atk-abh02a:177_2: paccuppannāni ārabbha paccuppannārammaṇā honti, paññattiṃ vā nibbānaṃ vā paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh02a:178_0: Tathā attano khandhadhātuāyatanāni ārabbha rajjantassa dussantassa muyhantassa saṃvarantassa
atk-abh02a:178_1: pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapentassa ajjhattārammaṇā honti, paresaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanāni ārabbha
atk-abh02a:178_3: kālena ajjhattaṃ kālena bahiddhā dhammesu evaṃ pavattentassa ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a:179_0: Iti bhagavā imaṃ khandhavibhaṅgaṃ suttantabhājanīyādivasena tayo parivaṭṭe nīharitvā
atk-abh02a:179_1: bhājento dassesi. Tīsupi hi parivaṭṭesu ekova paricchedo. Rūpakkhandho hi sabbattha
atk-abh02a:179_2: kāmāvacaroyeva. Cattāro khandhā catubhūmakā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitāti.
atk-abh02a:184: 154. Idāni tadanantare āyatanavibhaṅganiddese suttantabhājanīyaṃ tāva dassento dvādasāyatanāni cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanantiādimāha. Tattha pāḷimuttakena tāva nayena –
atk-abh02a:187_0: Tattha visesato tāva cakkhatīti cakkhu; rūpaṃ assādeti, vibhāveti cāti attho. Rūpayatīti
atk-abh02a:187_1: rūpaṃ; vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti attho. Suṇātīti sotaṃ.
atk-abh02a:187_2: Sappatīti saddo; udāhariyatīti attho. Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Gandhayatīti gandho; attano
atk-abh02a:187_3: vatthuṃ sūcayatīti attho. Jīvitaṃ avhāyatīti jivhā. Rasanti taṃ sattāti raso; assādentīti
atk-abh02a:187_4: attho. Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyoti kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso. Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:187_5: Manatīti mano. Attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārayantīti dhammā.
atk-abh02a:188_0: Avisesato pana āyatanato, āyānaṃ tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:188_1: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā
atk-abh02a:188_2: kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭṭenti vāyamantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Te ca pana āyabhūte
atk-abh02a:188_3: dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārentīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idañca anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ
atk-abh02a:188_4: atīva āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati tāva nayanteva, pavattayantīti vuttaṃ
atk-abh02a:188_5: hoti. Iti sabbepi me dhammā āyatanato āyānaṃ tananato āyatassa ca nayanato ‘āyatanaṃ
atk-abh02a:189_1: kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu
atk-abh02a:189_2: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ āyatananti vuccati. “Suvaṇṇāyatanaṃ rajatāyatana”ntiādīsu ākaro. Sāsane
atk-abh02a:189_3: pana “manorame āyatane sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. “Dakkhiṇāpatho
atk-abh02a:189_4: gunnaṃ āyatana”ntiādīsu sañjātideso. “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati
atk-abh02a:190_0: Cakkhurūpādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo
atk-abh02a:190_1: nesaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ. Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā taṃ nissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti
atk-abh02a:190_2: cakkhādayo nesaṃ ākaro. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha tattha vatthudvārārammaṇavasena
atk-abh02a:190_3: samosaraṇato. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ sañjātideso; taṃ nissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva
atk-abh02a:190_4: uppattito. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tesaṃ abhāve abhāvatoti. Iti nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena,
atk-abh02a:190_5: ākaraṭṭhena, samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena, sañjātidesaṭṭhena, kāraṇaṭṭhenāti imehi kāraṇehi
atk-abh02a:190_6: ete dhammā ‘āyatanaṃ āyatana’nti vuccanti. Tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ
atk-abh02a:190_7: āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe… dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṃ tāvettha
atk-abh02a:191: ‘Lakkhaṇato’ti cakkhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇatopettha viññātabbo vinicchayo. Tāni ca pana nesaṃ lakkhaṇāni heṭṭhā rūpakaṇḍaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:192_0: ‘Tāvatvato’ti tāvabhāvato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – cakkhādayopi hi dhammā eva. Evaṃ sati
atk-abh02a:192_1: dhammāyatanamicceva avatvā kasmā dvādasāyatanāni vuttānīti ce? Cha viññāṇakāyuppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato.
atk-abh02a:192_2: Idha channaṃ viññāṇakāyānaṃ dvārabhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena ca vavatthānato ayameva
atk-abh02a:192_3: tesaṃ bhedo hotīti dvādasa vuttāni. Cakkhuviññāṇavīthipariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa
atk-abh02a:192_4: cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṃ, rūpāyatanameva cārammaṇaṃ. Tathā itarāni itaresaṃ.
atk-abh02a:192_5: Chaṭṭhassa pana bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto manāyatanekadesova uppattidvāraṃ, asādhāraṇañca
atk-abh02a:192_6: dhammāyatanaṃ ārammaṇanti. Iti channaṃ viññāṇakāyānaṃ uppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato
atk-abh02a:193_0: ‘Kamato’ti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati. Ajjhattikesu
atk-abh02a:193_1: hi āyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighavisayattā cakkhāyatanaṃ pākaṭanti paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:193_3: bahūpakārattā ajjhattikesu cakkhāyatanasotāyatanāni paṭhamaṃ desitāni. Tato ghānāyatanādīni
atk-abh02a:193_4: tīṇi. Pañcannampi gocaravisayattā ante manāyatanaṃ. Cakkhādīnaṃ pana gocarattā tassa
atk-abh02a:193_5: tassa anantarāni bāhiresu rūpāyatanādīni. Apica viññāṇuppattikāraṇavavatthānatopi
atk-abh02a:193_6: ayameva tesaṃ kamo veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…
atk-abh02a:193_7: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”nti evaṃ ‘kamato’pettha viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:194: ‘Saṅkhepavitthārā’ti saṅkhepato hi manāyatanassa ceva dhammāyatanekadesassa ca nāmena, tadavasesānañca āyatanānaṃ rūpena saṅgahitattā dvādasāpi āyatanāni nāmarūpamattameva honti.
atk-abh02a:195_0: Vitthārato pana ajjhattikesu tāva cakkhāyatanaṃ jātivasena cakkhupasādamattameva,
atk-abh02a:195_1: paccayagatinikāyapuggalabhedato pana anantappabhedaṃ. Tathā sotāyatanādīni cattāri.
atk-abh02a:195_3: pana anantappabhedaṃ. Rūpagandharasāyatanāni samuṭṭhānabhedato catuppabhedāni, saddāyatanaṃ
atk-abh02a:195_4: dvippabhedaṃ. Sabhāgavisabhāgabhedato pana sabbānipi anantappabhedāni. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
atk-abh02a:196_0: ‘Daṭṭhabbato’ti ettha pana sabbānevetāni āyatanāni anāgamanato aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-abh02a:196_1: Na hi tāni pubbe udayā kutoci āgacchanti, nāpi uddhaṃ vayā kuhiñci gacchanti; atha
atk-abh02a:196_2: kho pubbe udayā appaṭiladdhasabhāvāni, uddhaṃ vayā paribhinnasabhāvāni, pubbantāparantavemajjhe
atk-abh02a:196_3: paccayāyattavuttitāya avasāni pavattanti. Tasmā anāgamanato aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-abh02a:196_4: Tathā nirīhato abyāpārato ca. Na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṃ evaṃ hoti – ‘aho vata amhākaṃ
atk-abh02a:196_5: sāmaggiyā viññāṇaṃ nāma uppajjeyyā’ti, na ca tāni viññāṇuppādanatthaṃ dvārabhāvena
atk-abh02a:196_6: vatthubhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena vā īhanti, na byāpāramāpajjanti; atha kho dhammatāvesā
atk-abh02a:196_7: yaṃ cakkhurūpādīnaṃ sāmaggiyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīni sambhavanti. Tasmā nirīhato abyāpārato
atk-abh02a:196_8: ca daṭṭhabbāni. Apica ajjhattikāni suññagāmo viya daṭṭhabbāni dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitattā,
atk-abh02a:196_9: bāhirāni gāmaghātakacorā viya ajjhattikānaṃ abhighātakattā. Vuttañhetaṃ – “cakkhu,
atk-abh02a:196_10: bhikkhave, haññati manāpāmanāpehi rūpehīti vitthāro. Apica ajjhattikāni cha pāṇakā
atk-abh02a:196_11: viya daṭṭhabbāni, bāhirāni tesaṃ gocarā viyāti. Evampettha ‘daṭṭhabbato’ viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh02a:197_0: Idāni tesaṃ vipassitabbākāraṃ dassetuṃ cakkhuṃ aniccantiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha cakkhu
atk-abh02a:197_1: tāva hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccanti veditabbaṃ. Aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi aniccaṃ –
atk-abh02a:198_0: Tadeva paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhaṃ. Yasmā vā etaṃ uppannaṃ ṭhitiṃ pāpuṇāti, ṭhitiyaṃ
atk-abh02a:198_1: jarāya kilamati, jaraṃ patvā avassaṃ bhijjati; tasmā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanato, dukkhamato,
atk-abh02a:198_2: dukkhavatthuto, sukhapaṭikkhepatoti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:199_0: Avasavattanaṭṭhena pana anattā. Yasmā vā etaṃ uppannaṃ ṭhitiṃ mā pāpuṇātu, ṭhānappattaṃ
atk-abh02a:199_1: mā jiratu, jarappataṃ mā bhijjatūti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu kassaci vasavattibhāvo natthi,
atk-abh02a:199_2: suññaṃ tena vasavattanākārena; tasmā suññato, assāmikato, akāmakāriyato, attapaṭikkhepatoti
atk-abh02a:200_1: vipariṇāmadhammaṃ. Idaṃ aniccavevacanameva. Rūpā aniccātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Apicettha
atk-abh02a:200_2: ṭhapetvā cakkhuṃ tebhūmakadhammā aniccā, no cakkhu. Cakkhu pana cakkhu ceva aniccañca.
atk-abh02a:200_3: Tathā sesadhammā dukkhā, no cakkhu. Cakkhu pana cakkhu ceva dukkhañca. Sesadhammā
atk-abh02a:200_4: anattā, no cakkhu. Cakkhu pana cakkhu ceva anattā cāti. Rūpādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:201_0: Imasmiṃ pana suttantabhājanīye tathāgatena kiṃ dassitanti? Dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ
atk-abh02a:201_1: anattalakkhaṇaṃ. Sammāsambuddho hi anattalakkhaṇaṃ dassento aniccena vā dasseti,
atk-abh02a:201_2: dukkhena vā, aniccadukkhehi vā. Tattha “cakkhu, attāti yo vadeyya, taṃ na upapajjati.
atk-abh02a:201_3: Cakkhussa uppādopi vayopi paññāyati. Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati ‘attā
atk-abh02a:201_4: me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṃ hoti. Tasmā taṃ na upapajjati – cakkhu
atk-abh02a:201_5: attāti yo vadeyya iti cakkhu anattā”ti. Imasmiṃ sutte aniccena anattalakkhaṇaṃ dassesi.
atk-abh02a:201_6: “Rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, anattā. Rūpañca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, na yidaṃ rūpaṃ
atk-abh02a:201_7: ābādhāya saṃvatteyya; labbhetha ca rūpe – evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosīti.
atk-abh02a:201_8: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ anattā tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati; na ca labbhati
atk-abh02a:201_9: rūpe – evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī”ti imasmiṃ sutte dukkhena anattalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:201_10: dassesi. “Rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ, yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā,
atk-abh02a:201_11: yadanattā taṃ netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā”tiādīsu aniccadukkhehi anattalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:202_0: Hatthato hi taṭṭake vā sarake vā kismiñcideva vā patitvā bhinne ‘aho anicca’nti vadanti.
atk-abh02a:202_1: Evaṃ aniccaṃ pākaṭaṃ nāma. Attabhāvasmiṃ pana gaṇḍapiḷakādīsu vā uṭṭhitāsu khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi
atk-abh02a:202_2: vā viddhāsu ‘aho dukkha’nti vadanti. Evaṃ dukkhaṃ pākaṭaṃ nāma. Anattalakkhaṇaṃ apākaṭaṃ
atk-abh02a:202_3: andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ duppaṭivijjhaṃ duddīpanaṃ duppaññāpanaṃ. Aniccadukkhalakkhaṇāni
atk-abh02a:202_4: uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā paññāyanti. Anattalakkhaṇaṃ vinā buddhuppādā na
atk-abh02a:202_5: paññāyati, buddhuppādeyeva paññāyati. Mahiddhikā hi mahānubhāvā tāpasaparibbājakā
atk-abh02a:202_6: sarabhaṅgasatthārādayopi ‘aniccaṃ dukkha’nti vattuṃ sakkonti, ‘anattā’ti vattuṃ na
atk-abh02a:202_7: sakkonti. Sace hi te sampattaparisāya anattāti vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyuṃ, sampattaparisāya
atk-abh02a:202_8: maggaphalapaṭivedho bhaveyya. Anattalakkhaṇapaññāpanañhi aññassa kassaci avisayo,
atk-abh02a:202_9: sabbaññubuddhānameva visayo. Evametaṃ anattalakkhaṇaṃ apākaṭaṃ. Tasmā satthā anattalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:202_10: dassento aniccena vā dassesi, dukkhena vā, aniccadukkhehi vā. Idha pana taṃ aniccadukkhehi
atk-abh02a:203_0: Imāni pana lakkhaṇāni kissa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, kena paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhahanti?
atk-abh02a:203_1: Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ tāva udayabbayānaṃ amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, santatiyā paṭicchannattā,
atk-abh02a:203_2: na upaṭṭhāti. Dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, iriyāpathehi
atk-abh02a:203_3: paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhāti. Anattalakkhaṇaṃ nānādhātuvinibbhogassa amanasikārā
atk-abh02a:203_4: appaṭivedhā, ghanena paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhāti. Udayabbayaṃ pana pariggahetvā
atk-abh02a:203_5: santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ
atk-abh02a:203_6: manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Nānādhātuyo
atk-abh02a:203_7: vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhoge kate anattalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:204_0: Ettha ca aniccaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, dukkhaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ, anattā anattalakkhaṇanti
atk-abh02a:204_1: ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha aniccanti khandhapañcakaṃ. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā,
atk-abh02a:204_2: hutvā abhāvato vā; uppādavayaññathattaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, hutvā abhāvasaṅkhāto ākāravikāro
atk-abh02a:204_3: vā. “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato pana tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ dukkhaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:204_5: anattā”ti pana vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ anattā. Kasmā? Avasavattanato; avasavattanākāro
atk-abh02a:204_6: anattalakkhaṇaṃ. Iti aññadeva aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, aññāni aniccadukkhānattalakkhaṇāni.
atk-abh02a:204_7: Pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti idañhi sabbampi aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:205: Saṅkhepato panettha dasāyatanāni kāmāvacarāni, dve tebhūmakāni. Sabbesupi sammasanacāro kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:208_0: 155. Abhidhammabhājanīye yathā heṭṭhā vipassakānaṃ upakāratthāya “cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpāyatana”nti
atk-abh02a:208_1: yugalato āyatanāni vuttāni, tathā avatvā ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ sabbākārato sabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:209: 156. Tesaṃ niddesavāre tattha katamaṃ cakkhāyatanantiādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:210_0: 167. Yaṃ panetaṃ dhammāyatananiddese “tattha katamā asaṅkhatā dhātu? Rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo
atk-abh02a:210_1: mohakkhayo”ti vuttaṃ, tatrāyamattho – asaṅkhatā dhātūti asaṅkhatasabhāvaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:210_2: Yasmā panetaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyanti, tasmā rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti
atk-abh02a:211_0: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha – ‘pāṭiyekkaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma natthi, kilesakkhayova nibbāna’nti.
atk-abh02a:211_1: ‘Suttaṃ āharā’ti ca vutte “nibbānaṃ nibbānanti kho, āvuso sāriputta, vuccati; katamaṃ
atk-abh02a:211_2: nu kho, āvuso, nibbānanti? Yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo – idaṃ
atk-abh02a:211_3: vuccati nibbāna”nti etaṃ jambukhādakasuttaṃ āharitvā ‘iminā suttena veditabbaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ
atk-abh02a:211_4: nibbānaṃ nāma natthi, kilesakkhayova nibbāna’nti āha. So vattabbo – ‘kiṃ pana yathā
atk-abh02a:211_5: cetaṃ suttaṃ tathā attho’ti? Addhā vakkhati – ‘āma, natthi suttato muñcitvā attho’ti.
atk-abh02a:211_6: Tato vattabbo – ‘idaṃ tāva te suttaṃ ābhataṃ; anantarasuttaṃ āharā’ti. Anantarasuttaṃ
atk-abh02a:211_7: nāma – “arahattaṃ arahattanti, āvuso sāriputta, vuccati; katamaṃ nu kho, āvuso, arahattanti?
atk-abh02a:211_8: Yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo – idaṃ vuccati arahatta”nti idaṃ
atk-abh02a:212_0: Imasmiṃ pana naṃ ābhate āhaṃsu – ‘nibbānaṃ nāma dhammāyatanapariyāpanno dhammo, arahattaṃ
atk-abh02a:212_1: cattāro khandhā. Nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā viharanto dhammasenāpati nibbānaṃ pucchitopi
atk-abh02a:212_2: arahattaṃ pucchitopi kilesakkhayameva āha. Kiṃ pana nibbānañca arahattañca ekaṃ udāhu
atk-abh02a:212_3: nāna’nti? ‘Ekaṃ vā hotu nānaṃ vā. Ko ettha tayā atibahuṃ cuṇṇīkaraṇaṃ karontena attho’?
atk-abh02a:212_4: ‘Na tvaṃ ekaṃ nānaṃ jānāsīti. Nanu ñāte sādhu hotī’ti evaṃ punappunaṃ pucchito vañcetuṃ
atk-abh02a:212_5: asakkonto āha – ‘rāgādīnaṃ khīṇante uppannattā arahattaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo’ti
atk-abh02a:212_6: vuccatīti. Tato naṃ āhaṃsu – ‘mahākammaṃ te kataṃ. Lañjaṃ datvāpi taṃ vadāpento etadeva
atk-abh02a:212_7: vadāpeyya. Yatheva ca te etaṃ vibhajitvā kathitaṃ, evaṃ idampi sallakkhehi – nibbānañhi
atk-abh02a:212_8: āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuttaṃ. Tīṇipi
atk-abh02a:213_0: Sace evaṃ vutte saññattiṃ gacchati iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce, bahunibbānatāya kāretabbo.
atk-abh02a:213_1: Kathaṃ? Evaṃ tāva pucchitabbo – ‘rāgakkhayo nāma rāgasseva khayo udāhu dosamohānampi?
atk-abh02a:213_2: Dosakkhayo nāma dosasseva khayo udāhu rāgamohānampi? Mohakkhayo nāma mohasseva khayo
atk-abh02a:213_3: udāhu rāgadosānampī’ti? Addhā vakkhati – ‘rāgakkhayo nāma rāgasseva khayo, dosakkhayo
atk-abh02a:213_4: nāma dosasseva khayo, mohakkhayo nāma mohasseva khayo’ti.
atk-abh02a:214_0: Tato vattabbo – ‘tava vāde rāgakkhayo ekaṃ nibbānaṃ hoti, dosakkhayo ekaṃ, mohakkhayo
atk-abh02a:214_1: ekaṃ; tiṇṇaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ khaye tīṇi nibbānāni honti, catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ khaye
atk-abh02a:214_2: cattāri, pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ khaye pañca, channaṃ taṇhākāyānaṃ khaye cha, sattannaṃ
atk-abh02a:214_3: anusayānaṃ khaye satta, aṭṭhannaṃ micchattānaṃ khaye aṭṭha, navannaṃ taṇhāmūlakadhammānaṃ
atk-abh02a:214_4: khaye nava, dasannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khaye dasa, diyaḍḍhakilesasahassassa khaye pāṭiyekkaṃ
atk-abh02a:214_5: pāṭiyekkaṃ nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti. Natthi pana te nibbānānaṃ pamāṇanti.
atk-abh02a:214_6: Evaṃ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo
atk-abh02a:214_7: dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati. Tīṇipi hetāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānīti gaṇha’.
atk-abh02a:215_0: Sace pana evaṃ vuttepi na sallakkheti, oḷārikatāya kāretabbo. Kathaṃ? ‘Andhabālā
atk-abh02a:215_1: hi acchadīpimigamakkaṭādayopi kilesapariyuṭṭhitā vatthuṃ paṭisevanti. Atha nesaṃ
atk-abh02a:215_2: paṭisevanapariyante kileso vūpasammati. Tava vāde acchadīpimigamakkaṭādayo nibbānappattā
atk-abh02a:215_3: nāma honti. Oḷārikaṃ vata te nibbānaṃ thūlaṃ, kaṇṇehi piḷandhituṃ na sakkāti. Evaṃ
atk-abh02a:215_4: pana aggahetvā nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo
atk-abh02a:215_5: mohakkhayoti vuccati. Tīṇipi hetāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānīti gaṇha’.
atk-abh02a:216_0: Sace pana evaṃ vuttepi na sallakkheti, gotrabhunāpi kāretabbo. Kathaṃ? Evaṃ tāva
atk-abh02a:216_1: pucchitabbo – ‘tvaṃ gotrabhu nāma atthīti vadesī’ti? ‘Āma vadāmī’ti. ‘Gotrabhukkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:216_2: kilesā khīṇā, khīyanti, khīyissantī’ti? Na khīṇā, na khīyanti; apica kho khīyissantīti.
atk-abh02a:216_3: ‘Gotrabhu pana kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotī’ti? ‘Nibbānaṃ’. ‘Tava gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesā na
atk-abh02a:216_4: khīṇā, na khīyanti; atha kho khīyissanti. Tvaṃ akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu kilesakkhayaṃ
atk-abh02a:216_5: nibbānaṃ paññapesi, appahīnesu anusayesu anusayappahānaṃ nibbānaṃ paññapesi. Taṃ
atk-abh02a:216_6: te na sameti. Evaṃ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṃ
atk-abh02a:216_7: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati. Tīṇipi hetāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānīti gaṇha’.
atk-abh02a:217_0: Sace pana evaṃ vuttepi na sallakkheti, maggena kāretabbo. Kathaṃ? Evaṃ tāva pucchitabbo
atk-abh02a:217_1: – ‘tvaṃ maggaṃ nāma vadesī’ti? ‘Āma vademī’ti. ‘Maggakkhaṇe kilesā khīṇā, khīyanti,
atk-abh02a:217_2: khiyissantī’ti? Jānamāno vakkhati – ‘khīṇāti vā khīyissantīti vā vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a:217_3: khīyantīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti. ‘Yadi evaṃ, maggassa kilesakkhayaṃ nibbānaṃ katamaṃ?
atk-abh02a:217_4: Maggena khīyanakakilesā katame? Maggo katamaṃ kilesakkhayaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
atk-abh02a:217_5: katame kilese khepeti? Tasmā mā evaṃ gaṇha. Nibbānaṃ pana āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti
atk-abh02a:217_6: ekameva nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati. Tīṇipi hetāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānī’ti.
atk-abh02a:218_0: Evaṃ vutte evamāha – ‘tvaṃ āgamma āgammāti vadesī’ti? ‘Āma vademī’ti. ‘Āgamma nāmāti
atk-abh02a:218_1: idaṃ te kuto laddha’nti? ‘Suttato laddha’nti. ‘Āhara sutta’nti. “Evaṃ avijjā ca taṇhā
atk-abh02a:218_2: ca taṃ āgamma, tamhi khīṇā, tamhi bhaggā, na ca kiñci kadācī”ti. Evaṃ vutte paravādī
atk-abh02a:219: Idhāpi dasāyatanāni kāmāvacarāni, dve pana catubhūmakāni lokiyalokuttaramissakānīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:222_0: 168. Idhāpi pañhāpucchake yaṃ labbhati yañca na labbhati, taṃ sabbaṃ pucchitvā labbhamānavaseneva
atk-abh02a:222_1: vissajjanaṃ vuttaṃ; na kevalañca idha, sabbesupi pañhāpucchakesu eseva nayo. Idha
atk-abh02a:222_2: pana dasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ rūpabhāvena abyākatatā veditabbā. Dvinnaṃ āyatanānaṃ khandhavibhaṅge
atk-abh02a:222_3: catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ viya kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Kevalañhi cattāro khandhā sappaccayāva
atk-abh02a:222_4: saṅkhatāva dhammāyatanaṃ pana “siyā appaccayaṃ, siyā asaṅkhata”nti āgataṃ. Ārammaṇattikesu
atk-abh02a:222_5: ca anārammaṇaṃ sukhumarūpasaṅkhātaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ na-vattabbakoṭṭhāsaṃ bhajati. Tañca
atk-abh02a:222_6: kho anārammaṇattā na parittādibhāvena navattabbadhammārammaṇattāti ayamettha viseso.
atk-abh02a:222_7: Sesaṃ tādisameva. Idhāpi hi cattāro khandhā viya dvāyatanā pañcapaṇṇāsa kāmāvacaradhamme
atk-abh02a:222_8: ārabbha rajjantassa dussantassa muyhantassa saṃvarantassa sammasantassa paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh02a:227_0: 172. Idāni tadanantare dhātuvibhaṅge sabbā dhātuyo chahi chahi dhātūhi saṅkhipitvā
atk-abh02a:227_1: tīhi chakkehi suttantabhājanīyaṃ dassento cha dhātuyotiādimāha. Tattha chāti gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-abh02a:227_2: Dhātuyoti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ. Pathavīdhātūtiādīsu dhātvaṭṭho nāma sabhāvaṭṭho,
atk-abh02a:227_3: sabhāvaṭṭho nāma suññataṭṭho, suññataṭṭho nāma nissattaṭṭhoti evaṃ sabhāvasuññatanissattaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:227_4: pathavīyeva dhātu pathavīdhātu. Āpodhātuādīsupi eseva nayo. Evamettha padasamāsaṃ
atk-abh02a:227_5: viditvā evamattho veditabbo – pathavīdhātūti patiṭṭhānadhātu. Āpodhātūti ābandhanadhātu.
atk-abh02a:227_6: Tejodhātūti paripācanadhātu. Vāyodhātūti vitthambhanadhātu. Ākāsadhātūti asamphuṭṭhadhātu.
atk-abh02a:228_0: 173. Pathavīdhātudvayanti pathavīdhātu dve ayaṃ. Ayaṃ pathavīdhātu nāma na ekā eva
atk-abh02a:228_1: ajjhattikabāhirabhedena pana dve dhātuyo evāti attho. Tenevāha – “atthi ajjhattikā
atk-abh02a:228_2: atthi bāhirā”ti. Tattha ajjhattikāti sattasantānapariyāpannā niyakajjhattā. Bāhirāti
atk-abh02a:228_3: saṅkhārasantānapariyāpannā anindriyabaddhā. Ajjhattaṃ paccattanti ubhayampetaṃ niyakajjhattādhivacanameva.
atk-abh02a:228_4: Idāni taṃ sabhāvākārato dassetuṃ kakkhaḷantiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kakkhaḷanti thaddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:228_5: Kharigatanti pharusaṃ. Kakkhaḷattanti kakkhaḷabhāvo. Kakkhaḷabhāvoti kakkhaḷasabhāvo.
atk-abh02a:228_6: Ajjhattaṃ upādinnanti niyakajjhattasaṅkhātaṃ upādinnaṃ. Upādinnaṃ nāma sarīraṭṭhakaṃ.
atk-abh02a:228_7: Sarīraṭṭhakañhi kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ vā hotu mā vā, taṃ sandhāya upādinnampi atthi anupādinnampi;
atk-abh02a:228_8: ādinnaggahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena pana sabbampetaṃ upādinnamevāti dassetuṃ “ajjhattaṃ upādinna”nti āha.
atk-abh02a:229_0: Idāni tameva pathavīdhātuṃ vatthuvasena dassetuṃ seyyathidaṃ kesā lomātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:229_1: Tattha seyyathidanti nipāto. Tassattho – yā sā ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu sā katamā?
atk-abh02a:229_2: Yaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ nāma taṃ katamanti? Kesā lomātiādi tassā ajjhattikāya
atk-abh02a:229_3: pathavīdhātuyā vatthuvasena pabhedadassanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kesā nāma ajjhattā
atk-abh02a:229_4: upādinnā sarīraṭṭhakā kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso. Lomā
atk-abh02a:229_5: nāma…pe… karīsaṃ nāma. Idha pana avuttampi paṭisambhidāmagge pāḷiāruḷhaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ
atk-abh02a:229_6: āharitvā matthaluṅgaṃ nāma ajjhattaṃ upādinnaṃ sarīraṭṭhakaṃ kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:229_7: imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso. Parato āpodhātuādīnaṃ niddese pittādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:230_0: Iminā kiṃ dassitaṃ hoti? Dhātumanasikāro. Imasmiṃ pana dhātumanasikāre kammaṃ katvā
atk-abh02a:230_1: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇitukāmena kiṃ kattabbaṃ? Catupārisuddhisīlaṃ
atk-abh02a:230_2: sodhetabbaṃ. Sīlavato hi kammaṭṭhānabhāvanā ijjhati. Tassa sodhanavidhānaṃ visuddhimagge
atk-abh02a:230_3: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Visuddhasīlena pana sīle patiṭṭhāya dasa pubbapalibodhā
atk-abh02a:230_4: chinditabbā. Tesampi chindanavidhānaṃ visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Chinnapalibodhena
atk-abh02a:230_6: uggaṇhāpentena sattavidhaṃ uggahakosallaṃ dasavidhañca manasikārakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:230_7: Antevāsikenāpi ācariyassa santike bahuvāre sajjhāyaṃ katvā nijjaṭaṃ paguṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:230_8: kātabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ – “ādikammikena bhikkhunā jarāmaraṇā muccitukāmena
atk-abh02a:230_9: sattahākārehi uggahakosallaṃ icchitabbaṃ, dasahākārehi manasikārakosallaṃ icchitabba”nti.
atk-abh02a:231_0: Tattha vacasā, manasā, vaṇṇato, saṇṭhānato, disato, okāsato, paricchedatoti imehi
atk-abh02a:231_3: lakkhaṇato, tayo ca suttantāti imehi dasahākārehi ‘manasikārakosallaṃ’ icchitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:232_0: Evaṃ uggahitakammaṭṭhānena pana visuddhimagge vutte aṭṭhārasa senāsanadose vajjetvā
atk-abh02a:232_1: pañcaṅgasamannāgate senāsane vasantena attanāpi pañcahi padhāniyaṅgehi samannāgatena
atk-abh02a:232_4: manasikaritvā avasāne evaṃ manasikāro pavattetabbo – ime kesā nāma sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacamme
atk-abh02a:232_5: jātā. Tattha yathā vammikamatthake jātesu kuṇṭhatiṇesu na vammikamatthako jānāti
atk-abh02a:232_6: ‘mayi kuṇṭhatiṇāni jātānī’ti, nāpi kuṇṭhatiṇāni jānanti ‘mayaṃ vammikamatthake jātānī’ti,
atk-abh02a:232_7: evameva na sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti ‘mayi kesā jātā’ti, nāpi kesā jānanti
atk-abh02a:232_9: dhammā. Iti kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
atk-abh02a:233_0: Lomā sarīraveṭhanacamme jātā. Tattha yathā suññagāmaṭṭhāne jātesu dabbatiṇesu na
atk-abh02a:233_1: suññagāmaṭṭhānaṃ jānāti ‘mayi dabbatiṇāni jātānī’ti, nāpi dabbatiṇāni jānanti ‘mayaṃ
atk-abh02a:233_2: suññagāmaṭṭhāne jātānī’ti, evameva na sarīraveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti ‘mayi lomā jātā’ti,
atk-abh02a:233_3: nāpi lomā jānanti ‘mayaṃ sarīraveṭhanacamme jātā’ti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:233_4: ete dhammā. Iti lomā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:234_0: Nakhā aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu jātā. Tattha yathā kumārakesu daṇḍakehi madhukaṭṭhike vijjhitvā
atk-abh02a:234_1: kīḷantesu na daṇḍakā jānanti ‘amhesu madhukaṭṭhikā ṭhapitā’ti, nāpi madhukaṭṭhikā
atk-abh02a:234_2: jānanti ‘mayaṃ daṇḍakesu ṭhapitā’ti, evameva na aṅguliyo jānanti ‘amhākaṃ aggesu
atk-abh02a:234_3: nakhā jātā’ti, nāpi nakhā jānanti ‘mayaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu jātā’ti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:234_4: ete dhammā. Iti nakhā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:235_0: Dantā hanukaṭṭhikesu jātā. Tattha yathā vaḍḍhakīhi pāsāṇaudukkhalesu kenacideva silesajātena
atk-abh02a:235_1: bandhitvā ṭhapitathambhesu na udukkhalāni jānanti ‘amhesu thambhā ṭhitā’ti, nāpi
atk-abh02a:235_2: thambhā jānanti ‘mayaṃ udukkhalesu ṭhitā’ti, evameva na hanukaṭṭhikā jānanti ‘amhesu
atk-abh02a:235_3: dantā jātā’ti, nāpi dantā jānanti ‘mayaṃ hanukaṭṭhikesu jātā’ti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:235_4: ete dhammā. Iti dantā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:236_0: Taco sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhito. Tattha yathā allagocammapariyonaddhāya
atk-abh02a:236_1: mahāvīṇāya na mahāvīṇā jānāti ‘ahaṃ allagocammena pariyonaddhā’ti, nāpi allagocammaṃ
atk-abh02a:236_2: jānāti ‘mayā mahāvīṇā pariyoddhā’ti, evameva na sarīraṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ tacena pariyonaddha’nti,
atk-abh02a:236_3: nāpi taco jānāti ‘mayā sarīraṃ pariyonaddhanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:236_4: ete dhammā. Iti taco nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:237_0: Maṃsaṃ aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaṃ anulimpitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā mahāmattikāya littāya bhittiyā
atk-abh02a:237_1: na bhitti jānāti ‘ahaṃ mahāmattikāya littā’ti, nāpi mahāmattikā jānāti ‘mayā mahābhitti
atk-abh02a:237_2: littā’ti, evameva na aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo jānāti ‘ahaṃ navamaṃsapesisatappabhedena maṃsena
atk-abh02a:237_3: litto’ti, nāpi maṃsaṃ jānāti ‘mayā aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo litto’ti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:237_4: ete dhammā. Iti maṃsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:238_0: Nhāru sarīrabbhantare aṭṭhīni ābandhamānā ṭhitā. Tattha yathā vallīhi vinaddhesu
atk-abh02a:238_1: kuṭṭadārūsu na kuṭṭadārūni jānanti ‘mayaṃ vallīhi vinaddhānī’ti, nāpi valliyo jānanti
atk-abh02a:238_2: ‘amhehi kuṭṭadārūni vinaddhānī’ti, evameva na aṭṭhīni jānanti ‘mayaṃ nhārūhi ābaddhānī’ti,
atk-abh02a:238_3: nāpi nhārū jānanti ‘amhehi aṭṭhīni ābaddhānī’ti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:238_4: ete dhammā. Iti nhāru nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:239_0: Aṭṭhīsu paṇhikaṭṭhi gopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Gopphakaṭṭhi jaṅghaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-abh02a:239_1: ṭhitaṃ. Jaṅghaṭṭhi ūruṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Ūruṭṭhi kaṭiṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:239_2: Kaṭiṭṭhi piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Piṭṭhikaṇṭako gīvaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhito.
atk-abh02a:239_3: Gīvaṭṭhi sīsaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Sīsaṭṭhi gīvaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṃ. Gīvaṭṭhi piṭṭhikaṇṭake
atk-abh02a:239_4: patiṭṭhitaṃ. Piṭṭhikaṇṭako kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhito. Kaṭiṭṭhi ūruṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:239_5: Ūruṭṭhi jaṅghaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṃ. Jaṅghaṭṭhi gopphakaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṃ. Gopphakaṭṭhi
atk-abh02a:240_0: Tattha yathā iṭṭhakadārugomayādisañcayesu na heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā jānanti ‘mayaṃ uparime
atk-abh02a:240_1: uparime ukkhipitvā ṭhitā’ti, nāpi uparimā uparimā jānanti ‘mayaṃ heṭṭhimesu heṭṭhimesu
atk-abh02a:240_2: patiṭṭhitā’ti, evameva na paṇhikaṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ gopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:240_3: na gopphakaṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti, na jaṅghaṭṭhi jānāti
atk-abh02a:240_4: ‘ahaṃ ūruṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti, na ūruṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ kaṭiṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-abh02a:240_5: ṭhita’nti, na kaṭiṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti, na piṭṭhikaṇṭako
atk-abh02a:240_6: jānāti ‘ahaṃ gīvaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhito’ti, na gīvaṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ sīsaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-abh02a:240_7: ṭhita’nti, na sīsaṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ gīvaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhita’nti, na gīvaṭṭhi jānāti
atk-abh02a:240_8: ‘ahaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭake patiṭṭhita’nti, na piṭṭhikaṇṭako jānāti ‘ahaṃ kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhito’ti,
atk-abh02a:240_9: na kaṭiṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ ūruṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhita’nti, na ūruṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhimhi
atk-abh02a:240_10: patiṭṭhita’nti, na jaṅghaṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ gopphakaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhita’nti, na gopphakaṭṭhi
atk-abh02a:240_12: ete dhammā. Iti aṭṭhi nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:241_0: Aṭṭhimiñjaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā veḷupabbādīnaṃ anto
atk-abh02a:241_1: pakkhittesu sinnavettaggādīsu na veḷupabbādīni jānanti ‘amhesu vettaggādīni pakkhittānī’ti,
atk-abh02a:241_2: nāpi vettaggādīni jānanti ‘mayaṃ veḷupabbādīsu ṭhitānīti, evameva na aṭṭhīni jānanti
atk-abh02a:241_3: ‘amhākaṃ anto aṭṭhimiñjaṃ ṭhita’nti, nāpi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ anto
atk-abh02a:241_4: ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti aṭṭhimiñjaṃ nāma
atk-abh02a:241_5: imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:242_0: Vakkaṃ galavāṭakato nikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā
atk-abh02a:242_1: vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā vaṇṭupanibaddhe
atk-abh02a:242_2: ambaphaladvaye na vaṇṭaṃ jānāti ‘mayā ambaphaladvayaṃ upanibaddha’nti, nāpi ambaphaladvayaṃ
atk-abh02a:242_3: jānāti ‘ahaṃ vaṇṭena upanibaddha’nti, evameva na thūlanhāru jānāti ‘mayā vakkaṃ upanibaddha’nti,
atk-abh02a:242_4: nāpi vakkaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ thūlanhārunā upanibaddha’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:242_5: ete dhammā. Iti vakkaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:243_0: Hadayaṃ sarīrabbhantare uraṭṭhipañjaramajjhaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā jiṇṇasandamānikapañjarabbhantaraṃ
atk-abh02a:243_1: nissāya ṭhapitāya maṃsapesiyā na jiṇṇasandamānikapañjarabbhantaraṃ jānāti ‘maṃ nissāya
atk-abh02a:243_2: maṃsapesi ṭhapitā’ti, nāpi maṃsapesi jānāti ‘ahaṃ jiṇṇasandamānikapañjarabbhantaraṃ
atk-abh02a:243_3: nissāya ṭhitā’ti, evameva na uraṭṭhipañjarabbhantaraṃ jānāti ‘maṃ nissāya hadayaṃ
atk-abh02a:243_4: ṭhita’nti, nāpi hadayaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ uraṭṭhipañjarabbhantaraṃ nissāya ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:243_5: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti hadayaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
atk-abh02a:243_6: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:244_0: Yakanaṃ antosarīre dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh02a:244_1: yathā ukkhalikapālapassamhi lagge yamakamaṃsapiṇḍe na ukkhalikapālapassaṃ jānāti
atk-abh02a:244_2: ‘mayi yamakamaṃsapiṇḍo laggo’ti, nāpi yamakamaṃsapiṇḍo jānāti ‘ahaṃ ukkhalikapālapasse
atk-abh02a:244_3: laggo’ti, evameva na thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ jānāti ‘maṃ nissāya yakanaṃ
atk-abh02a:244_4: ṭhita’nti, nāpi yakanaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:244_5: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti yakanaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
atk-abh02a:244_6: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:245_0: Kilomakesu paṭicchannakilomakaṃ hadayañca vakkañca parivāretvā ṭhitaṃ, apaṭicchannakilomakaṃ
atk-abh02a:245_1: sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pilotikapaliveṭhite
atk-abh02a:245_2: maṃse na maṃsaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ pilotikāya paliveṭhita’nti, nāpi pilotikā jānāti ‘mayā
atk-abh02a:245_3: maṃsaṃ paliveṭhita’nti, evameva na vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre maṃsañca jānāti ‘ahaṃ
atk-abh02a:245_4: kilomakena paṭicchanna’nti, nāpi kilomakaṃ jānāti ‘mayā vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre
atk-abh02a:245_5: maṃsañca paṭicchanna’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti kilomakaṃ
atk-abh02a:245_6: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:246_0: Pihakaṃ hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh02a:246_1: yathā koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitāya gomayapiṇḍiyā na koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ
atk-abh02a:246_2: jānāti ‘gomayapiṇḍi maṃ nissāya ṭhitā’ti, nāpi gomayapiṇḍi jānāti ‘ahaṃ koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ
atk-abh02a:246_3: nissāya ṭhitā’ti, evameva na udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ jānāti ‘pihakaṃ maṃ nissāya
atk-abh02a:246_4: ṭhita’nti, nāpi pihakaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:246_5: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti pihakaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
atk-abh02a:246_6: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:247_0: Papphāsaṃ sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare hadayañca yakanañca uparichādetvā
atk-abh02a:247_1: olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare olambamāne sakuṇakulāvake na
atk-abh02a:247_2: jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantaraṃ jānāti ‘mayi sakuṇakulāvako olambamāno ṭhito’ti, nāpi sakuṇakulāvako
atk-abh02a:247_3: jānāti ‘ahaṃ jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare olambamāno ṭhito’ti, evameva na sarīrabbhantaraṃ
atk-abh02a:247_4: jānāti ‘mayi papphāsaṃ olambamānaṃ ṭhita’nti, nāpi papphāsaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ evarūpe
atk-abh02a:247_5: sarīrabbhantare olambamānaṃ ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā.
atk-abh02a:247_6: Iti papphāsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
atk-abh02a:248_0: Antaṃ galavāṭakato karīsamaggapariyante sarīrabbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā lohitadoṇikāya
atk-abh02a:248_1: obhujitvā ṭhapite chinnasīsadhamanikaḷevare na lohitadoṇi jānāti ‘mayi dhamanikaḷevaraṃ
atk-abh02a:248_2: ṭhita’nti, nāpi dhamanikaḷevaraṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ lohitadoṇikāyaṃ ṭhita’nti, evameva
atk-abh02a:248_3: na sarīrabbhantaraṃ jānāti ‘mayi antaṃ ṭhita’nti, nāpi antaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ sarīrabbhantare
atk-abh02a:248_4: ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti antaṃ nāma imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:248_5: sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:249_0: Antaguṇaṃ antantare ekavīsati antabhoge bandhitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ
atk-abh02a:249_1: sibbetvā ṭhitesu rajjukesu na pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ jānāti ‘rajjukā maṃ sibbetvā
atk-abh02a:249_2: ṭhitā’ti, nāpi rajjukā jānanti ‘mayaṃ pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ sibbetvā ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:249_3: evameva na antaṃ jānāti ‘antaguṇaṃ maṃ ābandhitvā ṭhita’nti, nāpi antaguṇaṃ jānāti
atk-abh02a:249_4: ‘ahaṃ antaṃ bandhitvā ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā.
atk-abh02a:249_5: Iti antaguṇaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
atk-abh02a:250_0: Udariyaṃ udare ṭhitaṃ asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ. Tattha yathā suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhite suvānavamathumhi
atk-abh02a:250_1: na suvānadoṇi jānāti ‘mayi suvānavamathu ṭhito’ti, nāpi suvānavamathu jānāti ‘ahaṃ
atk-abh02a:250_2: suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhito’ti, evameva na udaraṃ jānāti ‘mayi udariyaṃ ṭhita’nti, nāpi udariyaṃ
atk-abh02a:250_3: jānāti ‘ahaṃ udare ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti
atk-abh02a:250_4: udariyaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:251_0: Karīsaṃ pakkāsayasaṅkhāte aṭṭhaṅgulaveḷupabbasadise antapariyosāne ṭhitaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh02a:251_1: yathā veḷupabbe omadditvā pakkhittāya saṇhapaṇḍumattikāya na veḷupabbaṃ jānāti ‘mayi
atk-abh02a:251_2: paṇḍumattikā ṭhitā’ti, nāpi paṇḍumattikā jānāti ‘ahaṃ veḷupabbe ṭhitā’ti, evameva
atk-abh02a:251_3: na pakkāsayo jānāti ‘mayi karīsaṃ ṭhita’nti, nāpi karīsaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ pakkāsaye
atk-abh02a:251_4: ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti karīsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:251_5: sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:252_0: Matthaluṅgaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā purāṇalābukaṭāhe pakkhittāya
atk-abh02a:252_1: piṭṭhapiṇḍiyā na lābukaṭāhaṃ jānāti ‘mayi piṭṭhapiṇḍi ṭhitā’ti, nāpi piṭṭhapiṇḍi
atk-abh02a:252_2: jānāti ‘ahaṃ lābukaṭāhe ṭhitā’ti, evameva na sīsakaṭāhabbhantaraṃ jānāti ‘mayi matthaluṅgaṃ
atk-abh02a:252_3: ṭhita’nti, nāpi matthaluṅgaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ
atk-abh02a:252_4: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti matthaluṅgaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
atk-abh02a:252_5: koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:253: Yaṃ vā panaññampīti iminā āpokoṭṭhāsādīsu tīsu anugataṃ pathavīdhātuṃ lakkhaṇavasena yevāpanakaṃ pathaviṃ katvā dasseti.
atk-abh02a:254_0: Bāhirapathavīdhātuniddese ayoti kāḷalohaṃ. Lohanti jātilohaṃ, vijātilohaṃ, kittimalohaṃ,
atk-abh02a:254_1: pisācalohanti catubbidhaṃ. Tattha ayo, sajjhu, suvaṇṇaṃ, tipu, sīsaṃ, tambalohaṃ,
atk-abh02a:254_2: vekantakanti imāni satta jātilohāni nāma. Nāganāsikalohaṃ vijātilohaṃ nāma. Kaṃsalohaṃ,
atk-abh02a:254_3: vaṭṭalohaṃ, ārakūṭanti tīṇi kittimalohāni nāma. Morakkhakaṃ, puthukaṃ, malinakaṃ,
atk-abh02a:254_4: capalakaṃ, selakaṃ, āṭakaṃ, bhallakaṃ, dūsilohanti aṭṭha pisācalohāni nāma. Tesu
atk-abh02a:254_5: pañca jātilohāni pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ vuttāneva. Tambalohaṃ, vekantakalohanti imehi pana
atk-abh02a:254_6: dvīhi jātilohehi saddhiṃ sesaṃ sabbampi idha lohanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:255_0: Tipūti setatipu. Sīsanti kāḷatipu. Sajjhūti rajataṃ. Muttāti sāmuddikamuttā. Maṇīti
atk-abh02a:255_1: ṭhapetvā pāḷiāgate veḷuriyādayo seso jotirasādibhedo sabbopi maṇi. Veḷuriyoti vaṃsavaṇṇamaṇi.
atk-abh02a:255_2: Saṅkhoti sāmuddikasaṅkho. Silāti kāḷasilā, paṇḍusilā, setasilātiādibhedā sabbāpi
atk-abh02a:255_3: silā. Pavāḷanti pavāḷameva. Rajatanti kahāpaṇo. Jātarūpanti suvaṇṇaṃ. Lohitaṅkoti
atk-abh02a:255_4: rattamaṇi. Masāragallanti kabaramaṇi. Tiṇādīsu bahisārā antamaso nāḷikerādayopi tiṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:255_5: nāma. Antosāraṃ antamaso dārukhaṇḍampi kaṭṭhaṃ nāma. Sakkharāti muggamattato yāva
atk-abh02a:255_6: muṭṭhippamāṇā marumbā sakkharā nāma. Muggamattato pana heṭṭhā vālikāti vuccati. Kaṭhalanti
atk-abh02a:255_7: yaṃ kiñci kapālaṃ. Bhūmīti pathavī. Pāsāṇoti antomuṭṭhiyaṃ asaṇṭhahanato paṭṭhāya
atk-abh02a:255_8: hatthippamāṇaṃ asampatto pāsāṇo nāma. Hatthippamāṇato paṭṭhāya pana upari pabbato
atk-abh02a:255_9: nāma. Yaṃ vā panāti iminā tālaṭṭhi-nāḷikera-phalādibhedaṃ sesapathaviṃ gaṇhāti. Yā
atk-abh02a:255_10: ca ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu yā ca bāhirāti iminā dvepi pathavīdhātuyo kakkhaḷaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:256_0: 174. Āpodhātuniddesādīsu heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Āpo āpogatantiādīsu ābandhanavasena
atk-abh02a:256_1: āpo. Tadeva āposabhāvaṃ gatattā āpogataṃ nāma. Snehavasena sneho. Soyeva snehasabhāvaṃ
atk-abh02a:256_2: gatattā snehagataṃ nāma. Bandhanattaṃ rūpassāti avinibbhogarūpassa bandhanabhāvo.
atk-abh02a:256_3: Pittaṃ semhantiādīnipi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena pariggahetvā dhātuvaseneva manasikātabbāni.
atk-abh02a:257_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – pittesu hi abaddhapittaṃ jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā
atk-abh02a:257_1: ṭhitaṃ, baddhapittaṃ pittakosake ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pūvaṃ byāpetvā ṭhite tele na
atk-abh02a:257_2: pūvaṃ jānāti ‘telaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhita’nti, nāpi telaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ pūvaṃ byāpetvā
atk-abh02a:257_3: ṭhita’nti, evameva na sarīraṃ jānāti ‘abaddhapittaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhita’nti, nāpi
atk-abh02a:257_4: abaddhapittaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ sarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhita’nti. Yathā ca vassodakena puṇṇe
atk-abh02a:257_5: kosātakīkosake na kosātakīkosako jānāti ‘mayi vassodakaṃ ṭhita’nti, nāpi vassodakaṃ
atk-abh02a:257_6: jānāti ‘ahaṃ kosātakīkosake ṭhita’nti, evameva na pittakosako jānāti mayi baddhapittaṃ
atk-abh02a:257_7: ṭhitanti, nāpi baddhapittaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ pittakosake ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:257_8: ete dhammā. Iti pittaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:258_0: Semhaṃ ekapatthapūrappamāṇaṃ udarapaṭale ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā upari sañjātapheṇapaṭalāya
atk-abh02a:258_1: candanikāya na candanikā jānāti ‘mayi pheṇapaṭalaṃ ṭhita’nti, nāpi pheṇapaṭalaṃ jānāti
atk-abh02a:258_2: ‘ahaṃ candanikāya ṭhita’nti, evameva na udarapaṭalaṃ jānāti ‘mayi semhaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:258_3: nāpi semhaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ udarapaṭale ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:258_4: ete dhammā. Iti semhaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:259_0: Pubbo anibaddhokāso, yattha yattheva khāṇukaṇṭakappaharaṇaaggijālādīhi abhihaṭe sarīrappadese
atk-abh02a:259_1: lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā paccati, gaṇḍapīḷakādayo vā uppajjanti, tattha tattheva tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:259_2: Tattha yathā pharasuppahārādivasena paggharitaniyāse rukkhe na rukkhassa pharasuppahārādippadesā
atk-abh02a:259_3: jānanti ‘amhesu niyyāso ṭhito’ti, nāpi niyyāso jānāti ‘ahaṃ rukkhassa pharasuppahārādippadesesu
atk-abh02a:259_4: ṭhito’ti, evameva na sarīrassa khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi abhihaṭappadesā jānanti ‘amhesu pubbo
atk-abh02a:259_5: ṭhito’ti, nāpi pubbo jānāti ‘ahaṃ tesu padesesu ṭhito’ti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:259_6: ete dhammā. Iti pubbo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:260_0: Lohitesu saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ abaddhapittaṃ viya sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ. Sannicitalohitaṃ
atk-abh02a:260_2: tementaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Tattha saṃsaraṇalohite abaddhapittasadisova vinicchayo. Itaraṃ pana
atk-abh02a:260_3: yathā jajjarakapālaṭṭhe udake heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍāni temayamāne na leḍḍukhaṇḍāni jānanti
atk-abh02a:260_4: ‘mayaṃ udakena temiyamānā ṭhitā’ti, nāpi udakaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ leḍḍukhaṇḍāni tememī’ti,
atk-abh02a:260_5: evameva na yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ vakkādīni vā jānanti ‘mayi lohitaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:260_6: amhe vā temayamānaṃ ṭhita’nti, nāpi lohitaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā
atk-abh02a:260_7: vakkādīni temayamānaṃ ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā.
atk-abh02a:260_8: Iti lohitaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
atk-abh02a:261_0: Sedo aggisantāpādikālesu kesalomakūpavivarāni pūretvā tiṭṭhati ceva paggharati ca.
atk-abh02a:261_1: Tattha yathā udakā abbūḷhamattesu bhisamuḷālakumudanāḷakalāpesu na bhisādikalāpavivarāni
atk-abh02a:261_2: jānanti ‘amhehi udakaṃ paggharatī’ti, nāpi bhisādikalāpavivarehi paggharantaṃ udakaṃ
atk-abh02a:261_3: jānāti ‘ahaṃ bhisādikalāpavivarehi paggharāmī’ti, evameva na kesalomakūpavivarāni
atk-abh02a:261_4: jānanti ‘amhehi sedo paggharatī’ti, nāpi sedo jānāti ‘ahaṃ kesalomakūpavivarehi paggharāmī’ti.
atk-abh02a:261_5: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti sedo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
atk-abh02a:261_6: koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:262_0: Medo thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito patthinnasneho.
atk-abh02a:262_1: Tattha yathā haliddipilotikapaṭicchanne maṃsapuñje na maṃsapuñjo jānāti ‘maṃ nissāya
atk-abh02a:262_2: haliddipilotikā ṭhitā’ti, nāpi haliddipilotikā jānāti ‘ahaṃ maṃsapuñjaṃ nissāya ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:262_3: evameva na sakalasarīre jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ jānāti ‘maṃ nissāya medo ṭhito’ti, nāpi
atk-abh02a:262_4: medo jānāti ‘ahaṃ sakalasarīre jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ nissāya ṭhito’ti. Aññamaññaṃ
atk-abh02a:262_5: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti medo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso
atk-abh02a:262_6: acetano abyākato suñño nissatto patthinnasneho patthinnayūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:263_0: Assu yadā sañjāyati tadā akkhikūpake pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā. Tattha yathā
atk-abh02a:263_1: udakapuṇṇesu taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu na taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakā jānanti ‘amhesu udakaṃ
atk-abh02a:263_2: ṭhita’nti, nāpi udakaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu ṭhita’nti, evameva na
atk-abh02a:263_3: akkhikūpakā jānanti ‘amhesu assu ṭhita’nti, nāpi assu jānāti ‘ahaṃ akkhikūpakesu
atk-abh02a:263_4: ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti assu nāma imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:263_5: sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:264_1: ṭhitavilīnasneho. Tattha yathā pakkhittatele ācāme na ācāmo jānāti ‘maṃ telaṃ ajjhottharitvā
atk-abh02a:264_2: ṭhita’nti, nāpi telaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ ācāmaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhita’nti, evameva na hatthatalādippadeso
atk-abh02a:264_3: jānāti ‘maṃ vasā ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā’ti, nāpi vasā jānāti ‘ahaṃ hatthatalādippadese
atk-abh02a:264_4: ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā’ti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti vasā
atk-abh02a:264_5: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto
atk-abh02a:265_0: Kheḷo tathārūpe kheḷuppattipaccaye sati ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhāya tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:265_1: Tattha yathā abbocchinnaudakanissande nadītīrakūpake na kūpatalaṃ jānāti ‘mayi udakaṃ
atk-abh02a:265_2: santiṭṭhatī’ti, nāpi udakaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ kūpatale santiṭṭhāmī’ti, evameva na jivhātalaṃ
atk-abh02a:265_3: jānāti ‘mayi ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā kheḷo ṭhito’ti, nāpi kheḷo jānāti ‘ahaṃ
atk-abh02a:265_4: ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhātale ṭhito’ti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:265_5: ete dhammā. Iti kheḷo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:266_0: Siṅghāṇikā yadā sañjāyati tadā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā. Tattha
atk-abh02a:266_1: yathā pūtidadhibharitāya sippikāya na sippikā jānāti ‘mayi pūtidadhi ṭhita’nti, nāpi
atk-abh02a:266_2: pūtidadhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ sippikāya ṭhita’nti, evameva na nāsāpuṭā jānanti ‘amhesu siṅghāṇikā
atk-abh02a:266_3: ṭhitā’ti, nāpi siṅghāṇikā jānāti ‘ahaṃ nāsāpuṭesu ṭhitā’ti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:266_4: ete dhammā. Iti siṅghāṇikā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato
atk-abh02a:267_0: Lasikā aṭṭhikasandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīsu ṭhitā. Tattha
atk-abh02a:267_1: yathā telabbhañjite akkhe na akkho jānāti ‘maṃ telaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhita’nti, nāpi
atk-abh02a:267_2: telaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ akkhaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhita’nti, evameva na asītisatasandhayo jānanti
atk-abh02a:267_3: ‘lasikā amhe abbhañjitvā ṭhitā’ti, nāpi lasikā jānāti ‘ahaṃ asītisatasandhayo abbhañjitvā
atk-abh02a:267_4: ṭhitā’ti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti lasikā nāma imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:267_5: sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:268_0: Muttaṃ vatthissa abbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā candanikāya pakkhitte adhomukhe
atk-abh02a:268_1: ravaṇaghaṭe na ravaṇaghaṭo jānāti ‘mayi candanikāraso ṭhito’ti, nāpi candanikāraso
atk-abh02a:268_2: jānāti ‘ahaṃ ravaṇaghaṭe ṭhito’ti, evameva na vatthi jānāti ‘mayi muttaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:268_3: nāpi muttaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ vatthimhi ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
atk-abh02a:268_4: ete dhammā. Iti muttaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
atk-abh02a:268_5: nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti. Yaṃ vā panāti avasesesu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu
atk-abh02a:269_0: Bāhiraāpodhātuniddese mūlaṃ paṭicca nibbatto raso mūlaraso nāma. Khandharasādīsupi
atk-abh02a:269_1: eseva nayo. Khīrādīni pākaṭāneva. Yathā pana bhesajjasikkhāpade evamidha niyamo natthi.
atk-abh02a:269_2: Yaṃ kiñci khīraṃ khīrameva. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Bhummānīti āvāṭādīsu ṭhitaudakāni.
atk-abh02a:269_3: Antalikkhānīti pathaviṃ appattāni vassodakāni. Yaṃ vā panāti himodakakappavināsakaudakapathavīsandhārakaudakādīni
atk-abh02a:270_0: 175. Tejodhātuniddese tejanavasena tejo. Tejova tejobhāvaṃ gatattā tejogataṃ. Usmāti
atk-abh02a:270_1: uṇhākāro. Usmāva usmābhāvaṃ gatattā usmāgataṃ. Usumanti caṇḍausumaṃ. Tadeva usumabhāvaṃ
atk-abh02a:270_2: gatattā usumagataṃ. Yena cāti yena tejogatena kuppitena. Santappatīti ayaṃ kāyo santappati,
atk-abh02a:270_3: ekāhikajarādibhāvena usumajāto hoti. Yena ca jīrīyatīti yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrīyati,
atk-abh02a:270_4: indriyavekallataṃ balaparikkhayaṃ valipalitādibhāvañca pāpuṇāti. Yena ca pariḍayhatīti
atk-abh02a:270_5: yena kuppitena ayaṃ kāyo ḍayhati, so ca puggalo ‘ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī’ti kandanto satadhotasappigosītacandanādilepanañceva
atk-abh02a:270_6: tālavaṇṭavātañca paccāsīsati. Yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti
atk-abh02a:270_7: yenetaṃ asitaṃ vā odanādi, pītaṃ vā pānakādi, khāyitaṃ vā piṭṭhakhajjakādi, sāyitaṃ
atk-abh02a:270_8: vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati, rasādibhāvena vivekaṃ gacchatīti
atk-abh02a:270_9: attho. Ettha ca purimā tayo tejodhātū catusamuṭṭhānā, pacchimo kammasamuṭṭhānova.
atk-abh02a:271_0: Idaṃ pana manasikāravidhānaṃ – idha bhikkhu ‘yena santappati, ayaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre
atk-abh02a:271_1: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto paripācanākāro tejodhātū’ti manasi
atk-abh02a:271_2: karoti; ‘yena jīrīyati, yena pariḍayhati, yena asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ
atk-abh02a:271_3: gacchati, ayaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
atk-abh02a:271_4: paripācanākāro tejodhātū’ti manasi karoti. Yaṃ vā panāti imasmiṃ sarīre pākatiko
atk-abh02a:271_5: eko utu atthi, so yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-abh02a:272_0: Bāhiratejodhātuniddese kaṭṭhaṃ paṭicca pajjalito kaṭṭhupādāno aggi kaṭṭhaggi nāma.
atk-abh02a:272_1: Sakalikaggiādīsupi eseva nayo. Saṅkāraggīti kacavaraṃ saṃkaḍḍhitvā jālāpito kacavaraggi.
atk-abh02a:272_2: Indaggīti asaniaggi. Aggisantāpoti jālāya vā vītaccikaṅgārānaṃ vā santāpo. Sūriyasantāpoti
atk-abh02a:272_3: ātapo. Kaṭṭhasannicayasantāpoti kaṭṭharāsiṭṭhāne santāpo. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Yaṃ
atk-abh02a:272_4: vā panāti petaggi kappavināsaggi nirayaggiādayo idha yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a:273_0: 176. Vāyodhātuniddese vāyanavasena vāyo. Vāyova vāyobhāvaṃ gatattā vāyogataṃ. Thambhitattaṃ
atk-abh02a:273_1: rūpassāti avinibbhogarūpassa thambhitabhāvo. Uddhaṅgamā vātāti uggārahikkādi pavattakā
atk-abh02a:273_2: uddhaṃ ārohanavātā. Adhogamā vātāti uccārapassāvādinīharaṇakā adho orohanavātā. Kucchisayā
atk-abh02a:273_3: vātāti antānaṃ bahivātā. Koṭṭhāsayā vātāti antānaṃ antovātā. Aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātāti
atk-abh02a:273_5: vātā. Satthakavātāti sandhibandhanāni kattariyā chindantā viya pavattavātā. Khurakavātāti
atk-abh02a:273_6: khurena viya hadayaṃ phālanavātā. Uppalakavātāti hadayamaṃsameva uppāṭanakavātā.
atk-abh02a:273_7: Assāsoti antopavisananāsikāvato. Passāsoti bahinikkhamananāsikāvato. Ettha ca purimā
atk-abh02a:273_8: sabbe catusamuṭṭhānā, assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānāva. Ayamettha padavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh02a:274_0: Idaṃ pana manasikāravidhānaṃ – idha bhikkhu uddhaṅgamādibhede vāte uddhaṅgamādivasena
atk-abh02a:274_1: pariggahetvā ‘uddhaṅgamā vātā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato
atk-abh02a:274_2: suñño nissatto vitthambhanākāro vāyodhātū’ti manasi karoti. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:274_3: Yaṃ vā panāti sese vāyokoṭṭhāse anugatā vātā idha yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a:275_0: Bāhiravāyodhātuniddese puratthimā vātāti puratthimadisato āgatā vātā. Pacchimuttaradakkhiṇesupi
atk-abh02a:275_1: eseva nayo. Sarajā vātāti saha rajena sarajā. Arajā vātāti rajavirahitā suddhā arajā
atk-abh02a:275_2: nāma. Sītāti sītautusamuṭṭhānā sītavalāhakantare samuṭṭhitā. Uṇhāti uṇhautusamuṭṭhānā
atk-abh02a:275_3: uṇhavalāhakantare samuṭṭhitā. Parittāti mandā tanukavātā. Adhimattāti balavavātā.
atk-abh02a:275_4: Kāḷāti kāḷavalāhakantare samuṭṭhitā, yehi abbhāhato chavivaṇṇo kāḷako hoti. Tesaṃ
atk-abh02a:275_5: etaṃ adhivacanantipi eke. Verambhavātāti yojanato upari vāyanavātā. Pakkhavātāti
atk-abh02a:275_6: antamaso makkhikāyapi pakkhāyūhanasamuṭṭhitā vātā. Supaṇṇavātāti garuḷavātā. Kāmañca
atk-abh02a:275_7: imepi pakkhavātāva ussadavasena pana visuṃ gahitā. Tālavaṇṭavātāti tālapaṇṇehi vā
atk-abh02a:275_8: aññena vā kenaci maṇḍalasaṇṭhānena samuṭṭhāpitā vātā. Vidhūpanavātāti bījanapattakena
atk-abh02a:275_9: samuṭṭhāpitā vātā. Imāni ca tālavaṇṭavidhūpanāni anuppannampi vātaṃ uppādenti, uppannampi
atk-abh02a:275_10: parivattenti. Yaṃ vā panāti idha pāḷiāgate ṭhapetvā sesavātā yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a:276_0: 177. Ākāsadhātuniddese appaṭighaṭṭanaṭṭhena na kassatīti ākāso. Ākāsova ākāsabhāvaṃ
atk-abh02a:276_1: gatattā ākāsagataṃ. Aghaṭṭanīyatāya aghaṃ. Aghameva aghabhāvaṃ gatattā aghagataṃ.
atk-abh02a:276_2: Vivaroti antaraṃ. Tadeva vivarabhāvaṃ gatattā vivaragataṃ. Asamphuṭṭhaṃ maṃsalohitehīti
atk-abh02a:276_3: maṃsalohitehi nissaṭaṃ. Kaṇṇacchiddantiādi pana tasseva pabhedadassanaṃ. Tattha kaṇṇacchiddanti
atk-abh02a:276_4: kaṇṇasmiṃ chiddaṃ vivaraṃ maṃsalohitehi asamphuṭṭhokāso. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Yenāti
atk-abh02a:276_5: yena vivarena etaṃ asitādibhedaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ ajjhoharati, anto paveseti. Yatthāti
atk-abh02a:276_6: yasmiṃ antoudarapaṭalasaṅkhāte okāse etadeva catubbidhaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:276_7: Yenāti yena vivarena sabbampetaṃ vipakkaṃ kasaṭabhāvaṃ āpannaṃ nikkhamati, taṃ udarapaṭalato
atk-abh02a:276_8: yāva karīsamaggā vidatthicaturaṅgulamattaṃ chiddaṃ maṃsalohitehi asamphuṭṭhaṃ nissaṭaṃ
atk-abh02a:276_9: ākāsadhātūti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ vā panāti ettha cammantaraṃ maṃsantaraṃ nhāruntaraṃ
atk-abh02a:276_10: aṭṭhintaraṃ lomantaranti idaṃ sabbaṃ yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:277_0: Bāhirakaākāsadhātuniddese asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti catūhi mahābhūtehi nissaṭaṃ
atk-abh02a:277_1: bhittichiddakavāṭachiddādikaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iminā yasmiṃ ākāse parikammaṃ karontassa
atk-abh02a:278_1: eseva nayo. Iti imāsu chasu dhātūsu pariggahitāsu aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pariggahitāva
atk-abh02a:278_2: honti. Kathaṃ? Pathavītejovāyodhātuggahaṇena tāva phoṭṭhabbadhātu gahitāva hoti,
atk-abh02a:278_4: manodhātu gahitāva hoti. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādayo sutte āgatā eva. Sesā nava āharitvā
atk-abh02a:278_5: dassetabbā. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuggahaṇena hi tassā nissayabhūtā cakkhudhātu, ārammaṇabhūtā
atk-abh02a:278_6: rūpadhātu ca gahitāva honti. Evaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuādiggahaṇena sotadhātuādayoti aṭṭhārasāpi
atk-abh02a:278_7: gahitāva honti. Tāsu dasahi dhātūhi rūpapariggaho kathito hoti. Sattahi arūpapariggaho.
atk-abh02a:278_8: Dhammadhātuyā siyā rūpapariggaho, siyā arūpapariggaho. Iti aḍḍhekādasahi dhātūhi
atk-abh02a:278_9: rūpapariggaho, aḍḍhaṭṭhadhātūhi arūpapariggahoti rūpārūpapariggaho kathito hoti.
atk-abh02a:278_10: Rūpārūpaṃ pañcakkhandhā. Taṃ hoti dukkhasaccaṃ. Taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā samudayasaccaṃ.
atk-abh02a:278_11: Ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ. Taṃpajānano maggo maggasaccanti idaṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:278_12: aṭṭhārasadhātuvasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā matthakaṃ pāpetvā nigamanaṃ
atk-abh02a:279_0: 179. Idāni dutiyachakkaṃ dassento aparāpi cha dhātuyotiādimāha. Tattha sukhadhātu
atk-abh02a:279_2: dassitāni. Sukhañhi dukkhassa paṭipakkho, dukkhaṃ sukhassa. Yattakaṃ sukhena pharitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:279_3: tattakaṃ dukkhaṃ pharati. Yattakaṃ dukkhena pharitaṭṭhānaṃ tattakaṃ sukhaṃ pharati.
atk-abh02a:279_4: Somanassadhātu domanassadhātūti idampi tatheva yugaḷakaṃ kataṃ. Somanassañhi domanassassa
atk-abh02a:279_5: paṭipakkho, domanassaṃ somanassassa. Yattakaṃ somanassena pharitaṭṭhānaṃ tattakaṃ
atk-abh02a:279_6: domanassaṃ pharati. Yattakaṃ domanassena pharitaṭṭhānaṃ tattakaṃ somanassaṃ pharati.
atk-abh02a:280_0: Upekkhādhātu avijjādhātūti idaṃ pana dvayaṃ sarikkhakavasena yugaḷakaṃ kataṃ. Ubhayampi
atk-abh02a:280_1: hetaṃ avibhūtattā sarikkhakaṃ hoti. Tattha sukhadukkhadhātuggahaṇena taṃ sampayuttā
atk-abh02a:280_2: kāyaviññāṇadhātu, vatthubhūtā kāyadhātu, ārammaṇabhūtā phoṭṭhabbadhātu ca gahitāva
atk-abh02a:280_3: honti. Somanassadomanassadhātuggahaṇena taṃ sampayuttā manoviññāṇadhātu gahitā hoti.
atk-abh02a:280_5: tāsaṃyeva vatthārammaṇabhūtā cakkhudhāturūpadhātuādayo ca gahitāti evaṃ aṭṭhārasapi
atk-abh02a:280_6: dhātuyo gahitāva honti. Idāni tāsu dasahi dhātūhi rūpapariggahotiādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-abh02a:280_7: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Evampi ekassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā matthakaṃ pāpetvā
atk-abh02a:280_8: nigamanaṃ kathitaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Tattha katamā sukhadhātu yaṃ kāyikaṃ sātanti
atk-abh02a:281_0: 181. Tatiyachakke kāmoti dve kāmā – vatthukāmo ca kilesakāmo ca. Tattha kilesakāmaṃ
atk-abh02a:281_1: sandhāya kāmapaṭisaṃyuttā dhātu kāmadhātu, kāmavitakkassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Vatthukāmaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh02a:281_2: kāmoyeva dhātu kāmadhātu, kāmāvacaradhammānametaṃ nāmaṃ. Byāpādapaṭisaṃyuttā dhātu
atk-abh02a:281_3: byāpādadhātu, byāpādavitakkassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Byāpādova dhātu byāpādadhātu, dasaāghātavatthukassa
atk-abh02a:281_4: paṭighassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Vihiṃsā paṭisaṃyuttā dhātu vihiṃsādhātu, vihiṃsāvitakkassetaṃ
atk-abh02a:281_5: nāmaṃ. Vihiṃsāyeva dhātu vihiṃsādhātu, parasattavihesanassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Ayaṃ pana heṭṭhā
atk-abh02a:281_6: anāgatattā evaṃ atthādivibhāgato veditabbā – vihiṃsanti etāya satte, vihiṃsanaṃ vā
atk-abh02a:281_7: etaṃ sattānanti vihiṃsā. Sā viheṭhanalakkhaṇā, karuṇāpaṭipakkhalakkhaṇā vā; parasantāne
atk-abh02a:281_9: paṭighapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā. Nekkhammaṃ vuccati lobhā nikkhantattā alobho, nīvaraṇehi
atk-abh02a:281_10: nikkhantattā paṭhamajjhānaṃ, sabbākusalehi nikkhantattā sabbakusalaṃ. Nekkhammapaṭisaṃyuttā
atk-abh02a:281_11: dhātu nekkhammadhātu, nekkhammavitakkassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Nekkhammameva dhātu nekkhammadhātu,
atk-abh02a:281_12: sabbassāpi kusalassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Abyāpādapaṭisaṃyuttā dhātu abyāpādadhātu, abyāpādavitakkassetaṃ
atk-abh02a:281_13: nāmaṃ. Abyāpādova dhātu abyāpādadhātu, mettāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Avihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyuttā dhātu
atk-abh02a:281_14: avihiṃsādhātu, avihiṃsā vitakkassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Avihiṃsāva dhātu avihiṃsādhātu, karuṇāyetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh02a:282_0: 182. Idāni tamevatthaṃ dassetuṃ tattha katamā kāmadhātūti padabhājanaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:282_1: Tattha paṭisaṃyuttoti saṃpayogavasena paṭisaṃyutto. Takko vitakkotiādīni vuttatthāneva.
atk-abh02a:282_2: Viheṭhetīti bādheti, dukkhāpeti. Heṭhanāti pāṇippahārādīhi bādhanā, dukkhuppādanā.
atk-abh02a:282_3: Balavaheṭhanā viheṭhanā. Hiṃsanti etāyāti hiṃsanā. Balavahiṃsanā vihiṃsanā. Rosanāti
atk-abh02a:282_4: ghaṭṭanā. Virosanāti balavaghaṭṭanā. Sabbattha vā ‘vi’ upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:282_5: Upahananti etenāti upaghāto, paresaṃ upaghāto parūpaghāto.
atk-abh02a:283_0: Mettāyanti etāyāti metti. Mettāyanākāro mettāyanā. Mettāya ayitassa mettāsamaṅgino
atk-abh02a:283_1: bhāvo mettāyitattaṃ. Byāpādena vimuttassa cetaso vimutti cetovimutti. Ettha ca purimehi
atk-abh02a:283_2: tīhi upacārappattāpi appanāpatāpi mettā kathitā, pacchimena appanāpattāva.
atk-abh02a:284_0: Karuṇāyanti etāyāti karuṇā. Karuṇāyanākāro karuṇāyanā. Karuṇāya ayitassa karuṇāsamaṅgino
atk-abh02a:284_1: bhāvo karuṇāyitattaṃ. Vihiṃsāya vimuttassa cetaso vimutti cetovimutti. Idhāpi purimanayeneva
atk-abh02a:284_2: upacārappanābhedo veditabbo. Ubhayatthāpi ca pariyosānapade mettākaruṇāti cetovimuttivisesanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:285_0: Ettha ca kāmavitakko sattesupi uppajjati saṅkhāresupi. Ubhayattha uppannopi kammapathabhedova.
atk-abh02a:285_1: Byāpādo pana sattesu uppannoyeva kammapathaṃ bhindati, na itaro. Vihiṃsāyapi eseva
atk-abh02a:285_2: nayo. Ettha ca duvidhā kathā – sabbasaṅgāhikā ceva asambhinnā ca. Kāmadhātuggahaṇena
atk-abh02a:285_3: hi byāpādavihiṃsādhātuyopi gahitā. Kāmadhātuyāyeva pana nīharitvā nīharitvā dvepi
atk-abh02a:285_4: etā dassitāti. Ayaṃ tāvettha sabbasaṅgāhikakathā. Ṭhapetvā pana byāpādavihiṃsādhātuyo
atk-abh02a:285_5: sesā sabbāpi kāmadhātu evāti. Ayaṃ asambhinnakathā nāma. Nekkhammadhātuggahaṇenāpi
atk-abh02a:285_6: abyāpādaavihiṃsādhātuyo gahitāyeva. Nekkhammadhātuto pana nīharitvā nīharitvā tadubhayampi
atk-abh02a:285_7: dassitanti ayametthāpi sabbasaṅgāhikakathā. Ṭhapetvā abyāpādaavihiṃsādhātuyo avasesā
atk-abh02a:286_0: Imāhi ca chahi dhātūhi pariggahitā hi aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pariggahitāva honti. Sabbāpi
atk-abh02a:286_1: hi tā kāmadhātutova nīharitvā nīharitvā labhāpetabbā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyova hontīti
atk-abh02a:286_2: tiṇṇaṃ chakkānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasa honti. Evaṃ pana aggahetvā ekekasmiṃ chakke vuttanayena
atk-abh02a:286_3: aṭṭhārasa aṭṭhārasa katvā sabbānipi tāni aṭṭhārasakāni ekajjhaṃ abhisaṅkhipitvā aṭṭhāraseva
atk-abh02a:286_4: hontīti veditabbā. Iti imasmiṃ suttantabhājanīye soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve tebhūmikāti
atk-abh02a:289: 183. Abhidhammabhājanīye sarūpeneva sabbāpi dhātuyo dassento aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo – cakkhudhātu rūpadhātūtiādimāha. Tattha uddesavāre tāva –
atk-abh02a:292_0: Tattha ‘atthato’ti cakkhatīti cakkhu. Rūpayatīti rūpaṃ. Cakkhussa viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇanti
atk-abh02a:292_1: evamādinā tāva nayena cakkhādīnaṃ visesatthato veditabbo vinicchayo. Avisesena pana
atk-abh02a:292_2: vidahati, dhīyate, vidhānaṃ, vidhīyate etāya, ettha vā dhīyatīti dhātu. Lokiyā hi
atk-abh02a:292_3: dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viya suvaṇṇarajatādiṃ
atk-abh02a:292_4: anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti; bhārahārehi ca bhāro viya sattehi dhīyante
atk-abh02a:292_5: dhārīyanteti attho. Dukkhavidhānamattameva cetā avasavattanato. Etāhi ca karaṇabhūtāhi
atk-abh02a:292_6: saṃsāradukkhaṃ sattehi anuvidhīyati; tathāvihitañcetaṃ etāsveva dhīyati ṭhapīyatīti
atk-abh02a:292_7: attho. Iti cakkhādīsu ekeko dhammo yathāsambhavaṃ vidahati dhīyatetiādiatthavasena dhātūti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:293_0: Apica yathā titthiyānaṃ attā nāma sabhāvato natthi, na evametā. Etā pana attano sabhāvaṃ
atk-abh02a:293_1: dhārentīti dhātuyo. Yathā ca loke vicittā haritālamanosilādayo silāvayavā dhātuyoti
atk-abh02a:293_2: vuccanti, evametāpi dhātuyo viya dhātuyo. Vicittā hetā ñāṇañeyyāvayavāti. Yathā vā
atk-abh02a:293_3: sarīrasaṅkhātassa samudāyassa avayavabhūtesu rasasoṇitādīsu aññamaññaṃ visabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnesu
atk-abh02a:293_4: dhātusamaññā, evametesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa avayavesu dhātusamaññā
atk-abh02a:293_5: veditabbā. Aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnā hete cakkhādayoti. Apica dhātūti
atk-abh02a:293_6: nijjīvamattassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tathā hi bhagavā – “cha dhāturo ayaṃ, bhikkhu, puriso”tiādīsu
atk-abh02a:293_7: jīvasaññāsamūhanatthaṃ dhātudesanaṃ akāsīti. Tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ
atk-abh02a:293_8: dhātu cāti cakkhudhātu …pe… manoviññāṇañca taṃ dhātu cāti manoviññāṇadhātūti evaṃ
atk-abh02a:294: ‘Lakkhaṇādito’ti cakkhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādito pettha veditabbo vinicchayo. Tāni ca pana tesaṃ lakkhaṇādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:295_0: ‘Kamato’ti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati. So ca panāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:295_1: hetuphalānupubbavavatthānavasena vutto. Cakkhudhātu rūpadhātūti idañhi dvayaṃ hetu.
atk-abh02a:295_2: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātūti phalaṃ. Evaṃ sabbattha kamato veditabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:296_0: ‘Tāvatvato’ti tāvabhāvato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tesu tesu hi suttābhidhammapadesesu
atk-abh02a:296_3: vihiṃsādhātu, nekkhammadhātu, abyāpādadhātu, avihiṃsādhātu, sukhadhātu, dukkhadhātu,
atk-abh02a:296_4: somanassadhātu, domanassadhātu, upekkhādhātu, avijjādhātu, ārambhadhātu, nikkamadhātu,
atk-abh02a:296_5: parakkamadhātu, hīnadhātu, majjhimadhātu, paṇītadhātu, pathavīdhātu, āpodhātu, tejodhātu,
atk-abh02a:296_6: vāyodhātu, ākāsadhātu, viññāṇadhātu, saṅkhatadhātu, asaṅkhatadhātu, anekadhātunānādhātulokoti
atk-abh02a:297_0: Evaṃ sati sabbāsaṃ vasena paricchedaṃ akatvā kasmā aṭṭhārasāti ayameva paricchedo
atk-abh02a:297_1: katoti ce? Sabhāvato vijjamānānaṃ sabbadhātūnaṃ tadantogadhattā. Rūpadhātuyeva hi
atk-abh02a:297_2: ābhādhātu. Subhadhātu pana rūpādippaṭibaddhā. Kasmā? Subhanimittattā. Subhanimittañhi
atk-abh02a:297_3: subhadhātu. Tañca rūpādivinimuttaṃ na vijjati, kusalavipākārammaṇā vā rūpādayo eva
atk-abh02a:297_5: Sesā dhammā dhammadhātu. Saññāvedayitanirodhadhātu pana sabhāvato natthi; dhātudvayanirodhamattameva
atk-abh02a:297_6: hi sā. Kāmadhātu dhammadhātumattaṃ vā hoti, yathāha “tattha katamā kāmadhātu? Kāmapaṭisaṃyutto
atk-abh02a:297_7: takko …pe… micchāsaṅkappo”ti; aṭṭhārasapi dhātuyo vā, yathāha “heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ
atk-abh02a:297_8: pariyantaṃ katvā uparito paranimmitavasavattideve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare
atk-abh02a:297_9: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā, rūpā, vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā,
atk-abh02a:297_10: viññāṇaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati kāmadhātū”ti. Nekkhammadhātu dhammadhātu eva; “sabbepi kusalā
atk-abh02a:297_11: dhammā nekkhammadhātū”ti vā vacanato manoviññāṇadhātupi hotiyeva. Byāpādavihiṃsāabyāpādaavihiṃsāsukhadukkhasomanassadomanassupekkhāavijjāārambhanikkamaparakkamadhātuyo dhammadhātuyeva.
atk-abh02a:298_0: Hīnamajjhimapaṇītadhātuyo aṭṭhārasadhātumattameva. Hīnā hi cakkhādayo hīnadhātu.
atk-abh02a:298_1: Majjhimapaṇītā cakkhādayo majjhimā ceva paṇītā ca dhātū. Nippariyāyena pana akusalā
atk-abh02a:298_2: dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuyo hīnadhātu. Lokiyā kusalābyākatā ubhopi cakkhudhātuādayo
atk-abh02a:298_3: ca majjhimadhātu. Lokuttarā pana dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuyo paṇītadhātu. Pathavītejovāyodhātuyo
atk-abh02a:298_4: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyeva. Āpodhātu ākāsadhātu ca dhammadhātuyeva. Viññāṇadhātu cakkhuviññāṇādisattaviññāṇadhātusaṅkhepoyeva.
atk-abh02a:298_5: Sattarasa dhātuyo dhammadhātuekadeso ca saṅkhatadhātu. Asaṅkhatadhātu pana dhammadhātuekadesova.
atk-abh02a:298_6: Anekadhātunānādhātuloko pana aṭṭhārasadhātuppabhedamattamevāti. Iti sabhāvato vijjamānānaṃ
atk-abh02a:299_0: Apica vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññīnaṃ jīvasaññāsamūhanatthampi aṭṭhāraseva vuttā.
atk-abh02a:299_1: Santi hi sattā vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññino. Tesaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇamanoviññāṇadhātubhedena
atk-abh02a:299_2: tassā anekattaṃ, cakkhurūpādipaccayāyattavuttitāya aniccatañca pakāsetvā dīgharattānusayitaṃ
atk-abh02a:299_3: jīvasaññaṃ samūhanitukāmena bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pakāsitā. Kiñca bhiyyo? Tathā
atk-abh02a:299_4: veneyyajjhāsayavasena; ye ca imāya nātisaṅkhepavitthārāya desanāya veneyyā sattā,
atk-abh02a:305_0: ‘Saṅkhato’ti cakkhudhātu tāva jātito eko dhammotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati cakkhupasādavasena.
atk-abh02a:305_2: pana pathavītejovāyovasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu kusalākusalavipākavasena
atk-abh02a:305_3: dve dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Tathā sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātuyo. Manodhātu
atk-abh02a:305_5: gacchati. Dhammadhātu tiṇṇaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ, soḷasannaṃ sukhumarūpānaṃ, asaṅkhatāya
atk-abh02a:305_6: ca dhātuyā vasena vīsatidhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Manoviññāṇadhātu sesakusalākusalābyākataviññāṇavasena
atk-abh02a:305_7: chasattatidhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti evamettha ‘saṅkhato’ veditabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:306: ‘Paccayā’ti cakkhudhātuādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīsu paccayato veditabbo vinicchayo. So panetesaṃ paccayabhāvo niddesavāre āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh02a:307_0: ‘Daṭṭhabbā’ti daṭṭhabbatopettha vinicchayo veditabboti attho. Sabbā eva hi saṅkhatā
atk-abh02a:307_2: ca daṭṭhabbā. Visesato panettha bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu daṭṭhabbā, daṇḍo viya
atk-abh02a:307_3: rūpadhātu, saddo viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā ādāsatalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu, mukhaṃ
atk-abh02a:307_4: viya rūpadhātu, mukhanimittaṃ viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Atha vā ucchutilāni viya cakkhudhātu,
atk-abh02a:307_5: yantacakkayaṭṭhi viya rūpadhātu, ucchurasatelāni viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā adharāraṇī
atk-abh02a:307_6: viya cakkhudhātu, uttarāraṇī viya rūpadhātu, aggi viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Esa nayo sotadhātuādīsupi.
atk-abh02a:308_0: Manodhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh02a:308_1: Dhammadhātuyā vedanākkhandho sallamiva sūlamiva ca daṭṭhabbo; saññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā
atk-abh02a:308_2: vedanāsallasūlayogā āturā viya; puthujjanānaṃ vā saññā āsādukkhajananato rittamuṭṭhi
atk-abh02a:308_3: viya, ayathābhuccanimittaggāhakato vanamigo viya; saṅkhārā paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanato
atk-abh02a:308_5: viya, sabbānatthāvahassa khandhasantānassa hetuto visarukkhabījāni viya; rūpaṃ nānāvidhūpaddavanimittato
atk-abh02a:309_0: Asaṅkhatā pana dhātu amatato santato khemato ca daṭṭhabbā. Kasmā? Sabbānatthapaṭipakkhabhūtattā.
atk-abh02a:309_1: Manoviññāṇadhātu gahitārammaṇaṃ muñcitvāpi aññaṃ gahetvāva pavatanato vanamakkaṭo
atk-abh02a:309_2: viya, duddamanato assakhaḷuṅko viya, yatthakāmanipātito vehāsaṃ khittadaṇḍo viya,
atk-abh02a:310_0: 184. Niddesavāre cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cāti idañca dvayaṃ paṭicca aññañca kiriyāmanodhātuñceva
atk-abh02a:310_1: sampayuttakhandhattayañcāti attho. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā hi cakkhu nissayapaccayo
atk-abh02a:310_2: hoti, rūpaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo, kiriyamanodhātu vigatapaccayo, tayo arūpakkhandhā sahajātapaccayo.
atk-abh02a:310_3: Tasmā esā cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ime cattāro paṭicca uppajjati nāma. Sotañca paṭiccātiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:311_0: Niruddhasamanantarāti niruddhāya samanantarā. Tajjā manodhātūti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe jātā
atk-abh02a:311_1: kusalākusalavipākato duvidhā manodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccā. Sabbadhammesu vā pana
atk-abh02a:311_2: paṭhamasamannāhāroti etesu cakkhuviññāṇādīsu sabbadhammesu uppajjamānesu paṭhamasamannāhāro;
atk-abh02a:311_4: ayamettha attho veditabbo. Etena pañcadvārāvajjanakiccā kiriyamanodhātu gahitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:312_0: Manodhātuyāpi uppajjitvā niruddhasamanantarāti ettha pi-kāro sampiṇḍanattho. Tasmā
atk-abh02a:312_1: manodhātuyāpi manoviññāṇadhātuyāpīti ayamettha attho veditabbo. Tena yā ca vipākamanodhātuyā
atk-abh02a:312_2: uppajjitvā niruddhāya samanantarā uppajjati santīraṇakiccā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu,
atk-abh02a:312_3: yā ca tassā uppajjitvā niruddhāya samanantarā uppajjati voṭṭhabbanakiccā kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu,
atk-abh02a:312_4: yā ca tassā uppajjitvā niruddhāya samanantarā uppajjati javanakiccā manoviññāṇadhātu
atk-abh02a:312_5: – tā sabbāpi kathitā hotīti veditabbā. Manañca paṭiccāti bhavaṅgamanaṃ. Dhamme cāti
atk-abh02a:312_6: catubhūmikadhammārammaṇaṃ. Uppajjati manoviññāṇanti sahāvajjanakaṃ javanaṃ nibbattati.
atk-abh02a:313_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne hatthe gahitapañhaṃ nāma gaṇhiṃsu. Mahādhammarakkhitatthero kira
atk-abh02a:313_1: nāma dīghabhāṇakābhayattheraṃ hatthe gahetvā āha – ‘paṭiccāti nāma āgataṭṭhāne āvajjanaṃ
atk-abh02a:313_2: visuṃ na kātabbaṃ, bhavaṅganissitakameva kātabba’nti. Tasmā idha manoti sahāvajjanakaṃ
atk-abh02a:313_3: bhavaṅgaṃ. Manoviññāṇanti javanamanoviññāṇaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana abhidhammabhājanīye soḷasa
atk-abh02a:313_4: dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve catubhūmikā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitāti.
atk-abh02a:316_0: 185. Pañhāpucchake aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāreneva kusalādibhāvo
atk-abh02a:316_1: veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu pana cha dhātuyo parittārammaṇāti idaṃ pana pañcannaṃ
atk-abh02a:316_2: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ manodhātuyā ca ekantena pañcasu rūpārammaṇādīsu pavattiṃ sandhāya
atk-abh02a:316_3: vuttaṃ. Dve dhātuyoti vuttānaṃ pana dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ manāyatanadhammāyatanesu
atk-abh02a:316_4: vuttanayeneva parittārammaṇāditā veditabbā. Iti imasmimpi pañhāpucchake soḷasa dhātuyo
atk-abh02a:316_5: kāmāvacarā, dve catubhūmikā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā. Evamayaṃ dhātuvibhaṅgopi
atk-abh02a:321: 189. Idāni tadanantare saccavibhaṅge cattārīti gaṇanaparicchedo. Ariyasaccānīti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ. Dukkhaṃ ariyasaccantiādimhi pana uddesavāre –
atk-abh02a:324: Kamato ariyasaccesu, yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tassa kiccato;
atk-abh02a:328_0: Tattha ‘vibhāgato’ti dukkhādīnañhi cattāro cattāro atthā vibhattā tathā avitathā
atk-abh02a:328_1: anaññathā, ye dukkhādīni abhisamentehi abhisametabbā. Yathāha, “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho,
atk-abh02a:328_2: saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭho – ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā
atk-abh02a:328_3: avitathā anaññathā. Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho, nidānaṭṭho, saṃyogaṭṭho, palibodhaṭṭho…pe…
atk-abh02a:328_4: nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho, vivekaṭṭho, asaṅkhataṭṭho, amataṭṭho…pe… maggassa niyyānaṭṭho,
atk-abh02a:328_5: hetvaṭṭho, dassanaṭṭho, ādhipateyyaṭṭho – ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā
atk-abh02a:328_6: anaññathā”ti. Tathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho, saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, viparināmaṭṭho,
atk-abh02a:328_7: abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādi. Iti evaṃ vibhattānaṃ catunnaṃ catunnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena
atk-abh02a:328_8: dukkhādīni veditabbānīti. Ayaṃ tāvettha vibhāgato vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:329_1: saddo kucchite dissati; kucchitañhi puttaṃ duputtoti vadanti. ‘Khaṃ’saddo pana tucche;
atk-abh02a:329_2: tucchañhi ākāsaṃ khanti vuccati. Idañca paṭhamasaccaṃ kucchitaṃ anekaupaddavādhiṭṭhānato,
atk-abh02a:329_4: ca dukkhanti vuccati. ‘Saṃ’iti ca ayaṃ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu saṃyogaṃ dīpeti;
atk-abh02a:329_5: ‘u’iti ayaṃ saddo “uppannaṃ udita”ntiādīsu uppattiṃ. ‘Aya’saddo pana kāraṇaṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh02a:329_6: Idañcāpi dutiyasaccaṃ avasesapaccayasamāyoge sati dukkhassuppattikāraṇaṃ. Iti dukkhassa
atk-abh02a:330_0: Tatiyasaccaṃ pana yasmā ‘ni’saddo abhāvaṃ ‘rodha’saddo ca cārakaṃ dīpeti, tasmā abhāvo
atk-abh02a:330_1: ettha saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā, samadhigate vā tasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:330_2: saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti tappaṭipakkhattātipi dukkhanirodhanti
atk-abh02a:330_3: vuccati, dukkhassa vā anuppādanirodhapaccayattā dukkhanirodhanti. Catutthasaccaṃ
atk-abh02a:330_4: pana yasmā etaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati ārammaṇavasena tadabhimukhībhūtattā, paṭipadā
atk-abh02a:330_5: ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyā, tasmā dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:331_0: Yasmā panetāni buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccanti. Yathāha
atk-abh02a:331_1: – “catārimāni, bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni. Katamāni…pe… imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri
atk-abh02a:331_2: ariyasaccāni. Ariyā imāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti. Apica
atk-abh02a:331_3: ariyassa saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha – “sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… sadevamanussāya
atk-abh02a:331_4: tathāgato ariyo, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti. Atha vā etesaṃ abhisambuddhattā
atk-abh02a:331_5: ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha – “imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ
atk-abh02a:331_6: yathābhūtaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho ‘ariyo’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-abh02a:331_7: Apica kho pana ariyāni saccānītipi ariyasaccāni; ariyānīti tathāni avitathāni avisaṃvādakānīti
atk-abh02a:331_8: attho. Yathāha – “imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni,
atk-abh02a:331_9: tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti. Evamettha nibbacanato vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:332_0: Kathaṃ ‘lakkhaṇādippabhedato’? Ettha hi bādhanalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, santāpanarasaṃ,
atk-abh02a:333_0: ‘Atthatthuddhārato cevā’ti ettha pana atthato tāva ko saccaṭṭhoti ce? Yo paññācakkhunā
atk-abh02a:333_1: upaparikkhamānānaṃ māyāva viparītako, marīcīva visaṃvādako, titthiyānaṃ attāva anupalabbhasabhāvo
atk-abh02a:333_2: ca na hoti; atha kho bādhanapabhavasantiniyyānappakārena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena
atk-abh02a:333_3: ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva; esa aggilakkhaṇaṃ viya, lokapakati viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo
atk-abh02a:333_4: saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathāha – “idaṃ dukkhanti kho, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ
atk-abh02a:334: Nābādhakaṃ yato dukkhaṃ, dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhakaṃ;
atk-abh02a:336: Taṃ vinā nāññato dukkhaṃ, na hoti na ca taṃ tato;
atk-abh02a:338: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṃ na ca na taṃ yato;
atk-abh02a:340: Maggā aññaṃ na niyyānaṃ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
atk-abh02a:345_0: Kathaṃ ‘atthuddhārato’? Idhāyaṃ ‘sacca’saddo anekesu atthesu dissati, seyyathidaṃ
atk-abh02a:345_1: – “saccaṃ bhaṇe, na kujjheyyā”tiādīsu vācāsacce. “Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā cā”tiādīsu
atk-abh02a:345_2: viratisacce. “Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā, pavādiyāse kusalāvadānā”tiādīsu diṭṭhisacce.
atk-abh02a:345_3: “Ekañhi saccaṃ na dutiyamatthī”tiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca. “Catunnaṃ
atk-abh02a:345_4: ariyasaccānaṃ kati kusalā”tiādīsu ariyasacce. Svāyamidhāpi ariyasacce vattatīti evamettha
atk-abh02a:346_0: ‘Anūnādhikato’ti kasmā pana cattāreva ariyasaccāni vuttāni, anūnāni anadhikānīti
atk-abh02a:346_1: ce? Aññassāsambhavato, aññatarassa ca anapaneyyabhāvato; na hi etehi aññaṃ adhikaṃ
atk-abh02a:346_2: vā etesaṃ vā ekampi apanetabbaṃ sambhoti. Yathāha – “idha, bhikkhave, āgaccheyya
atk-abh02a:346_3: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, aññaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yaṃ samaṇena
atk-abh02a:346_4: gotamena desitaṃ. Ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ
atk-abh02a:346_5: paññapessāmī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādi. Yathā cāha – “yo hi koci, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a:346_6: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃ vadeyya ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, yaṃ samaṇena
atk-abh02a:346_7: gotamena desitaṃ. Ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paccakkhāya aññaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:346_8: paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādi.
atk-abh02a:347_0: Apica pavattimācikkhanto bhagavā sahetukaṃ ācikkhi, nivattiñca saupāyaṃ. Iti pavattinivattitadubhayahetūnaṃ
atk-abh02a:347_1: etapparamato cattāreva vuttāni. Tathā pariññeyya pahātabba sacchikātabba bhāvetabbānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:347_3: vasenāpi cattāreva vuttānīti. Evamettha ‘anūnādhikato’ vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:348_0: ‘Kamato’ti ayampi desanākkamova. Ettha ca oḷārikattā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca suviññeyyanti
atk-abh02a:348_1: dukkhasaccaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ, tasseva hetudassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ samudayasaccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:348_2: hetunirodhā phalanirodhoti ñāpanatthaṃ tato nirodhasaccaṃ, tadadhigamupāyadassanatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:348_3: ante maggasaccaṃ. Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṃ vā sattānaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-abh02a:348_4: dukkhamāha. Taṃ neva akataṃ āgacchati, na issaranimmānādito hoti, ito pana hotīti
atk-abh02a:348_5: ñāpanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ samudayaṃ. Tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṃviggamānasānaṃ
atk-abh02a:348_6: dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṃ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṃ nirodhaṃ. Tato nirodhādhigamatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:349_0: ‘Ariyasaccesu yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tassa kiccato’ti saccañāṇakiccatopi vinicchayo veditabboti
atk-abh02a:349_1: attho. Duvidhañhi saccañāṇaṃ – anubodhañāṇañca paṭivedhañāṇañca. Tattha anubodhañāṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:349_2: lokiyaṃ anussavādivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati. Paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ nirodhārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:349_3: katvā kiccato cattāripi saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yathāha – “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passati
atk-abh02a:349_4: dukkhasamudayampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadampi
atk-abh02a:349_5: passatī”ti sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. Yaṃ panetaṃ lokiyaṃ, tattha dukkhañāṇaṃ pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavanavasena
atk-abh02a:349_6: pavattamānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ nivatteti, samudayañāṇaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ, nirodhañāṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:349_7: sassatadiṭṭhiṃ, maggañāṇaṃ akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ; dukkhañāṇaṃ vā dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvarahitesu
atk-abh02a:349_9: issarappadhānakālasabhāvādīhi loko pavattatīti akāraṇe kāraṇābhimānappavattaṃ hetumhi
atk-abh02a:349_12: visuddhimaggaggāhavasena pavattaṃ upāye vippaṭipattiṃ nivatteti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-abh02a:350: Loke lokappabhave, lokatthagame sive ca tadupāye;
atk-abh02a:351: Sammuyhati tāva naro, na vijānāti yāva saccānīti.
atk-abh02a:353_0: ‘Antogadhānaṃ pabhedā’ti dukkhasaccasmiñhi, ṭhapetvā taṇhañceva anāsavadhamme ca,
atk-abh02a:353_1: sesā sabbadhammā antogadhā; samudayasacce chattiṃsa taṇhāvicaritāni; nirodhasaccaṃ
atk-abh02a:353_3: Sammāsaṅkappāpadesena tayo nekkhammavitakkādayo, sammāvācāpadesena cattāri vacīsucaritāni,
atk-abh02a:353_4: sammākammantāpadesena tīṇi kāyasucaritāni, sammāājīvamukhena appicchatā santuṭṭhitā
atk-abh02a:353_5: ca, sabbesaṃyeva vā etesaṃ sammāvācākammantājīvānaṃ ariyakantasīlattā sīlassa ca
atk-abh02a:353_6: saddhāhatthena paṭiggahetabbattā tesaṃ atthitāya ca atthibhāvato saddhindriyasaddhābalachandiddhipādā,
atk-abh02a:354_0: ‘Upamāto’ti bhāro viya hi dukkhasaccaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, bhārādānamiva samudayasaccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:354_1: bhāranikkhepanamiva nirodhasaccaṃ, bhāranikkhepanūpāyo viya maggasaccaṃ; rogo viya
atk-abh02a:354_2: ca dukkhasaccaṃ, roganidānamiva samudayasaccaṃ, rogavūpasamo viya nirodhasaccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:354_3: bhesajjamiva maggasaccaṃ; dubbhikkhamiva vā dukkhasaccaṃ, dubbuṭṭhi viya samudayasaccaṃ,
