atk-abh02a:354_4: subhikkhamiva nirodhasaccaṃ, suvuṭṭhi viya maggasaccaṃ. Apica verīveramūlaverasamugghātaverasamugghātupāyehi,
atk-abh02a:355_0: ‘Catukkato’ti atthi cettha dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ, atthi ariyasaccaṃ na dukkhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:355_1: atthi dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca, atthi neva dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ. Esa nayo samudayādīsu.
atk-abh02a:355_2: Tattha maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato
atk-abh02a:355_3: saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ. Nirodho ariyasaccaṃ na dukkhaṃ. Itaraṃ
atk-abh02a:355_4: pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā dukkhaṃ aniccato, na pana yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ
atk-abh02a:355_5: vussati tathatthena. Sabbākārena pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca
atk-abh02a:355_6: aññatra taṇhāya. Maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pariññatthaṃ bhagavati
atk-abh02a:355_7: brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena neva dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ. Evaṃ samudayādīsupi
atk-abh02a:356: ‘Suññatekavidhādīhī’ti ettha suññato tāva paramatthena hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-abh02a:357: Dukkhameva hi na koci dukkhito, kārako na kiriyāva vijjati;
atk-abh02a:358: Atthi nibbuti na nibbuto pumā, maggamatthi gamako na vijjatīti.
atk-abh02a:362_0: Nirodhasuññāni vā tīṇi, nirodho ca sesattayasuñño. Phalasuñño vā ettha hetu samudaye
atk-abh02a:362_1: dukkhassābhāvato magge ca nirodhassa, na phalena sagabbho pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya.
atk-abh02a:362_2: Hetusuññañca phalaṃ dukkhasamudayānaṃ nirodhamaggānañca asamavāyā, na hetusamavetaṃ
atk-abh02a:362_3: hetuphalaṃ hetuphalasamavāyavādīnaṃ dviaṇukādīni viya. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-abh02a:363: Tayamidha nirodhasuññaṃ, tayena tenāpi nibbuti suññā;
atk-abh02a:364: Suñño phalena hetu, phalampi taṃ hetunā suññanti.
atk-abh02a:366_0: ‘Ekavidhādīhī’ti sabbameva cettha dukkhaṃ ekavidhaṃ pavattibhāvato, duvidhaṃ nāmarūpato,
atk-abh02a:366_2: pañcupādānakkhandhabhedato. Samudayopi ekavidho pavattakabhāvato, duvidho diṭṭhisampayuttāsampayuttato,
atk-abh02a:366_4: rūpābhinandanādibhedato, chabbidho chataṇhākāyabhedato. Nirodhopi ekavidho asaṅkhatadhātubhāvato,
atk-abh02a:366_5: pariyāyena pana duvidho saupādisesaanupādisesato, tividho bhavattayavūpasamato, catubbidho
atk-abh02a:366_7: Maggopi ekavidho bhāvetabbato, duvidho samathavipassanābhedato dassanabhāvanābhedato
atk-abh02a:366_8: vā, tividho khandhattayabhedato. Ayañhi sappadesattā nagaraṃ viya rajjena nippadesehi
atk-abh02a:367_0: “Na kho, āvuso visākha, ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā. Tīhi
atk-abh02a:367_1: ca kho, āvuso visākha, khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito. Yā cāvuso visākha,
atk-abh02a:367_2: sammāvācā, yo ca sammākammanto, yo ca sammāājīvo – ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā;
atk-abh02a:367_3: yo ca sammāvāyāmo, yā ca sammāsati, yo ca sammāsamādhi – ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe
atk-abh02a:367_4: saṅgahitā; yā ca sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo – ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti.
atk-abh02a:368_0: Ettha hi sammāvācādayo tayo sīlameva. Tasmā te sajātito sīlakkhandhena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh02a:368_1: Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṃ sīlakkhandheti bhummena niddeso kato, attho pana karaṇavaseneva
atk-abh02a:368_2: veditabbo. Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena
atk-abh02a:368_3: appetuṃ na sakkoti, vīriye pana paggahakiccaṃ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ
atk-abh02a:369_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – yathā hi nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmāti uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu
atk-abh02a:369_1: eko supupphitaṃ campakarukkhaṃ disvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-abh02a:369_2: Athassa dutiyo onamitvā piṭṭhiṃ dadeyya. So tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṃ
atk-abh02a:369_3: na sakkuṇeyya. Athassa itaro aṃsakūṭaṃ upanāmeyya. So ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa
atk-abh02a:369_4: aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷeyya. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:370_0: Ekato uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo tayo dhammā,
atk-abh02a:370_1: supupphitacampakarukkho viya ārammaṇaṃ, hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ asakkonto viya
atk-abh02a:370_2: attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ asakkonto samādhi, piṭṭhiṃ datvā
atk-abh02a:370_3: onatasahāyo viya vāyāmo, aṃsakūṭaṃ datvā ṭhitasahāyo viya sati. Yathā tesu ekassa
atk-abh02a:370_4: piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:370_5: evameva vīriye paggahakiccaṃ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā laddhūpakāro
atk-abh02a:370_6: samādhi sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ. Tasmā samādhiyevettha sajātito samādhikkhandhena
atk-abh02a:370_7: saṅgahito. Vāyāmasatiyo pana kiriyato saṅgahitā honti.
atk-abh02a:371_0: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappesupi paññā attano dhammatāya ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:371_1: nicchetuṃ na sakkoti, vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṃ? Yathā
atk-abh02a:371_2: hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhutaleneva
atk-abh02a:371_3: parivattetuṃ sakkoti, aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṃ
atk-abh02a:371_4: sakkoti; evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:371_5: abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena
atk-abh02a:371_6: viya ca ādāya ādāya dinnameva nicchetuṃ sakkoti. Tasmā idhāpi sammādiṭṭhiyeva sajātito
atk-abh02a:371_7: paññākkhandhena saṅgahitā, sammāsaṅkappo pana kiriyato saṅgahito hoti. Iti imehi
atk-abh02a:371_8: tīhi khandhehi maggo saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Tena vuttaṃ – “tividho khandhattayabhedato”ti.
atk-abh02a:372_0: Apica sabbāneva saccāni ekavidhāni avitathattā abhiññeyyattā vā, duvidhāni lokiyalokuttarato
atk-abh02a:372_1: saṅkhatāsaṅkhatato ca, tividhāni dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbato appahātabbato nevapahātabbanāpahātabbato
atk-abh02a:372_2: ca, catubbidhāni pariññeyyādibhedatoti. Evamettha ‘ekavidhādīhi’ vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:373: ‘Sabhāgavisabhāgato’ti sabbāneva ca saccāni aññamaññaṃ sabhāgāni avitathato attasuññato dukkarapaṭivedhato ca. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:374_0: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, ānanda, katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā
atk-abh02a:374_1: – yo dūratova sukhumena tālacchiggaḷena asanaṃ atipāteyya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ avirādhitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:374_2: yo vā sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyā”ti? “Etadeva, bhante,
atk-abh02a:374_3: dukkaratarañceva durabhisambhavatarañca – yo sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ
atk-abh02a:374_4: paṭivijjheyyā”ti. “Tato kho te, ānanda, duppaṭivijjhataraṃ paṭivijjhanti ye idaṃ
atk-abh02a:374_5: dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ paṭivijjhanti…pe… ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yathābhūtaṃ paṭivijjhantī”ti.
atk-abh02a:375_0: Visabhāgāni salakkhaṇavavatthānato. Purimāni ca dve sabhāgāni duravagāhatthena gambhīrattā
atk-abh02a:375_1: lokiyattā sāsavattā ca, visabhāgāni phalahetubhedato pariññeyyappahātabbato ca. Pacchimānipi
atk-abh02a:375_2: dve sabhāgāni gambhīratthena duravagāhattā lokuttarattā anāsavattā ca, visabhāgāni
atk-abh02a:375_3: visayavisayībhedato sacchikātabbabhāvetabbato ca. Paṭhamatatiyāni cāpi sabhāgāni
atk-abh02a:375_4: phalāpadesato, visabhāgāni saṅkhatāsaṅkhatato. Dutiyacatutthāni cāpi sabhāgāni hetuapadesato,
atk-abh02a:375_5: visabhāgāni ekantakusalākusalato. Paṭhamacatutthāni cāpi sabhāgāni saṅkhatato, visabhāgāni
atk-abh02a:375_6: lokiyalokuttarato. Dutiyatatiyāni cāpi sabhāgāni nevasekkhānāsekkhabhāvato, visabhāgāni
atk-abh02a:376: Iti evaṃ pakārehi, nayehi ca vicakkhaṇo;
atk-abh02a:381_0: 190. Idāni saṅkhepato uddiṭṭhāni dukkhādīni vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ayaṃ tattha katamaṃ
atk-abh02a:381_1: dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ jātipi dukkhāti niddesavāro āraddho. Tattha jāti veditabbā, jātiyā
atk-abh02a:381_2: dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo; jarā, maraṇaṃ, soko, paridevo, dukkhaṃ, domanassaṃ, upāyāso,
atk-abh02a:381_3: appiyasampayogo, piyavippayogo veditabbo; appiyasampayogassa piyavippayogassa dukkhaṭṭho
atk-abh02a:381_4: veditabbo; icchā veditabbā, icchāya dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo; khandhā veditabbā, khandhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:382_0: Tattha dukkhassa ariyasaccassa kathanatthāya ayaṃ mātikā – idañhi dukkhaṃ nāma anekaṃ
atk-abh02a:382_1: nānappakāraṃ, seyyathidaṃ – dukkhadukkhaṃ, vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ, saṅkhāradukkhaṃ, paṭicchannadukkhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:383_0: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhavedanā sabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā ‘dukkhadukkhaṃ’
atk-abh02a:383_1: nāma. Sukhavedanā vipariṇāmena dukkhuppattihetuto ‘vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ’ nāma. Upekkhāvedanā
atk-abh02a:383_2: ceva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayapīḷitattā ‘saṅkhāradukkhaṃ’ nāma. Tathā
atk-abh02a:383_3: pīḷanaṃ pana maggaphalānampi atthi. Tasmā ete dhammā dukkhasaccapariyāpannattena
atk-abh02a:383_5: kāyikacetasiko ābādho pucchitvā jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato ‘paṭicchannadukkhaṃ’
atk-abh02a:383_6: nāma, apākaṭadukkhantipi vuccati. Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno ābādho apucchitvāva
atk-abh02a:383_7: jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato ‘appaṭicchannadukkhaṃ’ nāma, pākaṭadukkhantipi
atk-abh02a:383_8: vuccati. Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṃ sesaṃ dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṃ jātiādi sabbampi
atk-abh02a:383_9: tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhāvato ‘pariyāyadukkhaṃ’ nāma. Dukkhadukkhaṃ ‘nippariyāyadukkhaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:384_0: Tattha pariyāyadukkhaṃ nippariyāyadukkhanti imasmiṃ padadvaye ṭhatvā dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ
atk-abh02a:384_1: kathetabbaṃ. Ariyasaccañca nāmetaṃ pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhepatopi āgacchati vitthāratopi. Saṅkhepato
atk-abh02a:384_2: āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepenapi vitthārenapi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Vitthārato āgataṭṭhāne pana
atk-abh02a:384_3: vitthāreneva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati, na saṅkhepena. Taṃ idaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne vitthārena āgatanti
atk-abh02a:384_4: vitthāreneva kathetabbaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ taṃ niddesavāre “tattha katamaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ?
atk-abh02a:384_5: Jātipi dukkhā”tiādīni padāni gahetvā “jāti veditabbā, jātiyā dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo”tiādi
atk-abh02a:384_6: vuttaṃ. Tattha jātiādīni tāva “tattha katamā jāti? Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi
atk-abh02a:384_7: tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjātī”ti imassa pana padabhājanīyassa vasena veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:385_0: 191. Tatrāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā – tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānanti ayaṃ saṅkhepato anekesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-abh02a:385_1: sādhāraṇaniddeso. Yā devadattassa jāti, yā somadattassa jātīti evañhi divasampi kathiyamāne
atk-abh02a:385_2: neva sattā pariyādānaṃ gacchanti, na sabbaṃ aparatthadīpanaṃ sijjhati. Imehi pana
atk-abh02a:385_3: dvīhi padehi na koci satto apariyādinno hoti, na kiñci aparatthadīpanaṃ na sijjhati.
atk-abh02a:385_4: Tena vuttaṃ – “yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattāna”nti. Tamhi tamhīti ayaṃ jātigativasena anekesaṃ
atk-abh02a:385_5: sattanikāyānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso. Sattanikāyeti sattānaṃ nikāye, sattaghaṭāyaṃ sattasamūheti attho.
atk-abh02a:386_0: Jātīti ayaṃ jātisaddo anekattho. Tathā hesa “ekampi jātiṃ, dvepi jātiyo”ti ettha
atk-abh02a:386_1: bhave āgato. “Atthi visākhe, nigaṇṭhā nāma samaṇajātikā”ti ettha nikāye. “Tiriyā
atk-abh02a:386_2: nāma tiṇajāti nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṃ āhacca ṭhitā ahosī”ti ettha paññattiyaṃ. “Jāti
atk-abh02a:386_3: dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahitā”ti ettha saṅkhatalakkhaṇe. “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mātukucchimhi
atk-abh02a:386_4: paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtaṃ, tadupādāya sāvassa jātī”ti
atk-abh02a:386_5: ettha paṭisandhiyaṃ. “Sampatijāto, ānanda, bodhisatto”ti ettha pasūtiyaṃ. “Anupakkuṭṭho
atk-abh02a:386_6: jātivādenā”ti ettha kule. “Yatohaṃ, bhagini, ariyāya jātiyā jāto”ti ettha ariyasīle.
atk-abh02a:386_7: Idha panāyaṃ savikāresu paṭhamābhinibbattakkhandhesu vattati. Tasmā jāyamānakavasena
atk-abh02a:386_8: jātīti idamettha sabhāvapaccattaṃ. Sañjāyanavasena sañjātīti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:386_9: Okkamanavasena okkanti. Jāyanaṭṭhena vā jāti, sā aparipuṇṇāyatanavasena yuttā. Sañjāyanaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:386_10: sañjāti, sā paripuṇṇāyatanavasena yuttā. Okkamanaṭṭhena okkanti, sā aṇḍajajalābujavasena
atk-abh02a:386_11: yuttā. Te hi aṇḍakosañca vatthikosañca okkamanti, okkamantāpi pavisantā viya paṭisandhiṃ
atk-abh02a:386_12: gaṇhanti. Abhinibbattanaṭṭhena abhinibbatti. Sā saṃsedajaopapātikavasena yuttā. Te
atk-abh02a:386_13: hi pākaṭā eva hutvā nibbattanti. Ayaṃ tāva sammutikathā.
atk-abh02a:387_0: Idāni paramatthakathā hoti. Khandhā eva hi paramatthato pātubhavanti, na sattā. Tattha
atk-abh02a:387_1: ca khandhānanti ekavokārabhave ekassa, catuvokārabhave catunnaṃ, pañcavokārabhave
atk-abh02a:387_2: pañcannaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Pātubhāvoti uppatti. Āyatanānanti ettha tatra tatra
atk-abh02a:387_3: uppajjamānāyatanavasena saṅgaho veditabbo. Paṭilābhoti santatiyaṃ pātubhāvoyeva;
atk-abh02a:387_4: pātubhavantāneva hi tāni paṭiladdhāni nāma honti. Ayaṃ vuccati jātīti ayaṃ jāti nāma
atk-abh02a:387_5: kathiyati. Sā panesā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā, nīyyātanarasā,
atk-abh02a:387_6: atītabhavato idha ummujjanapaccupaṭṭhānā, phalavasena dukkhavicittatāpaccupaṭṭhānā vā.
atk-abh02a:388_0: Idāni ‘jātiyā dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ayañhi jāti sayaṃ na dukkhā, dukkhuppattiyā
atk-abh02a:388_1: pana vatthubhāvena dukkhāti vuttā. Kataradukkhassa panāyaṃ vatthūti? Yaṃ taṃ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu
atk-abh02a:388_2: bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṃ āpāyikaṃdukkhaṃ, yañca sugatiyaṃ manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṃ
atk-abh02a:388_3: dukkhaṃ uppajjati, tassa sabbassāpi esā vatthu. Tatridaṃ gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṃ
atk-abh02a:388_4: dukkhaṃ – ayañhi satto mātukucchimhi nibbattamāno na uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīsu nibbattati.
atk-abh02a:388_5: Atha kho heṭṭhā āmāsayassa upari pakkāsayassa udarapaṭalapiṭṭhikaṇḍakānaṃ vemajjhe
atk-abh02a:388_7: adhimattajegucche kucchippadese pūtimacchapūtikummāsacandanikādīsu kimi viya nibbattati.
atk-abh02a:388_8: So tattha nibbatto dasa māse mātukucchisambhavena usmanā puṭapākaṃ viya paccamāno
atk-abh02a:388_9: piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya sediyamāno samiñjanapasāraṇādirahito adhimattaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhotīti.
atk-abh02a:389_0: Yaṃ pana so mātu sahasā upakkhalanagamananisīdanauṭṭhānaparivattanādīsu surādhuttahatthagato
atk-abh02a:389_1: eḷako viya ahiguṇṭhikahatthagato sappapotako viya ca ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaodhunananiddhunanādinā
atk-abh02a:389_2: upakkamena adhimattaṃ dukkhamanubhavati, yañca mātu sītudakapānakāle sītanarakūpapanno
atk-abh02a:389_4: khārāpaṭicchakādikammakāraṇappatto viya tibbaṃ dukkhamanubhoti – idaṃ ‘gabbhapariharaṇamūlakaṃ’ dukkhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:390_0: Yaṃ panassa mūḷhagabbhāya mātuyā mittāmaccasuhajjādīhipi adassanārahe dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:390_1: chedanaphālanādīhi dukkhaṃ uppajjati – idaṃ ‘gabbhavipattimūlakaṃ’ dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ vijāyamānāya
atk-abh02a:390_2: mātuyā kammajehi vātehi parivattetvā narakapapātaṃ viya atibhayānakaṃ yonimaggaṃ
atk-abh02a:390_3: paṭipātiyamānassa paramasambādhena yonimukhena tāḷacchiggaḷena viya nikkaḍḍhiyamānassa
atk-abh02a:390_4: mahānāgassa narakasattassa viya ca saṅghāṭapabbatehi vicuṇṇiyamānassa dukkhaṃ uppajjati
atk-abh02a:390_5: – idaṃ ‘vijāyanamūlakaṃ’ dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ pana jātassa taruṇavaṇasadisassa sukumārasarīrassa
atk-abh02a:390_7: dukkhaṃ uppajjati – idaṃ mātukucchito ‘bahi nikkhamanamūlakaṃ’ dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ tato
atk-abh02a:390_8: paraṃ pavattiyaṃ attanāva attānaṃ vadhantassa, acelakavatādivasena ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyuttassa,
atk-abh02a:390_9: kodhavasena abhuñjantassa, ubbandhantassa ca dukkhaṃ hoti – idaṃ ‘attūpakkamamūlakaṃ’ dukkhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:391_0: Yaṃ pana parato vadhabandhanādīni anubhavantassa dukkhaṃ uppajjati – idaṃ ‘parūpakkamamūlakaṃ’
atk-abh02a:391_1: dukkhanti. Iti imassa sabbassāpi dukkhassa ayaṃ jāti vatthumeva hotīti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-abh02a:398: Yaṃ taṃ kathaṃ tattha bhaveyya jātiṃ,
atk-abh02a:406: Na taṃ bhave tattha na cassa jāti,
atk-abh02a:412: Kiṃ bhāsitena bahunā nanu yaṃ kuhiñci,
atk-abh02a:417_0: 192. Jarāniddese jarāti sabhāvapaccattaṃ. Jīraṇatāti ākāraniddeso. Khaṇḍiccantiādayo
atk-abh02a:417_1: tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā. Pacchimā dve pakatiniddesā. Ayañhi jarāti iminā padena
atk-abh02a:417_2: sabhāvato dīpitā, tenassā idaṃ sabhāvapaccattaṃ. Jīraṇatāti iminā ākārato, tenassāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:417_3: ākāraniddeso. Khaṇḍiccanti iminā kālātikkame dantanakhānaṃ khaṇḍitabhāvakaraṇakiccato.
atk-abh02a:417_4: Pāliccanti iminā kesalomānaṃ palitabhāvakaraṇakiccato. Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ
atk-abh02a:417_5: milāpetvā tace valittabhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā. Tenassā ime khaṇḍiccanti ādayo tayo
atk-abh02a:417_6: kālātikkame kiccaniddesā. Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtāti pākaṭajarā
atk-abh02a:417_7: dassitā. Yatheva hi udakassa vā vātassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ saṃsaggapalibhaggatāya
atk-abh02a:417_8: vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti, na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni, evameva
atk-abh02a:417_9: jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo, cakkhuṃ ummīletvāpi gayhati.
atk-abh02a:417_10: Na ca khaṇḍiccādīneva jarā; na hi jarā cakkhuviññeyyā hoti.
atk-abh02a:418_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattāya
atk-abh02a:418_2: pakatiniddesāti veditabbā. Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati tasmā jarā “āyuno
atk-abh02a:418_3: saṃhānī”ti phalūpacārena vuttā. Yasmā daharakāle suppasannāni sukhumampi attano visayaṃ
atk-abh02a:418_4: sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni jaraṃ pattassa paripakkāni āluḷitāni
atk-abh02a:418_5: avisadāni oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti, tasmā “indriyānaṃ
atk-abh02a:419_0: Sā panesā evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti. Tattha dantādīsu
atk-abh02a:419_1: khaṇḍādibhāvadassanato rūpadhammesu jarā ‘pākaṭajarā’ nāma. Arūpadhammesu pana jarā
atk-abh02a:419_2: tādisassa vikārassa adassanato ‘paṭicchannajarā’ nāma. Tattha yvāyaṃ khaṇḍādibhāvo
atk-abh02a:419_3: dissati, so tādisānaṃ dantādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā vaṇṇoyeva. Taṃ cakkhunā disvā manodvārena
atk-abh02a:419_4: cintetvā “ime dantā jarāya pahaṭā”ti jaraṃ jānāti, udakaṭṭhāne baddhāni gosiṅgādīni
atk-abh02a:419_5: oloketvā heṭṭhā udakassa atthibhāvaṃ jānanaṃ viya. Puna avīci savīcīti evampi ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:419_6: jarā duvidhā hoti. Tattha maṇikanakarajatapavāḷacandasūriyādīnaṃ mandadasakādīsu
atk-abh02a:419_7: pāṇīnaṃ viya ca pupphaphalapallavādīsu apāṇīnaṃ viya ca antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:419_8: dubbiññeyyattā jarā ‘avīcijarā’ nāma, nirantarajarāti attho. Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu
atk-abh02a:420_0: Tattha savīcijarā upādinnānupādinnakavasena evaṃ dīpetabbā – daharakumārakānañhi
atk-abh02a:420_1: paṭhamameva khīradantā nāma uṭṭhahanti, na te thirā. Tesu pana patitesu puna dantā
atk-abh02a:420_2: uṭṭhahanti. Te paṭhamameva setā honti, jarāvātena pana pahaṭakāle kāḷakā honti. Kesā
atk-abh02a:420_3: pana paṭhamameva tambāpi honti kāḷakāpi setāpi. Chavi pana salohitikā hoti. Vaḍḍhantānaṃ
atk-abh02a:420_4: vaḍḍhantānaṃ odātānaṃ odātabhāvo, kāḷakānaṃ kāḷakabhāvo paññāyati, jarāvātena pana
atk-abh02a:420_5: pahaṭakāle vaḷiṃ gaṇhāti. Sabbampi sassaṃ vapitakāle setaṃ hoti, pacchā nīlaṃ, jarāvātena
atk-abh02a:420_6: pana pahaṭakāle paṇḍukaṃ hoti. Ambaṅkurenāpi dīpetuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Ayaṃ vuccati jarāti
atk-abh02a:420_7: ayaṃ jarā nāma kathiyati. Sā panesā khandhaparipākalakkhaṇā, maraṇūpanayanarasā,
atk-abh02a:421_0: ‘Jarāya dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṃ na dukkhā, dukkhassa pana
atk-abh02a:421_1: vatthubhāvena dukkhāti vuttā. Katarassa dukkhassa? Kāyadukkhassa ceva domanassadukkhassa
atk-abh02a:421_2: ca. Jiṇṇassa hi attabhāvo jarasakaṭaṃ viya dubbalo hoti, ṭhātuṃ vā gantuṃ vā nisīdituṃ
atk-abh02a:421_3: vā vāyamantassa balavaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ uppajjati; puttadāre yathāpure asallakkhente
atk-abh02a:421_4: domanassaṃ uppajjati. Iti imesaṃ dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvena dukkhāti veditabbā. Apica –
atk-abh02a:426: Pappoti dukkhaṃ yaṃ macco, kāyikaṃ mānasaṃ tathā;
atk-abh02a:427: Sabbametaṃ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhāti.
atk-abh02a:429_0: 193. Maraṇaniddese cavanakavasena cuti; ekacatupañcakkhandhāya cutiyā sāmaññavacanametaṃ.
atk-abh02a:429_1: Cavanatāti bhāvavacanena lakkhaṇanidassanaṃ. Bhedoti cutikhandhānaṃ bhaṅguppattiparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:429_2: Antaradhānanti ghaṭassa viya bhinnassa bhinnānaṃ cutikhandhānaṃ yena kenaci pariyāyena
atk-abh02a:429_3: ṭhānābhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Maccu maraṇanti maccusaṅkhātaṃ maraṇaṃ. Kālo nāma antako,
atk-abh02a:429_4: tassa kiriyā kālakiriyā. Ettāvatā sammutiyā maraṇaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:430_0: Idāni paramatthena dīpetuṃ khandhānaṃ bhedotiādimāha. Paramatthena hi khandhāyeva
atk-abh02a:430_1: bhijjanti, na satto nāma koci marati. Khandhesu pana bhijjamānesu satto marati bhinnesu
atk-abh02a:430_2: matoti vohāro hoti. Ettha ca catupañcavokāravasena khandhānaṃ bhedo, ekavokāravasena
atk-abh02a:430_3: kaḷevarassa nikkhepo; catuvokāravasena vā khandhānaṃ bhedo, sesadvayavasena kaḷevarassa
atk-abh02a:430_4: nikkhepo veditabbo. Kasmā? Bhavadvayepi rūpakāyasaṅkhātassa kaḷevarassa sambhavato.
atk-abh02a:430_5: Yasmā vā cātumahārājikādīsu khandhā bhijjanteva, na kiñci nikkhipati, tasmā tesaṃ
atk-abh02a:430_6: vasena khandhānaṃ bhedo. Manussādīsu kaḷevarassa nikkhepo. Ettha ca kaḷevarassa nikkhepakaraṇato
atk-abh02a:431_0: Jīvitindriyassa upacchedoti iminā indriyabaddhasseva maraṇaṃ nāma hoti, anindriyabaddhassa
atk-abh02a:431_1: maraṇaṃ nāma natthīti dasseti. ‘Sassaṃ mataṃ, rukkho mato’ti idaṃ pana vohāramattameva.
atk-abh02a:431_2: Atthato pana evarūpāni vacanāni sassādīnaṃ khayavayabhāvameva dīpenti. Idaṃ vuccati
atk-abh02a:431_3: maraṇanti idaṃ sabbampi maraṇaṃ nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a:432_0: Apicettha khaṇikamaraṇaṃ, sammutimaraṇaṃ, samucchedamaraṇanti ayampi bhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:432_1: Tattha ‘khaṇikamaraṇaṃ’ nāma pavatte rūpārūpadhammānaṃ bhedo. ‘Tisso mato, phusso
atk-abh02a:432_2: mato’ti idaṃ ‘sammutimaraṇaṃ’ nāma. Khīṇāsavassa appaṭisandhikā kālakiriyā ‘samucchedamaraṇaṃ’
atk-abh02a:432_3: nāma. Imasmiṃ panatthe sammutimaraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Jātikkhayamaraṇaṃ, upakkamamaraṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:432_4: sarasamaraṇaṃ, āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ, puññakkhayamaraṇantipi tasseva nāmaṃ. Tayidaṃ cutilakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:433_0: ‘Maraṇassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana idampi sayaṃ na dukkhaṃ, dukkhassa
atk-abh02a:433_1: pana vatthubhāvena dukkhanti vuttaṃ. Maraṇantikāpi hi sārīrikā vedanā, paṭivāte gahitā
atk-abh02a:433_2: ādittatiṇukkā viya, sarīraṃ nidahanti. Narakanimittādīnaṃ upaṭṭhānakāle balavadomanassaṃ
atk-abh02a:433_3: uppajjati. Iti imesaṃ dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvena dukkhanti veditabbaṃ. Api ca –
atk-abh02a:441_0: Apica imāni jātijarāmaraṇāni nāma imesaṃ sattānaṃ vadhakapaccāmittā viya otāraṃ gavesantāni
atk-abh02a:441_1: vicaranti. Yathā hi purisassa tīsu paccāmittesu otārāpekkhesu vicarantesu eko vadeyya
atk-abh02a:441_2: – “ahaṃ asukaaraññassa nāma vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā etaṃ ādāya tattha gamissāmi, ettha mayhaṃ
atk-abh02a:441_3: dukkaraṃ natthī”ti. Dutiyo vadeyya “ahaṃ tava etaṃ gahetvā gatakāle pothetvā dubbalaṃ
atk-abh02a:441_4: karissāmi, ettha mayhaṃ dukkaraṃ natthī”ti. Tatiyo vadeyya – “tayā etasmiṃ pothetvā
atk-abh02a:441_5: dubbale kate tiṇhena asinā sīsacchedanaṃ nāma mayhaṃ bhāro hotū”ti. Te evaṃ vatvā tathā kareyyuṃ.
atk-abh02a:442_0: Tattha paṭhamapaccāmittassa araññassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā taṃ ādāya tattha gatakālo viya
atk-abh02a:442_1: suhajjañātimaṇḍalato nikkaḍḍhitvā yattha katthaci nibbattāpanaṃ nāma jātiyā kiccaṃ.
atk-abh02a:442_2: Dutiyassa pothetvā dubbalakaraṇaṃ viya nibbattakkhandhesu nipatitvā parādhīnamañcaparāyaṇabhāvakaraṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:442_3: jarāya kiccaṃ. Tatiyassa tiṇhena asinā sīsacchedanaṃ viya jīvitakkhayapāpanaṃ maraṇassa
atk-abh02a:443_0: Apicettha jātidukkhaṃ sādīnavamahākantārappaveso viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jarādukkhaṃ tattha
atk-abh02a:443_1: annapānarahitassa dubbalyaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Maraṇadukkhaṃ dubbalassa iriyāpathapavattane
atk-abh02a:445_0: 194. Sokaniddese byasatīti byasanaṃ; hitasukhaṃ khipati viddhaṃsetīti attho. Ñātīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:445_1: byasanaṃ ñātibyasanaṃ; corarogabhayādīhi ñātikkhayo ñātivināsoti attho. Tena ñātibyasanena
atk-abh02a:445_2: phuṭṭhassāti ajjhotthaṭassa abhibhūtassa samannāgatassāti attho. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:445_3: Ayaṃ pana viseso – bhogānaṃ byasanaṃ bhogabyasanaṃ; rājacorādivasena bhogakkhayo
atk-abh02a:445_4: bhogavināsoti attho. Rogoyeva byasanaṃ rogabyasanaṃ; rogo hi ārogyaṃ byasati vināsetīti
atk-abh02a:445_5: byasanaṃ. Sīlassa byasanaṃ sīlabyasanaṃ; dussīlyassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sammādiṭṭhiṃ vināsayamānā
atk-abh02a:445_6: uppannā diṭṭhiyeva byasanaṃ diṭṭhibyasanaṃ. Ettha ca purimāni dve anipphannāni, pacchimāni
atk-abh02a:445_7: tīṇi nipphannāni tilakkhaṇabbhāhatāni. Purimāni ca tīṇi neva kusalāni na akusalāni.
atk-abh02a:446_0: Aññataraññatarenāti gahitesu vā yena kenaci aggahitesu vā mittāmaccabyasanādīsu yena
atk-abh02a:446_1: kenaci. Samannāgatassāti samanubandhassa aparimuccamānassa. Aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammenāti
atk-abh02a:446_2: yena kenaci sokadukkhassa uppattihetunā. Sokoti socanakavasena soko; idaṃ tehi kāraṇehi
atk-abh02a:446_3: upajjanakasokassa sabhāvapaccattaṃ. Socanāti socanākaro. Socitattanti socitabhāvo.
atk-abh02a:446_4: Antosokoti abbhantare soko. Dutiyapadaṃ upasaggavasena vaḍḍhitaṃ. So hi abbhantare
atk-abh02a:446_5: sukkhāpento viya parisukkhāpento viya uppajjatīti “antosoko antoparisoko”ti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:447_0: Cetaso parijjhāyanāti cittassa jhāyanākāro. Soko hi uppajjamāno aggi viya cittaṃ
atk-abh02a:447_1: jhāpeti paridahati, “cittaṃ me jhāmaṃ, na me kiñci paṭibhātī”ti vadāpeti. Dukkhito
atk-abh02a:447_2: mano dummano, tassa bhāvo domanassaṃ. Anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena sokova sallanti sokasallaṃ.
atk-abh02a:447_3: Ayaṃ vuccati sokoti ayaṃ soko nāma kathiyati. So panāyaṃ kiñcāpi atthato domanassavedanāva
atk-abh02a:447_4: hoti, evaṃ santepi antonijjhānalakkhaṇo, cetaso parinijjhāyanaraso, anusocanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-abh02a:448_0: ‘Sokassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayaṃ sabhāvadukkhattā ceva dukkhassa
atk-abh02a:448_1: ca vatthubhāvena dukkhoti vutto. Kataradukkhassāti? Kāyikadukkhassa ceva javanakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:448_2: ca domanassadukkhassa. Sokavegena hi hadaye mahāgaṇḍo uṭṭhahitvā paripaccitvā bhijjati,
atk-abh02a:448_3: mukhato vā kāḷalohitaṃ nikkhamati, balavaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ uppajjati. “Ettakā me ñātayo
atk-abh02a:448_4: khayaṃ gatā, ettakā me bhogā”ti cintentassa ca balavaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati. Iti
atk-abh02a:448_5: imesaṃ dvinnaṃ dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvenapesa dukkhoti veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a:449: Sattānaṃ hadayaṃ soko, sallaṃ viya vitujjati;
atk-abh02a:452: Dukkhampi vividhaṃ yasmā, tasmā dukkhoti vuccatīti.
atk-abh02a:454_0: 195. Paridevaniddese ‘mayhaṃ dhītā, mayhaṃ putto’ti evaṃ ādissa ādissa devanti rodanti
atk-abh02a:454_1: etenāti ādevo. Taṃ taṃ vaṇṇaṃ parikittetvā parikittetvā devanti etenāti paridevo.
atk-abh02a:454_2: Tato parāni dve dve padāni purimadvayasseva ākārabhāvaniddesavasena vuttāni. Vācāti
atk-abh02a:454_3: vacanaṃ. Palāpoti tucchaṃ niratthakavacanaṃ. Upaḍḍhabhaṇitaaññabhaṇitādivasena virūpo
atk-abh02a:454_4: palāpo vippalāpo. Lālappoti punappunaṃ lapanaṃ. Lālappanākāro lālappanā. Lālappitassa
atk-abh02a:454_5: bhāvo lālappitattaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati paridevoti ayaṃ paridevo nāma kathiyati. So lālappanalakkhaṇo,
atk-abh02a:455_0: ‘Paridevassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṃ na dukkho, kāyadukkhadomanassadukkhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:455_1: pana vatthubhāvena dukkhoti vutto. Paridevanto hi attano khandhaṃ muṭṭhīhi potheti,
atk-abh02a:455_2: ubhohi hatthehi uraṃ paharati piṃsati, sīsena bhittiyā saddhiṃ yujjhati. Tenassa
atk-abh02a:455_3: balavaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ uppajjati. ‘Ettakā me ñātayo khayaṃ vayaṃ abbhatthaṃ gatā’tiādīni
atk-abh02a:455_4: cinteti. Tenassa balavaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati. Iti imesaṃ dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvena
atk-abh02a:461: 196-7. Dukkhadomanassaniddesā heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vaṇṇitattā pākaṭā eva. Lakkhaṇādīni pana tesaṃ tattha vuttāneva.
atk-abh02a:462_0: ‘Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo, domanassassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana
atk-abh02a:462_1: ubhayampetaṃ sayañca dukkhattā kāyikacetasikadukkhānañca vatthubhāvena dukkhanti
atk-abh02a:462_2: vuttaṃ. Hatthapādānañhi kaṇṇanāsikānañca chedanadukkhena dukkhitassa, anāthasālāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:462_3: ucchiṭṭhakapālaṃ purato katvā nipannassa, vaṇamukhehi puḷuvakesu nikkhamantesu balavaṃ
atk-abh02a:462_4: kāyadukkhaṃ uppajjati; nānāraṅgarattavatthamanuññālaṅkāraṃ nakkhattaṃ kīḷantaṃ mahājanaṃ
atk-abh02a:462_5: disvā balavadomanassaṃ uppajjati. Evaṃ tāva dukkhassa dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvo veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a:463: Pīḷeti kāyikamidaṃ, dukkhaṃ dukkhañca mānasaṃ bhiyyo;
atk-abh02a:464: Janayati yasmā tasmā, dukkhanti visesato vuttanti.
atk-abh02a:465_0: Cetodukkhasamappitā pana kese pakiriya urāni patipisenti, āvaṭṭanti, vivaṭṭanti,
atk-abh02a:465_1: chinnapapātaṃ papatanti, satthaṃ āharanti, visaṃ khādanti, rajjuyā ubbandhanti, aggiṃ
atk-abh02a:465_2: pavisanti. Taṃ taṃ viparītaṃ vatthuṃ tathā tathā vippaṭisārino pariḍayhamānacittā
atk-abh02a:465_3: cintenti. Evaṃ domanassassa ubhinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvo veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a:466: Pīḷeti yato cittaṃ, kāyassa ca pīḷanaṃ samāvahati;
atk-abh02a:469_1: nāmaṃ. Balavaṃ āyāso upāyāso. Āyāsitabhāvo āyāsitattaṃ. Upāyāsitabhāvo upāyāsitattaṃ.
atk-abh02a:469_2: Ayaṃ vuccati upāyāsoti ayaṃ upāyāso nāma kathiyati. So panesa byāsattilakkhaṇo, nitthunanaraso,
atk-abh02a:470_0: ‘Upāyāsassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṃ na dukkho, ubhinnampi
atk-abh02a:470_1: dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvena dukkhoti vutto. Kupitena hi raññā issariyaṃ acchinditvā hataputtabhātikānaṃ
atk-abh02a:470_2: āṇattavadhānaṃ bhayena aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nilīnānaṃ mahāvisādappattānaṃ dukkhaṭṭhānena
atk-abh02a:470_3: dukkhaseyyāya dukkhanisajjāya balavaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ uppajjati. ‘Ettakā no ñātakā, ettakā
atk-abh02a:470_4: bhogā naṭṭhā’ti cintentānaṃ balavadomanassaṃ uppajjati. Iti imesaṃ dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:471: Cittassa paridahanā, kāyassa visādanā ca adhimattaṃ;
atk-abh02a:472: Yaṃ dukkhamupāyāso, janeti dukkho tato vutto.
atk-abh02a:473_0: Ettha ca mandagginā antobhājaneyeva telādīnaṃ pāko viya soko. Tikkhagginā paccamānassa
atk-abh02a:473_1: bhājanato bahinikkhamanaṃ viya paridevo. Bahinikkhantāvasesassa nikkhamitumpi appahontassa
atk-abh02a:473_2: antobhājaneyeva yāva parikkhayā pāko viya upāyāso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a:475_0: 199. Appiyasampayoganiddese yassāti ye assa. Aniṭṭhāti apariyesitā. Pariyesitā vā
atk-abh02a:475_1: hontu apariyesitā vā, nāmamevetaṃ amanāpārammaṇānaṃ. Manasmiṃ na kamanti, na pavisantīti
atk-abh02a:475_2: akantā. Manasmiṃ na appiyanti, na vā manaṃ vaḍḍhentīti amanāpā. Rūpātiādi tesaṃ sabhāvanidassanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:475_3: Anatthaṃ kāmenti icchantīti anatthakāmā. Ahitaṃ kāmenti icchantīti ahitakāmā. Aphāsukaṃ
atk-abh02a:475_4: dukkhavihāraṃ kāmenti icchantīti aphāsukakāmā. Catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbhayaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ
atk-abh02a:475_5: na icchanti, sabhayaṃ vaṭṭameva nesaṃ kāmenti icchantīti āyogakkhemakāmā.
atk-abh02a:476_0: Apica saddhādīnaṃ vuddhisaṅkhātassa atthassa akāmanato tesaṃyeva hānisaṅkhātassa
atk-abh02a:476_1: anatthassa ca kāmanato anatthakāmā. Saddhādīnaṃyeva upāyabhūtassa hitassa akāmanato
atk-abh02a:476_2: saddhāhāniādīnaṃ upāyabhūtassa ahitassa ca kāmanato ahitakāmā. Phāsukavihārassa akāmanato
atk-abh02a:476_3: aphāsukavihārassa ca kāmanato aphāsukakāmā. Yassa kassaci nibbhayassa akāmanato bhayassa
atk-abh02a:476_4: ca kāmanato ayogakkhemakāmāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a:477_0: Saṅgatīti gantvā saṃyogo. Samāgamoti āgatehi saṃyogo. Samodhānanti ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-abh02a:477_1: sahabhāvo. Missībhāvoti sabbakiccānaṃ sahakaraṇaṃ. Ayaṃ sattavasena yojanā. Saṅkhāravasena
atk-abh02a:477_2: pana yaṃ labbhati taṃ gahetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ appiyasampayogo nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a:478_0: So atthato eko dhammo nāma natthi. Kevalaṃ appiyasampayuttānaṃ duvidhassāpi dukkhassa
atk-abh02a:478_1: vatthubhāvato dukkhoti vutto. Aniṭṭhāni hi vatthūni samodhānagatāni vijjhanachedanaphālanādīhi
atk-abh02a:478_2: kāyikampi dukkhaṃ uppādenti, ubbegajananato mānasampi. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-abh02a:479: Disvāva appiye dukkhaṃ, paṭhamaṃ hoti cetasi;
atk-abh02a:484_0: 200. Piyavippayoganiddeso vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo. Mātā vātiādi panettha
atk-abh02a:484_1: atthakāme sarūpena dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha mamāyatīti mātā. Piyāyatīti pitā. Bhajatīti
atk-abh02a:484_2: bhātā. Tathā bhaginī. Mettāyantīti mittā, minantīti vā mittā; sabbaguyhesu anto pakkhipantīti
atk-abh02a:484_3: attho. Kiccakaraṇīyesu sahabhāvaṭṭhena amā hontīti amaccā. Ayaṃ amhākaṃ ajjhattikoti
atk-abh02a:484_4: evaṃ jānanti ñāyantīti vā ñātī. Lohitena sambandhāti sālohitā. Evametāni padāni atthato
atk-abh02a:484_5: veditabbāni. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ piyehi vippayogo nāma kathiyati. So iṭṭhavatthuviyogalakkhaṇo,
atk-abh02a:485_0: So atthato eko dhammo nāma natthi. Kevalaṃ piyavippayuttānaṃ duvidhassāpi dukkhassa
atk-abh02a:485_1: vatthubhāvato dukkhoti vutto. Iṭṭhāni hi vatthūni viyujjamānāni sarīrassa sosanamilāpanādibhāvena
atk-abh02a:485_2: kāyikampi dukkhaṃ uppādenti, ‘yampi no ahosi, tampi no natthī’ti anusocāpanato mānasampi. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-abh02a:487: Bālā yato tato yaṃ, dukkhoti mato piyaviyogoti.
atk-abh02a:489_0: 201. Icchāniddese jātidhammānanti jātisabhāvānaṃ jātipakatikānaṃ. Icchā uppajjatīti
atk-abh02a:489_1: taṇhā uppajjati. Aho vatāti patthanā. Na kho panetaṃ icchāya pattabbanti yaṃ etaṃ
atk-abh02a:489_2: “aho vata mayaṃ na jātidhammā assāma, na ca vata no jāti āgaccheyyā”ti evaṃ pahīnasamudayesu
atk-abh02a:489_3: sādhūsu vijjamānaṃ ajātidhammattaṃ, parinibbutesu ca vijjamānaṃ jātiyā anāgamanaṃ
atk-abh02a:489_4: icchitaṃ, taṃ icchantassāpi maggabhāvanāya vinā apattabbato anicchantassa ca bhāvanāya
atk-abh02a:489_5: pattabbato na icchāya pattabbaṃ nāma hoti. Idampīti etampi; upari sesāni upādāya
atk-abh02a:489_6: pikāro. Yampicchanti yenapi dhammena alabbhaneyyaṃ vatthuṃ icchanto na labhati, taṃ
atk-abh02a:489_7: alabbhaneyyavatthuicchanaṃ dukkhanti veditabbaṃ. Jarādhammānantiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:489_8: Evamettha alabbhaneyyavatthūsu icchāva “yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkha”nti vuttā.
atk-abh02a:490_0: Dvinnaṃ pana dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvato dukkhāti vuttā. Ekacco hi rājā bhavissatīti
atk-abh02a:490_1: sambhāvito hoti. So chinnabhinnagaṇena parivārito pabbatavisamaṃ vā vanagahanaṃ vā
atk-abh02a:490_2: pavisati. Atha rājā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā balakāyaṃ peseti. So rājapurisehi nihataparivāro
atk-abh02a:490_3: sayampi laddhappahāro palāyamāno rukkhantaraṃ vā pāsāṇantaraṃ vā pavisati. Tasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:490_4: samaye mahāmegho uṭṭhahati, tibbandhakārā kāḷavaddalikā hoti. Atha naṃ samantato
atk-abh02a:490_5: kāḷakipillikādayo pāṇā parivāretvā gaṇhanti. Tenassa balavakāyadukkhaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:490_6: ‘Maṃ ekaṃ nissāya ettakā ñātī ca bhogā ca vinaṭṭhā’ti cintentassa balavadomanassaṃ
atk-abh02a:490_7: uppajjati. Iti ayaṃ icchā imesaṃ dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvena dukkhāti veditabbā. Apica –
atk-abh02a:491: Taṃ taṃ patthayamānānaṃ, tassa tassa alābhato;
atk-abh02a:492: Yaṃ vighātamayaṃ dukkhaṃ, sattānaṃ idha jāyati.
atk-abh02a:496_0: 202. Upādānakkhandhaniddese saṃkhittenāti desanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dukkhañhi ettakāni
atk-abh02a:496_1: dukkhasatānīti vā ettakāni dukkhasahassānīti vā ettakāni dukkhasatasahassānīti vā
atk-abh02a:496_2: saṃkhipituṃ na sakkā, desanā pana sakkā, tasmā “dukkhaṃ nāma aññaṃ kiñci natthi,
atk-abh02a:496_3: saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti desanaṃ saṅkhipento evamāha. Seyyathidanti
atk-abh02a:496_4: nipāto; tassa te katameti ceti attho. Rūpūpādānakkhandhotiādīnaṃ attho khandhavibhaṅge vaṇṇitoyeva.
atk-abh02a:498: Jātippabhutikaṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ vuttaṃ idha tādinā;
atk-abh02a:499: Avuttaṃ yañca taṃ sabbaṃ, vinā ete na vijjati.
atk-abh02a:502_0: Tathā hi indhanamiva pāvako, lakkhamiva paharaṇāni, gorūpamiva ḍaṃsamakasādayo, khettamiva
atk-abh02a:502_1: lāvakā, gāmaṃ viya gāmaghātakā, upādānakkhandhapañcakameva jātiādayo nānappakārehi
atk-abh02a:502_2: bādhayamānā, tiṇalatādīni viya bhūmiyaṃ, pupphaphalapallavādīni viya rukkhesu, upādānakkhandhesuyeva
atk-abh02a:502_3: nibbattanti. Upādānakkhandhānañca ādidukkhaṃ jāti, majjhedukkhaṃ jarā, pariyosānadukkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:502_4: maraṇaṃ. Māraṇantikadukkhābhighātena pariḍayhamānadukkhaṃ soko, tadasahanato lālappanadukkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:502_6: dukkhaṃ. Tena bādhiyamānānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ tattha paṭighuppattito cetobādhanadukkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:502_7: domanassaṃ. Sokādivuḍḍhiyā janitavisādānaṃ anutthunanadukkhaṃ upāyāso. Manorathavighātappattānaṃ
atk-abh02a:502_8: icchāvighātadukkhaṃ icchitālābhoti evaṃ nānappakārato upaparikkhiyamānā upādānakkhandhāva
atk-abh02a:502_9: dukkhāti yadetaṃ ekamekaṃ dassetvā vuccamānaṃ anekehi kappehi na sakkā asesato vattuṃ,
atk-abh02a:502_10: taṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasaṃ viya yesu kesuci pañcasu
atk-abh02a:502_11: upādānakkhandhesu saṅkhipitvā dassetuṃ “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti bhagavā avocāti.
atk-abh02a:505_0: 203. Samudayasaccaniddese yāyaṃ taṇhāti yā ayaṃ taṇhā. Ponobbhavikāti punabbhavakaraṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:505_1: punobbhavo, punobbhavo sīlamassāti ponobbhavikā. Apica punabbhavaṃ deti, punabbhavāya
atk-abh02a:505_2: saṃvattati, punappunaṃ bhave nibbattetīti ponobbhavikā. Sā panesā punabbhavassa dāyikāpi
atk-abh02a:505_3: atthi adāyikāpi, punabbhavāya saṃvattanikāpi atthi asaṃvattanikāpi, dinnāya paṭisandhiyā
atk-abh02a:505_4: upadhivepakkamattāpi. Sā punabbhavaṃ dadamānāpi adadamānāpi, punabbhavāya saṃvattamānāpi
atk-abh02a:505_5: asaṃvattamānāpi, dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkamattāpi ponobbhavikā evāti nāmaṃ
atk-abh02a:505_6: labhati. Abhinandanasaṅkhātena nandirāgena sahagatāti nandirāgasahagatā, nandirāgena
atk-abh02a:505_7: saddhiṃ atthato ekattameva gatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatratatrābhinandinīti yatra yatra
atk-abh02a:505_8: attabhāvo tatratatrābhinandinī, rūpādīsu vā ārammaṇesu tatratatrābhinandinī; rūpābhinandinī
atk-abh02a:505_10: katamāti ceti attho. Kāmataṇhāti kāme taṇhā kāmataṇhā; pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassetaṃ
atk-abh02a:505_11: adhivacanaṃ. Bhave taṇhā bhavataṇhā; bhavapatthanāvasena uppannassa sassatadiṭṭhisahagatassa
atk-abh02a:505_12: rūpārūpabhavarāgassa ca jhānanikantiyā cetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vibhave taṇhā vibhavataṇhā;
atk-abh02a:506_0: Idāni tassā taṇhāya vatthuṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ sā kho panesātiādimāha. Tattha uppajjatīti
atk-abh02a:506_1: jāyati. Nivisatīti punappunaṃ pavattivasena patiṭṭhahati. Yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpanti
atk-abh02a:506_2: yaṃ lokasmiṃ piyasabhāvañceva madhurasabhāvañca. Cakkhuṃ loketiādīsu lokasmiñhi cakkhādīsu
atk-abh02a:506_3: mamattena abhiniviṭṭhā sattā sampattiyaṃ patiṭṭhitā attano cakkhuṃ ādāsādīsu nimittaggahaṇānusārena
atk-abh02a:506_4: vippasannapañcapasādaṃ suvaṇṇavimāne ugghāṭitamaṇisīhapañjaraṃ viya maññanti, sotaṃ
atk-abh02a:506_5: rajatapanāḷikaṃ viya pāmaṅgasuttakaṃ viya ca maññanti, tuṅganāsāti laddhavohāraṃ
atk-abh02a:506_6: ghānaṃ vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaharitālavaṭṭiṃ viya maññanti, jivhaṃ rattakambalapaṭalaṃ viya
atk-abh02a:506_7: mudusiniddhamadhurarasadaṃ maññanti, kāyaṃ sālalaṭṭhiṃ viya suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya ca
atk-abh02a:506_8: maññanti, manaṃ aññesaṃ manena asadisaṃ uḷāraṃ maññanti, rūpaṃ suvaṇṇakaṇikārapupphādivaṇṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:506_10: catusamuṭṭhānikagandhārammaṇādīni ‘kassa aññassa evarūpāni atthī’ti maññanti. Tesaṃ
atk-abh02a:506_11: evaṃ maññamānānaṃ tāni cakkhādīni piyarūpāni ceva honti sātarūpāni ca. Atha nesaṃ
atk-abh02a:506_12: tattha anuppannā ceva taṇhā uppajjati, uppannā ca punappunaṃ pavattivasena nivisati.
atk-abh02a:506_13: Tasmā bhagavā – “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ. Etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”tiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:506_14: Tattha uppajjamānāti yadā uppajjati tadā ettha uppajjatīti attho. Esa nayo sabbatthāpīti.
atk-abh02a:509: 204. Nirodhasaccaniddese yo tassāyeva taṇhāyāti ettha ‘yo tasseva dukkhassā’ti vattabbe yasmā samudayanirodheneva dukkhaṃ nirujjhati no aññathā, yathāha –
atk-abh02a:514_0: Tasmā taṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ dassento samudayanirodhena dassetuṃ evamāha. Sīhasamānavuttino
atk-abh02a:514_1: hi tathāgatā. Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca dassentā hetumhi paṭipajjanti,
atk-abh02a:514_2: na phale. Suvānavuttino pana aññatitthiyā. Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca
atk-abh02a:514_3: dassentā attakilamathānuyogena ceva tasseva ca desanāya phale paṭipajjanti, na hetumhīti.
atk-abh02a:514_4: Sīhasamānavuttitāya satthā hetumhi paṭipajjanto yo tassāyevātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:515_0: Tattha tassāyevāti yā sā uppatti nivesavasena heṭṭhā pakāsitā tassāyeva. Asesavirāganirodhotiādīni
atk-abh02a:515_1: sabbāni nibbānavevacanāneva. Nibbānañhi āgamma taṇhā asesā virajjati nirujjhati.
atk-abh02a:515_2: Tasmā taṃ “tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho”ti vuccati. Nibbānañca āgamma taṇhā
atk-abh02a:515_3: cajiyati, paṭinissajjiyati, muccati, na alliyati. Tasmā nibbānaṃ “cāgo paṭinissaggo
atk-abh02a:515_4: mutti anālayo”ti vuccati. Ekameva hi nibbānaṃ. Nāmāni panassa sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ nāmapaṭipakkhavasena
atk-abh02a:515_5: anekāni nibbānavevacanāneva honti, seyyathidaṃ – asesavirāganirodho, cāgo, paṭinissaggo,
atk-abh02a:515_6: mutti, anālayo, rāgakkhayo, dosakkhayo, mohakkhayo, taṇhākkhayo, anuppādo, appavattaṃ,
atk-abh02a:515_7: animittaṃ, appaṇihitaṃ, anāyūhanaṃ, appaṭisandhi, anupapatti, agati, ajātaṃ, ajaraṃ,
atk-abh02a:515_8: abyādhi, amataṃ, asokaṃ, aparidevaṃ, anupāyāsaṃ, asaṃkiliṭṭhantiādīni.
atk-abh02a:516_0: Idāni maggena chinnāya nibbānaṃ āgamma appavattipattāyapi ca taṇhāya yesu vatthūsu
atk-abh02a:516_1: tassā uppatti dassitā, tattheva abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ sā kho panesātiādimāha. Tattha yathā
atk-abh02a:516_2: puriso khette jātaṃ tittaalābuvalliṃ disvā aggato paṭṭhāya mūlaṃ pariyesitvā chindeyya,
atk-abh02a:516_3: sā anupubbena milāyitvā appavattiṃ gaccheyya. Tato tasmiṃ khette tittaalābu niruddhā
atk-abh02a:516_4: pahīnāti vucceyya. Evameva khette tittaalābu viya cakkhādīsu taṇhā. Sā ariyamaggena
atk-abh02a:516_5: mūlacchinnā nibbānaṃ āgamma appavattiṃ gacchati. Evaṃ gatā pana tesu vatthūsu khette
atk-abh02a:516_6: tittaalābu viya na paññāyati. Yathā ca aṭavito core ānetvā nagarassa dakkhiṇadvāre
atk-abh02a:516_7: ghāteyyuṃ, tato aṭaviyaṃ corā matāti vā māritāti vā vucceyyuṃ; evameva aṭaviyaṃ corā
atk-abh02a:516_8: viya yā cakkhādīsu taṇhā, sā dakkhiṇadvāre corā viya nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhattā
atk-abh02a:516_9: nibbāne niruddhā. Evaṃ niruddhā pana tesu vatthūsu aṭaviyaṃ corā viya na paññāyati.
atk-abh02a:516_10: Tenassā tattheva nirodhaṃ dassento “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā
atk-abh02a:516_11: pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha nirujjhamānā nirujjhatī”tiādimāha. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh02a:519_0: 205. Maggasaccaniddese ayamevāti aññamaggapaṭikkhepanatthaṃ niyamanaṃ. Ariyoti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhehi
atk-abh02a:519_1: kilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo. Aṭṭhaṅgāni
atk-abh02a:519_2: assāti aṭṭhaṅgiko. Svāyaṃ caturaṅgikā viya senā, pañcaṅgikaṃ viya tūriyaṃ aṅgamattameva
atk-abh02a:519_3: hoti, aṅgavinimutto natthi. Nibbānatthikehi maggīyati, nibbānaṃ vā maggati, kilese
atk-abh02a:519_4: vā mārento gacchatīti maggo. Seyyathidanti so katamoti ceti attho.
atk-abh02a:520_0: Idāni aṅgamattameva maggo hoti, aṅgavinimmutto natthīti dassento sammādiṭṭhi…pe…
atk-abh02a:520_1: sammāsamādhīti āha. Tattha sammā dassanalakkhaṇā sammādiṭṭhi. Sammā abhiniropanalakkhaṇo
atk-abh02a:520_2: sammāsaṅkappo. Sammā pariggahalakkhaṇā sammāvācā. Sammā samuṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇo sammākammanto.
atk-abh02a:520_3: Sammā vodānalakkhaṇo sammāājīvo. Sammā paggahalakkhaṇo sammāvāyāmo. Sammā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā
atk-abh02a:521_0: Tesu ca ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kiccāni honti, seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi
atk-abh02a:521_1: attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
atk-abh02a:521_2: sampayuttadhamme ca passati tappaṭicchādakamohavidhamanavasena asammohato. Sammāsaṅkappādayopi
atk-abh02a:521_3: tatheva micchāsaṅkappādīni ca pajahanti, nirodhañca ārammaṇaṃ karonti. Visesato panettha
atk-abh02a:521_4: sammāsaṅkappo sahajātadhamme abhiniropeti, sammāvācā sammā pariggaṇhāti, sammākammanto
atk-abh02a:521_5: sammā samuṭṭhāpeti, sammāājīvo sammā vodāpeti, sammāvāyāmo sammā paggaṇhāti, sammāsati
atk-abh02a:522_0: Apicesā sammādiṭṭhi nāma pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā hoti, maggakāle ekakkhaṇā
atk-abh02a:522_1: ekārammaṇā, kiccato pana dukkhe ñāṇantiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati. Sammāsaṅkappādayopi
atk-abh02a:522_2: pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā honti, maggakāle ekakkhaṇā ekārammaṇā. Tesu sammāsaṅkappo
atk-abh02a:522_3: kiccato nekkhammasaṅkappotiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati. Sammāvācādayo tayo pubbabhāge
atk-abh02a:522_4: nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā viratiyopi honti cetanāyopi, maggakkhaṇe pana viratiyova.
atk-abh02a:522_5: Sammāvāyāmo sammāsatīti idampi dvayaṃ kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri
atk-abh02a:522_6: nāmāni labhati. Sammāsamādhi pana pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi sammāsamādhiyeva.
atk-abh02a:523_0: Iti imesu aṭṭhasu dhammesu bhagavatā nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa yogino bahūpakārattā
atk-abh02a:523_1: paṭhamaṃ sammādiṭṭhi desitā. Ayañhi “paññāpajjoto paññāsattha”nti ca vuttā. Tasmā
atk-abh02a:523_2: etāya pubbabhāge vipassanāñāṇasaṅkhātāya sammādiṭṭhiyā avijjandhakāraṃ viddhaṃsetvā
atk-abh02a:523_3: kilesacore ghātento khemena yogāvacaro nibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tena vuttaṃ “nibbānādhigamāya
atk-abh02a:523_4: paṭipannassa yogino bahūpakārattā paṭhamaṃ sammādiṭṭhi desitā”ti.
atk-abh02a:524_0: Sammāsaṅkappo pana tassā bahūpakāro, tasmā tadanantaraṃ vutto. Yathā hi heraññiko
atk-abh02a:524_1: hatthena parivattetvā parivattetvā cakkhunā kahāpaṇaṃ olokento ‘ayaṃ kūṭo, ayaṃ cheko’ti
atk-abh02a:524_2: jānāti, evaṃ yogāvacaropi pubbabhāge vitakkena vitakketvā vipassanāpaññāya olokayamāno
atk-abh02a:524_3: ‘ime dhammā kāmāvacarā, ime dhammā rūpāvacarādayo’ti jānāti. Yathā vā pana purisena
atk-abh02a:524_4: koṭiyaṃ gahetvā parivattetvā parivattetvā dinnaṃ mahārukkhaṃ tacchako vāsiyā tacchetvā
atk-abh02a:524_5: kamme upaneti, evaṃ vitakkena vitakketvā vitakkatvā dinnadhamme yogāvacaro paññāya
atk-abh02a:524_6: ‘ime dhammā kāmāvacarā, ime dhammā rūpāvacarā’tiādinā nayena paricchinditvā kamme
atk-abh02a:524_7: upaneti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘sammāsaṅkappo pana tassā bahūpakāro, tasmā tadanantaraṃ vutto”ti.
atk-abh02a:525: Svāyaṃ yathā sammādiṭṭhiyā, evaṃ sammāvācāyapi upakārako. Yathāha – “pubbe kho, gahapati, vitakketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācaṃ bhindatī”ti. Tasmā tadanantaraṃ sammāvācā vuttā.
atk-abh02a:526: Yasmā pana ‘idañcidañca karissāmā’ti paṭhamaṃ vācāya saṃvidahitvā loke kammante payojenti, tasmā vācā kāyakammassa upakārikāti sammāvācāya anantaraṃ sammākammanto vutto.
atk-abh02a:527_0: Catubbidhaṃ pana vacīduccaritaṃ, tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ pahāya ubhayaṃ sucaritaṃ
atk-abh02a:527_1: pūrentasseva yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ pūrati, na itarassa, tasmā tadubhayānantaraṃ sammāājīvo vutto.
atk-abh02a:528_0: Evaṃ suddhājīvena ‘parisuddho me ājīvo’ti ettāvatā paritosaṃ akatvā suttappamattena
atk-abh02a:528_1: viharituṃ na yuttaṃ, atha kho sabbairiyāpathesu idaṃ vīriyamārabhitabbanti dassetuṃ
atk-abh02a:529: Tato āraddhavīriyenāpi kāyādīsu catūsu vatthūsu sati suppatiṭṭhitā kātabbāti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ sammāsati desitā.
atk-abh02a:530_0: Yasmā pana evaṃ suppatiṭṭhitā sati samādhissa upakārānupakārānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo
atk-abh02a:530_1: samanvesitvā pahoti ekattārammaṇe cittaṃ samādhātuṃ, tasmā sammāsatianantaraṃ sammāsamādhi desitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:531_0: Sammādiṭṭhiniddese “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādinā catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ. Tattha purimāni
atk-abh02a:531_1: dve saccāni vaṭṭaṃ, pacchimāni vivaṭṭaṃ. Tesu bhikkhuno vaṭṭe kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso
atk-abh02a:531_2: hoti, vivaṭṭe natthi abhiniveso. Purimāni hi dve saccāni “pañcakkhandhā dukkhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:531_3: taṇhā samudayo”ti evaṃ saṅkhepena ca “katame pañcakkhandhā? Rūpakkhandho”tiādinā
atk-abh02a:531_4: nayena vitthārena ca ācariyassa santike uggaṇhitvā vācāya punappunaṃ parivattento
atk-abh02a:531_5: yogāvacaro kammaṃ karoti; itaresu pana dvīsu saccesu “nirodhasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ
atk-abh02a:531_6: manāpaṃ, maggasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpa”nti evaṃ savaneneva kammaṃ karoti. So evaṃ
atk-abh02a:531_7: kammaṃ karonto cattāri saccāni ekena paṭivedhena paṭivijjhati, ekābhisamayena abhisameti;
atk-abh02a:531_8: dukkhaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati, samudayaṃ pahānapaṭivedhena, nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyapaṭivedhena,
atk-abh02a:531_9: maggaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati; dukkhaṃ pariññābhisamayena…pe… maggaṃ bhāvanābhisamayena abhisameti.
atk-abh02a:532_1: hoti, dvīsu savanapaṭivedhoyeva; aparabhāge tīsu kiccato paṭivedho hoti, nirodhe
atk-abh02a:532_2: ārammaṇapaṭivedho. Tattha sabbampi paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ, savanadhāraṇasammasanañāṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:532_3: lokiyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ, paccavekkhaṇā pana pattasaccassa hoti. Ayañca ādikammiko. Tasmā
atk-abh02a:532_4: sā idha na vuttā. Imassa ca bhikkhuno pubbe pariggahato ‘dukkhaṃ parijānāmi, samudayaṃ
atk-abh02a:532_5: pajahāmi, nirodhaṃ sacchikaromi, maggaṃ bhāvemī’ti ābhogasamannāhāramanasikārapaccavekkhaṇā
atk-abh02a:532_6: natthi, pariggahato paṭṭhāya hoti; aparabhāge pana dukkhaṃ pariññātameva hoti…pe…
atk-abh02a:533_0: Tattha dve saccāni duddasattā gambhīrāni, dve gambhīrattā duddasāni. Dukkhasaccañhi
atk-abh02a:533_1: uppattito pākaṭaṃ; khāṇukaṇṭakappahārādīsu ‘aho dukkha’nti vattabbatampi āpajjati.
atk-abh02a:533_3: pana ubhayampi gambhīraṃ. Iti tāni duddasattā gambhīrāni. Itaresaṃ pana dvinnaṃ dassanatthāya
atk-abh02a:533_4: payogo bhavaggagahaṇatthaṃ hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya, avīciphusanatthaṃ pādappasāraṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:533_5: viya, satadhā bhinnavālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādanaṃ viya ca hoti. Iti tāni gambhīrattā
atk-abh02a:533_6: duddasāni. Evaṃ duddasattā gambhīresu gambhīrattā ca duddasesu catūsu saccesu uggahādivasena
atk-abh02a:533_7: pubbabhāgañāṇuppattiṃ sandhāya idaṃ “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭivedhakkhaṇe pana ekameva ñāṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:534_0: Sammāsaṅkappaniddese kāmato nissaṭoti nekkhammasaṅkappo. Byāpādato nissaṭoti abyāpādasaṅkappo.
atk-abh02a:534_1: Vihiṃsāya nissaṭoti avihiṃsāsaṅkappo. Tattha nekkhammavitakko kāmavitakkassa padaghātaṃ
atk-abh02a:534_2: padacchedaṃ karonto uppajjati, abyāpādavitakko byāpādavitakkassa, avihiṃsāvitakko
atk-abh02a:534_3: vihiṃsāvitakkassa. Nekkhammavitakko ca kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:535_0: Tattha yogāvacaro kāmavitakkassa padaghātanatthaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ vā sammasati aññaṃ
atk-abh02a:535_1: vā pana kiñci saṅkhāraṃ. Athassa vipassanākkhaṇe vipassanāsampayutto saṅkappo tadaṅgavasena
atk-abh02a:535_2: kāmavitakkassa padaghātaṃ padacchedaṃ karonto uppajjati, vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-abh02a:535_3: maggaṃ pāpeti. Athassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayutto saṅkappo samucchedavasena kāmavitakkassa
atk-abh02a:535_4: padaghātaṃ padacchedaṃ karonto uppajjati; byāpādavitakkassāpi padaghātanatthaṃ byāpādavitakkaṃ
atk-abh02a:535_5: vā aññaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ sammasati; vihiṃsāvitakkassa padaghātanatthaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ
atk-abh02a:535_6: vā aññaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ sammasati. Athassa vipassanākkhaṇeti sabbaṃ purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:536_0: Kāmavitakkādīnaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vibhattesu aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesu ekakammaṭṭhānampi
atk-abh02a:536_1: apaccanīkaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantato pana kāmavitakkassa tāva asubhesu paṭhamajjhānameva
atk-abh02a:536_2: paccanīkaṃ, byāpādavitakkassa mettāya tikacatukkajjhānāni, vihiṃsāvitakkassa karuṇāya
atk-abh02a:536_3: tikacatukkajjhānāni. Tasmā asubhe parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ samāpannassa samāpattikkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:536_4: jhānasampayutto saṅkappo vikkhambhanavasena kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:536_5: Jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa vipassanākkhaṇe vipassanāsampayutto
atk-abh02a:536_6: saṅkappo tadaṅgavasena kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati. Vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-abh02a:536_7: maggaṃ pāpentassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayutto saṅkappo samucchedavasena kāmavitakkassa
atk-abh02a:536_8: paccanīko hutvā uppajjati. Evaṃ uppanno nekkhammasaṅkappoti vuccatīti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:537_0: Mettāya pana parikammaṃ katvā, karuṇāya parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ samāpajjatīti sabbaṃ
atk-abh02a:537_1: purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ uppanno abyāpādasaṅkappoti vuccati, avihiṃsāsaṅkappoti
atk-abh02a:537_2: ca vuccatīti veditabbo. Evamete nekkhammasaṅkappādayo vipassanājhānavasena uppattīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:537_3: nānattā pubbabhāge nānā; maggakkhaṇe pana imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uppannassa akusalasaṅkappassa
atk-abh02a:537_4: padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamāno ekova kusalasaṅkappo uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:538_0: Sammāvācāniddesepi yasmā aññeneva cittena musāvādā viramati, aññenaññena pisuṇavācādīhi,
atk-abh02a:538_1: tasmā catassopetā veramaṇiyo pubbabhāge nānā; maggakkhaṇe pana micchāvācāsaṅkhātāya
atk-abh02a:538_3: pūrayamānā ekāva sammāvācāsaṅkhātā kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati. Ayaṃ sammāvācā nāma.
atk-abh02a:539_0: Sammākammantaniddesepi yasmā aññeneva cittena pāṇātipātā viramati, aññena adinnādānā,
atk-abh02a:539_1: aññena kāmesumicchācārā, tasmā tissopetā veramaṇiyo pubbabhāge nānā; maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:539_2: pana micchākammantasaṅkhātāya tividhāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-abh02a:539_3: maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva sammākammantasaṅkhātā akusalaveramaṇī uppajjati. Ayaṃ sammākammanto nāma.
atk-abh02a:540_0: Sammāājīvaniddese idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Ariyasāvakoti ariyassa buddhassa sāvako.
atk-abh02a:540_1: Micchāājīvaṃ pahāyāti pāpakaṃ ājīvaṃ pajahitvā. Sammāājīvenāti buddhapasatthena kusalaājīvena.
atk-abh02a:540_2: Jīvikaṃ kappetīti jīvitappavattiṃ pavatteti. Idhāpi yasmā aññeneva cittena kāyadvāravītikkamā
atk-abh02a:540_3: viramati; aññena vacīdvāravītikkamā, tasmā pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇesu uppajjati; maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:540_4: pana dvīsu dvāresu sattannaṃ kammapathānaṃ vasena uppannāya micchāājīvadussīlyacetanāya
atk-abh02a:540_5: padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva sammāājīvasaṅkhātā
atk-abh02a:541_1: pana pubbabhāge nānācittesu labhati. Aññeneva hi cittena anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ
atk-abh02a:541_2: dhammānaṃ anuppādāya vāyāmaṃ karoti, aññena uppannānaṃ pahānāya; aññeneva ca anuppannānaṃ
atk-abh02a:541_3: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya, aññena uppannānaṃ ṭhitiyā; maggakkhaṇe pana ekacitteyeva
atk-abh02a:541_4: labbhati. Ekameva hi maggasampayuttaṃ vīriyaṃ catukiccasādhanaṭṭhena cattāri nāmāni labbhati.
atk-abh02a:542_1: ca pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhati. Aññeneva hi cittena kāyaṃ pariggaṇhāti, aññenaññena
atk-abh02a:542_2: vedanādīni; maggakkhaṇe pana ekacitteyeva labbhati. Ekāyeva hi maggasampayuttā sati
atk-abh02a:543_0: Sammāsamādhiniddese cattāri jhānāni pubbabhāgepi nānā, maggakkhaṇepi. Pubbabhāge
atk-abh02a:543_1: samāpattivasena nānā, maggakkhaṇe nānāmaggavasena. Ekassa hi paṭhamamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko
atk-abh02a:543_2: hoti, dutiyamaggādayopi paṭhamajjhānikā, dutiyādīsu aññatarajjhānikā vā. Ekassa paṭhamamaggo
atk-abh02a:543_3: dutiyādīnaṃ aññatarajjhāniko hoti, dutiyādayopi dutiyādīnaṃ aññatarajjhānikā vā paṭhamajjhānikā
atk-abh02a:543_4: vā. Evaṃ cattāropi maggā jhānavasena sadisā vā asadisā vā ekaccasadisā vā honti.
atk-abh02a:544_0: Ayaṃ panassa viseso pādakajjhānaniyāmena hoti. Pādakajjhānaniyāmena tāva paṭhamajjhānalābhino
atk-abh02a:544_1: paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppannamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko hoti; maggaṅgabojjhaṅgāni
atk-abh02a:544_2: panettha paripuṇṇāneva honti. Dutiyajjhānato uṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno maggo
atk-abh02a:544_3: dutiyajjhāniko hoti; maggaṅgāni panettha satta honti. Tatiyajjhānato uṭṭhāya vipassantassa
atk-abh02a:544_4: uppanno maggo tatiyajjhāniko hoti; maggaṅgāni panettha satta, bojjhaṅgāni cha honti.
atk-abh02a:544_5: Esa nayo catutthajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā.
atk-abh02a:545_0: Āruppe catukkapañcakajjhānaṃ uppajjati. Tañca kho lokuttaraṃ no lokiyanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:545_1: Ettha kathanti? Etthāpi paṭhamajjhānādīsu yato uṭṭhāya sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhitvā
atk-abh02a:545_2: āruppasamāpattiṃ bhāvetvā yo āruppe uppanno, taṃjhānikāva tassa tattha tayo maggā
atk-abh02a:545_3: uppajjanti. Evaṃ pādakajjhānameva niyāmeti. Keci pana therā “vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā
atk-abh02a:545_4: khandhā niyāmentī”ti vadanti. Keci “puggalajjhāsayo niyāmetī”ti vadanti. Keci “vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā
atk-abh02a:545_5: niyāmetī”ti vadanti. Tesaṃ vādavinicchayo heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe lokuttarapadabhājanīyavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:545_6: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Ayaṃ vuccati sammāsamādhīti yā imesu catūsu jhānesu ekaggatā,
atk-abh02a:545_7: ayaṃ pubbabhāge lokiyo, aparabhāge lokuttaro sammāsamādhi nāma vuccatīti. Evaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena
atk-abh02a:546_0: Tattha lokiyamagge sabbāneva maggaṅgāni yathānurūpaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇāni
atk-abh02a:546_1: honti. Lokuttaramagge pana catusaccapaṭivedhāya pavattassa ariyassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:546_2: avijjānusayasamugghātakaṃ paññācakkhu sammādiṭṭhi. Tathā sampannadiṭṭhissa taṃsampayuttaṃ
atk-abh02a:546_4: Tathā passantassa vitakkentassa ca taṃsampayuttāva catubbidhavacīduccaritasamugghātikāya
atk-abh02a:546_5: micchāvācāya virati sammāvācā. Tathā viramantassa taṃsampayuttāva micchākammantasamucchedikā
atk-abh02a:546_7: taṃsampayuttāva kuhanādisamucchedikā micchāājīvavirati sammāājīvo. Imissā sammāvācākammantājīvasaṃkhātāya
atk-abh02a:546_8: sīlabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhamānassa tadanurūpo taṃsampayuttova kosajjasamucchedako anuppannuppannānaṃ
atk-abh02a:546_9: akusalakusalānaṃ anuppādapahānuppādaṭṭhitisādhako ca vīriyārambho sammāvāyāmo. Evaṃ
atk-abh02a:546_11: ca cetaso asammoso sammāsati. Iti anuttarāya satiyā suvihitacittārakkhassa taṃsampayuttāva
atk-abh02a:546_12: micchāsamādhisamugghātikā cittekaggatā sammāsamādhīti. Esa lokuttaro ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
atk-abh02a:546_13: maggo yo saha lokiyena maggena dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-abh02a:547_0: So kho panesa maggo sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappānaṃ vijjāya, sesadhammānaṃ caraṇena saṅgahitattā
atk-abh02a:547_1: vijjā ceva caraṇañca. Tathā tesaṃ dvinnaṃ vipassanāyānena, itaresaṃ samathayānena
atk-abh02a:547_2: saṅgahitattā samatho ceva vipassanā ca. Tesaṃ vā dvinnaṃ paññākkhandhena, tadanantarānaṃ
atk-abh02a:547_4: ca saṅgahitattā khandhattayañceva sikkhāttayañca hoti; yena samannāgato ariyasāvako
atk-abh02a:547_5: dassanasamatthehi cakkhūhi gamanasamatthehi ca pādehi samannāgato addhiko viya vijjācaraṇasampanno
atk-abh02a:547_7: antadvayaṃ parivajjetvā majjhimapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno paññākkhandhena mohakkhandhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:547_8: sīlakkhandhena dosakkhandhaṃ, samādhikkhandhena ca lobhakkhandhaṃ padālento adhipaññāsikkhāya
atk-abh02a:547_10: tisso sampattiyo patvā amataṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti, ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:550_0: 206-214. Idāni abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ hoti. Tattha “ariyasaccānī”ti avatvā nippadesato
atk-abh02a:550_1: paccayasaṅkhātaṃ samudayaṃ dassetuṃ “cattāri saccānī”ti vuttaṃ. Ariyasaccānīti hi
atk-abh02a:550_2: vutte avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni,
atk-abh02a:550_3: avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā na saṅgayhanti. Na ca kevalaṃ taṇhāva dukkhaṃ samudāneti,
atk-abh02a:550_4: imepi avasesā ca kilesādayo paccayā samudānentiyeva. Iti imepi paccayā dukkhaṃ samudānentiyevāti
atk-abh02a:550_5: nippadesato paccayasaṅkhātaṃ samudayaṃ dassetuṃ “ariyasaccānī”ti avatvā “cattāri saccānī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:551_0: Niddesavāre ca nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ dukkhaṃ aniddisitvā tasseva dukkhassa sukhaniddesatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:551_1: dukkhasamudayo niddiṭṭho. Tasmiñhi niddiṭṭhe “avasesā ca kilesā”tiādinā nayena dukkhasaccaṃ
atk-abh02a:551_2: sukhaniddesaṃ hoti. Nirodhasaccampettha taṇhāya pahānaṃ “taṇhāya ca avasesānañca
atk-abh02a:551_3: kilesānaṃ pahāna”nti evaṃ yathāvuttassa samudayassa pahānavasena pañcahākārehi niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:551_5: desanānayassa mukhamattameva dassentena niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha nayabhedo veditabbo. Taṃ
atk-abh02a:552_0: Yasmā pana na kevalaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggova paṭipadā “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ
atk-abh02a:552_1: vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti vacanato pana puggalajjhāsayavasena pañcaṅgikopi
atk-abh02a:552_2: maggo paṭipadā evāti desito, tasmā taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ pañcaṅgikavāropi niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh02a:552_3: Yasmā ca na kevalaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikapañcaṅgikamaggāva paṭipadā, sampayuttakā pana atirekapaññāsadhammāpi
atk-abh02a:552_4: paṭipadā eva, tasmā taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ tatiyo sabbasaṅgāhikavāropi niddiṭṭho. Tattha
atk-abh02a:552_5: “avasesā dhammā dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya sampayuttā”ti idaṃ parihāyati. Sesaṃ
atk-abh02a:553_0: Tattha aṭṭhaṅgikavārassa “taṇhāya avasesānañca kilesānaṃ pahāna”ntiādīsu pañcasu
atk-abh02a:553_1: koṭṭhāsesu paṭhamakoṭṭhāse tāva sotāpattimagge jhānābhinivese suddhikapaṭipadā, suddhikasuññatā,
atk-abh02a:553_2: suññatapaṭipadā, suddhikaappaṇihitaṃ, appaṇihitapaṭipadāti imesu pañcasu vāresu dvinnaṃ
atk-abh02a:553_3: dvinnaṃ catukkapañcakanayānaṃ vasena dasa nayā honti. Evaṃ sesesupīti vīsatiyā abhinivesesu
atk-abh02a:553_4: dve nayasatāni. Tāni catūhi adhipatīhi catugguṇitāni aṭṭha. Iti suddhikāni dve sādhipatī
atk-abh02a:553_5: aṭṭhāti sabbampi nayasahassaṃ hoti. Yathā ca sotāpattimagge, evaṃ sesamaggesupīti
atk-abh02a:553_6: cattāri nayasahassāni honti. Yathā ca paṭhamakoṭṭhāse cattāri, evaṃ sesesupīti aṭṭhaṅgikavāre
atk-abh02a:553_7: pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu vīsati nayasahassāni honti. Tathā pañcaṅgikavāre sabbasaṅgāhikavāre
atk-abh02a:553_8: cāti sabbānipi saṭṭhi nayasahassāni satthārā vibhattāni. Pāḷi pana saṅkhepena āgatā.
atk-abh02a:556_0: 215. Pañhāpucchake catunnampi saccānaṃ khandhavibhaṅge vuttanayānusāreneva kusalādibhāvo
atk-abh02a:556_1: veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu pana samudayasaccaṃ kāmāvacaradhamme assādentassa parittārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:556_2: hoti, mahaggatadhamme assādentassa mahaggatārammaṇaṃ, paññattiṃ assādentassa navattabbārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:556_3: Dukkhasaccaṃ kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha uppannaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ, rūpārūpāvacaradhamme
atk-abh02a:556_4: ārabbha uppattikāle mahaggatārammaṇaṃ, nava lokuttaradhamme paccavekkhaṇakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:556_5: paṇṇattiṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ. Maggasaccaṃ sahajātahetuvasena sabbadāpi
atk-abh02a:556_6: maggahetukaṃ vīriyaṃ vā vīmaṃsaṃ vā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipati,
atk-abh02a:556_7: chandacittesu aññatarādhipatikāle navattabbaṃ nāma hoti. Dukkhasaccaṃ ariyānaṃ maggapaccavekkhaṇakāle
atk-abh02a:556_8: maggārammaṇaṃ, tesaṃyeva maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle maggādhipati, sesadhammapaccavekkhaṇakāle navattabbaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:557_0: Dve saccānīti dukkhasamudayasaccāni. Etāni hi atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha uppattikāle
atk-abh02a:557_1: atītādiārammaṇāni honti. Samudayasaccaṃ ajjhattādibhede dhamme assādentassa ajjhattādiārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:557_2: hoti, dukkhasaccaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanakāle navattabbārammaṇampīti veditabbaṃ. Iti imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:557_3: pañhāpucchake dve saccāni lokiyāni honti, dve lokuttarāni. Yathā ca imasmiṃ, evaṃ
atk-abh02a:557_4: purimesupi dvīsu. Sammāsambuddhena hi tīsupi suttantabhājanīyādīsu lokiyalokuttarāneva
atk-abh02a:557_5: saccāni kathitāni. Evamayaṃ saccavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
atk-abh02a:562_0: 219. Idāni tadanantare indriyavibhaṅge bāvīsatīti gaṇanaparicchedo. Indriyānīti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:562_1: Idāni tāni sarūpato dassento cakkhundriyantiādimāha. Tattha cakkhudvāre indaṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh02a:562_2: kāretīti cakkhundriyaṃ. Sotaghānajivhākāyadvāre indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti kāyindriyaṃ. Vijānanalakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:562_3: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti manindriyaṃ. Itthibhāve indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti itthindriyaṃ. Purisabhāve
atk-abh02a:562_4: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti purisindriyaṃ. Anupālanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti jīvitindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:562_5: Sukhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti sukhindriyaṃ. Dukkhasomanassa domanassa upekkhālakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:562_6: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti upekkhindriyaṃ. Adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti saddhindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:562_7: Paggahalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti vīriyindriyaṃ. Upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
atk-abh02a:562_8: satindriyaṃ. Avikkhepalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti samādhindriyaṃ. Dassanalakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:562_9: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti paññindriyaṃ. Anaññātaññassāmīti pavatte jānanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh02a:562_10: kāretīti anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Ñātānaṃyeva dhammānaṃ puna ājānane indaṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh02a:562_11: kāretīti aññindriyaṃ. Aññātāvībhāve indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti aññātāvindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:563_0: Idha suttantabhājanīyaṃ nāma na gahitaṃ. Kasmā? Suttante imāya paṭipāṭiyā bāvīsatiyā
atk-abh02a:563_1: indriyānaṃ anāgatattā. Suttantasmiñhi katthaci dve indriyāni kathitāni, katthaci
atk-abh02a:563_2: tīṇi, katthaci pañca. Evaṃ pana nirantaraṃ dvāvīsati āgatāni nāma natthi. Ayaṃ tāvettha
atk-abh02a:563_3: aṭṭhakathānayo. Ayaṃ pana aparo nayo – etesu hi
atk-abh02a:565: Bhedābhedā tathā kiccā, bhūmito ca vinicchayaṃ.
atk-abh02a:566_0: Tattha cakkhādīnaṃ tāva “cakkhatīti cakkhū”tiādinā nayena attho pakāsito. Pacchimesu
atk-abh02a:566_1: pana tīsu paṭhamaṃ ‘pubbabhāge anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ vā jānissāmī’ti
atk-abh02a:566_2: evaṃ paṭipannassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti
atk-abh02a:566_3: vuttaṃ. Dutiyaṃ ājānanato ca indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññindriyaṃ. Tatiyaṃ aññātāvino
atk-abh02a:566_4: catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitañāṇakiccassa khīṇāsavasseva uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññātāvindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:567_0: Ko panesa indriyaṭṭho nāmāti? Indaliṅgaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho, indadesitaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho,
atk-abh02a:567_1: indadiṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho, indasiṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho, indajuṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho.
atk-abh02a:567_2: So sabbopi idha yathāyogaṃ yujjati. Bhagavā hi sammāsambuddho paramissariyabhāvato
atk-abh02a:567_3: indo. Kusalākusalañca kammaṃ kammesu kassaci issariyābhāvato. Tenevettha kammasañjanitāni
atk-abh02a:567_4: indriyāni kusalākusalakammaṃ ulliṅgenti. Tena ca siṭṭhānīti indaliṅgaṭṭhena indasiṭṭhaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:567_5: ca indriyāni. Sabbāneva panetāni bhagavatā yathābhūtato pakāsitāni ca abhisambuddhāni
atk-abh02a:567_6: cāti indadesitaṭṭhena indadiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni. Teneva bhagavatā munindena kānici
atk-abh02a:567_7: gocarāsevanāya, kānici bhāvanāsevanāya sevitānīti indajuṭṭhaṭṭhenapi indriyāni. Apica
atk-abh02a:567_9: cakkhādīnaṃ siddhamādhipaccaṃ; tasmiṃ tikkhe tikkhattā mande ca mandattāti. Ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:568_1: vijāniyāti attho. Tāni nesaṃ lakkhaṇādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayāneva. Paññindriyādīni hi
atk-abh02a:568_2: cattāri atthato amohoyeva. Sesāni tattha sarūpenevāgatāni.
atk-abh02a:569_0: ‘Kamato’ti ayampi desanākkamova. Tattha ajjhattadhammaṃ pariññāya ariyabhūmipaṭilābho
atk-abh02a:569_1: hotīti attabhāvapariyāpannāni cakkhundriyādīni paṭhamaṃ desitāni. So panattabhāvo
atk-abh02a:569_2: yaṃ dhammaṃ upādāya itthīti vā purisoti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchati, ayaṃ soti nidassanatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:569_3: tato itthindriyaṃ purisindriyañca. So duvidhopi jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhavuttīti ñāpanatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:569_4: tato jīvitindriyaṃ. Yāva tassa pavatti tāva etesaṃ vedayitānaṃ anivatti. Yaṃ kiñci
atk-abh02a:569_5: vedayitaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ sukhadukkhanti ñāpanatthaṃ tato sukhindriyādīni. Taṃnirodhatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:569_6: pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbāti paṭipattidassanatthaṃ tato saddhādīni. Imāya paṭipattiyā
atk-abh02a:569_7: esa dhammo paṭhamaṃ attani pātubhavatīti paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanatthaṃ tato
atk-abh02a:569_8: anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Tasseva phalattā tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbattā ca tato
atk-abh02a:569_9: aññindriyaṃ. Ito paraṃ bhāvanāya imassa adhigamo, adhigate ca panimasmiṃ natthi kiñci
atk-abh02a:569_10: uttari karaṇīyanti ñāpanatthaṃ ante paramassāsabhūtaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ desitanti ayamettha kamo.
atk-abh02a:570: ‘Bhedābhedā’ti jīvitindriyasseva cettha bhedo. Tañhi rūpajīvitindriyaṃ arūpajīvitindriyanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Sesānaṃ abhedoti evamettha bhedābhedato vinicchayaṃ vijāniyā.
atk-abh02a:571_0: ‘Kiccā’ti kiṃ indriyānaṃ kiccanti ce? Cakkhundriyassa tāva “cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā
atk-abh02a:571_1: taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato yaṃ taṃ indriyapaccayabhāvena
atk-abh02a:571_3: attākārānuvattāpanaṃ idaṃ ‘kiccaṃ’. Evaṃ sotaghānajivhākāyānaṃ. Manindriyassa pana
atk-abh02a:571_6: sahajātadhamme abhibhavitvā yathāsakaṃ oḷārikākārānupāpanaṃ, upekkhindriyassa santapaṇītamajjhattākārānupāpanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:572_3: bhūmittayapariyāpannaṃ. Avasāne tīṇi lokuttarānevāti evaṃ bhūmito vinicchayaṃ vijāniyā. Evañhi vijānanto –
atk-abh02a:575_0: 220. Niddesavāre “yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtāna”ntiādi sabbaṃ dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ
atk-abh02a:575_1: padabhājane vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Vīriyindriyasamādhindriyaniddesādīsu ca sammāvāyāmo
atk-abh02a:575_2: micchāvāyāmo sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhītiādīni na vuttāni. Kasmā? Sabbasaṅgāhakattā.
atk-abh02a:575_3: Sabbasaṅgāhakāni hi idha indriyāni kathitāni. Evaṃ santepettha dasa indriyāni lokiyāni
atk-abh02a:578: 221. Pañhāpucchake sabbesampi indriyānaṃ kusalādivibhāgo pāḷinayānusāreneva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:579_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Jīvitindriyaṃ pana arūpamissakattā idha anābhaṭṭhaṃ. Dvindriyāti
atk-abh02a:579_2: dve indriyā; sukhadukkhadvayaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tañhi ekantaparittārammaṇaṃ. Domanassindriyaṃ
atk-abh02a:579_3: siyā parittārammaṇaṃ, siyā mahaggatārammaṇanti kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattikāle
atk-abh02a:579_4: parittārammaṇaṃ hoti, rūpāvacarārūpāvacare pana ārabbha pavattikāle mahaggatārammaṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:579_5: paṇṇattiṃ ārabbha pavattikāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ. Navindriyā siyā parittārammaṇāti
atk-abh02a:579_7: idaṃ vuttaṃ. Jīvitindriyañhi rūpamissakattā anārammaṇesu rūpadhammesu saṅgahitampi
atk-abh02a:580_0: Cattāri indriyānīti sukhadukkhadomanassaaññātāvindriyāni. Tāni hi maggārammaṇattike
atk-abh02a:580_1: na bhajanti. Maggahetukanti sahajātahetuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vīriyavīmaṃsājeṭṭhakakāle
atk-abh02a:581_0: Dasindriyā siyā uppannā, siyā uppādinoti satta rūpindriyāni tīṇi ca vipākindriyāni
atk-abh02a:581_1: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Dasindriyāni domanassena saddhiṃ heṭṭhā vuttāneva. Tattha domanassindriyaṃ
atk-abh02a:581_2: paṇṇattiṃ ārabbha pavattikāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ, sesāni nibbānapaccavekkhaṇakālepi.
atk-abh02a:581_3: Tīṇindriyāni bahiddhārammaṇānīti tīṇi lokuttarindriyāni. Cattārīti sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassāni.
atk-abh02a:581_4: Tāni hi ajjhattadhammepi bahiddhādhammepi ārabbha pavattanti. Aṭṭhindriyāti manindriyajīvitindriyaupekkhindriyāni
atk-abh02a:581_5: ceva saddhādipañcakañca. Tattha ākiñcaññāyatanakāle navattabbārammaṇatā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:582_0: Iti imasmimpi pañhāpucchake dasindriyāni kāmāvacarāni, tīṇi lokuttarāni, nava lokiyalokuttaramissakāneva
atk-abh02a:582_1: kathitānīti. Ayampi abhidhammabhājanīyena saddhiṃ ekaparicchedova hoti. Ayaṃ pana
atk-abh02a:587_0: 225. Idāni tadanantare paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge yā “ayaṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā
atk-abh02a:587_1: nayena tanti nikkhittā, tassā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena vibhajjavādimaṇḍalaṃ otaritvā
atk-abh02a:587_2: ācariye anabbhācikkhantena sakasamayaṃ avokkamantena parasamayaṃ anāyūhantena suttaṃ
atk-abh02a:587_3: appaṭibāhantena vinayaṃ anulomentena mahāpadese olokentena dhammaṃ dīpentena atthaṃ
atk-abh02a:587_4: saṅgahantena tamevatthaṃ puna āvattetvā aparehipi pariyāyehi niddisantena ca yasmā
atk-abh02a:587_5: atthasaṃvaṇṇanā kātabbā hoti, pakatiyāpi ca dukkarāva paṭiccasamuppādassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanā, yathāhu porāṇā –
atk-abh02a:590: Tasmā “aññatra āgamādhigamappattehi na sukarā paṭiccasamuppādassa atthavaṇṇanā”ti paritulayitvā –
atk-abh02a:605_0: Tattha ‘desanābhedato’ti bhagavato hi vallihārakānaṃ catunnaṃ purisānaṃ valliggahaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:605_1: viya ādito vā majjhato vā paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānaṃ, tathā pariyosānato vā majjhato
atk-abh02a:605_2: vā paṭṭhāya yāva ādīti catubbidhā paṭiccasamuppādadesanā. Yathā hi vallihārakesu
atk-abh02a:605_3: catūsu purisesu eko valliyā mūlameva paṭhamaṃ passati, so taṃ mūle chetvā sabbaṃ
atk-abh02a:605_4: ākaḍḍhitvā ādāya kamme upaneti, evaṃ bhagavā “iti kho, bhikkhave, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā…pe…
atk-abh02a:605_5: jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānāpi paṭiccasamuppādaṃ deseti.
atk-abh02a:606_0: Yathā pana tesu purisesu eko valliyā majjhaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati, so majjhe chinditvā
atk-abh02a:606_1: uparibhāgaṃyeva ākaḍḍhitvā ādāya kamme upaneti, evaṃ bhagavā “tassa taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandato
atk-abh02a:606_2: abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī; yā vedanāsu nandī, tadupādānaṃ, tassupādānapaccayā
atk-abh02a:606_3: bhavo, bhavapaccayā jātī”ti majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānāpi deseti.
atk-abh02a:607_0: Yathā ca tesu purisesu eko valliyā aggaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati, so agge gahetvā aggānusārena
atk-abh02a:607_1: yāva mūlā sabbaṃ ādāya kamme upaneti, evaṃ bhagavā “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti
atk-abh02a:607_2: kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, jātipaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, jarāmaraṇaṃ no vā kathaṃ vā ettha
atk-abh02a:607_3: hotī”ti? “Jātipaccayā, bhante, jarāmaraṇaṃ; evaṃ no ettha hoti – jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti.
atk-abh02a:607_4: “Bhavapaccayā jāti…pe… avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, avijjāpaccayā
atk-abh02a:607_5: nu kho, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā no vā kathaṃ vā ettha hotī”ti? “Avijjāpaccayā, bhante,
atk-abh02a:607_6: saṅkhārā; evaṃ no ettha hoti – avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti pariyosānato paṭṭhāya yāva
atk-abh02a:608_0: Yathā pana tesu purisesu eko valliyā majjhameva paṭhamaṃ passati, so majjhe chinditvā
atk-abh02a:608_1: heṭṭhā otaranto yāva mūlā ādāya kamme upaneti, evaṃ bhagavā “ime, bhikkhave, cattāro
atk-abh02a:608_2: āhārā kiṃ nidānā, kiṃ samudayā, kiṃ jātikā, kiṃ pabhavā? Ime cattāro āhārā taṇhānidānā,
atk-abh02a:608_3: taṇhāsamudayā, taṇhājātikā, taṇhāpabhavā. Taṇhā cāyaṃ, bhikkhave, kiṃ nidānā? Vedanā,
atk-abh02a:608_4: phasso, saḷāyatanaṃ, nāmarūpaṃ, viññāṇaṃ. Saṅkhārā kiṃ nidānā…pe… saṅkhārā avijjānidānā,
atk-abh02a:608_5: avijjāsamudayā, avijjājātikā, avijjāpabhavā”ti majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva ādito deseti.
atk-abh02a:609_0: Kasmā panevaṃ desetīti? Paṭiccasamuppādassa samantabhaddakattā, sayañca desanāvilāsappattattā.
atk-abh02a:609_1: Samantabhaddako hi paṭiccasamuppādo tato tato ñāyappaṭivedhāya saṃvattatiyeva. Desanāvilāsappatto
atk-abh02a:609_2: ca bhagavā catuvesārajjappaṭisambhidāyogena catubbidhagambhīrabhāvappattiyā ca. So
atk-abh02a:609_3: desanāvilāsappattattā nānānayeheva dhammaṃ deseti. Visesato panassa yā ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-abh02a:609_4: anulomadesanā, sā pavattikāraṇavibhāgasammūḷhaṃ veneyyajanaṃ samanupassato yathāsakehi
atk-abh02a:610_0: Yā pariyosānato paṭṭhāya paṭilomadesanā, sā “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca
atk-abh02a:610_1: jīyati ca mīyati cā”ti ādinā nayena kicchāpannaṃ lokamanuvilokayato pubbabhāgappaṭivedhānusārena
atk-abh02a:610_2: tassa tassa jarāmaraṇādikassa dukkhassa attanādhigatakāraṇasandassanatthaṃ. Yā pana
atk-abh02a:610_3: majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva ādi, sā āhāranidānavavatthāpanānusārena yāva atītaṃ addhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:610_4: atiharitvā puna atītaddhato pabhuti hetuphalapaṭipāṭisandassanatthaṃ. Yā pana majjhato
atk-abh02a:610_5: paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā pavattā, sā paccuppanne addhāne anāgataddhahetusamuṭṭhānato
atk-abh02a:610_6: pabhuti anāgataddhasandassanatthaṃ. Tāsu yā sā pavattikāraṇasammūḷhassa veneyyajanassa
atk-abh02a:610_7: yathāsakehi kāraṇehi pavattisandassanatthaṃ uppattikkamasandassanatthañca ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-abh02a:610_8: anulomadesanā vuttā, sā idha nikkhittāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:611_0: Kasmā panettha avijjā ādito vuttā? Kiṃ pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya avijjāpi akāraṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:611_1: mūlakāraṇaṃ lokassāti? Na akāraṇaṃ. “Āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti hi avijjāya
atk-abh02a:611_2: kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Atthi pana pariyāyo yena mūlakāraṇaṃ siyā. Ko pana soti? Vaṭṭakathāya
atk-abh02a:611_3: sīsabhāvo. Bhagavā hi vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento dve dhamme sīsaṃ katvā kathesi – avijjaṃ
atk-abh02a:611_4: vā bhavataṇhaṃ vā. Yathāha – “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ‘ito
atk-abh02a:611_5: pubbe avijjā nāhosi, atha pacchā samabhavī’ti. Evañcetaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati, atha
atk-abh02a:611_6: ca pana paññāyati ‘idappaccayā avijjā”ti ; bhavataṇhaṃ vā, yathāha – “purimā, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a:611_7: koṭi na paññāyati bhavataṇhāya ‘ito pubbe bhavataṇhā nāhosi, atha pacchā samabhavī’ti.
atk-abh02a:611_8: Evañcetaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati, atha ca pana paññāyati ‘idappaccayā bhavataṇhā”ti.
atk-abh02a:612_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento ime dveva dhamme sīsaṃ katvā kathesīti? Sugatiduggatigāmino
atk-abh02a:612_1: kammassa visesahetubhūtattā. Duggatigāmino hi kammassa visesahetu avijjā. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:612_3: tāya parissamāturatāya nirassādampi attano anatthāvahampi ca uṇhodakapānaṃ viya,
atk-abh02a:612_4: kilesasantāpato nirassādampi duggativinipātato ca attano anatthāvahampi pāṇātipātādimanekappakāraṃ
atk-abh02a:612_5: duggatigāmikammaṃ ārabhati. Sugatigāmino pana kammassa visesahetu bhavataṇhā. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:612_6: Yasmā bhavataṇhābhibhūto puthujjano, yathā vuttappakārā gāvī sītudakataṇhāya saassādaṃ
atk-abh02a:612_7: attano parissamavinodanañca sītudakapānaṃ viya, kilesasantāpavirahato saassādaṃ sugatisampāpanena
atk-abh02a:613_0: Etesu pana vaṭṭakathāya sīsabhūtesu dhammesu katthaci bhagavā ekadhammamūlikaṃ desanaṃ
atk-abh02a:613_1: deseti, seyyathidaṃ – “iti kho, bhikkhave, avijjūpanisā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārūpanisaṃ
atk-abh02a:613_2: viññāṇa”ntiādi. Tathā “upādānīyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato
atk-abh02a:613_3: taṇhā pavaḍḍhati, taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”ntiādi. Katthaci ubhayamūlikampi, seyyathidaṃ
atk-abh02a:613_4: – “avijjānīvaraṇassa, bhikkhave, bālassa taṇhāya sampayuttassa evamayaṃ kāyo samudāgato.
atk-abh02a:613_5: Iti ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpaṃ itthetaṃ dvayaṃ, dvayaṃ paṭicca phasso, saḷevāyatanāni
atk-abh02a:613_6: yehi phuṭṭho bālo sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”tiādi. Tāsu tāsu desanāsu “avijjāpaccayā
atk-abh02a:613_7: saṅkhārā”ti ayamidha avijjāvasena ekadhammamūlikā desanāti veditabbā. Evaṃ tāvettha
atk-abh02a:614_0: ‘Atthato’ti avijjādīnaṃ padānaṃ atthato, seyyathidaṃ – pūretuṃ ayuttaṭṭhena kāyaduccaritādi
atk-abh02a:614_1: avindiyaṃ nāma; aladdhabbanti attho. Taṃ avindiyaṃ vindatīti avijjā. Tabbiparītato
atk-abh02a:614_2: kāyasucaritādi vindiyaṃ nāma. Taṃ vindiyaṃ na vindatīti avijjā. Khandhānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:614_3: āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ, saccānaṃ tathaṭṭhaṃ, indriyānaṃ ādhipateyyaṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh02a:614_4: aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā. Dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ catubbidhaṃ
atk-abh02a:614_5: atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā. Antavirahite saṃsāre sabbayonigatibhavaviññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
atk-abh02a:614_6: satte javāpetīti avijjā. Paramatthato avijjamānesu itthipurisādīsu javati, vijjamānesupi
atk-abh02a:614_7: khandhādīsu na javatīti avijjā. Apica cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannānañca
atk-abh02a:615_0: Yaṃ paṭicca phalameti so paccayo. Paṭiccāti na vinā tena; taṃ apaccakkhitvāti attho.
atk-abh02a:615_1: Etīti uppajjati ceva pavattati cāti attho. Api ca upakārakaṭṭho paccayaṭṭho. Avijjā
atk-abh02a:615_2: ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo. Tasmā avijjāpaccayā.
atk-abh02a:616_0: Saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti saṅkhārā. Apica avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārasaddena
atk-abh02a:616_1: āgatasaṅkhārā cāti duvidhā saṅkhārā. Tattha puññāpuññāneñjābhisaṅkhārā tayo, kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārā
atk-abh02a:616_2: tayoti ime cha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā. Te sabbepi lokiyakusalākusalacetanāmattameva honti.
atk-abh02a:617_1: ime pana cattāro saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārā. Tattha “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”tiādīsu
atk-abh02a:617_2: vuttā sabbepi sappaccayā dhammā ‘saṅkhatasaṅkhārā’ nāma. Kammanibbattā tebhūmakā
atk-abh02a:617_3: rūpārūpadhammā ‘abhisaṅkhatasaṅkhārā’ti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttā. Tepi “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti
atk-abh02a:617_4: ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Visuṃ pana nesaṃ āgataṭṭhānaṃ na paññāyati. Tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā
atk-abh02a:617_6: puññañce abhisaṅkharotī”tiādīsu āgataṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati. Kāyikacetasikaṃ pana vīriyaṃ
atk-abh02a:617_7: ‘payogābhisaṅkhāro’ti vuccati. So “yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati, tāvatikaṃ gantvā
atk-abh02a:618_0: Na kevalañca eteyeva, aññepi “saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpajjantassa kho, āvuso visākha,
atk-abh02a:618_1: bhikkhuno paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati vacīsaṅkhāro, tato kāyasaṅkhāro, tato cittasaṅkhāro”tiādinā
atk-abh02a:618_2: nayena saṅkhārasaddena āgatā anekasaṅkhārā. Tesu natthi so saṅkhāro, yo saṅkhatasaṅkhāre
atk-abh02a:618_3: saṅgahaṃ na gaccheyya. Ito paraṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇantiādīsu yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:619_0: Avutte pana vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ. Namatīti nāmaṃ. Ruppatīti rūpaṃ. Āye tanoti, āyatañca
atk-abh02a:619_1: nayatīti āyatanaṃ. Phusatīti phasso. Vedayatīti vedanā. Paritassatīti taṇhā. Upādiyatīti
