atk-abh02a:913_1: anamatagge saṃsāre imassa paṭhamaṃ uppattīti abhāvato kilesānaṃ nippariyāyena uppattikkamo
atk-abh02a:913_2: na vuccati. Pariyāyena pana yebhuyyena ekasmiṃ bhave attaggāhapubbaṅgamo sassatucchedābhiniveso.
atk-abh02a:913_3: Tato “sassato ayaṃ attā”ti gaṇhato attavisuddhatthaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ, ucchijjatīti
atk-abh02a:913_4: gaṇhato paralokanirapekkhassa kāmupādānanti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ attavādupādānaṃ, tato diṭṭhisīlabbatakāmupādānānīti
atk-abh02a:914: Diṭṭhupādānādīni cettha paṭhamaṃ pahīyanti sotāpattimaggavajjhattā. Kāmupādānaṃ pacchā arahattamaggavajjhattāti. Ayametesaṃ pahānakkamo.
atk-abh02a:915_0: Mahāvisayattā pana pākaṭattā ca etesu kāmupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ. Mahāvisayañhi
atk-abh02a:915_1: taṃ aṭṭhacittasampayogā. Appavisayāni itarāni catucittasampayogā. Yebhuyyena ca ālayarāmatāya
atk-abh02a:915_2: pajāya pākaṭaṃ kāmupādānaṃ, na itarāni. Kāmupādānavā vatthukāmānaṃ samadhigamatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:915_3: kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulo hoti, na sassatadiṭṭhīti tadanantaraṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Taṃ
atk-abh02a:915_4: pabhijjamānaṃ sīlabbataattavādupādānavasena duvidhaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ dvaye gokiriyaṃ
atk-abh02a:915_5: vā kukkurakiriyaṃ vā disvāpi veditabbato oḷārikanti sīlabbatupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:916: Taṇhā ca purimassettha, ekadhā hoti paccayo;
atk-abh02a:917: Sattadhā aṭṭhadhā vāpi, hoti sesattayassa sā.
atk-abh02a:918_0: Ettha ca evaṃ desite upādānacatukke purimassa kāmupādānassa kāmataṇhā upanissayavasena
atk-abh02a:918_1: ekadhāva paccayo hoti taṇhābhinanditesu visayesu uppattito. Sesattayassa pana sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatahetuvasena
atk-abh02a:918_2: sattadhā vā upanissayena saha aṭṭhadhā vāpi paccayo hoti. Yadā ca sā upanissayavasena
atk-abh02a:923: Yaṃ yassa paccayo ceva, viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:924_0: Tattha bhavatīti bhavo. Duvidhenāti dvīhi ākārehi pavattitoti attho. Athavā duvidhenāti
atk-abh02a:924_1: paccate karaṇavacanaṃ, duvidhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Atthīti saṃvijjati. Kammameva bhavo
atk-abh02a:924_2: kammabhavo. Upapattiyeva bhavo upapattibhavo. Ettha ca upapatti bhavatīti bhavo.
atk-abh02a:924_3: Kammaṃ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā “sukho buddhānamuppādo”ti vutto, evaṃ bhavakāraṇattā
atk-abh02a:924_4: phalavohārena bhavoti veditabbaṃ. Tattha katamo kammabhavoti tesu dvīsu bhavesu yo
atk-abh02a:924_5: kammabhavoti vutto, so katamoti attho. Puññābhisaṅkhārādayo vuttatthā eva. Sabbanti
atk-abh02a:924_6: anavasesaṃ. Bhavaṃ gacchati gameti cāti bhavagāmi. Iminā lokuttaraṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh02a:924_7: Ayañhi vaṭṭakathā, tañca vivaṭṭanissitanti. Karīyatīti kammaṃ.
atk-abh02a:925_0: Kāmabhavādīsu kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo kāmabhavo. Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu. Saññāvataṃ
atk-abh02a:925_1: bhavo, saññā vā ettha bhave atthīti saññābhavo. Vipariyāyena asaññābhavo. Oḷārikasaññāya
atk-abh02a:925_2: abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā neva saññā nāsaññā asmiṃ bhaveti nevasaññānāsaññābhavo.
atk-abh02a:925_3: Ekena rūpakkhandhena vokiṇṇo bhavo ekavokārabhavo. Eko vā vokāro assa bhavassāti
atk-abh02a:925_4: ekavokārabhavo. Eseva nayo catuvokārapañcavokārabhavesu. Ayaṃ vuccati upapattibhavoti
atk-abh02a:925_5: esa navavidhopi upapattibhavo nāma vuccatīti. Evaṃ tāvettha ‘atthato’ viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:926_0: ‘Dhammato’ pana ettha hi puññābhisaṅkhāro dhammato terasa cetanā, apuññābhisaṅkhāro
atk-abh02a:926_1: dvādasa, āneñjābhisaṅkhāro catasso. “Sabbampi bhavagāmikamma”nti etena sabbepete
atk-abh02a:926_2: dhammā cetanā sampayuttā vā kammasaṅkhātā ācayagāmino dhammā saṅgahitā. Kāmabhavo
atk-abh02a:926_3: pañca upādinnakkhandhā, tathā rūpabhavo, arūpabhavo cattāro, saññābhavo catupañca,
atk-abh02a:926_4: asaññābhavo eko upādinnakkhandho, nevasaññānāsaññābhavo cattāro. Ekavokārabhavādayo
atk-abh02a:927_0: ‘Sātthato’ti yathā ca bhavaniddese tatheva kāmañca saṅkhāraniddesepi puññābhisaṅkhārādayova
atk-abh02a:927_1: vuttā, evaṃ santepi purimā atītakammavasena idha paṭisandhiyā paccayattā vuttā. Ime
atk-abh02a:927_2: paccuppannakammavasena āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayattāti punavacanaṃ sātthakameva.
atk-abh02a:927_3: Pubbe vā “tattha katamo puññābhisaṅkhāro? Kusalacetanā kāmāvacarā”ti evamādinā nayena
atk-abh02a:927_4: cetanāva saṅkhārāti vuttā. Idha pana “sabbampi bhavagāmikamma”nti vacanato cetanāsampayuttāpi.
atk-abh02a:927_5: Pubbe ca viññāṇapaccayameva kammaṃ saṅkhārāti vuttaṃ, idāni asaññābhavanibbattakampi.
atk-abh02a:927_6: Kiṃ vā bahunā? “Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettha puññābhisaṅkhārādayova kusalākusaladhammā
atk-abh02a:927_7: vuttā. “Upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti idha pana upapattibhavassāpi saṅgahitattā kusalākusalābyākatā
atk-abh02a:927_8: dhammā vuttā. Tasmā sabbathāpi sātthakamevidaṃ punavacananti. Evamettha ‘sātthato’pi
atk-abh02a:928_0: ‘Bhedasaṅgahā’ti upādānapaccayā bhavassa bhedato ceva saṅgahato ca. Yañhi kāmupādānapaccayā
atk-abh02a:928_1: kāmabhavanibbattakaṃ kammaṃ kariyati, so kammabhavo. Tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo.
atk-abh02a:928_2: Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu. Evaṃ kāmupādānapaccayā dve kāmabhavā, tadantogadhāva saññābhavapañcavokārabhavā;
atk-abh02a:928_5: antogadhehi cha bhavā. Yathā ca kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi cha bhavā tathā
atk-abh02a:928_6: sesupādānapaccayāpīti evaṃ upādānapaccayā bhedato saddhiṃ antogadhehi catuvīsati bhavā.
atk-abh02a:929_0: Saṅgahato pana kammabhavaṃ upapattibhavañca ekato katvā kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ
atk-abh02a:929_1: antogadhehi eko kāmabhavo, tathā rūpārūpabhavāti tayo bhavā. Tathā sesupādānapaccayāpīti
atk-abh02a:929_2: evaṃ upādānapaccayā saṅgahato saddhiṃ antogadhehi dvādasa bhavā. Apica avisesena
atk-abh02a:929_3: upādānapaccayā kāmabhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo. Tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo.
atk-abh02a:929_4: Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu. Evaṃ upādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi dve kāmabhavā,
atk-abh02a:929_5: dve rūpabhavā, dve arūpabhavāti aparenapi pariyāyena saṅgahato cha bhavā. Kammabhavaupapattibhavabhedaṃ
atk-abh02a:929_6: vā anupagamma saddhiṃ antogadhehi kāmabhavādivasena tayo bhavā honti. Kāmabhavādibhedañcāpi
atk-abh02a:929_7: anupagamma kammabhavaupapattibhavavasena dve bhavā honti. Kammupapattibhedañca anupagamma
atk-abh02a:929_8: upādānapaccayā bhavoti bhavavasena eko bhavo hotīti. Evamettha upādānapaccayassa
atk-abh02a:930_0: ‘Yaṃ yassa paccayo cevā’ti yañcettha upādānaṃ yassa paccayo hoti, tatopi viññātabbo
atk-abh02a:930_1: vinicchayoti attho. Kiṃ panettha kassa paccayo hoti? Yaṃ kiñci yassa kassaci paccayo
atk-abh02a:930_2: hotiyeva. Ummattako viya hi puthujjano. So ‘idaṃ yuttaṃ, idaṃ ayutta’nti avicāretvā
atk-abh02a:930_3: yassa kassaci upādānassa vasena yaṃ kiñci bhavaṃ patthetvā yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ karotiyeva.
atk-abh02a:930_4: Tasmā yadekacce “sīlabbatupādānena rūpārūpabhavā na hontī”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:930_5: Sabbena pana sabbo hotīti gahetabbaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco anussavavasena vā diṭṭhānusārena
atk-abh02a:930_6: vā “kāmā nāmete manussaloke ceva khattiyamahāsālakulādīsu chakāmāvacaradevaloke ca
atk-abh02a:930_7: samiddhā”ti cintetvā tesaṃ adhigamatthaṃ asaddhammasavanādīhi vañcito ‘iminā kammena
atk-abh02a:930_8: kāmā sampajjantī’ti maññamāno kāmupādānavasena kāyaduccaritādīnipi karoti. So duccaritapāripūriyā
atk-abh02a:930_9: apāye uppajjati; sandiṭṭhike vā pana kāme patthayamāno paṭiladdhe vā gopayamāno kāmupādānavasena
atk-abh02a:930_10: kāyaduccaritādīnipi karoti. So duccaritapāripūriyā apāye uppajjati. Tatrāssa upapattihetubhūtaṃ
atk-abh02a:930_11: kammaṃ kammabhavo, kammābhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo saññābhavapañcavokārabhavā
atk-abh02a:931_0: Aparo pana saddhammasavanādīhi upabrūhitañāṇo “iminā kammena kāmā sampajjantī”ti
atk-abh02a:931_1: maññamāno kāmupādānavasena kāyasucaritādīni karoti. So sucaritapāripūriyā devesu
atk-abh02a:931_2: vā manussesu vā uppajjati. Tatrāssa upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo, kammābhinibbattā
atk-abh02a:931_3: khandhā upapattibhavo. Saññābhavapañcavokārabhavā pana tadantogadhā eva. Iti kāmupādānaṃ
atk-abh02a:932_0: Aparo “rūpārūpabhavesu tato samiddhatarā kāmā”ti sutvā vā parikappetvā vā kāmupādānavaseneva
atk-abh02a:932_1: rūpārūpasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā samāpattibalena rūpārūpabrahmaloke uppajjati. Tatrāssa
atk-abh02a:932_2: upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo, kammābhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo. Saññāasaññā
atk-abh02a:932_3: nevasaññā nāsaññāekavokāracatuvokārapañcavokārabhavā pana tadantogadhā eva. Iti kāmupādānaṃ
atk-abh02a:933_0: Aparo “ayaṃ attā nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:933_1: ucchinno suucchinno hotī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ upādāya tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karoti. Tassa
atk-abh02a:933_2: taṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo, kammābhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo. Saññābhavādayo pana
atk-abh02a:933_3: tadantogadhā eva. Iti diṭṭhupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇampi kāmarūpārūpabhavānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:934_0: Aparo “ayaṃ attā nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:934_1: sukhī hoti, vigatapariḷāho hotī”ti attavādupādānena tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karoti. Tassa
atk-abh02a:934_2: taṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo, tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo. Saññābhavādayo pana
atk-abh02a:934_3: tadantogadhā eva. Iti attavādupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:935_0: Aparo “idaṃ sīlabbataṃ nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:935_1: paripūrentassa sukhaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti sīlabbatupādānavasena tadupagaṃ kammaṃ
atk-abh02a:935_2: karoti. Tassa taṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo, tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo. Saññābhavādayo
atk-abh02a:935_3: pana tadantogadhā eva. Iti sīlabbatupādānampi sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:935_4: bhavānaṃ paccayo hotīti evamettha yaṃ yassa paccayo hoti tatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:936: Kiṃ panettha kassa bhavassa kathaṃ paccayo hotīti ce?
atk-abh02a:939_0: Rūpārūpabhavānañhi kāmabhavapariyāpannassa ca kāmabhave kusalakammasseva upapattibhavassa
atk-abh02a:939_1: cetaṃ catubbidhampi upādānaṃ upanissayapaccayena ekadhā paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave attanā
atk-abh02a:939_3: sahajātādīhi paccayo hoti. Vippayuttassa pana upanissayapaccayenevāti.
atk-abh02a:942_0: 235. Bhavapaccayā jātiniddesādīsu jātiādīnaṃ vinicchayo saccavibhaṅge vuttanayeneva
atk-abh02a:942_1: veditabbo. Bhavoti panettha kammabhavova adhippeto. So hi jātiyā paccayo, na upapattibhavo.
atk-abh02a:942_2: So pana kammapaccayaupanissayapaccayavasena dvidhāva paccayo hotīti.
atk-abh02a:943_0: Tattha siyā – kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “bhavo jātiyā paccayo”ti ce? Bāhirapaccayasamattepi
atk-abh02a:943_2: samattepi sattānaṃ yamakānampi sataṃ hīnapaṇītatādiviseso dissati. So ca na ahetuko,
atk-abh02a:943_3: sabbadā ca sabbesañca abhāvato; na kammabhavato aññahetuko, tadabhinibbattakasattānaṃ
atk-abh02a:943_4: ajjhattasantāne aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvatoti kammabhavahetukova. Kammañhi sattānaṃ
atk-abh02a:943_5: hīnapaṇītādivisesahetu. Tenāha bhagavā – “kammaṃ satte vibhajati yadidaṃ hīnappaṇītatāyā”ti.
atk-abh02a:944_0: Yasmā ca asati jātiyā jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma na hoti, sokādayo ca dhammā na honti, jātiyā
atk-abh02a:944_1: pana sati jarāmaraṇañceva jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātadukkhadhammaphuṭṭhassa ca bālassa jarāmaraṇābhisambandhā
atk-abh02a:944_2: vā tena tena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa anabhisambandhā vā sokādayo ca dhammā honti,
atk-abh02a:944_3: tasmā ayaṃ jātijarāmaraṇassa ceva sokādīnañca paccayo hotīti veditabbā. Sā pana upanissayakoṭiyā
atk-abh02a:946: 242. Evametassātiādīnaṃ attho uddesavāre vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Saṅgatiādīni samudayavevacanāneva.
atk-abh02a:947: Yasmā panettha sokādayo avasāne vuttā, tasmā yā sā avijjā “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti evametassa bhavacakkassa ādimhi vuttā, sā –
atk-abh02a:950_0: Satataṃ samitaṃ pavattatīti veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ panettha sokādīhi avijjā siddhā? Kathamidaṃ
atk-abh02a:950_1: bhavacakkaṃ aviditādi? Kathaṃ kārakavedakarahitaṃ? Kathaṃ dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññanti
atk-abh02a:950_2: ce? Ettha hi sokadukkhadomanassupāyāsā avijjāya aviyogino, paridevo ca nāma mūḷhassāti
atk-abh02a:950_3: tesu tāva siddhesu siddhāva hoti avijjā. Apica “āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti hi
atk-abh02a:950_4: vuttaṃ. Āsavasamudayā cete sokādayo honti. Kathaṃ? Vatthukāmaviyoge tāva soko kāmāsavasamudayo hoti? Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:953_0: Yathā cāha – “kāmato jāyatī soko”ti. Sabbepi cete diṭṭhāsavasamudayā honti, yathāha
atk-abh02a:953_1: – “tassa ahaṃ rūpaṃ, mama rūpanti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino taṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇamati aññathā
atk-abh02a:953_3: Yathā ca diṭṭhāsavasamudayā evaṃ bhavāsavasamudayāpi, yathāha – “yepi te devā dīghāyukā
atk-abh02a:953_4: vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ
atk-abh02a:953_5: sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajja”nti pañca pubbanimittāni disvā maraṇabhayena
atk-abh02a:953_6: santajjitānaṃ devānaṃ viyāti. Yathā ca bhavāsavasamudayā evaṃ avijjāsavasamudayāpi,
atk-abh02a:953_7: yathāha – “sa kho so, bhikkhave, bālo diṭṭheva dhamme tividhaṃ dukkhadomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti.
atk-abh02a:954_0: Iti yasmā āsavasamudayā ete honti, tasmā ete sijjhamānā avijjāya hetubhūte āsave
atk-abh02a:954_1: sādhenti. Āsavesu ca siddhesu paccayabhāve bhāvato avijjāpi siddhāva hotīti. Evaṃ
atk-abh02a:955_0: Yasmā pana evaṃ paccayabhāve bhāvato avijjāya siddhāya puna “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā,
atk-abh02a:955_1: saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti evaṃ hetuphalaparamparāya pariyosānaṃ natthi, tasmā taṃ
atk-abh02a:955_2: hetuphalasambandhavasena pavattaṃ dvādasaṅgaṃ ‘bhavacakkaṃ aviditādī’ti siddhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:956_0: Evaṃ sati “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti idaṃ ādimattakathanaṃ virujjhatīti ce? Nayidaṃ
atk-abh02a:956_1: ādimattakathanaṃ, padhānadhammakathanaṃ panetaṃ. Tiṇṇañhi vaṭṭānaṃ avijjā padhānā.
atk-abh02a:956_2: Avijjāggahaṇena hi avasesaṃ kilesavaṭṭañca kammādīni ca bālaṃ paliveṭhenti, sappasiraggahaṇena
atk-abh02a:956_3: sesaṃ sappasarīraṃ viya bāhaṃ. Avijjāsamucchede pana kate tehi vimokkho hoti, sappasiracchede
atk-abh02a:956_4: kate paliveṭhitabāhāvimokkho viya. Yathāha – “avijjāyatveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādi.
atk-abh02a:956_5: Iti yaṃ gaṇhato bandho muñcato ca mokkho hoti, tassa padhānadhammassa kathanamidaṃ,
atk-abh02a:956_6: na ādimattakathananti evamidaṃ bhavacakkaṃ aviditādīti veditabbaṃ. Tayidaṃ yasmā
atk-abh02a:956_7: avijjādīhi kāraṇehi saṅkhārādīnaṃ pavatti, tasmā tato aññena “brahmā mahābrahmā seṭṭho
atk-abh02a:956_8: sajitā”ti evaṃ parikappitena brahmādinā vā saṃsārassa kārakena “so kho pana me ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:956_9: attā vado vedeyyo”ti evaṃ parikappitena attanā vā sukhadukkhānaṃ vedakena rahitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:957_0: Yasmā panettha avijjā udayabbayadhammakattā dhuvabhāvena, saṃkiliṭṭhattā saṃkilesikattā
atk-abh02a:957_1: ca subhabhāvena, udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā sukhabhāvena, paccayāyattavuttittā vasavattanabhūtena
atk-abh02a:957_2: attabhāvena ca suññā, tathā saṅkhārādīnipi aṅgāni; yasmā vā avijjā na attā, na attano,
atk-abh02a:957_3: na attani, na attavatī, tathā saṅkhārādīnipi aṅgāni; tasmā ‘dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññamidaṃ’
atk-abh02a:960: Dve aṭṭha dve eva ca, sarūpato tesu aṅgāni.
atk-abh02a:961_0: Tassa kho panetassa bhavacakkassa avijjā taṇhā cāti dve dhammā mūlanti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:961_1: Tadetaṃ pubbantāharaṇato avijjāmūlaṃ vedanāvasānaṃ, aparantasantānato taṇhāmūlaṃ
atk-abh02a:961_2: jarāmaraṇāvasānanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha purimaṃ diṭṭhicaritavasena vuttaṃ, pacchimaṃ
atk-abh02a:961_3: taṇhācaritavasena. Diṭṭhicaritānañhi avijjā, taṇhācaritānaṃ taṇhā saṃsāranāyikā.
atk-abh02a:961_4: Ucchedadiṭṭhisamugghātāya vā paṭhamaṃ, phaluppattiyā hetūnaṃ anupacchedapakāsanato;
atk-abh02a:961_6: vā purimaṃ, anupubbapavattidīpanato; opapātikavasena pacchimaṃ sahuppattidīpanato.
atk-abh02a:962_0: Atītapaccuppannānāgatā cassa tayo kālā. Tesu pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatavasena avijjā
atk-abh02a:962_1: saṅkhārā cāti dve aṅgāni atītakālāni, viññāṇādīni bhavāvasānāni aṭṭha paccuppannakālāni,
atk-abh02a:962_2: jāti ceva jarāmaraṇañca dve anāgatakālānīti veditabbāni. Puna –
atk-abh02a:965_0: Itipi veditabbaṃ. Tattha saṅkhārānañca paṭisandhiviññāṇassa ca antarā eko hetuphalasandhi
atk-abh02a:965_1: nāma. Vedanāya ca taṇhāya ca antarā eko phalahetusandhi nāma. Bhavassa ca jātiyā
atk-abh02a:965_2: ca antarā eko hetuphalasandhīti. Evamidaṃ hetuphalahetupubbakatisandhīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:965_3: Sandhīnaṃ ādipariyosānavavatthitā panassa cattāro saṅgahā honti, seyyathidaṃ – avijjāsaṅkhārā
atk-abh02a:965_4: eko saṅgaho, viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā dutiyo, taṇhupādānabhavā tatiyo,
atk-abh02a:968_0: Etehi pana vīsatiyā ākārehi arehi vīsatiākārāranti veditabbaṃ. Tattha ‘atīte hetavo
atk-abh02a:968_1: pañcā’ti avijjā saṅkhārā cāti ime tāva dve vuttā eva. Yasmā pana avidvā paritassati,
atk-abh02a:968_2: paritasito upādiyati, tassa upādānapaccayā bhavo, tasmā taṇhupādānabhavāpi gahitā
atk-abh02a:968_3: honti. Tenāha “purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā, nikanti taṇhā,
atk-abh02a:968_4: upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavo, ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti.
atk-abh02a:969_0: Tattha purimakammabhavasminti purime kammabhave, atītajātiyaṃ kammabhave kariyamāneti
atk-abh02a:969_1: attho. Moho avijjāti yo tadā dukkhādīsu moho, yena mūḷho kammaṃ karoti, sā avijjā.
atk-abh02a:969_2: Āyūhanā saṅkhārāti taṃ kammaṃ karoto purimacetanāyo, yathā ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cittaṃ
atk-abh02a:969_3: uppādetvā māsampi saṃvaccharampi dānūpakaraṇāni sajjentassa uppannā purimacetanāyo.
atk-abh02a:969_4: Paṭiggāhakānaṃ pana hatthe dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpayato cetanā bhavoti vuccati. Ekāvajjanesu
atk-abh02a:969_5: vā chasu javanesu cetanā āyūhanasaṅkhārā nāma. Sattamā cetanā bhavo. Yā kāci vā pana
atk-abh02a:969_6: cetanā bhavo, taṃsampayuttā āyūhanasaṅkhārā nāma. Nikanti taṇhāti yā kammaṃ karontassa
atk-abh02a:969_7: tassa phale uppattibhave nikāmanā patthanā sā taṇhā nāma. Upagamanaṃ upādānanti yaṃ
atk-abh02a:969_8: kammaṃ bhavassa paccayabhūtaṃ; ‘idaṃ katvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne kāme sevissāmi ucchijjissāmī’tiādinā
atk-abh02a:969_9: nayena pavattaṃ upagamanaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ – idaṃ upādānaṃ nāma. Cetanā bhavoti
atk-abh02a:970_0: ‘Idāni phalapañcaka’nti viññāṇādi vedanāvasānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Yathāha “idha
atk-abh02a:970_1: paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ, okkanti nāmarūpaṃ, pasādo āyatanaṃ, phuṭṭho phasso, vedayitaṃ
atk-abh02a:970_2: vedanā ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā”ti. Tattha
atk-abh02a:970_3: paṭisandhi viññāṇanti yaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena uppannattā paṭisandhīti vuccati,
atk-abh02a:970_4: taṃ viññāṇaṃ. Okkanti nāmarūpanti yā gabbhe rūpārūpadhammānaṃ okkanti, āgantvā pavisanaṃ
atk-abh02a:970_5: viya – idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ. Pasādo āyatananti idaṃ cakkhādipañcāyatanavasena vuttaṃ. Phuṭṭho
atk-abh02a:970_6: phassoti yo ārammaṇaṃ phuṭṭho phusanto uppanno – ayaṃ phasso. Vedayitaṃ vedanāti
atk-abh02a:970_7: yaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇena vā saḷāyatanapaccayena vā phassena sahuppannaṃ vipākavedayitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:971_0: ‘Idāni hetavo pañcā’ti taṇhādayo pāḷiyaṃ āgatāva taṇhupādānabhavā. Bhave pana gahite
atk-abh02a:971_1: tassa pubbabhāgā taṃsampayuttā vā saṅkhārā gahitāva honti, taṇhupādānaggahaṇena ca
atk-abh02a:971_2: taṃsampayuttā, yāya vā mūḷho kammaṃ karoti sā avijjā gahitāva hotīti evaṃ pañca.
atk-abh02a:971_3: Tenāha “idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā, nikanti taṇhā,
atk-abh02a:971_4: upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavo. Ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā
atk-abh02a:971_5: paccayā”ti. Tattha idha paripakkattā āyatanānanti paripakkāyatanassa kammakaraṇakāle
atk-abh02a:972_0: ‘Āyatiṃ phalapañcaka’nti viññāṇādīni pañca. Tāni jātiggahaṇena vuttāni. Jarāmaraṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:972_1: pana tesaṃyeva jarāmaraṇaṃ. Tenāha “āyatiṃ paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ, okkanti nāmarūpaṃ,
atk-abh02a:972_2: pasādo āyatanaṃ, phuṭṭho phasso, vedayitaṃ vedanā. Ime pañca dhammā āyatiṃ upapattibhavasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:972_3: idha katassa kammassa paccayā”ti. Evamidaṃ vīsatiākārāraṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:973_0: Tattha purimabhavasmiṃ pañca kammasambhārā, etarahi pañca vipākasambhārā, etarahi
atk-abh02a:973_1: pañca kammasambhārā, anāgate pañca vipākadhammāti dasa dhammā kammaṃ, dasa vipākoti.
atk-abh02a:973_2: Dvīsu ṭhānesu kammaṃ kammaṃ nāma, dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko vipāko nāmāti sabbampetaṃ
atk-abh02a:973_3: bhavacakkaṃ paccayākāravaṭṭaṃ kammañceva kammavipāko ca. Tathā dvīsu ṭhānesu kammaṃ
atk-abh02a:973_4: kammasaṅkhepo, dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko vipākasaṅkhepoti sabbampetaṃ kammasaṅkhepo ceva
atk-abh02a:973_5: vipākasaṅkhepo ca. Dvīsu ṭhānesu kammaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ, dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko vipākavaṭṭanti
atk-abh02a:973_6: sabbampetaṃ kammavaṭṭañceva vipākavaṭṭañca. Tathā dvīsu ṭhānesu kammaṃ kammabhavo,
atk-abh02a:973_7: dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko vipākabhavoti sabbampetaṃ kammabhavo ceva vipākabhavo ca. Dvīsu
atk-abh02a:973_8: ṭhānesu kammaṃ kammapavattaṃ, dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko vipākapavattanti sabbampetaṃ kammapavattañceva
atk-abh02a:973_9: vipākapavattañca. Tathā dvīsu ṭhānesu kammaṃ kammasantati, dvīsu vipāko vipākasantatīti
atk-abh02a:973_10: sabbampetaṃ kammasantati ceva vipākasantati ca. Dvīsu ṭhānesu kammaṃ kiriyā nāma,
atk-abh02a:973_11: dvīsu vipāko kiriyāphalaṃ nāmāti sabbampetaṃ kiriyā ceva kiriyāphalañcāti.
atk-abh02a:980: Hetūsu uparuddhesu, chinnaṃ vaṭṭaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:982: Satte ca nūpalabbhante, nevucchedo na sassataṃ.
atk-abh02a:983_0: Tivaṭṭamanavaṭṭhitaṃ bhamatīti ettha pana saṅkhārabhavā kammavaṭṭaṃ, avijjātaṇhūpādānāni
atk-abh02a:983_1: kilesavaṭṭaṃ, viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā vipākavaṭṭanti imehi tīhi vaṭṭehi
atk-abh02a:983_2: tivaṭṭamidaṃ bhavacakkaṃ yāva kilesavaṭṭaṃ na upacchijjati tāva anupacchinnapaccayattā
atk-abh02a:987_0: Tattha yasmā kusalākusalakammaṃ avisesena samudayasaccanti saccavibhaṅge vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:987_1: tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti avijjāya saṅkhārā dutiyasaccappabhavaṃ dutiyasaccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:987_2: saṅkhārehi viññāṇaṃ dutiyasaccappabhavaṃ paṭhamasaccaṃ, viññāṇādīhi nāmarūpādīni
atk-abh02a:987_3: vipākavedanāpariyosānāni paṭhamasaccappabhavaṃ paṭhamasaccaṃ, vedanāya taṇhā paṭhamasaccappabhavaṃ
atk-abh02a:987_4: dutiyasaccaṃ, taṇhāya upādānaṃ dutiyasaccappabhavaṃ dutiyasaccaṃ, upādānato bhavo
atk-abh02a:987_6: paṭhamasaccaṃ, jātiyā jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭhamasaccappabhavaṃ paṭhamasaccanti. Evaṃ tāvidaṃ
atk-abh02a:988_0: Yasmā panettha avijjā vatthūsu ca satte sammoheti paccayo ca hoti saṅkhārānaṃ pātubhāvāya,
atk-abh02a:988_1: tathā saṅkhārā saṅkhatañca abhisaṅkharonti paccayā ca honti viññāṇassa, viññāṇampi
atk-abh02a:988_2: vatthuñca paṭijānāti paccayo ca hoti nāmarūpassa, nāmarūpampi aññamaññañca upatthambheti
atk-abh02a:988_3: paccayo ca hoti saḷāyatanassa, saḷāyatanampi savisaye ca vattati paccayo ca hoti
atk-abh02a:988_4: phassassa, phassopi ārammaṇañca phusati paccayo ca hoti vedanāya, vedanāpi ārammaṇarasañca
atk-abh02a:988_5: anubhavati paccayo ca hoti taṇhāya, taṇhāpi rajjanīye ca dhamme rajjati paccayo ca
atk-abh02a:988_6: hoti upādānassa, upādānampi upādānīye ca dhamme upādiyati paccayo ca hoti bhavassa,
atk-abh02a:988_7: bhavopi nānāgatīsu ca vikkhipati paccayo ca hoti jātiyā, jātipi khandhe ca janeti
atk-abh02a:988_8: tesaṃ abhinibbattibhāvena pavattatā paccayo ca hoti jarāmaraṇassa, jarāmaraṇampi
atk-abh02a:988_9: khandhānaṃ pākabhedabhāvañca adhitiṭṭhati paccayo ca hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāya sokādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:988_10: adhiṭṭhānattā, tasmā sabbapadesu dvidhā pavatta‘kiccato’pi idaṃ viññātabbaṃ yathārahaṃ.
atk-abh02a:989_3: phusati vedayati taṇhiyati upādiyati bhavati jāyati jīyati mīyatī”ti evamādidassananivāraṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:990_0: Yasmā panettha salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena dhammānaṃ adassanato andho viya avijjā,
atk-abh02a:990_1: andhassa upakkhalanaṃ viya avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, upakkhalitassa patanaṃ viya saṅkhārapaccayā
atk-abh02a:990_2: viññāṇaṃ, patitassa gaṇḍapātubhāvo viya viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, gaṇḍabhedapīḷakā
atk-abh02a:990_3: viya nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, gaṇḍapīḷakāghaṭṭanaṃ viya saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso,
atk-abh02a:990_4: ghaṭṭanadukkhaṃ viya phassapaccayā vedanā, dukkhassa paṭikārābhilāso viya vedanāpaccayā
atk-abh02a:990_5: taṇhā, paṭikārābhilāsena asappāyaggahaṇaṃ viya taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādinnaasappāyālepanaṃ
atk-abh02a:990_6: viya upādānapaccayā bhavo, asappāyālepanena gaṇḍavikārapātubhāvo viya bhavapaccayā
atk-abh02a:990_7: jāti, gaṇḍavikārato gaṇḍabhedo viya jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:991_0: Yasmā vā panettha avijjā appaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattibhāvena satte abhibhavati paṭalaṃ
atk-abh02a:991_1: viya akkhīni, tadabhibhūto ca bālo ponobbhavikehi saṅkhārehi attānaṃ veṭheti kosakārakimi
atk-abh02a:991_2: viya kosappadesehi, saṅkhārapariggahitaṃ viññāṇaṃ gatīsu patiṭṭhaṃ labhati pariṇāyakapariggahito
atk-abh02a:991_3: viya rājakumāro rajje, upapattinimittaṃ parikappanato viññāṇaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ anekappakāraṃ
atk-abh02a:991_4: nāmarūpaṃ abhinibbatteti māyākāro viya māyaṃ, nāmarūpe patiṭṭhitaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ vuddhiṃ
atk-abh02a:991_5: virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti subhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito vanappagumbo viya, āyatanaghaṭṭanato
atk-abh02a:991_6: phasso jāyati araṇīsahitābhimaddanato aggi viya, phassena phuṭṭhassa vedanā pātubhavati
atk-abh02a:991_7: agginā phuṭṭhassa ḍāho viya, vedayamānassa taṇhā vaḍḍhati loṇūdakaṃ pivato pipāsā
atk-abh02a:991_8: viya, tasito bhavesu abhilāsaṃ karoti pipāsito viya pānīye, tadassupādānaṃ upādānena
atk-abh02a:991_9: bhavaṃ upādiyati āmisalobhena maccho baḷisaṃ viya, bhave sati jāti hoti bīje sati
atk-abh02a:991_10: aṅkuro viya, jātassa avassaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ uppannassa rukkhassa patanaṃ viya, tasmā
atk-abh02a:992_0: Yasmā ca bhagavatā atthatopi dhammatopi desanātopi paṭivedhatopi gambhīrabhāvaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh02a:992_1: “gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda, paṭiccasamuppādo gambhīrāvabhāso cā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā ‘gambhīrabhedato’petaṃ
atk-abh02a:993_0: Tattha yasmā na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hoti, itthañca
atk-abh02a:993_1: jātito samudāgacchatīti evaṃ jātipaccayasamudāgataṭṭhassa duravabodhanīyato jarāmaraṇassa
atk-abh02a:993_2: jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho gambhīro, tathā jātiyā bhavapaccaya…pe… saṅkhārānaṃ
atk-abh02a:993_3: avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho gambhīro, tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ atthagambhīranti.
atk-abh02a:993_4: Ayaṃ tāvettha ‘atthagambhīratā’ hetuphalañhi atthoti vuccati, yathāha “hetuphale
atk-abh02a:994_0: Yasmā pana yenākārena yadavatthā ca avijjā tesaṃ tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti,
atk-abh02a:994_1: tassa duravabodhanīyato avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho gambhīro, tathā saṅkhārānaṃ…pe…
atk-abh02a:994_2: jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho gambhīro, tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ dhammagambhīranti
atk-abh02a:994_3: ayamettha ‘dhammagambhīratā’ hetuno hi dhammoti nāmaṃ, yathāha “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti.
atk-abh02a:995_0: Yasmā cassa tena tena kāraṇena tathā tathā pavattetabbattā desanāpi gambhīrā, na
atk-abh02a:995_1: tattha sabbaññutañāṇato aññaṃ ñāṇaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ labhati, tathā hetaṃ katthaci sutte
atk-abh02a:995_2: anulomato, katthaci paṭilomato; katthaci anulomapaṭilomato, katthaci vemajjhato paṭṭhāya
atk-abh02a:995_3: anulomato vā paṭilomato vā, katthaci tisandhicatusaṅkhepaṃ, katthaci dvisandhitisaṅkhepaṃ,
atk-abh02a:995_4: katthaci ekasandhidvisaṅkhepaṃ desitaṃ, tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ desanāgambhīranti
atk-abh02a:996_0: Yasmā panettha yo avijjādīnaṃ sabhāvo, yena paṭividdhena avijjādayo dhammā salakkhaṇato
atk-abh02a:996_1: paṭividdhā honti, so duppariyogāhattā gambhīro, tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ paṭivedhagambhīraṃ.
atk-abh02a:996_2: Tathā hettha avijjāya aññāṇādassanasaccāsampaṭivedhaṭṭho gambhīro, saṅkhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇāyūhanasarāgavirāgaṭṭho,
atk-abh02a:997_0: Yasmā panettha ekattanayo, nānattanayo, abyāpāranayo, evaṃdhammatānayoti cattāro
atk-abh02a:997_1: atthanayā honti, tasmā ‘nayabhedato’petaṃ bhavacakkaṃ viññātabbaṃ yathārahaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh02a:997_2: “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti evaṃ bījassa aṅkurādibhāvena
atk-abh02a:997_3: rukkhabhāvappatti viya santānānupacchedo ‘ekattanayo’ nāma; yaṃ sammā passanto hetuphalasambandhena
atk-abh02a:997_4: pavattamānassa santānassa anupacchedāvabodhato ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati, micchā passanto
atk-abh02a:997_5: hetuphalasambandhena pavattamānassa santānānupacchedassa ekattaggahaṇato sassatadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyati.
atk-abh02a:998_0: Avijjādīnaṃ pana yathāsakalakkhaṇavavatthānaṃ ‘nānattanayo’ nāma; yaṃ sammā passanto
atk-abh02a:998_1: navanavānaṃ uppādadassanato sassatadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati, micchā passanto ekasantānapatitassa
atk-abh02a:999_0: Avijjāya ‘saṅkhārā mayā uppādetabbā’, saṅkhārānaṃ vā ‘viññāṇaṃ amhehī’ti evamādibyāpārābhāvo
atk-abh02a:999_1: ‘abyāpāranayo’ nāma; yaṃ sammā passanto kārakassa abhāvāvabodhato attadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
atk-abh02a:999_2: micchā passanto yo asatipi byāpāre avijjādīnaṃ sabhāvaniyamasiddho hetubhāvo tassa
atk-abh02a:1000_0: Avijjādīhi pana kāraṇehi saṅkhārādīnaṃyeva sambhavo khīrādīhi dadhiādīnaṃ viya, na
atk-abh02a:1000_1: aññesanti ayaṃ ‘evaṃdhammatānayo’ nāma; yaṃ sammā passanto paccayānurūpato phalāvabodhato
atk-abh02a:1000_2: ahetukadiṭṭhiñca akiriyadiṭṭhiñca pajahati, micchā passanto paccayānurūpaṃ phalappavattiṃ
atk-abh02a:1000_3: aggahetvā yato kutoci yassa kassaci asambhavaggahaṇato ahetukadiṭṭhiñceva niyatavādañca
atk-abh02a:1003: Idañhi gambhīrato agādhaṃ nānānayaggahaṇato durabhiyānaṃ ñāṇāsinā samādhipavarasilāyaṃ sunisitena –
atk-abh02a:1008_0: Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā – “gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda, paṭiccasamuppādo gambhīrāvabhāso
atk-abh02a:1008_1: ca. Etassa, ānanda, dhammassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamayaṃ pajā tantākulakajātā
atk-abh02a:1008_2: kulagaṇṭhikajātā muñjapabbajabhūtā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattatī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1008_3: Tasmā attano vā paresaṃ vā hitāya sukhāya paṭipanno avasesakiccāni pahāya –
atk-abh02a:1013_0: 243. Evaṃ mahāpathaviṃ pattharanto viya ākāsaṃ vitthārayanto viya ca sabbadhammesu
atk-abh02a:1013_1: appaṭihatañāṇo satthā suttantabhājanīye niggaṇṭhiṃ nijjaṭaṃ paccayākāraṃ nānācittavasena
atk-abh02a:1013_2: dassetvā idāni yasmā na kevalaṃ ayaṃ paccayākāro nānācittesuyeva hoti, ekacittepi
atk-abh02a:1013_3: hotiyeva, tasmā abhidhammabhājanīyavasena ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ paccayākāraṃ nānappakārato
atk-abh02a:1013_4: dassetuṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārotiādinā nayena mātikaṃ tāva ṭhapesi. Evaṃ ṭhapitāya pana mātikāya –
atk-abh02a:1016_1: avijjādīhi navahi mūlapadehi avijjādiko, saṅkhārādiko, viññāṇādiko, nāmādiko, chaṭṭhāyatanādiko,
atk-abh02a:1016_2: phassādiko, vedanādiko, taṇhādiko, upādānādikoti ime nava mūlapadā nava nayā honti.
atk-abh02a:1017_0: Tesu yo tāva ayaṃ avijjādiko nayo, tattha paccayacatukkaṃ, hetucatukkaṃ, sampayuttacatukkaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1017_1: aññamaññacatukkanti cattāri catukkāni honti. Yathā cettha evaṃ sesesupīti ekekasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1017_2: naye catunnaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena chattiṃsa catukkāni. Tattha ekekena catukkena
atk-abh02a:1017_3: catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vārānaṃ saṅgahitattā catunnampi catukkānaṃ vasena ekekasmiṃ naye
atk-abh02a:1017_4: soḷasa soḷasa vārāti catucattālīsādhikaṃ vārasataṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1019_0: Tattha yadetaṃ sabbapaṭhame avijjāmūlake naye paccayacatukkaṃ, tasmiṃ paṭhamo nāmarūpaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1019_1: nāmassa, saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne chaṭṭhāyatanassa ca vuttattā aparipuṇṇaaṅgadvayayutto dvādasaṅgikavāro
atk-abh02a:1019_2: nāma. Dutiyo nāmarūpaṭṭhāne nāmasseva, saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne ca na kassaci vuttattā aparipuṇṇaekaṅgayutto
atk-abh02a:1019_3: ekādasaṅgikavāro nāma. Tatiyo saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne chaṭṭhāyatanassa vuttattā paripuṇṇaekaṅgayutto
atk-abh02a:1020_0: Tattha siyā – ayampi chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phassoti vuttattā aparipuṇṇekaṅgayuttoyevāti?
atk-abh02a:1020_1: Na, tassa anaṅgattā. Phassoyeva hettha aṅgaṃ, na chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ. Tasmā tassa anaṅgattā
atk-abh02a:1020_2: nāyaṃ aparipuṇṇekaṅgayuttoti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ – “paṭhamo sabbasaṅgāhikaṭṭhena,
atk-abh02a:1020_3: dutiyo paccayavisesaṭṭhena, tatiyo gabbhaseyyakasattānaṃ vasena, catuttho opapātikasattānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1020_4: vasena gahito. Tathā paṭhamo sabbasaṅgāhikaṭṭhena, dutiyo paccayavisesaṭṭhena, tatiyo
atk-abh02a:1020_5: aparipuṇṇāyatanavasena, catuttho paripuṇṇāyatanavasena gahito. Tathā paṭhamo sabbasaṅgāhikaṭṭhena,
atk-abh02a:1020_6: dutiyo mahānidānasuttantavasena, tatiyo rūpabhavavasena, catuttho kāmabhavavasena gahito”ti.
atk-abh02a:1021: Tattha paṭhamo imesu dutiyādīsu tīsu vāresu na katthaci na pavisatīti sabbasaṅgāhikoti vutto. Sesānaṃ viseso parato āvibhavissati. Tassāvibhāvatthaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1022: Yaṃ yattha aññathā vuttaṃ, avuttañcāpi yaṃ yahiṃ;
atk-abh02a:1023: Yaṃ yathā paccayo yassa, taṃ sabbamupalakkhaye.
atk-abh02a:1024_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – avisesena tāva catūsupi etesu suttantabhājaniye viya saṅkhārāti avatvā
atk-abh02a:1024_1: saṅkhāroti vuttaṃ, taṃ kasmāti? Ekacittakkhaṇikattā. Tatra hi nānācittakkhaṇiko paccayākāro
atk-abh02a:1024_2: vibhatto. Idha ekacittakkhaṇiko āraddho. Ekacittakkhaṇe ca bahū cetanā na santīti
atk-abh02a:1025_1: ca rūpaṃ chaḍḍetvā “viññāṇapaccayā nāma”ntveva vuttaṃ. Tañhi ekacittakkhaṇapariyāpannaṃ
atk-abh02a:1025_2: sabbaṭṭhānasādhāraṇañca, na katthaci viññāṇappavattiṭṭhāne na pavattati. Yasmā ca
atk-abh02a:1025_3: ekacittakkhaṇapariyāpanno ekovettha phasso, tasmā tassānurūpaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ āyatanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1025_4: gaṇhanto saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne “nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatana”nti ekaṃ manāyatanaṃyeva āha.
atk-abh02a:1025_5: Tañhi ekassa akusalaphassassa anurūpaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ. Kāmañcetaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā
atk-abh02a:1025_6: viññāṇanti etthāpi vuttaṃ, hetuphalavisesadassanatthaṃ pana aṅgapuṇṇatthañca puna
atk-abh02a:1025_7: idha gahitaṃ. Tatra hi etassa visesena saṅkhāro hetu, avisesena nāmaṃ phalaṃ. Idha
atk-abh02a:1025_8: panassa avisesena nāmaṃ hetu, visesena phasso phalanti. Sokādayo pana yasmā sabbe
atk-abh02a:1025_9: ekacittakkhaṇe na sambhavanti, sabbasmiñca cittappavattiṭṭhāne ceva citte ca na pavattanti,
atk-abh02a:1025_10: tasmā na gahitā. Jātijarāmaraṇāni pana acittakkhaṇamattānipi samānāni cittakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:1025_11: antogadhattā aṅgaparipūraṇatthaṃ gahitāni. Evaṃ tāvettha ‘yaṃ aññathā vuttaṃ. Yañca
atk-abh02a:1026: Yaṃ panettha ito paresu vāresu vuttaṃ, tassattho vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ pana vāre yo yo viseso āgato, taṃ taṃ tattha tattheva pakāsayissāma.
atk-abh02a:1027_0: ‘Yaṃ yathā paccayo yassā’ti ettha pana saṅkhārassa avijjā sampayuttadhammasādhāraṇehi
atk-abh02a:1027_2: sattadhā paccayo. Tattha yasmā parato hetucatukkādīni tīṇi catukkāni avigatasampayuttaaññamaññapaccayavasena
atk-abh02a:1027_3: vuttāni, tasmā idha tāni apanetvā avasesānaṃ vasena avijjā saṅkhārassa catudhā paccayoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1028_0: Saṅkhāro viññāṇassa sādhāraṇehi chahi, kammāhārapaccayehi cāti aṭṭhadhā paccayo.
atk-abh02a:1028_1: Idha pana teyeva tayo apanetvā pañcadhā. Viññāṇaṃ nāmassa sādhāraṇehi chahi, indriyāhārādhipatīhi
atk-abh02a:1028_2: cāti navadhā. Idha pana tayo apanetvā chadhā. Nāmaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanassa sādhāraṇehi
atk-abh02a:1028_3: chahi. Kiñci panettha adhipatipaccayena, kiñci āhārapaccayādīhīti anekadhā. Idha
atk-abh02a:1028_4: pana teyeva tayo apanetvā tidhā catudhā pañcadhā vā. Chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ phassassa yathā
atk-abh02a:1028_5: viññāṇaṃ nāmassa. Evaṃ phasso vedanāya sādhāraṇehi chahi āhārapaccayena cāti sattadhā.
atk-abh02a:1028_6: Idha pana teyeva tayo apanetvā catudhā. Vedanā taṇhāya sādhāraṇehi chahi jhānindriyapaccayehi
atk-abh02a:1028_7: cāti aṭṭhadhā. Idha pana teyeva tayo apanetvā pañcadhā. Taṇhā upādānassa, yathā avijjā
atk-abh02a:1028_8: saṅkhārassa. Evaṃ upādānaṃ bhavassa sādhāraṇehi chahi maggapaccayena cāti sattadhā.
atk-abh02a:1028_9: Idha pana teyeva tayo apanetvā catudhā. Bhavo jātiyā, yasmā jātīti idha saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1028_10: adhippetaṃ, tasmā pariyāyena upanissayapaccayeneva paccayo. Tathā jāti jarāmaraṇassāti.
atk-abh02a:1029_0: Ye pana evaṃ vadanti – “imasmiṃ catukke sabbesampi saṅkhārādīnaṃ avijjādayo sahajātapaccayena
atk-abh02a:1029_1: paccayā honti. Sahajātapaccayavaseneva hi paṭhamavāro āraddho”ti, te bhavādīnaṃ tathā
atk-abh02a:1029_2: abhāvaṃ sesapaccayānañca sambhavaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā. Na hi bhavo jātiyā sahajātapaccayo
atk-abh02a:1029_3: hoti, na jāti jarāmaraṇassa. Ye cetesaṃ saṅkharādīnaṃ avasesā paccayā vuttā, tepi
atk-abh02a:1029_4: sambhavantiyeva. Tasmā na sakkā chaḍḍetunti. Evaṃ tāva paṭhamavāre yaṃ yattha aññathā
atk-abh02a:1029_5: vuttaṃ, avuttañcāpi yaṃ yahiṃ, yañca yathā yassa paccayo hoti, taṃ veditabbaṃ. Dutiyavārādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1030_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – dutiyavāre “nāmapaccayā phasso”ti vatvā saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne na kiñci
atk-abh02a:1030_2: Phassassa hi na kevalañca chaṭṭhāyatanameva paccayo, vedanākkhandhādayo pana tayo
atk-abh02a:1030_3: khandhāpi paccayāyeva. Mahānidānasuttante cassa “atthi idappaccayā phassoti iti puṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:1030_4: satā, ānanda, atthītissa vacanīyaṃ. Kiṃ paccayā phassoti? Iti ce vadeyya, nāmapaccayā
atk-abh02a:1030_5: phassoti iccassa vacanīya”nti. Evaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ chaḍḍetvā ekādasaṅgiko paṭiccasamuppādo
atk-abh02a:1030_6: vutto. Tasmā imassa paccayavisesassa dassanatthaṃ imissā ca mahānidānasuttantadesanāya
atk-abh02a:1030_7: pariggahatthaṃ dutiyavāre “nāmapaccayā phasso”ti vatvā saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne na kiñci
atk-abh02a:1031_0: Tatiyavāre pana “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti suttantabhājanīye āgatameva catutthamaṅgaṃ
atk-abh02a:1031_1: vuttaṃ, taṃ ekacittakkhaṇikattā paccayākārassa idha ayuttanti ce? Taṃ nāyuttaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1031_2: Sakakkhaṇe paccayabhāvato. Sacepi hi tattha rūpaṃ cittakkhaṇato uddhaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh02a:1031_3: tathāpissa taṃ viññāṇaṃ sakakkhaṇe paccayo hoti. Kathaṃ? Purejātassa tāva cittasamuṭṭhānassa
atk-abh02a:1031_4: aññassa vā pacchājātapaccayena. Vuttañcetaṃ “pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa
atk-abh02a:1031_5: imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti. Sahajātassa pana cittasamuṭṭhānassa
atk-abh02a:1031_6: nissayapaccayena paccayo. Yathāha “cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1032_0: Yadi evaṃ, purimavāresu kasmā evaṃ na vuttanti? Rūpappavattidesaṃ sandhāya desitattā.
atk-abh02a:1032_1: Ayañhi paccayākāro rūpappavattidese kāmabhave gabbhaseyyakānañceva aparipuṇṇāyatanaopapātikānañca
atk-abh02a:1032_2: rūpāvacaradevānañca vasena desito. Tenevettha “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti avatvā
atk-abh02a:1032_3: chaṭṭhāyatananti vuttaṃ. Tattha nāmaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Rūpaṃ pana hadayarūpaṃ
atk-abh02a:1032_4: veditabbaṃ. Taṃ panetassa chaṭṭhāyatanassa nissayapaccayena ceva purejātapaccayena
atk-abh02a:1032_5: cāti dvidhā paccayo hotīti esa tatiyavāre viseso.
atk-abh02a:1033_0: Catutthavāro pana yonivasena opapātikānaṃ, āyatanavasena paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ, bhavavasena
atk-abh02a:1033_1: kāmāvacarasattānaṃ vasena vutto. Tenevettha “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1033_2: Tattha nāmaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanassa sahajātādīhi, cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pacchājātapaccayena.
atk-abh02a:1033_3: Rūpe hadayarūpaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanassa nissayapaccayapurejātapaccayehi, cattāri mahābhūtāni
atk-abh02a:1033_4: cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ sahajātanissayaatthiavigatehi. Yasmā panesa ekacittakkhaṇiko paccayākāro,
atk-abh02a:1033_5: tasmā ettha saḷāyatanapaccayāti avatvā “chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso”ti vuttoti ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1034_0: Evametesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ ñatvā puna sabbesveva tesu visesena paṭhamakā dve vārā arūpabhave
atk-abh02a:1034_1: paccayākāradassanatthaṃ vuttāti veditabbā. Arūpabhavasmiñhi rūpena asammissāni paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni
atk-abh02a:1034_2: pavattanti. Tatiyo rūpabhave paccayākāradassanatthaṃ vutto. Rūpabhavasmiñhi satipi
atk-abh02a:1034_3: rūpasammissatte saḷāyatanaṃ na pavattati. Catuttho kāmabhave paccayākāradassanatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1034_4: vutto. Kāmabhavasmiñhi sakalaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ pavattati. Tatiyo vā rūpabhave ceva kāmabhave
atk-abh02a:1034_5: ca aparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ akusalappavattikkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vutto. Catuttho vā kāmabhave
atk-abh02a:1034_6: paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ. Paṭhamo vā sabbatthagāmitaṃ sandhāya vutto. So hi na katthaci
atk-abh02a:1034_7: cittappavattidese na pavattati. Dutiyo paccayavisesaṃ sandhāya vutto. Ekādasaṅgikattañhettha
atk-abh02a:1034_8: phassassa ca nāmapaccayattaṃ paccayaviseso. Tatiyo purimayonidvayaṃ sandhāya vutto.
atk-abh02a:1034_9: Purimāsu hi dvīsu yonīsu so sambhavati, tattha sadā saḷāyatanassa asambhavato. Catuttho
atk-abh02a:1034_10: pacchimayonidvayaṃ sandhāya vutto. Pacchimāsu hi so dvīsu yonīsu sambhavati, tattha
atk-abh02a:1035: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ vuttaṃ catūsupi vāresu –
atk-abh02a:1036: Yaṃ yattha aññathā vuttaṃ, avuttañcāpi yaṃ yahiṃ;
atk-abh02a:1037: Yaṃ yathā paccayo yassa, taṃ sabbamupalakkhayeti.
atk-abh02a:1040: Viseso yo ca taṃ jaññā, catukkesu paresupi.
atk-abh02a:1042_0: 244. Tattha yo tāva idha vutto nayo, so sabbattha pākaṭoyeva. Viseso pana evaṃ veditabbo
atk-abh02a:1042_1: – hetucatukke tāva avijjā hetu assāti avijjāhetuko. Avijjā assa sahavattanato yāvabhaṅgā
atk-abh02a:1042_2: pavattikā gamikāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Avijjāpaccayā”ti ca ettāvatā sahajātādipaccayavasena
atk-abh02a:1042_3: sādhāraṇato saṅkhārassa avijjā paccayoti dassetvā, puna “avijjāhetuko”ti eteneva
atk-abh02a:1042_4: visesato avigatapaccayatā dassitā. Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārahetukantiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1043_0: Kasmā pana bhavādīsu hetukaggahaṇaṃ na katanti? Avigatapaccayaniyamābhāvato abhāvato
atk-abh02a:1043_1: ca avigatapaccayassa. “Tattha katamo upādānapaccayā bhavo? Ṭhapetvā upādānaṃ vedanākkhandho
atk-abh02a:1043_2: saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho – ayaṃ vuccati upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti
atk-abh02a:1043_3: vacanato upādānapaccayā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ idha bhavoti nāmaṃ. Saṅkhārakkhandhe
atk-abh02a:1043_4: ca “jāti dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahitā”tiādivacanato jātijarāmaraṇāni antogadhāni.
atk-abh02a:1044_0: Tattha yāva upādānaṃ tāva jātijarāmaraṇānaṃ anupalabbhanato upādānaṃ bhavassa na
atk-abh02a:1044_1: niyamato avigatapaccayo hoti. “Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ jātī”ti ādivacanato saṅkhatalakkhaṇesu
atk-abh02a:1044_2: jātiyā jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātassa bhavassa jātikkhaṇamatteyeva abhāvato avigatapaccayabhāvo
atk-abh02a:1044_3: na sambhavati. Tathā jātiyā jarāmaraṇakkhaṇe abhāvato. Upanissayapaccayeneva pana
atk-abh02a:1044_4: bhavo jātiyā. Jāti jarāmaraṇassa paccayoti sabbathāpi avigatapaccayaniyamābhāvato
atk-abh02a:1044_5: abhāvato ca avigatapaccayassa bhavādīsu hetukaggahaṇaṃ na katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1045_0: Keci panāhu – “bhavo duvidhenā”ti vacanato upapattimissako bhavo, na ca upapattibhavassa
atk-abh02a:1045_1: upādānaṃ avigatapaccayo hotīti “upādānapaccayā bhavo upādānahetuko”ti avatvā “upādānapaccayā
atk-abh02a:1045_2: bhavo”ti vutto. Idha pacchinnattā paratopi na vuttanti. Taṃ idha upapattimissakassa
atk-abh02a:1045_3: bhavassa anadhippetattā ayuttaṃ. Arūpakkhandhā hi idha bhavoti āgatā.
atk-abh02a:1046_0: Bhavapaccayā jātīti ettha ca ṭhapetvā jātijarāmaraṇāni avaseso bhavo jātiyā paccayoti
atk-abh02a:1046_1: veditabbo. Kasmā? Jātiādīnaṃ jātiyā appaccayattā. Yadi evaṃ, ṭhapetvā jātijarāmaraṇāni
atk-abh02a:1046_2: bhavo jātiyā paccayoti vattabboti? Āma vattabbo, vattabbapadesābhāvato pana na vutto.
atk-abh02a:1046_3: Dasamaṅganiddese hi upādānapaccayasambhūto bhavo vattabbo. Ekādasamaṅganiddese jāti
atk-abh02a:1046_4: vattabbā. Yo pana bhavo jātiyā paccayo, tassa vattabbapadeso natthīti vattabbapadesābhāvato
atk-abh02a:1046_5: na vutto. Avuttopi pana yuttito gahetabboti. Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpantiādīsu ca viññāṇādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1046_6: avigatapaccayabhāvasambhavato viññāṇahetukādivacanaṃ katanti esa hetucatukke viseso.
atk-abh02a:1048_2: Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Yasmā pana arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ rūpadhammehi sampayogo natthi,
atk-abh02a:1048_4: nāma”ntiādinā nayena yaṃ labbhati, tadeva gahitanti esa sampayuttacatukke viseso.
atk-abh02a:1050_1: dassetvā “saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā”ti aññamaññapaccayatā dassitā. Sesapadesupi eseva
atk-abh02a:1050_2: nayo. Yasmā pana bhavo nippadeso, upādānaṃ sappadesaṃ, sappadesadhammo ca nippadesadhammassa
atk-abh02a:1050_3: paccayo hoti, na nippadesadhammo sappadesadhammassa, tasmā ettha “bhavapaccayāpi
atk-abh02a:1050_4: upādāna”nti na vuttaṃ; heṭṭhā vā desanāya pacchinnattā evaṃ na vuttaṃ. Yasmā ca nāmarūpapaccayā
atk-abh02a:1050_5: saḷāyatanaṃ atthi, saḷāyatanapaccayā ekacittakkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ natthi, yassa saḷāyatanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1050_7: yaṃ labbhati tadeva gahitanti esa aññamaññacatukke viseso.
atk-abh02a:1053_0: 247. Idāni saṅkhārapaccayā avijjāti saṅkhāramūlakanayo āraddho. Tatthāpi yathā avijjāmūlake
atk-abh02a:1053_1: evaṃ cattāri catukkāni soḷasa ca vārā veditabbā. Paṭhamacatukke pana paṭhamavārameva
atk-abh02a:1053_2: dassetvā desanā saṃkhittā. Yathā cettha evaṃ viññāṇamūlakādīsupi. Tattha sabbesveva
atk-abh02a:1053_3: tesu saṅkhāramūlakādīsu aṭṭhasu nayesu “saṅkhārapaccayā avijjā”tiādinā nayena sahajātādipaccayavasena
atk-abh02a:1053_4: avijjāya saṅkhārādipaccayataṃ dassetvā puna “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena
atk-abh02a:1054_0: Kasmā pana bhavamūlakā jātijarāmaraṇamūlakā vā nayā na vuttā? Kiṃ bhavapaccayā avijjā
atk-abh02a:1054_1: na hotīti? No na hoti. “Saṅkhārapaccayā avijjā”ti evamādīsu pana vuccamānesu na koci
atk-abh02a:1054_2: bhavapariyāpanno dhammo avijjāya paccayo na vutto. Tasmā apubbassa aññassa avijjāpaccayassa
atk-abh02a:1054_3: vattabbassa abhāvato bhavamūlako nayo na vutto. Bhavaggahaṇena ca avijjāpi saṅgahaṃ
atk-abh02a:1054_4: gacchati. Tasmā “bhavapaccayā avijjā”ti vuccamāne “avijjāpaccayā avijjā”tipi vuttaṃ
atk-abh02a:1054_5: siyā. Na ca ekacittakkhaṇe avijjā avijjāya paccayo nāma hoti. Tattha pacchinnattāva
atk-abh02a:1054_6: jātijarāmaraṇamūlakāpi nayā na gahitā. Apica bhave jātijarāmaraṇānipi antogadhāni.
atk-abh02a:1054_7: Na cetāni ekacittakkhaṇe avijjāya paccayā hontīti bhavamūlakā jātijarāmaraṇamūlakā vā nayā na vuttāti.
atk-abh02a:1057_0: 248-249. Idāni yathā heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalattikaṃ ādiṃ katvā nikkhittamātikāya
atk-abh02a:1057_1: paṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ kusalaṃ bhājitaṃ, tathā idha mātikāya anikkhittattā paṭhamaṃ
atk-abh02a:1057_2: kusalaṃ anāmasitvā “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro”ti akusaladhammavasena mātikāya nikkhittattā
atk-abh02a:1057_3: nikkhepapaṭipāṭiyāva avijjādīni paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ katame dhammā
atk-abh02a:1057_4: akusalātiādimāha. Tassattho heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Yasmā
atk-abh02a:1057_5: pana ekacittakkhaṇe taṇhāya ca kāmupādānassa ca sambhavo natthi, tasmā yaṃ ettha
atk-abh02a:1057_6: taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ labbhati, tadeva dassetuṃ diṭṭhi diṭṭhigatantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1058_0: Bhavaniddese ca yasmā upādānaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhe saṅgahaṃ gacchati, tasmā “ṭhapetvā
atk-abh02a:1058_1: upādānaṃ vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1058_2: Evañhi vuccamāne upādānassa upādānapaccayattaṃ āpajjeyya. Na ca tadeva tassa paccayo
atk-abh02a:1058_3: hoti. Jātiādiniddesesu yasmā ete arūpadhammānaṃ jātiādayo, tasmā “khaṇḍiccaṃ, pāliccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1059_0: 250. Evaṃ paṭhamavāraṃ niṭṭhapetvā puna dutiyavāre yasmiṃ samaye paṭhamavārena paccayākāro
atk-abh02a:1059_1: dassito, tasmiṃyeva samaye aparenapi nayena paccayākāraṃ dassetuṃ visuṃ samayavavatthānavāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1059_2: avatvā tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārotiādināva nayena desanā katā. Tattha ṭhapetvā
atk-abh02a:1059_3: phassanti idaṃ yasmā phassopi nāmapariyāpanno, tasmā phassassa nāmato nīharaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1060_0: 252. Tatiyavāre yassa cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa viññāṇaṃ paccayo, tasmiṃ pavattamāne
atk-abh02a:1060_1: yasmā tenupatthaddhānaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ upacitattaṃ paññāyati, tasmā cakkhāyatanassa
atk-abh02a:1060_2: upacayotiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmā ca kammajarūpassapi tasmiṃ samaye vattamānassa viññāṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1060_3: pacchājātapaccayena paccayo hoti, tasmāpi evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha kiñcāpi kammajaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānanti
atk-abh02a:1060_4: dveva santatiyo gahitā, itarāpi pana dve santatiyo gahetabbā. Tāsampi hi viññāṇaṃ paccayo hotiyeva.
atk-abh02a:1061_0: 254. Catutthavāre pana yasmā ekacittakkhaṇepi mahābhūtarūpapaccayā cakkhāyatanādīni,
atk-abh02a:1061_1: hadayarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, nāmapaccayā ca pacchājātasahajātādivasena yathānurūpaṃ
atk-abh02a:1061_2: sabbānipi pavattanti, tasmā tattha katamaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ? Cakkhāyatanantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1063: 264. Tatiyacatukke yassa sampayuttapaccayabhāvo na hoti, yassa ca hoti, taṃ visuṃ visuṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ vuccati viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ nāmantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1064_0: 272. Catutthacatukke phassapaccayā nāmaniddese kiñcāpi “ṭhapetvā phassaṃ vedanākkhandho…pe…
atk-abh02a:1064_1: viññāṇakkhandho – idaṃ vuccati phassapaccayā nāma”nti na vuttaṃ, tathāpi anantarātītapadaniddese
atk-abh02a:1064_2: “ṭhapetvā phassaṃ vedanākkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho”ti vuttattā avuttampi taṃ vuttameva
atk-abh02a:1064_3: hoti. Yadeva hi nāmaṃ phassassa paccayo, phassopi tasseva paccayoti.
atk-abh02a:1065_0: Yathā cāyaṃ catucatukko soḷasavārappabhedo avijjāmūlako paṭhamanayo etasmiṃ paṭhamākusalacitte
atk-abh02a:1065_1: pakāsito, evaṃ saṅkhāramūlakādayo aṭṭha nayāpi veditabbā. Pāḷi pana saṃkhittā. Evameva
atk-abh02a:1065_2: tasmiṃ paṭhamākusalacitteyeva nava nayā, chattiṃsa catukkāni, catucattālīsādhikañca
atk-abh02a:1066_0: 280. Idāni imināva nayena sesākusalacittesupi paccayākāraṃ dassetuṃ katame dhammā
atk-abh02a:1066_1: akusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha yasmā diṭṭhivippayuttesu taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ natthi,
atk-abh02a:1066_2: tasmā upādānaṭṭhāne upādānaṃ viya daḷhanipātinā adhimokkhena padaṃ pūritaṃ. Domanassasahagatesu
atk-abh02a:1066_3: ca yasmā vedanāpaccayā taṇhāpi natthi, tasmā taṇhāṭṭhāne taṇhā viya balavakilesena
atk-abh02a:1066_4: paṭighena padaṃ pūritaṃ. Upādānaṭṭhāne adhimokkheneva. Vicikicchāsampayutte pana
atk-abh02a:1066_5: yasmā sanniṭṭhānābhāvato adhimokkhopi natthi, tasmā taṇhāṭṭhāne balavakilesabhūtāya
atk-abh02a:1066_6: vicikicchāya padaṃ pūritaṃ. Upādānaṭṭhānaṃ parihīnameva. Uddhaccasampayutte pana
atk-abh02a:1066_7: yasmā adhimokkho atthi, tasmā taṇhāṭṭhāne balavakilesena uddhaccena padaṃ pūritaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1066_8: Upādānaṭṭhāne adhimokkheneva. Sabbattheva ca visesamattaṃ dassetvā pāḷi saṃkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1066_9: Yo cāyaṃ viseso dassito, tattha kevalaṃ adhimokkhaniddesova apubbo. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā āgatameva.
atk-abh02a:1067_0: Adhimokkhaniddese pana adhimuccanavasena adhimokkho. Adhimuccati vā tena ārammaṇe
atk-abh02a:1067_1: cittaṃ nibbicikicchatāya sanniṭṭhānaṃ gacchatīti adhimokkho. Adhimuccanākāro adhimuccanā.
atk-abh02a:1067_2: Tassa cittassa, tasmiṃ vā ārammaṇe adhimuttattāti tadadhimuttatā. Sabbacittesu ca
atk-abh02a:1067_3: paṭhamacitte vuttanayeneva nayacatukkavārappabhedo veditabbo. Kevalañhi vicikicchāsampayutte
atk-abh02a:1067_4: upādānamūlakassa nayassa abhāvā aṭṭha nayā, dvattiṃsa catukkāni, aṭṭhavīsādhikañca vārasataṃ hotīti.
atk-abh02a:1070_0: 292. Idāni imināva nayena kusalacittādīsupi paccayākāraṃ dassetuṃ katame dhammā kusalātiādi
atk-abh02a:1070_1: āraddhaṃ. Yathā pana akusale paṭhamaṃ mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā pacchā niddeso kato, na
atk-abh02a:1070_2: tathā idha. Kasmā? Appanāvāre nānattasambhavato. Lokiyakusalādīsu hi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1070_4: lokuttarakusalādīsu “evametesaṃ dhammāna”nti. Tasmā ettha sādhāraṇato mātikaṃ ṭhapetuṃ
atk-abh02a:1070_5: na sakkāti pāṭiyekkaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ kusalādīnaṃ mātikaṃ uddisitvāva niddeso katoti.
atk-abh02a:1071_0: Tattha yasmā ekacittakkhaṇe kusalasaṅkhārena saddhiṃ avijjā natthi, tasmā taṃ avatvā,
atk-abh02a:1071_1: avijjā viya akusalānaṃ, kusalānaṃ mūlato kusalamūlaṃ, taṇhupādānānañca abhāvato taṇhāṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1071_2: taṇhā viya ārammaṇe ajjhogāḷho pasādo, upādānaṭṭhāne upādānaṃ viya daḷhanipātī nāma
atk-abh02a:1071_3: adhimokkho vutto. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh02a:1074_0: 306. Abyākataṃ heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe āgatapaṭipāṭiyāva vibhattaṃ. Sabbavāresu ca
atk-abh02a:1074_1: avijjāmūlakā nayā parihīnā. Kasmā? Avijjāṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbassa abhāvato. Kusalacittesu
atk-abh02a:1074_2: hi avijjāṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbaṃ kusalamūlaṃ atthi, cakkhuviññāṇādīsu natthi. Sahetukesu
atk-abh02a:1074_3: pana kiñcāpi atthi, evaṃ santepi idha pacchinnattā tattha na gahitaṃ. Pañcaviññāṇasote
atk-abh02a:1075_0: Visesato panettha cakkhuviññāṇādīsu taṇhāṭṭhānaṃ upādānaṭṭhānañca parihīnaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1075_1: Taṇhāṭṭhānārahassa balavadhammassa abhāvā adhimokkharahitattā ca. Sesāhetukesu taṇhāṭṭhānameva
atk-abh02a:1075_2: parihīnaṃ. Sahetukesu pasādasabbhāvato taṇhāṭṭhāne pasādena padaṃ pūritaṃ. Evamettha
atk-abh02a:1075_4: cha cha, sesāhetukesu adhimokkhamūlakena saddhiṃ satta satta, sahetukesu pasādamūlakena
atk-abh02a:1076_0: Tattha cakkhuviññāṇādīsupi catunnampi catukkānaṃ ādivārova vutto. Dutiyavāro paccayavisesaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:1076_1: labbhamānopi na vutto. Tatiyacatutthavārā asambhavatoyeva. Rūpamissakā hi te, na
atk-abh02a:1076_2: ca cakkhuviññāṇādīni rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti. Yathā ca paṭhamacatukke dve vārā labbhanti,
atk-abh02a:1076_3: evaṃ sesacatukkesupi. Tasmā paṭhamacatukke dutiyavāro, sesacatukkesu ca dve dve vārā
atk-abh02a:1076_4: avuttāpi vuttāva hontīti veditabbā. Sesāhetukābyākate sabbacatukkesu sabbepi vārā
atk-abh02a:1076_5: labbhanti. Idha pacchinnattā pana parato na gahitā. Sotapatitāva hutvā desanā katāti.
atk-abh02a:1076_6: Sesasahetukavipākesupi eseva nayo aññatra arūpāvacaravipākā. Arūpāvacaravipākasmiñhi
atk-abh02a:1079_0: 334. Idāni aparena pariyāyena ekacittakkhaṇe paccayākāraṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā
atk-abh02a:1079_1: kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha avijjāpaccayāti upanissayapaccayataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1079_2: Teneva niddesavāre “tattha katamā avijjā”ti avibhajitvā “tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā
atk-abh02a:1079_3: saṅkhāro”ti vibhattaṃ. Kusalacetanāsaṅkhāto hi saṅkhāroyeva tasmiṃ samaye cittena
atk-abh02a:1080_0: Tattha lokiyakusalassa heṭṭhā suttantabhājanīye vuttanayeneva avijjā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1080_1: Yasmā pana appahīnāvijjo avijjāya pahānatthaṃ lokuttaraṃ bhāveti, tasmā tassāpi samatikkamavasena
atk-abh02a:1080_2: paccayo hoti. Avijjāvatoyeva hi kusalāyūhanaṃ hoti, na itarassa. Tattha tebhūmakakusale
atk-abh02a:1080_3: sammohavasenapi samatikkamabhāvanāvasenapi āyūhanaṃ labbhati; lokuttare samucchedabhāvanāvasenāti.
atk-abh02a:1081_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā heṭṭhā ekekakusale catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena nava soḷasakā
atk-abh02a:1081_1: laddhā, tathā idha na labbhanti. Kasmā? Avijjāya avigatasampayuttaaññamaññapaccayābhāvato.
atk-abh02a:1081_2: Upanissayavasena panettha paṭhamacatukkameva labbhati. Tampi paṭhamavārameva dassetvā
atk-abh02a:1084_0: 343. Idāni abyākatesupi apareneva nayena paccayākāraṃ dassetuṃ katame dhammā abyākatātiādi
atk-abh02a:1084_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha kusalamūlapaccayāti idampi upanissayapaccayataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1084_2: Kusalavipākassa hi kusalamūlaṃ, akusalavipākassa ca akusalamūlaṃ upanissayapaccayo
atk-abh02a:1084_3: hoti; nānākkhaṇikakammapaccaye pana vattabbameva natthi. Tasmā esa upanissayapaccayena
atk-abh02a:1084_4: ceva nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena ca paccayo hoti. Teneva niddesavāre “tattha katamaṃ
atk-abh02a:1084_5: kusalamūla”nti avibhajitvā “tattha katamo kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro”ti vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1085_0: Avijjāmūlakakusalaniddese viya ca imasmimpi vipākaniddese paṭhamaṃ paccayacatukkameva
atk-abh02a:1085_1: labbhati. Tampi paṭhamavāraṃ dassetvā saṃkhittaṃ. Tasmā ekekasmiṃ vipākacitte ekamekasseva
atk-abh02a:1085_2: catukkassa vasena kusalamūlamūlake akusalamūlamūlake ca naye vārappabhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1085_3: Kiriyādhammānaṃ pana yasmā neva avijjā na kusalākusalamūlāni upanissayapaccayataṃ
atk-abh02a:1085_4: labhanti, tasmā kiriyavasena paccayākāro na vuttoti.
atk-abh02a:1092: Yasmā ñāṇapabhedo, na kadācipi hoti etasmiṃ.
atk-abh02a:1094: Tattha kayirā na haññaṃ, karaṇīyataraṃ tato atthīti.
atk-abh02a:1095: Ayaṃ pana paccayākāro suttantaabhidhammabhājanīyavasena dveparivaṭṭameva nīharitvā bhājetvā dassito hoti.
atk-abh02a:1101_0: 355. Idāni tadanantare satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Tena na tato
atk-abh02a:1101_1: heṭṭhā na uddhanti satipaṭṭhānaparicchedaṃ dīpeti. Satipaṭṭhānāti tayo satipaṭṭhānā
atk-abh02a:1101_2: – satigocaropi, tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭidhānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-abh02a:1101_3: “Catunnaṃ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmi. Taṃ suṇātha…pe…
atk-abh02a:1101_4: ko ca, bhikkhave, kāyassa samudayo? Āhārasamudayā kāyassa samudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro
atk-abh02a:1101_5: satipaṭṭhānanti vuccati. Tathā “kāyo upaṭṭhānaṃ, no sati. Sati upaṭṭhānañceva sati
atk-abh02a:1101_6: cā”tiādīsu. Tassattho – patiṭṭhāti asminti paṭṭhānaṃ. Kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati. Satiyā
atk-abh02a:1101_7: paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ, padhānaṃ ṭhānanti vā paṭṭhānaṃ; satiyā paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1102_0: “Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇaṃ anusāsitumarahatī”ti
atk-abh02a:1102_1: ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā satipaṭṭhānanti
atk-abh02a:1102_2: vuttā. Tassattho – paṭṭhapetabbato paṭṭhānaṃ, pavattayitabbatoti attho. Kena paṭṭhapetabbatoti?
atk-abh02a:1102_3: Satiyā; satiyā paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā
atk-abh02a:1102_4: satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana satiyeva satipaṭṭhānanti vuccati. Tassattho
atk-abh02a:1102_5: – patiṭṭhātīti paṭṭhānaṃ, upaṭṭhāti okkanditvā pakkhanditvā pavattatīti attho; satiyeva
atk-abh02a:1102_6: paṭṭhānaṭṭhena satipaṭṭhānaṃ; athavā saraṇaṭṭhena sati, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena paṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1102_7: Iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Idamidha adhippetaṃ. Yadi evaṃ, kasmā
atk-abh02a:1102_8: satipaṭṭhānāti bahuvacanaṃ katanti? Satiyā bahuttā; ārammaṇabhedena hi bahukā tā satiyoti.
atk-abh02a:1103_0: Kasmā pana bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā, anūnā anadhikāti? Veneyyahitattā.
atk-abh02a:1103_2: pavattesu mandassa taṇhācaritassa oḷārikaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo,
atk-abh02a:1103_3: tikkhassa sukhumaṃ vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ. Diṭṭhicaritassapi mandassa nātippabhedagataṃ
atk-abh02a:1103_5: Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena adhigantabbanimittaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1103_6: visuddhimaggo, tikkhassa oḷārikārammaṇe asaṇṭhahanato dutiyaṃ. Vipassanāyānikassāpi
atk-abh02a:1103_7: mandassa nātippabhedagatārammaṇaṃ tatiyaṃ, tikkhassa atippabhedagatārammaṇaṃ catutthaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1104_0: Subhasukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsappahānatthaṃ vā. Kāyo hi asubho. Tattha subhavipallāsavipallatthā
atk-abh02a:1104_1: sattā. Tesaṃ tattha asubhabhāvadassanena tassa vipallāsassa pahānatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-abh02a:1104_2: satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Sukhaṃ, niccaṃ, attāti gahitesupi ca vedanādīsu vedanā dukkhā,
atk-abh02a:1104_3: cittaṃ aniccaṃ, dhammā anattā. Etesu ca sukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsavipallatthā sattā.
atk-abh02a:1104_4: Tesaṃ tattha dukkhādibhāvadassanena tesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pahānatthaṃ sesāni tīṇi vuttānīti.
atk-abh02a:1104_5: Evaṃ subhasukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsappahānatthaṃ vā cattārova vuttā anūnā anadhikāti
atk-abh02a:1104_6: veditabbā. Na kevalañca vipallāsapahānatthameva, atha kho caturoghayogāsavaganthaupādānaagatippahānatthampi
atk-abh02a:1104_7: catubbidhāhārapariññatthañca cattārova vuttāti veditabbā. Ayaṃ tāva pakaraṇanayo.
atk-abh02a:1105_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1105_1: ārammaṇavasena cattāroti etadeva vuttaṃ. Yathā hi catudvāre nagare pācīnato āgacchantā
atk-abh02a:1105_2: pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti, dakkhiṇato,
atk-abh02a:1105_3: pacchimato, uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena
atk-abh02a:1105_4: nagarameva pavisanti, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Nagaraṃ viya hi nibbānamahānagaraṃ,
atk-abh02a:1105_5: dvāraṃ viya aṭṭhaṅgiko lokuttaramaggo. Pācīnadisādayo viya kāyādayo.
atk-abh02a:1106_0: Yathā pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva
atk-abh02a:1106_1: pavisanti, evaṃ kāyānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā
atk-abh02a:1106_2: kāyānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena ariyamaggena ekaṃ nibbānameva osaranti. Yathā
atk-abh02a:1106_3: dakkhiṇato āgacchantā dakkhiṇadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇadvārena nagarameva
atk-abh02a:1106_4: pavisanti, evaṃ vedanānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā
atk-abh02a:1106_5: vedanānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena ariyamaggena ekaṃ nibbānameva osaranti. Yathā
atk-abh02a:1106_6: pacchimato āgacchantā pacchimadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pacchimadvārena nagarameva
atk-abh02a:1106_7: pavisanti, evaṃ cittānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā
atk-abh02a:1106_8: cittānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena ariyamaggena ekaṃ nibbānameva osaranti. Yathā
atk-abh02a:1106_9: uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva
atk-abh02a:1106_10: pavisanti, evaṃ dhammānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā
atk-abh02a:1106_12: Evaṃ saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena
atk-abh02a:1107_0: Idha bhikkhūti ettha kiñcāpi bhagavatā devaloke nisīditvā ayaṃ satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgo
atk-abh02a:1107_1: kathito, ekabhikkhupi tattha bhagavato santike nisinnako nāma natthi. Evaṃ santepi
atk-abh02a:1107_2: yasmā ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhikkhū bhāventi, bhikkhugocarā hi ete, tasmā idha
atk-abh02a:1107_3: bhikkhūti ālapati. Kiṃ panete satipaṭṭhāne bhikkhūyeva bhāventi, na bhikkhunīādayoti?
atk-abh02a:1107_4: Bhikkhunīādayopi bhāventi. Bhikkhū pana aggaparisā. Iti aggaparisattā idha bhikkhūti
atk-abh02a:1107_5: ālapati. Paṭipattiyā vā bhikkhubhāvadassanato evamāha. Yo hi imaṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-abh02a:1107_6: so bhikkhu nāma hoti. Paṭipannako hi devo vā hotu manusso vā, bhikkhūti saṅkhaṃ gacchatiyeva. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:1111: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti. ;
atk-abh02a:1113_0: Ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tasmā ajjhattaṃ kāyeti attano kāyeti attho.
atk-abh02a:1113_1: Tattha kāyeti rūpakāye. Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca dhammānaṃ samūhaṭṭhena,
atk-abh02a:1113_2: hatthikāyaassakāyarathakāyādayo viya, kāyoti adhippeto. Yathā ca samūhaṭṭhena evaṃ
atk-abh02a:1113_3: kucchitānaṃ āyaṭṭhena. Kucchitānañhi paramajegucchānaṃ so āyotipi kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso.
atk-abh02a:1113_4: Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – āyanti tatoti āyo. Ke āyanti? Kucchitā kesādayo. Iti kucchitānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1114_0: Kāyānupassīti kāyaṃ anupassanasīlo, kāyaṃ vā anupassamāno kāyeti ca vatvāpi puna
atk-abh02a:1114_2: katanti veditabbaṃ. Tena na kāye vedanānupassī cittadhammānupassī vā; atha kho kāye
atk-abh02a:1114_3: kāyānupassī yevāti kāyasaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato
atk-abh02a:1114_4: vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Tathā na kāye aṅgapaccaṅgavinimuttaekadhammānupassī, nāpi
atk-abh02a:1114_6: kāyo, tatthāpi na bhūtupādāyavinimuttaekadhammānupassī; atha kho rathasambhārānupassako
atk-abh02a:1114_8: kadalikkhandhapattavaṭṭivinibhuñjako viya rittamuṭṭhiviniveṭhako viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassīyevāti
atk-abh02a:1114_9: nānappakārato samūhavasena kāyasaṅkhātassa vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito
atk-abh02a:1114_10: hoti. Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci
atk-abh02a:1114_11: dhammo dissati. Yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatteyeva pana tathā tathā sattā micchābhinivesaṃ
atk-abh02a:1115: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati;
atk-abh02a:1116: Apassaṃ bajjhate mūḷho, bajjhamāno na muccatī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1117_0: Ghanavinibbhogādidassanatthanti vuttaṃ. Ādisaddena cettha ayampi attho veditabbo
atk-abh02a:1117_1: – ayañhi etasmiṃ kāye kāyānupassīyeva, na aññadhammānupassī. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā
atk-abh02a:1117_2: anudakabhūtāyapi marīciyā udakānupassino honti, na evaṃ aniccadukkhānattaasubhabhūteyeva
atk-abh02a:1117_3: imasmiṃ kāye niccasukhaattasubhabhāvānupassī; atha kho kāyānupassī aniccadukkhānattaasubhākārasamūhānupassīyevāti
atk-abh02a:1117_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā yvāyaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhāne “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato
atk-abh02a:1117_6: kāyo vutto, yo ca “idhekacco pathavīkāyaṃ aniccato anupassati, tathā āpokāyaṃ, tejokāyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1117_7: vāyokāyaṃ, kesakāyaṃ, lomakāyaṃ, chavikāyaṃ, cammakāyaṃ, maṃsakāyaṃ, rudhirakāyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1117_8: nhārukāyaṃ, aṭṭhikāyaṃ, aṭṭhimiñjakāya”nti paṭisambhidāyaṃ kāyo vutto, tassa sabbassa
atk-abh02a:1117_9: imasmiṃyeva kāye anupassanato kāye kāyānupassīti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a:1118_0: Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā evaṃ gahetabbassa kassaci ananupassanato, tassa
atk-abh02a:1118_1: tasseva pana kesalomādikassa nānādhammasamūhassa anupassanato kāye kesādidhammasamūhasaṅkhāte
atk-abh02a:1118_2: kāyānupassīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Apica “imasmiṃ kāye aniccato anupassati, no niccato”tiādinā
atk-abh02a:1118_3: anukkamena paṭisambhidāyaṃ āgatanayassa sabbasseva aniccalakkhaṇādino ākārasamūhasaṅkhātassa
atk-abh02a:1118_4: kāyassa anupassanatopi kāye kāyānupassīti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a:1119_0: Tathā hi ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu imaṃ kāyaṃ aniccānupassanādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1119_1: sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccato anupassati no niccato, dukkhato anupassati
atk-abh02a:1119_2: no sukhato, anattato anupassati no attato, nibbindati no nandati, virajjati no rajjati,
atk-abh02a:1119_3: nirodheti no samudeti, paṭinissajjati no ādiyati. So taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ
atk-abh02a:1119_4: pajahati, dukkhato anupassanto sukhasaññaṃ pajahati, anattato anupassanto attasaññaṃ
atk-abh02a:1119_5: pajahati, nibbindanto nandiṃ pajahati, virajjanto rāgaṃ pajahati, nirodhento samudayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1120_1: iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aparena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā apatamānaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati pavattetīti attho.
atk-abh02a:1121_0: Bahiddhā kāyeti parassa kāye. Ajjhattabahiddhā kāyeti kālena attano kāye, kālena
atk-abh02a:1121_1: parassa kāye. Paṭhamanayena hi attano kāye kāyapariggaho vutto, dutiyanayena parassa
atk-abh02a:1121_2: kāye, tatiyanayena kālena attano kālena parassa kāye. Ajjhattabahiddhā pana ghaṭitārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1121_3: nāma natthi. Paguṇakammaṭṭhānassa pana aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakālo ettha kathito. Ātāpīti
atk-abh02a:1121_4: kāyapariggāhakavīriyasamāyogaparidīpanametaṃ. So hi yasmā tasmiṃ samaye yaṃ taṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1121_5: tīsu bhavesu kilesānaṃ ātāpanato ātāpoti vuccati, tena samannāgato hoti, tasmā ātāpīti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1122_0: Sampajānoti kāyapariggāhakena sampajaññasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgato. Satimāti kāyapariggāhikāya
atk-abh02a:1122_1: satiyā samannāgato. Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati,
atk-abh02a:1122_2: na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi, tenevāha – “satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a:1122_3: sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti, tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1122_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo antarāyakaro hoti, asampajāno upāyapariggahe
atk-abh02a:1122_5: anupāyaparivajjane ca sammuyhati, muṭṭhassatī upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca
atk-abh02a:1122_6: asamatthova hoti, tenassa taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajjati; tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena
atk-abh02a:1122_7: taṃ sampajjati tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “ātāpī sampajāno satimā”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1123_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sampayogaṅgañca dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh02a:1123_1: vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṃ. Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena
atk-abh02a:1123_2: vā vinayitvā. Loketi ettha yvāyaṃ ajjhattādibhedo kāyo pariggahito sveva idha loko
atk-abh02a:1123_3: nāma. Tasmiṃ loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ vinayitvāti attho. Yasmā panettha abhijjhāgahaṇena
atk-abh02a:1123_4: kāmacchando, domanassaggahaṇena byāpādo saṅgahaṃ gacchati, tasmā nīvaraṇapariyāpannabalavadhammadvayadassanena
atk-abh02a:1124_0: Visesena cettha abhijjhāvinayena kāyasampattimūlakassa anurodhassa, domanassavinayena
atk-abh02a:1124_1: kāyavipattimūlakassa virodhassa, abhijjhāvinayena ca kāye abhiratiyā, domanassavinayena
atk-abh02a:1124_2: kāyabhāvanāya anabhiratiyā, abhijjhāvinayena kāye abhūtānaṃ subhasukhabhāvādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1124_3: pakkhepassa, domanassavinayena kāye bhūtānaṃ asubhāsukhabhāvādīnaṃ apanayanassa ca
atk-abh02a:1124_4: pahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena yogāvacarassa yogānubhāvo yogasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti. Yogānubhāvo
atk-abh02a:1124_5: hi esa yadidaṃ anurodhavirodhavippamutto, aratiratisaho, abhūtapakkhepabhūtāpanayanavirahito
atk-abh02a:1124_6: ca hoti. Anurodhavirodhavippamutto cesa aratiratisaho abhūtaṃ apakkhipanto bhūtañca
atk-abh02a:1125_0: Aparo nayo – “kāye kāyānupassī”ti ettha anupassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Viharatīti
atk-abh02a:1125_1: ettha vuttavihārena kammaṭṭhānikassa kāyapariharaṇaṃ. Ātāpītiādīsu ātāpena sammappadhānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1125_2: satisampajaññena sabbatthikakammaṭṭhānaṃ, kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇūpāyo vā; satiyā vā
atk-abh02a:1125_4: bhāvanāphalaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānuddesassa atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh02a:1127_1: hi attano vedanādīsu, parassa vedanādīsu, kālena attano kālena parassa vedanādīsūti
atk-abh02a:1127_2: tividho pariggaho vutto. Vedanāsu vedanānupassītiādīsu ca vedanādīnaṃ punavacane
atk-abh02a:1127_3: payojanaṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Vedanāsu vedanānupassī, citte
atk-abh02a:1127_4: cittānupassī, dhammesu dhammānupassīti ettha pana vedanāti tisso vedanā. Tā ca lokiyā
atk-abh02a:1127_5: eva; cittampi lokiyaṃ, tathā dhammā. Tesaṃ vibhāgo niddesavāre pākaṭo bhavissati.
atk-abh02a:1127_6: Kevalaṃ panidha yathā vedanā anupassitabbā tathā anupassanto “vedanāsu vedanānupassī”ti
atk-abh02a:1127_7: veditabbo. Esa nayo cittadhammesu. Kathañca vedanā anupassitabbāti? Sukhā tāva vedanā
atk-abh02a:1127_8: dukkhato, dukkhā sallato, adukkhamasukhā aniccato. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:1130: Sa ve sammadaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti. ;
atk-abh02a:1131_0: Sabbā eva cetā dukkhātipi anupassitabbā. Vuttañcetaṃ – “yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti
atk-abh02a:1131_1: vadāmī”ti. Sukhadukkhatopi ca anupassitabbā, yathāha – “sukhā kho, āvuso visākha,
atk-abh02a:1131_2: vedanā ṭhitisukhā, vipariṇāmadukkhā”ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Apica aniccādisattānupassanāvasenapi
atk-abh02a:1132_1: aniccādinupassanānaṃ niddesavāre āgatasarāgādibhedānañca vasena anupassitabbaṃ. Dhammā
atk-abh02a:1132_3: āgatasantāsantādibhedānañca vasena anupassitabbā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Kāmañcettha
atk-abh02a:1132_4: yassa kāyasaṅkhāte loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīnaṃ, tassa vedanādilokesupi taṃ pahīnameva.
atk-abh02a:1132_6: Yato vā ekattha pahīnaṃ, sesesupi pahīnaṃ hoti. Tenevassa tattha pahānadassanatthampi
atk-abh02a:1135_1: upakaraṇāni kattukāmo ekaṃ mahāveḷuṃ labhitvā catudhā chinditvā tato ekekaṃ veḷukhaṇḍaṃ
atk-abh02a:1135_2: gahetvā phāletvā taṃ taṃ upakaraṇaṃ kareyya, yathā vā pana cheko suvaṇṇakāro nānāvihitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1135_3: piḷandhanavikatiṃ kattukāmo suparisuddhaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭikaṃ labhitvā catudhā bhinditvā
atk-abh02a:1135_4: tato ekekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā taṃ taṃ piḷandhanaṃ kareyya, evameva bhagavā satipaṭṭhānadesanāya
atk-abh02a:1135_5: sattānaṃ anekappakāraṃ visesādhigamaṃ kattukāmo ekameva sammāsatiṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
atk-abh02a:1135_6: – idha bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇavasena
atk-abh02a:1135_7: catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vibhajanto kathañca bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ
atk-abh02a:1136_0: Tattha kathañcātiādi vitthāretuṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho
atk-abh02a:1136_1: – kena ca ākārena kena pakārena bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharatīti? Sesapucchāvāresupi
atk-abh02a:1136_2: eseva nayo. Idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu. Ayañhettha idha-saddo ajjhattādivasena
atk-abh02a:1136_4: aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano ca. Vuttañhetaṃ – “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe…
atk-abh02a:1136_5: suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti. Tena vuttaṃ “imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhū”ti.
atk-abh02a:1137_0: Ajjhattaṃ kāyanti attano kāyaṃ. Uddhaṃ pādatalāti pādatalato upari. Adho kesamatthakāti
atk-abh02a:1137_1: kesaggato heṭṭhā. Tacapariyantanti tiriyaṃ tacaparicchinnaṃ. Pūraṃ nānappakārassa
atk-abh02a:1137_2: asucino paccavekkhatīti nānappakārakesādiasucibharito ayaṃ kāyoti passati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:1137_3: Atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā…pe… muttanti. Tattha atthīti saṃvijjanti. Imasminti yvāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1137_4: uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tiriyaṃ tacapariyanto pūro nānappakārassa asucinoti
atk-abh02a:1137_5: vuccati tasmiṃ. Kāyeti sarīre. Sarīrañhi asucisañcayato kucchitānaṃ kesādīnañceva
atk-abh02a:1138_0: Kesā lomāti ete kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā. Tattha atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā, atthi imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1138_1: kāye lomāti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo. Imasmiñhi pādatalato paṭṭhāya upari, kesamatthakā
atk-abh02a:1138_2: paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā, tacato paṭṭhāya tiriyantatoti ettake byāmamatte kaḷevare sabbākārenapi
atk-abh02a:1138_3: vicinanto na koci kiñci muttaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā veḷuriyaṃ vā agaruṃ vā kuṅkumaṃ vā kappūraṃ
atk-abh02a:1138_4: vā vāsacuṇṇādiṃ vā aṇumattampi sucibhāvaṃ passati, atha kho paramaduggandhajegucchaṃ
atk-abh02a:1138_5: assirīkadassanaṃ nānappakāraṃ kesalomādibhedaṃ asuciṃyeva passati. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1138_6: atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā…pe… muttanti. Ayamettha padasambandhato vaṇṇanā.
atk-abh02a:1139_0: Imaṃ pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇitukāmena kulaputtena āditova catubbidhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1139_1: sīlaṃ sodhetvā suparisuddhasīle patiṭṭhitena, yvāyaṃ dasasu palibodhesu palibodho
atk-abh02a:1139_2: atthi taṃ upacchinditvā, paṭikkūlamanasikārakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā,
atk-abh02a:1139_3: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā, arahattaṃ anāgāmiphalādīsu vā aññataraṃ
atk-abh02a:1139_4: pattassa sabbantimena paricchedena sāṭṭhakathāya pāḷiyā kataparicayassa tantiācariyassāpi
atk-abh02a:1139_5: kalyāṇamittassa santike uggahetabbaṃ. Visuddhaṃ tathārūpaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ ekavihāre
atk-abh02a:1139_6: alabhantena tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā uggahetabbaṃ. Tattha catubbidhasīlavisodhanañceva
atk-abh02a:1139_7: palibodho ca palibodhupacchedo ca ācariyassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamanavidhānañca sabbampi
atk-abh02a:1139_8: visuddhimagge vitthārato kathitaṃ. Tasmā taṃ tattha kathitanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1140_0: Ācariyena pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena tividhena kathetabbaṃ. Eko bhikkhu pakatiyā
atk-abh02a:1140_1: uggahitakammaṭṭhāno hoti. Tassa ekaṃ dve nisajjavāre sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1140_2: Eko santike vasitvā uggaṇhitukāmo hoti. Tassa āgatāgatavelāya kathetabbaṃ. Eko uggaṇhitvā
atk-abh02a:1140_3: aññattha gantukāmo hoti. Tassa nātipapañcaṃ nātisaṅkhepaṃ katvā nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhikaṃ
atk-abh02a:1140_4: kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbaṃ. Kathentena kiṃ ācikkhitabbanti? Sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ
atk-abh02a:1141_0: Tattha vacasā manasā vaṇṇato saṇṭhānato disato okāsato paricchedatoti evaṃ sattadhā
atk-abh02a:1141_1: uggahakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Imasmiñhi paṭikkūlamanasikārakammaṭṭhāne yopi tipiṭako
atk-abh02a:1141_2: hoti, tenapi manasikārakāle paṭhamaṃ vācāya sajjhāyo kātabbo. Ekaccassa hi sajjhāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1141_3: karontasseva kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, malayavāsīmahādevattherassa santike uggahitakammaṭṭhānānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1141_4: dvinnaṃ therānaṃ viya. Thero kira tehi kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācito ‘cattāro māse imaṃ evaṃ
atk-abh02a:1141_5: sajjhāyaṃ karothā’ti dvattisākārapāḷiṃ adāsi. Te, kiñcāpi tesaṃ dve tayo nikāyā paguṇā,
atk-abh02a:1141_6: padakkhiṇaggāhitāya pana cattāro māse dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyantāva sotāpannā ahesuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1142_0: Tasmā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena ācariyena antevāsiko vattabbo – ‘paṭhamaṃ tāva vācāya
atk-abh02a:1142_1: sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti. Karontena ca tacapañcakādīni paricchinditvā anulomapaṭilomavasena
atk-abh02a:1142_2: sajjhāyo kātabbo. “Kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco”ti hi vatvā puna paṭilomato “taco dantā
atk-abh02a:1142_3: nakhā lomā kesā”ti vattabbaṃ. Tadanantaraṃ vakkapañcake “maṃsaṃ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ
atk-abh02a:1142_4: vakka”nti vatvā puna paṭilomato “vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsaṃ taco dantā
atk-abh02a:1142_5: nakhā lomā kesā”ti vattabbaṃ. Tato papphāsapañcake “hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakaṃ pihakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1142_6: papphāsa”nti vatvā puna paṭilomato “papphāsaṃ pihakaṃ kilomakaṃ yakanaṃ hadayaṃ vakkaṃ
atk-abh02a:1142_7: aṭṭhimiñjaṃ aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsaṃ taco dantā nakhā lomā kesā”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1143_0: Tato imaṃ tantiṃ anāruḷhampi paṭisambhidāmagge āgataṃ matthaluṅgaṃ karīsāvasāne tantiṃ
atk-abh02a:1143_1: āropetvā imasmiṃ matthaluṅgapañcake “antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariyaṃ karīsaṃ matthaluṅga”nti
atk-abh02a:1143_2: vatvā puna paṭilomato “matthaluṅgaṃ karīsaṃ udariyaṃ antaguṇaṃ antaṃ papphāsaṃ pihakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1143_3: kilomakaṃ yakanaṃ hadayaṃ vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsaṃ taco dantā nakhā
atk-abh02a:1144_0: Tato medachakke “pittaṃ semhaṃ pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medo”ti vatvā puna paṭilomato “medo
atk-abh02a:1144_1: sedo lohitaṃ pubbo semhaṃ pittaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ karīsaṃ udariyaṃ antaguṇaṃ antaṃ papphāsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1144_2: pihakaṃ kilomakaṃ yakanaṃ hadayaṃ vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsaṃ taco dantā
atk-abh02a:1145_0: Tato muttachakke “assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā mutta”nti vatvā puna paṭilomato
atk-abh02a:1145_1: “muttaṃ lasikā siṅghāṇikā kheḷo vasā assu medo sedo lohitaṃ pubbo semhaṃ pittaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ
atk-abh02a:1145_2: karīsaṃ udariyaṃ antaguṇaṃ antaṃ papphāsaṃ pihakaṃ kilomakaṃ yakanaṃ hadayaṃ vakkaṃ
atk-abh02a:1145_3: aṭṭhimiñjaṃ aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsaṃ taco dantā nakhā lomā kesā”ti evaṃ kālasatampi kālasahassampi
atk-abh02a:1145_4: kālasatasahassampi vācāya sajjhāyo kātabbo. Vacasā sajjhāyena hi kammaṭṭhānatanti
atk-abh02a:1145_5: paguṇā hoti; na ito cito ca cittaṃ vidhāvati; koṭṭhāsā pākaṭā honti, hatthasaṅkhalikā
atk-abh02a:1145_6: viya khāyanti, vatipādapanti viya ca khāyanti. Yathā ca pana vacasā, tatheva manasāpi
atk-abh02a:1145_7: sajjhāyo kātabbo. Vacasā sajjhāyo hi manasā sajjhāyassa paccayo hoti. Manasā sajjhāyo
atk-abh02a:1145_8: lakkhaṇapaṭivedhassa paccayo hoti. Lakkhaṇapaṭivedho maggaphalapaṭivedhassa paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1146_0: ‘Vaṇṇato’ti kesādīnaṃ vaṇṇo vavatthapetabbo. ‘Saṇṭhānato’ti tesaṃyeva saṇṭhānaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1146_1: ‘Disato’ti imasmiṃ sarīre nābhito uddhaṃ uparimā disā, adho heṭṭhimā disā. Tasmā
atk-abh02a:1146_2: “ayaṃ koṭṭhāso imissā nāma disāyā”ti disā vavatthapetabbā. ‘Okāsato’ti “ayaṃ koṭṭhāso
atk-abh02a:1146_3: imasmiṃ nāma okāse patiṭṭhito”ti evaṃ tassa tassa okāso vavatthapetabbo. ‘Paricchedato’ti
atk-abh02a:1146_4: sabhāgaparicchedo visabhāgaparicchedoti dve paricchedā. Tattha “ayaṃ koṭṭhāso heṭṭhā
atk-abh02a:1146_5: ca upari ca tiriyañca iminā nāma paricchinno”ti evaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1146_6: “Kesā na lomā, lomāpi na kesā”ti evaṃ amissīkatavasena visabhāgaparicchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1147_0: Evaṃ sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ ācikkhantena pana “idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ asukasmiṃ sutte
atk-abh02a:1147_1: paṭikkūlavasena kathitaṃ, asukasmiṃ dhātuvasenā”ti ñatvā ācikkhitabbaṃ. Idañhi mahāsatipaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1147_3: kathitaṃ. Kāyagatāsatisutte pana yassa vaṇṇato upaṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāya cattāri jhānāni
atk-abh02a:1147_4: vibhattāni. Tattha dhātuvasena kathitaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, paṭikkūlavasena
atk-abh02a:1147_5: kathitaṃ samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Tadetaṃ idha samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ avisesato sabbasādhāraṇavasena
atk-abh02a:1148_0: Evaṃ sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ ācikkhitvā “anupubbato, nātisīghato, nātisaṇikato, vikkhepapaṭibāhanato,
atk-abh02a:1148_1: paṇṇattisamatikkamanato, anupubbamuñcanato, appanāto, tayo ca suttantā”ti evaṃ dasadhā
atk-abh02a:1148_2: manasikārakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Tattha ‘anupubbato’ti idañhi sajjhāyakaraṇato paṭṭhāya
atk-abh02a:1148_3: anupaṭipāṭiyā manasikātabbaṃ, na ekantarikāya. Ekantarikāya hi manasikaronto yathā
atk-abh02a:1148_4: nāma akusalo puriso dvattiṃsapadaṃ nisseṇiṃ ekantarikāya ārohanto kilantakāyo patati,
atk-abh02a:1148_5: na ārohanaṃ sampādeti; evameva bhāvanāsampattivasena adhigantabbassa assādassa anadhigamā
atk-abh02a:1149_0: Anupubbato manasikarontenāpi ca ‘nātisīghato’ manasikātabbaṃ. Atisīghato manasikaroto
atk-abh02a:1149_1: hi yathā nāma tiyojanaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā okkamanavissajjanaṃ asallakkhetvā sīghena
atk-abh02a:1149_2: javena sattakkhattumpi gamanāgamanaṃ karoto purisassa kiñcāpi addhānaṃ parikkhayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1149_3: gacchati, atha kho pucchitvāva gantabbaṃ hoti; evameva kevalaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1149_4: pāpuṇāti, avibhūtaṃ pana hoti, na visesaṃ āvahati. Tasmā nātisīghato manasikātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1150_0: Yathā ca nātisīghato evaṃ ‘nātisaṇikato’pi. Atisaṇikato manasikaroto hi yathā nāma
atk-abh02a:1150_1: tadaheva tiyojanaṃ maggaṃ gantukāmassa purisassa antarāmagge rukkhapabbatagahanādīsu
