atk-abh02a:1150_2: vilambamānassa maggo parikkhayaṃ na gacchati, dvīhatīhena pariyosāpetabbo hoti; evameva
atk-abh02a:1150_3: kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchati, visesādhigamassa paccayo na hoti.
atk-abh02a:1151_1: vikkhepo paṭibāhitabbo. Appaṭibāhato hi yathā nāma ekapadikaṃ papātamaggaṃ paṭipannassa
atk-abh02a:1151_2: purisassa akkamanapadaṃ asallakkhetvā ito cito ca vilokayato padavāro virajjhati,
atk-abh02a:1151_3: tato sataporise papāte patitabbaṃ hoti; evameva bahiddhā vikkhepe sati kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1152_0: ‘Paṇṇattisamatikkamanato’ti yā ayaṃ “kesā lomā”ti ādikā paṇṇatti taṃ atikkamitvā
atk-abh02a:1152_1: paṭikkūlanti cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ. Yathā hi udakadullabhakāle manussā araññe udapānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1152_2: disvā tattha tālapaṇṇādikaṃ kiñcideva saññāṇaṃ bandhitvā tena saññāṇena āgantvā nhāyanti
atk-abh02a:1152_3: ceva pivanti ca, yadā pana tesaṃ abhiṇhasañcārena āgatāgatapadaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, tadā
atk-abh02a:1152_4: saññāṇena kiccaṃ na hoti, icchiticchitakkhaṇe gantvā nhāyanti ceva pivanti ca; evameva
atk-abh02a:1152_5: pubbabhāge ‘kesā lomā’ti paṇṇattivasena manasikaroto paṭikkūlabhāvo pākaṭo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1152_6: Atha ‘kesā lomā’ti paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamitvā paṭikkūlabhāveyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1153_0: ‘Anupubbamuñcanato’ti yo yo koṭṭhāso na upaṭṭhāti, taṃ taṃ muñcantena anupubbamuñcanato
atk-abh02a:1153_1: manasikātabbaṃ. Ādikammikassa hi ‘kesā’ti manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā ‘mutta’nti
atk-abh02a:1153_2: imaṃ pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhati. ‘Mutta’nti ca manasikaroto manasikāro
atk-abh02a:1153_3: gantvā ‘kesā’ti imaṃ ādikoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhati. Athassa manasikaroto keci koṭṭhāsā
atk-abh02a:1153_4: upaṭṭhahanti, keci na upaṭṭhahanti. Tena ye ye upaṭṭhahanti tesu tesu tāva kammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1153_5: kātabbaṃ, yāva dvīsu upaṭṭhitesu tesampi eko suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhahati. Evaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1153_6: pana tameva punappunaṃ manasikarontena appanā uppādetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1154_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – yathā hi dvattiṃsatālake tālavane vasantaṃ makkaṭaṃ gahetukāmo luddo
atk-abh02a:1154_1: ādimhi ṭhitatālassa paṇṇaṃ sarena vijjhitvā ukkuṭṭhiṃ kareyya; atha so makkaṭo paṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh02a:1154_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ tāle patitvā pariyantatālameva gaccheyya; tatthapi gantvā luddena tatheva
atk-abh02a:1154_3: kate puna teneva nayena āditālaṃ āgaccheyya; so evaṃ punappunaṃ paṭipāṭiyā gacchanto
atk-abh02a:1154_4: ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāneyeva uṭṭhahitvā puna anukkamena ekasmiṃ tāle nipatitvā tassa
atk-abh02a:1154_5: vemajjhe makuḷatālapaṇṇasūciṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā vijjhiyamānopi na uṭṭhaheyya, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1155_0: Tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – yathā hi tālavane dvattiṃsatālā, evaṃ imasmiṃ kāye dvattiṃsa
atk-abh02a:1155_1: koṭṭhāsā; makkaṭo viya cittaṃ; luddo viya yogāvacaro; makkaṭassa dvattiṃsatālake
atk-abh02a:1155_2: tālavane nivāso viya yogino cittassa dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsake kāye ārammaṇavasena anusaṃcaraṇaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1155_3: luddena ādimhi ṭhitatālassa paṇṇaṃ sarena vijjhitvā ukkuṭṭhiyā katāya makkaṭassa
atk-abh02a:1155_4: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ tāle patitvā pariyantatālagamanaṃ viya yogino ‘kesā’ti manasikāre āraddhe
atk-abh02a:1155_5: paṭipāṭiyā gantvā pariyosānakoṭṭhāse eva cittassa saṇṭhānaṃ; puna paccāgamanepi eseva
atk-abh02a:1155_6: nayo; punappunaṃ paṭipāṭiyā gacchamānassa makkaṭassa ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāne uṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1155_7: viya punappunaṃ manasikaroto kesuci kesuci upaṭṭhitesu anupaṭṭhahante vissajjetvā
atk-abh02a:1155_8: upaṭṭhitesu parikammakaraṇaṃ; anukkamena ekasmiṃ tāle nipatitvā tassa vemajjhe makuḷatālapaṇṇasūciṃ
atk-abh02a:1155_9: daḷhaṃ gahetvā vijjhiyamānassāpi anuṭṭhānaṃ viya avasāne dvīsu upaṭṭhitesu yo suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-abh02a:1155_10: upaṭṭhāti tameva punappunaṃ manasikaritvā appanāya uppādanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1156_0: Aparāpi upamā – yathā nāma piṇḍapātiko bhikkhu dvattiṃsakulaṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vasanto
atk-abh02a:1156_1: paṭhamagehe eva dve bhikkhā labhitvā parato ekaṃ vissajjeyya; punadivase tisso labhitvā
atk-abh02a:1156_2: parato dve vissajjeyya; tatiyadivase ādimhiyeva pattapūraṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā
atk-abh02a:1156_3: paribhuñjeyya, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dvattiṃsakulagāmo viya hi dvattiṃsākāro;
atk-abh02a:1156_4: piṇḍapātiko viya yogāvacaro; tassa taṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vāso viya yogino dvattiṃsākāre
atk-abh02a:1156_5: parikammakaraṇaṃ; paṭhamagehe dve bhikkhā labhitvā parato ekissā vissajjanaṃ viya
atk-abh02a:1156_6: dutiyadivase tisso labhitvā parato dvinnaṃ vissajjanaṃ viya ca manasikaroto manasikaroto
atk-abh02a:1156_7: anupaṭṭhahante anupaṭṭhahante vissajjetvā upaṭṭhitesu upaṭṭhitesu yāva koṭṭhāsadvaye
atk-abh02a:1156_8: parikammakaraṇaṃ; tatiyadivase ādimhiyeva pattapūraṃ labhitvā āsanasālāyaṃ nisīditvā
atk-abh02a:1156_9: paribhogo viya dvīsu yo suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhahati tameva punappunaṃ manasikaritvā appanāya uppādanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1157: ‘Appanāto’ti appanākoṭṭhāsato. Kesādīsu ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse appanā hotīti veditabbāti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-abh02a:1158: ‘Tayo ca suttantā’ti adhicittaṃ, sītibhāvo, bojjhaṅgakosallanti ime tayo suttantā vīriyasamādhiyojanatthaṃ veditabbāti ayamettha adhippāyo. Tattha –
atk-abh02a:1159_0: “Adhicittamanuyuttena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā tīṇi nimittāni kālena kālaṃ manasikātabbāni…kālena
atk-abh02a:1159_1: kālaṃ samādhinimittaṃ manasikātabbaṃ, kālena kālaṃ paggahanimittaṃ manasikātabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1159_2: kālena kālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasikātabbaṃ. Sace, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto
atk-abh02a:1159_3: bhikkhu ekantaṃ samādhinimittaṃyeva manasikareyya, ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyya.
atk-abh02a:1159_4: Sace, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekantaṃ paggahanimittaṃyeva manasikareyya,
atk-abh02a:1159_5: ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvatteyya. Sace, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu
atk-abh02a:1159_6: ekantaṃ upekkhānimittaṃyeva manasikareyya, ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na sammāsamādhiyeyya
atk-abh02a:1159_7: āsavānaṃ khayāya. Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ
atk-abh02a:1159_8: samādhinimittaṃ, paggahanimittaṃ, upekkhānimittaṃ manasikaroti, taṃ hoti cittaṃ mudu
atk-abh02a:1159_9: ca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca, na ca pabhaṅgu, sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāya.
atk-abh02a:1160_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā ukkaṃ bandhati, ukkaṃ
atk-abh02a:1160_1: bandhitvā ukkāmukhaṃ ālimpeti, ukkāmukhaṃ ālimpetvā saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṃ gahetvā ukkāmukhe
atk-abh02a:1160_2: pakkhipeyya, ukkāmukhe pakkhipitvā kālena kālaṃ abhidhamati, kālena kālaṃ udakena
atk-abh02a:1160_3: paripphoseti, kālena kālaṃ ajjhupekkhati. Sace, bhikkhave, suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī
atk-abh02a:1160_4: vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ abhidhameyya, ṭhānaṃ taṃ jātarūpaṃ ḍaheyya. Sace, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a:1160_5: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ udakena paripphoseyya,
atk-abh02a:1160_6: ṭhānaṃ taṃ jātarūpaṃ nibbāyeyya. Sace, bhikkhave, suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī
atk-abh02a:1160_7: vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ ajjhupekkheyya, ṭhānaṃ taṃ jātarūpaṃ na sammā paripākaṃ gaccheyya.
atk-abh02a:1161_0: “Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ kālena
atk-abh02a:1161_1: kālaṃ abhidhamati, kālena kālaṃ udakena paripphoseti, kālena kālaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
atk-abh02a:1161_2: taṃ hoti jātarūpaṃ mudu ca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca, na ca pabhaṅgu, sammā upeti
atk-abh02a:1161_3: kammāya; yassā yassā ca piḷandhanavikatiyā ākaṅkhati – yadi paṭṭikāya yadi kuṇḍalāya
atk-abh02a:1161_4: yadi gīveyyakāya yadi suvaṇṇamālāya, tañcassa atthaṃ anubhoti.
atk-abh02a:1162_0: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyuttena…pe… sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāya;
atk-abh02a:1162_1: yassa yassa ca abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṃ abhininnāmeti abhiññā sacchikiriyāya,
atk-abh02a:1162_2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”ti idaṃ suttaṃ adhicittanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1163_0: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anuttaraṃ sītibhāvaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1163_1: Katamehi chahi? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1163_2: samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti, yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ
atk-abh02a:1163_3: paggaṇhāti, yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃsitabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃseti,
atk-abh02a:1163_4: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati, paṇītādhimuttiko
atk-abh02a:1163_5: ca hoti nibbānābhirato ca. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu
atk-abh02a:1163_6: bhabbo anuttaraṃ sītibhāvaṃ sacchikātu”nti idaṃ suttaṃ sītibhāvoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1164_0: Bojjhaṅgakosallaṃ pana “evameva kho, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1164_1: akālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”ti saṃyuttamahāvagge bojjhaṅgasaṃyutte āgatameva.
atk-abh02a:1165_0: Iti idaṃ sattavidhaṃ uggahakosallaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā imañca dasavidhaṃ manasikārakosallaṃ
atk-abh02a:1165_1: suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā tena yoginā ubhayakosallavasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1165_2: Sace panassa ācariyena saddhiṃ ekavihāreyeva phāsu hoti, evaṃ vitthārena akathāpetvā
atk-abh02a:1165_3: kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjantena visesaṃ labhitvā uparūpari kathāpetabbaṃ. Aññattha vasitukāmena
atk-abh02a:1165_4: yathāvuttena vidhinā vitthārato kathāpetvā punappunaṃ parivattetvā sabbaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1165_5: chinditvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ pahāya mahāvāsatādiaṭṭhārasadosavajjite
atk-abh02a:1165_6: anurūpe vihāre viharantena khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ katvā yo tāva rāgacarito hoti,
atk-abh02a:1165_7: tena yasmā rāgo pahātabbo, tasmā paṭikkūlamanasikāre parikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1166_0: Karontena pana kesesu tāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ vā dve vā kese luñcitvā
atk-abh02a:1166_1: hatthatale ṭhapetvā vaṇṇo tāva vavatthapetabbo. Chinnaṭṭhānepi kese oloketuṃ vaṭṭati;
atk-abh02a:1166_2: udakapatte vā yāgupatte vā oloketumpi vaṭṭatiyeva. Kāḷakakāle disvā kāḷakāti manasikātabbā;
atk-abh02a:1166_3: setakāle setāti. Missakakāle pana ussadavasena manasikātabbā honti. Yathā ca kesesu,
atk-abh02a:1166_4: evaṃ sakalepi tacapañcake disvāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā sabbakoṭṭhāsesu
atk-abh02a:1167_0: Tatrāyaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu anupubbakathā – kesā tāva pakativaṇṇena kāḷakā addāriṭṭhakavaṇṇā,
atk-abh02a:1167_1: saṇṭhānato dīghavaṭṭalikā tulādaṇḍasaṇṭhānā, disato uparimadisāya jātā, okāsato ubhosu
atk-abh02a:1167_2: passesu kaṇṇacūḷikāhi, purato nalāṭantena, pacchato galavāṭakena paricchinnā. Sīsakaṭāhaveṭhanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1167_3: allacammaṃ kesānaṃ okāso. Paricchedato kesā sīsaveṭhanacamme vīhaggamattaṃ pavisitvā
atk-abh02a:1167_4: patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano mūlatalena, upari ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā.
atk-abh02a:1167_5: Dve kesā ekato natthīti ayaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo.
atk-abh02a:1168: ‘Kesā na lomā, lomā na kesā’ti evaṃ avasesehi ekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsehi amissīkatā kesā nāma pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāsoti ayaṃ visabhāgaparicchedo. Idaṃ kesānaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthāpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1169_0: Idaṃ pana tesaṃ vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlato vavatthāpanaṃ – kesā ca nāmete
atk-abh02a:1169_1: vaṇṇatopi paṭikkūlā, saṇṭhānatopi gandhatopi āsayatopi okāsatopi paṭikkūlā. Manuññepi
atk-abh02a:1169_2: hi yāgupatte vā bhattapatte vā kesavaṇṇaṃ kiñci disvā ‘kesamissakamidaṃ, haratha
atk-abh02a:1169_3: na’nti jigucchanti. Evaṃ kesā vaṇṇato paṭikkūlā. Rattiṃ bhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1169_4: akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ vā chupitvāpi tatheva jigucchanti. Evaṃ saṇṭhānato paṭikkūlā.
atk-abh02a:1170_1: tato jegucchataro aggimhi pakkhittānaṃ. Kesā hi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikkūlāpi siyuṃ,
atk-abh02a:1170_2: gandhena pana paṭikkūlāyeva. Yathā hi daharassa kumārassa vaccaṃ vaṇṇato haḷiddivaṇṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1170_4: vaṇṇato tālapakkavaṇṇaṃ, saṇṭhānato vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamudiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ, dāṭhāpissa
atk-abh02a:1170_5: sumanamakuḷasadisāti ubhayampi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikkūlaṃ, gandhena pana paṭikkūlameva;
atk-abh02a:1170_6: evaṃ kesāpi siyuṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikkūlā, gandhena pana paṭikkūlā evāti.
atk-abh02a:1171_0: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni
atk-abh02a:1171_2: atijegucchāti idaṃ nesaṃ ‘āsayato’ pāṭikulyaṃ. Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇikaṃ
atk-abh02a:1171_3: viya ekattiṃsakoṭṭhāsarāsimhi jātā. Te susānasaṅkāraṭṭhānādīsu jātasākaṃ viya, parikhādīsu
atk-abh02a:1171_4: jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ viya ca asuciṭṭhāne jātattā paramajegucchāti idaṃ tesaṃ
atk-abh02a:1172_0: Yathā ca kesānaṃ, evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsānaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā
atk-abh02a:1172_1: paṭikkūlatā vavatthapetabbā. Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena pana sabbepi visuṃ
atk-abh02a:1173_0: Tattha lomā tāva pakativaṇṇato na kesā viya asambhinnakāḷakā, kāḷapiṅgalā pana honti;
atk-abh02a:1173_1: saṇṭhānato onataggatālamūlasaṇṭhānā; disato dvīsu disāsu jātā; okāsato ṭhapetvā kesānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1173_2: patiṭṭhitokāsañca hatthapādatalāni ca yebhuyyena avasesasarīraveṭhanacamme jātā;
atk-abh02a:1173_3: paricchedato sarīraveṭhanacamme likkhāmattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano
atk-abh02a:1173_4: mūlatalena, upari ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā. Dve lomā ekato natthi.
atk-abh02a:1173_5: Ayaṃ tesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
atk-abh02a:1174_0: Nakhāti vīsatiyā nakhapaṭṭānaṃ nāmaṃ. Te sabbepi vaṇṇato setā; saṇṭhānato macchasakalikasaṇṭhānā;
atk-abh02a:1174_1: disato pādanakhā heṭṭhimadisāya jātā, hatthanakhā uparimadisāyāti dvīsu disāsu jātā;
atk-abh02a:1174_2: okāsato aṅgulīnaṃ aggapiṭṭhesu patiṭṭhitā; paricchedato dvīsu disāsu aṅgulikoṭimaṃsehi,
atk-abh02a:1174_3: anto aṅgulipiṭṭhimaṃsena, bahi ceva agge ca ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā.
atk-abh02a:1174_4: Dve nakhā ekato natthi. Ayaṃ nesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
atk-abh02a:1175_0: Dantāti paripuṇṇadantassa dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhikāni. Tepi vaṇṇato setā; saṇṭhānato
atk-abh02a:1175_1: anekasaṇṭhānā. Tesañhi heṭṭhimāya tāva dantapāḷiyā majjhe cattāro dantā mattikāpiṇḍe
atk-abh02a:1175_2: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaalābubījasaṇṭhānā. Tesaṃ ubhosu passesu ekeko ekamūlako ekakoṭiko
atk-abh02a:1175_3: mallikamakuḷasaṇṭhāno. Tato ekeko dvimūlako dvikoṭiko yānakaupatthambhanikasaṇṭhāno.
atk-abh02a:1175_4: Tato dve dve timūlā tikoṭikā. Tato dve dve catumūlā catukoṭikāti. Uparimapāḷiyāpi
atk-abh02a:1175_5: eseva nayo. Disato uparimadisāya jātā. Okāsato dvīsu hanukaṭṭhikesu patiṭṭhitā. Paricchedato
atk-abh02a:1175_6: heṭṭhā hanukaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitena attano mūlatalena, upari ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena
atk-abh02a:1175_7: paricchinnā. Dve dantā ekato natthi. Ayaṃ nesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo
atk-abh02a:1176_0: Tacoti sakalasarīraṃ veṭhetvā ṭhitacammaṃ. Tassa upari kāḷasāmapītādivaṇṇā chavi
atk-abh02a:1176_1: nāma, yā sakalasarīratopi saṅkaḍḍhiyamānā badaraṭṭhimattā hoti. Taco pana vaṇṇato
atk-abh02a:1176_2: setoyeva. So cassa setabhāvo aggijālābhighātapaharaṇapahārādīhi viddhaṃsitāya chaviyā
atk-abh02a:1176_3: pākaṭo hoti. Saṇṭhānato sarīrasaṇṭhānova hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-abh02a:1177_0: Vitthārato pana pādaṅgulittaco kosakārakakosasaṇṭhāno. Piṭṭhipādattaco puṭabandhaupāhanasaṇṭhāno.
atk-abh02a:1177_5: phaṇakatthavikasaṇṭhāno vā. Hatthaṅgulittaco kuñcikākosakasaṇṭhāno. Gīvattaco galakañcukasaṇṭhāno.
atk-abh02a:1178_0: Tacapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena uttaroṭṭhato paṭṭhāya upari mukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā
atk-abh02a:1178_1: paṭhamaṃ tāva mukhaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tato nalāṭaṭṭhicammaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1178_2: Tato thavikāya pakkhittapattassa ca thavikāya ca antarena hatthamiva sīsaṭṭhikassa
atk-abh02a:1178_3: ca sīsacammassa ca antarena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā aṭṭhikena saddhiṃ cammassa ekābaddhabhāvaṃ
atk-abh02a:1178_4: viyojentena sīsacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tato khandhacammaṃ. Tato anulomena paṭilomena
atk-abh02a:1178_5: ca dakkhiṇahatthacammaṃ. Atha teneva nayena vāmahatthacammaṃ. Tato piṭṭhicammaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1178_6: Taṃ taṃ vavatthapetvā anulomena ca paṭilomena ca dakkhiṇapādacammaṃ. Atha teneva
atk-abh02a:1178_7: nayena vāmapādacammaṃ. Tato anukkameneva vatthiudarahadayagīvacammāni vavatthapetabbāni.
atk-abh02a:1178_8: Atha gīvācammānantaraṃ heṭṭhimahanucammaṃ vavatthapetvā adharoṭṭhapariyosānaṃ pāpetvā
atk-abh02a:1178_9: niṭṭhapetabbaṃ. Evaṃ oḷārikoḷārikaṃ pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1179_0: Disato dvīsu disāsu jāto. Okāsato sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhito. Paricchedato
atk-abh02a:1179_1: heṭṭhā patiṭṭhitatalena, upari ākāsena paricchinno. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo
atk-abh02a:1180_0: Maṃsanti nava maṃsapesisatāni. Taṃ sabbampi vaṇṇato rattaṃ kiṃsukapupphasadisaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1180_3: potthalikāya kucchiyaṃ tanumattikālepanasaṇṭhānaṃ, thanamaṃsaṃ vaṭṭetvā avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1180_4: bāhudvayamaṃsaṃ diguṇaṃ katvā ṭhapitaniccammamahāmūsikasaṇṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ oḷārikoḷārikaṃ
atk-abh02a:1180_5: maṃsaṃ pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato
atk-abh02a:1180_6: sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni anulimpetvā ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato heṭṭhā aṭṭhisaṅghāte
atk-abh02a:1180_7: patiṭṭhitatalena, upari tacena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.
atk-abh02a:1181_0: ‘Nhārū’ti nava nhārusatāni. Vaṇṇato sabbepi nhārū setā; saṇṭhānato nānāsaṇṭhānā.
atk-abh02a:1181_1: Etesu hi gīvāya uparibhāgato paṭṭhāya pañca mahānhārū sarīraṃ vinaddhamānā hadayassa
atk-abh02a:1181_2: purimapassena otiṇṇā, pañca pacchimapassena, pañca dakkhiṇapassena, pañca vāmapassena,
atk-abh02a:1181_3: dakkhiṇahatthaṃ vinaddhamānāpi hatthassa purimapassena pañca, pacchimapassena pañca,
atk-abh02a:1181_4: tathā vāmahatthaṃ vinaddhamānāpi. Dakkhiṇapādaṃ vinaddhamānāpi pādassa purimapassena
atk-abh02a:1181_5: pañca, pacchimapassena pañca, tathā vāmapādaṃ vinaddhamānāpīti. Evaṃ sarīradhārakā
atk-abh02a:1181_6: nāma saṭṭhi mahānhārū kāyaṃ vinaddhamānā otiṇṇā, ye kaṇḍarātipi vuccanti. Te sabbepi
atk-abh02a:1182_0: Aññe pana taṃ taṃ padesaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā tato sukhumatarā suttarajjukasaṇṭhānā.
atk-abh02a:1182_1: Aññe tato sukhumatarā pūtilatāsaṇṭhānā. Aññe tato sukhumatarā mahāvīṇātantisaṇṭhānā.
atk-abh02a:1182_2: Aññe thūlasuttakasaṇṭhānā. Hatthapādapiṭṭhiyaṃ nhārū sakuṇapādasaṇṭhānā. Sīsanhārū
atk-abh02a:1182_3: dārakānaṃ sīsajālakasaṇṭhānā. Piṭṭhinhārū ātape pasāritaallajālasaṇṭhānā. Avasesā
atk-abh02a:1182_4: taṃtaṃaṅgapaccaṅgānugatā nhārū sarīre paṭimukkajālakañcukasaṇṭhānā. Disato dvīsu
atk-abh02a:1182_5: disāsu jātā. Okāsato sakalasarīre aṭṭhīni ābandhitvā ṭhitā. Paricchedato heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1182_6: aṭṭhisatānaṃ upari patiṭṭhitatalehi, upari maṃsacammāni āhacca ṭhitapadesehi, tiriyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1182_7: aññamaññena paricchinnā. Ayaṃ nesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
atk-abh02a:1183_0: Aṭṭhīti ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhīni avasesāni catusaṭṭhi hatthaṭṭhīni, catusaṭṭhi
atk-abh02a:1183_1: pādaṭṭhīni, catusaṭṭhi maṃsanissitāni muduaṭṭhīni, dve paṇhikaṭṭhīni, ekekasmiṃ pāde
atk-abh02a:1183_2: dve gopphakaṭṭhīni, dve jaṅghaṭṭhīni, dve jaṇṇukaṭṭhīni, dve ūruṭṭhīni, dve kaṭiṭṭhīni,
atk-abh02a:1183_3: aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni, catuvīsati phāsukaṭṭhīni, cuddasa uraṭṭhīni, ekaṃ
atk-abh02a:1183_4: hadayaṭṭhi, dve akkhakaṭṭhīni, dve koṭṭhaṭṭhīni, dve bāhaṭṭhīni, dve dve aggabāhaṭṭhīni,
atk-abh02a:1183_5: satta gīvaṭṭhīni, dve hanukaṭṭhīni, ekaṃ nāsikaṭṭhi, dve akkhiṭṭhīni, dve kaṇṇaṭṭhīni,
atk-abh02a:1183_6: ekaṃ nalāṭaṭṭhi, ekaṃ muddhaṭṭhi, nava sīsakapālaṭṭhīnīti evaṃ timattāni aṭṭhisatāni.
atk-abh02a:1184_0: Tāni sabbānipi vaṇṇato setāni, saṇṭhānato nānāsaṇṭhānāni. Tattha hi aggapādaṅguliṭṭhīni
atk-abh02a:1184_5: dhanukadaṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ, mahantaṃ milātasappapiṭṭhisaṇṭhānaṃ. Jaṇṇukaṭṭhi ekato parikkhīṇapheṇakasaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1185_0: Tattha jaṅghaṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikhiṇaggagosiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ. Ūruṭṭhi duttacchitavāsipharasudaṇḍakasaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1185_1: Tassa kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ kīḷāgoḷakasaṇṭhānaṃ. Tena kaṭiṭṭhino patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1185_2: aggacchinnamahāpunnāgaphalasaṇṭhānaṃ. Kaṭiṭṭhīni dvepi ekābaddhāni hutvā kumbhakārakauddhanasaṇṭhānāni,
atk-abh02a:1185_3: pāṭiyekkaṃ kammārakūṭayottakasaṇṭhānāni. Koṭiyaṃ ṭhitaānisadaṭṭhi adhomukhaṃ katvā
atk-abh02a:1185_4: gahitasappaphaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ sattasu ṭhānesu chiddāvachiddaṃ. Piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni abbhantarato
atk-abh02a:1185_6: antarantarā kakacadantasadisā dve tayo kaṇṭakā honti. Catuvīsatiyā phāsukaṭṭhīsu
atk-abh02a:1186_5: aggapabbaṭṭhīni katakabījasaṇṭhānāni. Satta gīvaṭṭhīni daṇḍena vijjhitvā paṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh02a:1188_0: Disato dvīsu disāsu jātāni. Okāsato avisesena sakalasarīre ṭhitāni. Visesena panettha
atk-abh02a:1188_1: sīsaṭṭhīni gīvaṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhitāni, gīvaṭṭhīni piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīsu, piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni
atk-abh02a:1188_2: kaṭiṭṭhīsu, kaṭiṭṭhīni ūruṭṭhīsu, ūruṭṭhīni jaṇṇukaṭṭhīsu, jaṇṇukaṭṭhīni jaṅghaṭṭhīsu,
atk-abh02a:1188_3: jaṅghaṭṭhīni gopphakaṭṭhīsu, gopphakaṭṭhīni piṭṭhipādaṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhitāni. Paricchedato
atk-abh02a:1188_4: anto aṭṭhimiñjena, upari maṃsena, agge mūle ca aññamaññena paricchinnāni. Ayaṃ nesaṃ
atk-abh02a:1189_0: Aṭṭhimiñjanti tesaṃ tesaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ miñjaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ. Saṇṭhānato
atk-abh02a:1189_3: Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantare patiṭṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato
atk-abh02a:1189_4: aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaratalehi paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1190_0: Vakkanti ekabandhanā dve maṃsapiṇḍā. Taṃ vaṇṇato mandarattaṃ pāḷibhaddakaṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1190_2: vā. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato galavāṭakā nikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ
atk-abh02a:1190_3: gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā
atk-abh02a:1190_4: ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato vakkaṃ vakkabhāgena paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.
atk-abh02a:1191_0: Hadayanti hadayamaṃsaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ padumapattapiṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato bāhirapattāni
atk-abh02a:1191_1: apanetvā adhomukhaṭhapitapadumamakuḷasaṇṭhānaṃ. Bahi maṭṭhaṃ; anto kosātakīphalassa
atk-abh02a:1191_2: abbhantarasadisaṃ. Paññavantānaṃ thokaṃ vikasitaṃ, mandapaññānaṃ makuḷitameva. Anto
atk-abh02a:1191_3: cassa punnāgaṭṭhipatiṭṭhānamatto āvāṭako hoti, yattha aḍḍhapasatamattaṃ lohitaṃ saṇṭhāti;
atk-abh02a:1191_4: yaṃ nissāya manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti. Taṃ panetaṃ rāgacaritassa rattaṃ
atk-abh02a:1191_5: hoti, dosacaritassa kāḷakaṃ, mohacaritassa maṃsadhovanudakasadisaṃ, vitakkacaritassa
atk-abh02a:1191_6: kulatthayūsavaṇṇaṃ, saddhācaritassa kaṇikārapupphavaṇṇaṃ, paññācaritassa acchaṃ vippasannaṃ
atk-abh02a:1191_7: anāvilaṃ paṇḍaraṃ parisuddhaṃ niddhotajātimaṇi viya jutimantaṃ khāyati. Disato uparimāya
atk-abh02a:1191_8: disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ majjhe patiṭṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato
atk-abh02a:1191_9: hadayaṃ hadayabhāgena paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1192_0: Yakananti yamakamaṃsapaṭalaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato rattapaṇḍukadhātukaṃ, nātirattakumudassa
atk-abh02a:1192_1: pattapiṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato mūle ekaṃ, agge yamakaṃ koviḷārapattasaṇṭhānaṃ. Tañca
atk-abh02a:1192_2: dandhānaṃ ekameva hoti mahantaṃ, paññavantānaṃ dve vā tīṇi vā khuddakāni. Disato
atk-abh02a:1192_3: uparimadisāya jātaṃ. Okāsato dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1192_4: Paricchedato yakanaṃ yakanabhāgena paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1193_0: Kilomakanti paṭicchannāpaṭicchannabhedato duvidhaṃ pariyonahanamaṃsaṃ. Taṃ duvidhampi
atk-abh02a:1193_1: vaṇṇato setaṃ, dukūlapilotikavaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato attano okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato paṭicchannakilomakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1193_2: uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Itaraṃ dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato paṭicchannakilomakaṃ hadayañca
atk-abh02a:1193_3: vakkañca paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ. Apaṭicchannakilomakaṃ sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato
atk-abh02a:1193_4: maṃsaṃ pariyonaddhitvā ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato heṭṭhā maṃsena, upari cammena, tiriyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1193_5: kilomakabhāgena paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1194_0: Pihakanti udarajivhāmaṃsaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato nīlaṃ nigguṇḍikapupphavaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato
atk-abh02a:1194_1: sattaṅgulappamāṇaṃ abandhanaṃ kāḷavacchakajivhāsaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato uparimāya disāya
atk-abh02a:1194_2: jātaṃ. Okāsato hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1194_3: yasmiṃ paharaṇappahārena bahi nikkhante sattānaṃ jīvitakkhayo hoti. Paricchedato
atk-abh02a:1194_4: pihakabhāgena paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1195_0: Papphāsanti dvattiṃsamaṃsakhaṇḍappabhedaṃ papphāsamaṃsaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ nātipakkaudumbaraphalavaṇṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1195_2: uggatena kammajatejusmanā abbhāhatattā saṅkhāditapalālapiṇḍamiva nirasaṃ nirojaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1195_3: Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānamantare hadayañca
atk-abh02a:1195_4: yakanañca paṭicchādetvā olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato phapphāsabhāgena paricchinnaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1196_0: Antanti purisassa dvattiṃsa hatthā, itthiyā aṭṭhavīsatihatthā ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu
atk-abh02a:1196_1: obhaggā antavaṭṭi. Tadetaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ sakkharasudhāvaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato lohitadoṇiyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1196_2: ābhujitvā ṭhapitasīsacchinnasappasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato upari
atk-abh02a:1196_3: galavāṭake heṭṭhā ca karīsamagge vinibandhattā galavāṭakakarīsamaggapariyante sarīrabbhantare
atk-abh02a:1196_4: ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato antabhāgena paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1197_0: Antaguṇanti antabhogaṭṭhānesu bandhanaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ dakasītalikamūlavaṇṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1197_1: Saṇṭhānato dakasītalikamūlasaṇṭhānameva. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato kudāḷapharasukammādīni
atk-abh02a:1197_2: karontānaṃ yantākaḍḍhanakāle yantasuttamiva, yantaphalakāni antabhoge ekato agaḷante
atk-abh02a:1197_3: ābandhitvā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakassa antarā taṃ sibbetvā ṭhitarajjukā viya ekavīsatiyā
atk-abh02a:1197_4: ṭhānesu antabhogānaṃ antarā ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato antaguṇabhāgena paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa
atk-abh02a:1198_0: Udariyanti udare bhavaṃ asitapitakhāyitasāyitaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato ajjhohaṭāhāravaṇṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1198_1: Saṇṭhānato parissāvane sithilabandhataṇḍulasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1198_2: Okāsato udare ṭhitaṃ. Udaraṃ nāma ubhato nippīḷiyamānassa allasāṭakassa majjhe sañjātaphoṭakasadisaṃ
atk-abh02a:1198_4: kuthitapanasatacassa abbhantarasadisantipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati; yattha takkoṭakā, gaṇḍuppādakā,
atk-abh02a:1198_6: ākulabyākulā saṇḍasaṇḍacārino hutvā nivasanti; ye pānabhojanādimhi avijjamāne ullaṅghitvā
atk-abh02a:1198_7: viravantā hadayamaṃsaṃ abhihananti, pānabhojanādiajjhoharaṇavelāya ca uddhaṃmukhā
atk-abh02a:1198_8: hutvā paṭhamajjhohaṭe dve tayo ālope turitaturitā vilumpanti; yaṃ tesaṃ kimīnaṃ sūtigharaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1199_0: Yattha seyyathāpi nāma caṇḍālagāmadvāre candanikāya nidāghasamaye thūlaphusitake
atk-abh02a:1199_2: nānākuṇapajātaṃ nipatitvā kaddamodakāluḷitaṃ dvīhatīhaccayena sañjātakimikulaṃ sūriyātapavegasantāpakuthitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1199_3: upari pheṇapubbulake muñcantaṃ abhinīlavaṇṇaṃ paramaduggandhajegucchaṃ neva upagantuṃ
atk-abh02a:1199_4: na daṭṭhuṃ araharūpataṃ āpajjitvā tiṭṭhati, pageva ghāyituṃ vā sāyituṃ vā; evameva
atk-abh02a:1199_9: yaṃ sutvāpi pānabhojanādīsu amanuññatā saṇṭhāti, pageva paññācakkhunā avaloketvā,
atk-abh02a:1199_10: yattha ca patitaṃ pānabhojanādi pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ gacchati – ekaṃ bhāgaṃ pāṇakā khādanti,
atk-abh02a:1199_11: ekaṃ bhāgaṃ udaraggi jhāpeti, eko bhāgo muttaṃ hoti, eko karīsaṃ, eko rasabhāvaṃ
atk-abh02a:1199_12: āpajjitvā soṇitamaṃsādīni upabrūhayati. Paricchedato udarapaṭalena ceva udariyabhāgena
atk-abh02a:1199_13: ca paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1200_0: Karīsanti vaccaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato yebhuyyena ajjhohaṭāhāravaṇṇameva hoti. Saṇṭhānato
atk-abh02a:1200_1: okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato heṭṭhimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato pakkāsaye ṭhitaṃ. Pakkāsayo
atk-abh02a:1200_2: nāma heṭṭhā nābhipiṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānamantare antāvasāne ubbedhena aṭṭhaṅgulamatto
atk-abh02a:1200_3: veḷunāḷikasadiso, yattha seyyathāpi nāma uparūpari bhūmibhāge patitaṃ vassodakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1200_4: ogaḷitvā heṭṭhā bhūmibhāgaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati; evameva yaṃ kiñci āmāsaye patitaṃ pānabhojanādikaṃ
atk-abh02a:1200_5: udaragginā pheṇuddehakaṃ pakkaṃ pakkaṃ nisadāya pisitamiva saṇhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā
atk-abh02a:1200_6: antabilena ogaḷitvā ogaḷitvā madditvā veḷupabbe pakkhipamānapaṇḍumattikā viya sannicitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1200_7: hutvā tiṭṭhati. Paricchedato pakkāsayapaṭalena ceva karīsabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1201_0: Matthaluṅganti sīsakaṭāhabbhantare ṭhitamiñjarāsi. Taṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ ahicchattakapiṇḍikavaṇṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1201_1: dadhibhāvaṃ asampattaduṭṭhakhīravaṇṇantipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1201_2: Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato sīsakaṭāhabbhantare cattāro sibbinimagge nissāya
atk-abh02a:1201_3: samodhānetvā ṭhapitā cattāro piṭṭhapiṇḍā viya samohitaṃ tiṭṭhati. Paricchedato sīsakaṭāhassa
atk-abh02a:1201_4: abbhantaratalehi ceva matthaluṅgabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.
atk-abh02a:1202_0: Pittanti dve pittāni – baddhapittañca abaddhapittañca. Tattha baddhapittaṃ vaṇṇato
atk-abh02a:1202_2: ubhayampi okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato baddhapittaṃ uparimāya disāya jātaṃ, itaraṃ dvīsu
atk-abh02a:1202_3: disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato abaddhapittaṃ ṭhapetvā kesalomadantanakhānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānañceva
atk-abh02a:1202_4: thaddhasukkhacammañca udakamiva telabinduṃ avasesasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ, yamhi
atk-abh02a:1202_5: kupite akkhīni pītakāni honti bhamanti, gattaṃ kampati kaṇḍuyati. Baddhapittaṃ hadayapapphāsānamantare
atk-abh02a:1202_6: yakanamaṃsaṃ nissāya patiṭṭhite mahākosātakīkosakasadise pittakosake ṭhitaṃ, yamhi
atk-abh02a:1202_7: kupite sattā ummattakā honti, vipallatthacittā hirottappaṃ chaḍḍetvā akattabbaṃ karonti,
atk-abh02a:1202_8: abhāsitabbaṃ bhāsanti, acintetabbaṃ cintenti. Paricchedato pittabhāgena paricchinnaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1203_0: Semhanti sarīrabbhantare ekapattapūrappamāṇaṃ semhaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ nāgabalapaṇṇarasavaṇṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1203_1: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato udarapaṭale ṭhitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1203_2: yaṃ pānabhojanādīni ajjhoharaṇakāle seyyathāpi nāma udake sevālapaṇakaṃ kaṭṭhe vā
atk-abh02a:1203_3: kapāle vā patante chijjitvā dvidhā hutvā puna ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati, evameva pānabhojanādimhi
atk-abh02a:1203_4: nipatante chijjitvā dvidhā hutvā puna ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati; yamhi ca mandībhūte
atk-abh02a:1203_5: pakkagaṇḍo viya pūtikukkuṭaṇḍamiva ca udaraṃ paramajegucchaṃ kuṇapagandhaṃ hoti;
atk-abh02a:1203_6: tato uggatena ca gandhena uddekopi mukhampi duggandhaṃ pūtikuṇapasadisaṃ hoti; so
atk-abh02a:1203_7: ca puriso ‘apehi, duggandhaṃ vāyasī’ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati; yañca vaḍḍhitvā bahalattamāpannaṃ
atk-abh02a:1203_8: pidhānaphalakamiva vaccakuṭiyā udarapaṭalassa abbhantareyeva kuṇapagandhaṃ sannirujjhitvā
atk-abh02a:1203_9: tiṭṭhati. Paricchedato semhabhāgena paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1204_0: Pubboti pūtilohitavasena pavattapubbo. So vaṇṇato paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇo, matakasarīre
atk-abh02a:1204_1: pana pūtibahalācāmavaṇṇo hoti. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhāno. Disato dvīsu disāsu jāto.
atk-abh02a:1204_2: Okāsato pana pubbassa okāso nāma nibaddho natthi yattha so sannicito tiṭṭheyya; yatra
atk-abh02a:1204_3: yatra pana khāṇukaṇṭakappaharaṇaggijālādīhi abhihate sarīrappadese lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā
atk-abh02a:1204_4: paccati, gaṇḍapiḷakādayo vā uppajjanti, tatra tatreva tiṭṭhati. Paricchedato pubbabhāgena
atk-abh02a:1204_5: paricchinno. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1205_0: Lohitanti dve lohitāni – sannicitalohitañca saṃsaraṇalohitañca. Tattha sannicitalohitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1205_2: ubhayampi okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato sannicitalohitaṃ uparimāya disāya jātaṃ, itaraṃ
atk-abh02a:1205_3: dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ, ṭhapetvā kesalomadantanakhānaṃ maṃsavinimmuttaṭṭhānañceva
atk-abh02a:1205_4: thaddhasukkhacammañca, dhamanijālānusārena sabbaṃ upādinnakasarīraṃ pharitvā ṭhitaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1205_5: sannicitalohitaṃ yakanaṭṭhānassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā ekapattapūramattaṃ hadayavakkapapphāsānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1205_6: upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharantaṃ vakkahadayayakanapapphāse temayamānaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Tasmiñhi
atk-abh02a:1205_7: vakkahadayādīni atemente sattā pipāsitā honti. Paricchedato lohitabhāgena paricchinnaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1206_0: Sedoti lomakūpādīhi paggharaṇakaāpodhātu. So vaṇṇato vippasannatilatelavaṇṇo. Saṇṭhānato
atk-abh02a:1206_1: okāsasaṇṭhāno. Disato dvīsu disāsu jāto. Okāsato sedassokāso nāma nibaddho natthi,
atk-abh02a:1206_2: yattha so lohitaṃ viya sadā tiṭṭheyya; yadā pana aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvikārādīhi
atk-abh02a:1206_4: viya sabbakesalomakūpavivarehi paggharati. Tasmā tassa saṇṭhānampi kesalomakūpavivarānaṃyeva
atk-abh02a:1206_5: vasena veditabbaṃ. Sedapariggaṇhakena ca yoginā kesalomakūpavivare pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva
atk-abh02a:1206_6: sedo manasikātabbo. Paricchedato sedabhāgena paricchinno. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.
atk-abh02a:1207_0: Medoti thinasineho. So vaṇṇato phālitahaliddivaṇṇo. Saṇṭhānato thūlasarīrassa tāva
atk-abh02a:1207_2: ūrumaṃsaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakanissitaṃ piṭṭhamaṃsaṃ udaravaṭṭimaṃsanti etāni nissāya diguṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1207_3: tiguṇaṃ katvā ṭhapitahaliddivaṇṇadukūlapilotikasaṇṭhāno. Disato dvīsu disāsu jāto.
atk-abh02a:1207_4: Okāsato thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā, kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito, yaṃ
atk-abh02a:1207_5: sinehasaṅkhaṃ gatampi paramajegucchattā neva muddhani telatthāya, na nāsātelādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1207_6: atthāya gaṇhanti. Paricchedato heṭṭhā maṃsena, upari cammena, tiriyaṃ medabhāgena
atk-abh02a:1207_7: paricchinno. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1208_0: Assūti akkhīhi pagdharaṇakaāpodhātu. Taṃ vaṇṇato vippasannatilatelavaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato
atk-abh02a:1208_1: okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato akkhikūpakesu ṭhitaṃ. Na cetaṃ
atk-abh02a:1208_2: pittakosake pittamiva akkhikūpakesu sadā sannicitaṃ tiṭṭhati; yadā pana sattā somanassajātā
atk-abh02a:1208_3: mahāhasitaṃ hasanti, domanassajātā rodanti paridevanti tathārūpaṃ visabhāgāhāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1208_4: āharanti, yadā ca nesaṃ akkhīni dhūmarajapaṃsukādīhi abhihaññanti, tadā etehi somanassadomanassavisabhāgāhārautūhi
atk-abh02a:1208_5: samuṭṭhahitvā akkhikūpake pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā. Assupariggaṇhakena pana
atk-abh02a:1208_6: yoginā akkhikūpake pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva pariggaṇhitabbaṃ. Paricchedato assubhāgena
atk-abh02a:1208_7: paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1209_0: Vasāti vilīnasneho. Sā vaṇṇato nāḷikeratelavaṇṇā, ācāme āsittatelavaṇṇātipi vattuṃ
atk-abh02a:1209_1: vaṭṭati. Saṇṭhānato nhānakāle pasannaudakassa upari paribbhamantasinehabinduvisaṭasaṇṭhānā.
atk-abh02a:1209_2: Disato dvīsu disāsu jātā. Okāsato yebhuyyena hatthatalahatthapiṭṭhipādatalapādapiṭṭhināsāpuṭanalāṭaaṃsakūṭesu
atk-abh02a:1209_3: ṭhitā. Na cesā etesu okāsesu sadā vilīnāva hutvā tiṭṭhati; yadā pana aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvisabhāgadhātuvisabhāgehi
atk-abh02a:1209_4: te padesā usmā jātā honti, tadā tattha nhānakāle pasannaudakūpari sinehabinduvisaṭo
atk-abh02a:1209_5: viya ito cito ca saṃsarati. Paricchedato vasābhāgena paricchinnā. Ayamassā sabhāgaparicchedo.
atk-abh02a:1210_0: Kheḷoti antomukhe pheṇamissā āpodhātu. So vaṇṇato seto pheṇavaṇṇo. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhāno,
atk-abh02a:1210_1: pheṇasaṇṭhānatotipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Disato uparimāya disāya jāto. Okāsato ubhohi
atk-abh02a:1210_2: kapolapassehi oruyha jivhāya ṭhito. Na cesa ettha sadā sannicito hutvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:1210_3: Yadā pana sattā tathārūpaṃ āhāraṃ passanti vā saranti vā uṇhatittakaṭukaloṇambilānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1210_4: vā kiñci mukhe ṭhapenti, yadā vā nesaṃ hadayaṃ ākilāyati, kismiñcideva vā jigucchā
atk-abh02a:1210_5: uppajjati, tadā kheḷo uppajjitvā ubhohi kapolapassehi oruyha jivhāya saṇṭhāti. Aggajivhāya
atk-abh02a:1210_6: cesa tanuko hoti, mūlajivhāya bahalo; mukhe pakkhittañca puthukaṃ vā taṇḍulaṃ vā
atk-abh02a:1210_7: aññaṃ vā kiñci khādanīyaṃ, nadīpuḷine khatakūpakasalilaṃ viya, parikkhayaṃ agacchantova
atk-abh02a:1210_8: temetuṃ samattho hoti. Paricchedato kheḷabhāgena paricchinno. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.
atk-abh02a:1211_0: Siṅghāṇikāti matthaluṅgato paggharaṇakaasuci. Sā vaṇṇato taruṇatālaṭṭhimiñjavaṇṇā.
atk-abh02a:1211_1: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānā. Disato uparimāya disāya jātā. Okāsato nāsāpuṭe pūretvā
atk-abh02a:1211_2: ṭhitā. Na cesā ettha sadā sannicitā hutvā tiṭṭhati; atha kho yathā nāma puriso paduminīpattena
atk-abh02a:1211_3: dadhiṃ bandhitvā heṭṭhā kaṇṭakena vijjheyya, atha tena chiddena dadhimatthu gaḷitvā
atk-abh02a:1211_4: bahi pateyya, evameva yadā sattā rodanti vā visabhāgāhārautuvasena vā sañjātadhātukkhobhā
atk-abh02a:1211_5: honti, tadā antosīsato pūtisemhabhāvaṃ āpannaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ gaḷitvā tālumatthakavivarena
atk-abh02a:1211_6: otaritvā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā. Siṅghāṇikā pariggaṇhakena pana
atk-abh02a:1211_7: yoginā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva pariggaṇhitabbā. Paricchedato siṅghāṇikābhāgena
atk-abh02a:1211_8: paricchinnā. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1212_0: Lasikāti sarīrasandhīnaṃ abbhantare picchilakuṇapaṃ. Sā vaṇṇato kaṇikāraniyyāsavaṇṇā.
atk-abh02a:1212_1: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānā. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātā. Okāsato aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ
atk-abh02a:1212_2: sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitā. Yassa cesā mandā hoti, tassa uṭṭhahantassa
atk-abh02a:1212_3: nisīdantassa abhikkamantassa paṭikkamantassa sammiñjantassa pasārentassa aṭṭhikāni
atk-abh02a:1212_4: kaṭakaṭāyanti, accharāsaddaṃ karonto viya vicarati, ekayojanadviyojanamattampi addhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1212_5: gatassa vāyodhātu kuppati, gattāni dukkhanti. Yassa pana bahukā hoti tassa uṭṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-abh02a:1212_6: na aṭṭhīni kaṭakaṭāyanti, dīghampi addhānaṃ gatassa na vāyodhātu kuppati, na gattāni
atk-abh02a:1212_7: dukkhanti. Paricchedato lasikābhāgena paricchinnā. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1213_1: Disato heṭṭhimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato vatthissa abbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Vatthi nāma
atk-abh02a:1213_2: vatthipuṭo vuccati, yattha seyyathāpi nāma candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe ravaṇaghaṭe
atk-abh02a:1213_3: candanikaraso pavisati, na cassa pavisanamaggo paññāyati; evameva sarīrato muttaṃ
atk-abh02a:1213_4: pavisati, na cassa pavisanamaggo paññāyati, nikkhamanamaggo pana pākaṭo hoti; yamhi
atk-abh02a:1213_5: ca muttassa bharite ‘passāvaṃ karomā’ti sattānaṃ āyūhanaṃ hoti. Paricchedato vatthiabbhantarena
atk-abh02a:1213_6: ceva muttabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
atk-abh02a:1214_0: Evañhi kesādike koṭṭhāse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena vavatthapetvā anupubbato
atk-abh02a:1214_3: purisassa dvattiṃsavaṇṇānaṃ kusumānaṃ ekasuttagaṇṭhitaṃ mālaṃ olokentassa sabbapupphāni
atk-abh02a:1214_4: apubbāpariyamiva pākaṭāni honti, evameva “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”ti imaṃ kāyaṃ olokentassa
atk-abh02a:1214_5: sabbe te dhammā apubbāpariyamiva pākaṭā honti. Tena vuttaṃ manasikārakosallakathāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1214_6: “ādikammikassa hi ‘kesā’ti manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā ‘mutta’nti imaṃ pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhatī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1215_0: Sace pana bahiddhāpi manasikāraṃ upasaṃharati, athassa evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu pākaṭībhūtesu
atk-abh02a:1215_1: āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo sattākāraṃ vijahitvā koṭṭhāsarāsivaseneva upaṭṭhahanti;
atk-abh02a:1215_2: tehi ca ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi koṭṭhāsarāsimhi pakkhipiyamānamiva upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:1215_3: Athassa anupubbamuñcanādivasena ‘paṭikūlā paṭikūlā’ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto anukkamena appanā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1216_1: sabbākārato paṭikūlavasena upaṭṭhānaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Taṃ punappunaṃ āvajjentassa
atk-abh02a:1216_2: manasikarontassa takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karontassa cattāro khandhā paṭikūlārammaṇā
atk-abh02a:1216_3: honti, paṭhamajjhānavasena appanā pavattati. Pubbabhāge parikammaupacāracittāni savitakkasavicārāni
atk-abh02a:1216_5: sappītikā somanassasahagatāva. Bhūmantarena pana mahaggatā rūpāvacarā honti. Paṭikkūlepi
atk-abh02a:1216_6: ca etasmiṃ ārammaṇe ānisaṃsadassāvitāya somanassaṃ uppajjati, ekattārammaṇabaleneva
atk-abh02a:1216_7: vā taṃ uppajjati. Dutiyajjhānādīni panettha na nibbattanti. Kasmā? Oḷārikattā. Idañhi
atk-abh02a:1216_8: ārammaṇaṃ oḷārikaṃ. Vitakkabalenevettha cittekaggatā jāyati, na vitakkasamatikkamenāti.
atk-abh02a:1217_0: Avisesato pana sādhāraṇavasena evaṃ veditabbaṃ – idañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetukāmena
atk-abh02a:1217_2: vācāya pothetvā pothetvā ekekakoṭṭhāse ‘ayaṃ etaṃsarikkhako’ti tividhena sajjhāyo
atk-abh02a:1217_3: kātabbo. Kathaṃ? Tacapañcake tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva anulomato pañcāhaṃ, paṭilomato
atk-abh02a:1217_4: pañcāhaṃ, anulomapaṭilomato pañcāhanti addhamāsaṃ sajjhāyo kātabbo. Tato ācariyassa
atk-abh02a:1217_5: santikaṃ gantvā vakkapañcakaṃ uggaṇhitvā tatheva addhamāsaṃ sajjhāyo kātabbo. Tato
atk-abh02a:1217_6: te dasapi koṭṭhāse ekato katvā addhamāsaṃ. Puna papphāsapañcakādīsupi ekekaṃ uggaṇhitvā
atk-abh02a:1217_7: addhamāsaṃ. Tato te pañcadasapi koṭṭhāse addhamāsaṃ. Matthaluṅgapañcakaṃ addhamāsaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1217_8: Tato tevīsati koṭṭhāse addhamāsaṃ. Medachakkaṃ addhamāsaṃ. Tato te chabbīsatipi koṭṭhāse
atk-abh02a:1217_9: ekato katvā addhamāsaṃ. Muttachakkaṃ addhamāsaṃ. Tato sabbepi dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāse
atk-abh02a:1217_10: ekato katvā addhamāsanti evaṃ cha māse sajjhāyo kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1218_0: Tattha – upanissayasampannassa sappaññassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhantasseva
atk-abh02a:1218_1: koṭṭhāsā upaṭṭhahanti, ekaccassa na upaṭṭhahanti. Tena ‘na upaṭṭhahantī’ti vīriyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1218_2: na vissajjetabbaṃ. Yattakā koṭṭhāsā upaṭṭhahanti tattake gahetvā sajjhāyo kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1218_3: Evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena pana neva paññavato na mandapaññassa vasena kathetabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1218_4: majjhimapaññassa vasena kathetabbaṃ. Majjhimapaññassa hi vasena ācariyā chahi māsehi
atk-abh02a:1218_5: paricchinditvā tantiṃ ṭhapayiṃsu. Yassa pana ettāvatāpi koṭṭhāsā pākaṭā na honti,
atk-abh02a:1218_6: tena tato parampi sajjhāyo kātabbo eva; no ca kho aparicchinditvā, cha cha māse paricchinditvāva kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1219_0: Sajjhāyaṃ karontena vaṇṇo na paccavekkhitabbo, na lakkhaṇaṃ manasikātabbaṃ, koṭṭhāsavaseneva
atk-abh02a:1219_1: sajjhāyo kātabbo. Ācariyenāpi ‘vaṇṇavasena sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti niyametvā na kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1219_2: Niyametvā kathite ko dosoti? Sampattiyampi vipattisaññāāpajjanaṃ. Sace hi ācariyena
atk-abh02a:1219_3: ‘vaṇṇavasena sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti vutte imassa bhikkhuno tathā karontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1219_4: vaṇṇato na upaṭṭhāti, paṭikūlavasena vā dhātuvasena vā upaṭṭhāti, athesa ‘na idaṃ
atk-abh02a:1219_5: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vilakkhaṇa’nti saññī hoti, ācariyena kathitameva kappetvā gaṇhāti. ‘Paṭikūlavasena
atk-abh02a:1219_6: sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti vuttepi sace tassa tathā karontassa paṭikkūlato na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-abh02a:1219_7: vaṇṇavasena vā dhātuvasena vā upaṭṭhāti, athesa ‘nayidaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vilakkhaṇa’nti
atk-abh02a:1219_8: saññī hoti, ācariyena kathitameva kappetvā gaṇhāti. ‘Dhātuvasena taṃ sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti
atk-abh02a:1219_9: vuttepi sace tassa tathā karontassa dhātuto na upaṭṭhāti, vaṇṇavasena vā paṭikūlavasena
atk-abh02a:1219_10: vā upaṭṭhāti, athesa ‘nayidaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vilakkhaṇa’nti saññī hoti, ācariyena kathitameva
atk-abh02a:1219_11: kappetvā gaṇhāti. Ayaṃ ācariyena niyametvā kathite doso.
atk-abh02a:1220_0: Kinti pana vattabbo hotīti? ‘Koṭṭhāsavasena sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti vattabbo. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:1220_1: ‘Kesakoṭṭhāso lomakoṭṭhāsoti sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti vattabbo. Sace panassa evaṃ koṭṭhāsavasena
atk-abh02a:1220_2: sajjhāyaṃ karontassa vaṇṇato upaṭṭhāti, athānena ovādācariyassa ācikkhitabbaṃ – ‘ahaṃ
atk-abh02a:1220_3: dvattiṃsākāraṃ koṭṭhāsavasena sajjhāyaṃ karomi; mayhaṃ pana vaṇṇato upaṭṭhātī’ti.
atk-abh02a:1220_4: Ācariyena ‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ viya akammaṭṭhānaṃ, vilakkhaṇaṃ eta’nti na visaṃvādetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1220_5: ‘Sādhu, sappurisa, pubbe tayā vaṇṇakasiṇe parikammaṃ katapubbaṃ bhavissati. Etadeva
atk-abh02a:1220_6: kammaṭṭhānaṃ tuyhaṃ sappāyaṃ. Vaṇṇavaseneva sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti vattabbo. Tenapi
atk-abh02a:1221_0: So evaṃ karonto ajjhattaṃ nīlakaṃ pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātakanti cattāri vaṇṇakasiṇāni
atk-abh02a:1221_1: labhati. Kathaṃ? Tassa hi kesalomapittesu ceva akkhīnañca kāḷakaṭṭhāne vaṇṇaṃ ‘nīlaṃ
atk-abh02a:1221_2: nīla’nti manasikarontassa catukkapañcakajjhānāni uppajjanti; jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā
atk-abh02a:1221_3: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Medasmiṃ pana akkhīnañca pītakaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1221_4: vaṇṇaṃ ‘pītakaṃ pītaka’nti manasikarontassa catukkapañcakajjhānāni uppajjanti; jhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1221_5: pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Maṃsalohitesu pana akkhīnañca
atk-abh02a:1221_7: uppajjanti; jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Nakhadantacammaaṭṭhīsu
atk-abh02a:1221_8: pana akkhīnañca paṇḍaraṭṭhāne vaṇṇaṃ ‘odātaṃ odāta’nti manasikarontassa catukkapañcakajjhānāni
atk-abh02a:1221_9: uppajjanti, jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Idaṃ
atk-abh02a:1221_10: vaṇṇavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā nigamanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1222_0: Aparassa koṭṭhāsavasena sajjhāyaṃ karontassa paṭikūlato upaṭṭhāti. Athānena ovādācariyassa
atk-abh02a:1222_1: ācikkhitabbaṃ. Ācariyena ‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ viya akammaṭṭhānaṃ, vilakkhaṇaṃ eta’nti na
atk-abh02a:1222_2: visaṃvādetabbaṃ. ‘Sādhu, sappurisa, pubbe tayā paṭikūlamanasikāre yogo kato bhavissati.
atk-abh02a:1222_3: Etadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ tuyhaṃ sappāyaṃ. Paṭikūlavaseneva sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti vattabbo.
atk-abh02a:1222_4: Tenapi paṭikūlavasena sajjhāyo kātabbo. Tassa kesā nāma ‘ajaññā duggandhā jegucchā
atk-abh02a:1222_5: paṭikūlā’ti evaṃ paṭikūlavasena sajjhāyaṃ karontassa paṭikūlārammaṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1222_6: nibbattati. So jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Idaṃ
atk-abh02a:1222_7: paṭikūlavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā nigamanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1223_0: Aparassa koṭṭhāsavasena sajjhāyaṃ karontassa dhātuto upaṭṭhāti. Dhātuto upaṭṭhahantaṃ
atk-abh02a:1223_1: kīdisaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti? Kesā tāva vammikamatthake jātakunthatiṇakāni viya hutvā
atk-abh02a:1223_2: upaṭṭhahanti. Lomā purāṇagāmaṭṭhāne jātadabbatiṇakāni viya. Nakhā daṇḍakesu ṭhapitamadhukaphalaṭṭhikosakā
atk-abh02a:1223_3: viya. Dantā mattikāpiṇḍe pavesetvā ṭhapitaalābubījāni viya. Taco vīṇāpabbake pariyonaddhaallagocammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1223_4: viya, maṃsaṃ bhittiyaṃ anulittamattikā viya. Nhāru dabbasambhārabaddhavallī viya.
atk-abh02a:1223_5: Aṭṭhi ussāpetvā ṭhapitabhittidabbasambhāro viya. Aṭṭhimiñjaṃ mahāveḷumhi pakkhittaseditavettaggaṃ
atk-abh02a:1223_6: viya. Vakkaṃ, hadayaṃ, yakanaṃ, kilomakaṃ, pihakaṃ, papphāsanti ime cha koṭṭhāsā
atk-abh02a:1223_7: sūnakāragharaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Dvattiṃsahatthaṃ antaṃ lohitadoṇiyaṃ saṃvellitvā
atk-abh02a:1223_8: ṭhapitagharasappo viya. Antaguṇaṃ pādapuñchanake sibbitarajjukā viya. Udariyaṃ parissāvane
atk-abh02a:1223_9: sithilabandhataṇḍulaṃ viya. Karīsaṃ veṇupabbe pakkhittapaṇḍumattikā viya. Matthaluṅgaṃ
atk-abh02a:1223_10: omadditvā ṭhapitā cattāro taṇḍulapiṭṭhapiṇḍā viya. Dvādasavidhā āpodhātu paṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh02a:1223_11: ṭhapitesu dvādasasu udakasarāvakesu pūritaudakaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:1224_0: Athānena ovādācariyassa ācikkhitabbaṃ. Ācariyena ‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ viya akammaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1224_1: vilakkhaṇaṃ eta’nti na visaṃvādetabbaṃ. ‘Sādhu, sappurisa, pubbe tayā dhātumanasikāre
atk-abh02a:1224_2: yogo kato bhavissati. Etadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ tuyhaṃ sappāyaṃ. Dhātuvaseneva sajjhāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1224_3: karohī’ti vattabbo. Tenapi dhātuvasena sajjhāyo kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1225_0: Tatridaṃ manasikāramukheneva sajjhāyavidhānaṃ – idha bhikkhu ‘kesā sīsaṃ pariyonaddhitvā
atk-abh02a:1225_1: ṭhitacamme jātā. Te na jānanti ‘mayaṃ sīsaṃ pariyonaddhitvā ṭhitacamme jātā’ti; sīsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1225_2: pariyonaddhitvā ṭhitacammampi na jānāti ‘kesā mayi jātā’ti; acetanā ete abyākatā
atk-abh02a:1225_3: suññā thaddhā patthinnā pathavīdhātu esā’ti manasikaroti. ‘Lomā sarīraṃ pariyonahanacamme
atk-abh02a:1225_4: jātā. Te na jānanti ‘mayaṃ sarīraṃ pariyonahanacamme jātā’ti. Sarīraṃ pariyonahanacammampi
atk-abh02a:1225_5: na jānāti ‘lomā mayi jātā’ti etepi acetanā. Nakhā aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu jātā. Te na jānanti
atk-abh02a:1225_6: ‘mayaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu jātā’ti. Aṅgulīnaṃ aggānipi na jānanti ‘nakhā amhesu jātā’ti.
atk-abh02a:1225_7: Etepi acetanā. Dantā hanukaṭṭhike jātā. Te na jānanti ‘mayaṃ hanukaṭṭhike jātā’ti.
atk-abh02a:1225_8: Hanukaṭṭhikampi na jānāti ‘dantā mayi jātā’ti. Etepi acetanā. Taco na jānāti ‘sarīraṃ
atk-abh02a:1225_9: mayā pariyonaddha’nti. Sarīrampi na jānāti ‘ahaṃ tacena pariyonaddha’nti. Ayampi
atk-abh02a:1225_10: acetano. Maṃsaṃ na jānāti ‘mayā sarīraṃ anulitta’nti. Sarīrampi na jānāti ‘ahaṃ maṃsena
atk-abh02a:1225_11: anulitta’nti. Idampi acetanaṃ. Nhāru na jānāti ‘ahaṃ aṭṭhipuñjaṃ ābandhitvā ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:1225_12: Aṭṭhipuñjopi na jānāti ‘nhārujālenāhaṃ ābaddho’ti. Idampi acetanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1226_0: Sīsaṭṭhi na jānāti ‘ahaṃ gīvaṭṭhike patiṭṭhita’nti. Gīvaṭṭhikampi na jānāti ‘mayi
atk-abh02a:1226_1: sīsaṭṭhikaṃ patiṭṭhita’nti. Gīvaṭṭhi na jānāti ‘ahaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭake ṭhita’nti. Piṭṭhikaṇṭaṭṭhikopi
atk-abh02a:1226_2: kaṭiṭṭhikaṃ ūruṭṭhikaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhikaṃ gopphakaṭṭhikaṃ na jānāti ‘ahaṃ paṇhikaṭṭhike
atk-abh02a:1226_3: patiṭṭhita’nti. Paṇhikaṭṭhikampi na jānāti ‘ahaṃ gopphakaṭṭhikaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti…pe…
atk-abh02a:1226_4: gīvaṭṭhikaṃ na jānāti ‘ahaṃ sīsaṭṭhikaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:1231_0: ‘Idampi acetanaṃ. Aṭṭhimiñjaṃ; vakkaṃ…pe… matthaluṅgaṃ acetanaṃ abyākataṃ suññaṃ
atk-abh02a:1231_1: thaddhaṃ patthinnaṃ pathavīdhātū’ti manasikaroti. ‘Pittaṃ semhaṃ…pe… muttaṃ acetanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1232_0: Ime dve mahābhūte pariggaṇhantassa udare ussadā tejodhātu pākaṭā hoti, nāsāya ussadā
atk-abh02a:1232_1: vāyodhātu pākaṭā hoti. Ime cattāro mahābhūte pariggaṇhantassa upādārūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-abh02a:1232_2: hoti. Mahābhūtaṃ nāma upādārūpena paricchinnaṃ, upādārūpaṃ mahābhūtena. Yathā ātapo
atk-abh02a:1232_3: nāma chāyāya paricchinno, chāyā ātapena; evameva mahābhūtaṃ upādārūpena paricchinnaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1232_4: upādārūpaṃ mahābhūtena. Athassa evaṃ “cattāri mahābhūtāni tevīsati upādārūpāni rūpakkhandho”ti
atk-abh02a:1232_5: rūpakkhandhaṃ pariggaṇhantassa āyatanadvāravasena arūpino khandhā pākaṭā honti. Iti
atk-abh02a:1232_6: rūpārūpapariggaho pañcakkhandhā honti, pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni honti, dvādasāyatanāni
atk-abh02a:1232_7: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo hontīti khandhāyatanadhātuvasena yamakatālakandhaṃ phālento viya
atk-abh02a:1233_0: So “idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na ahetu na appaccayā nibbattaṃ, sahetu sappaccayā nibbattaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1233_1: Ko panassa hetu? Ko pana paccayo”ti upaparikkhanto “avijjāpaccayā taṇhāpaccayā kammapaccayā
atk-abh02a:1233_2: āhārapaccayā cā”ti tassa paccayaṃ vavatthapetvā “atītepi paccayā ceva paccayasamuppannadhammā
atk-abh02a:1233_3: ca anāgatepi etarahipi paccayā ceva paccayasamuppannadhammā ca, tato uddhaṃ satto
atk-abh02a:1233_4: vā puggalo vā natthi, suddhasaṅkhārapuñjo evā”ti – evaṃ tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhaṃ vitarati.
atk-abh02a:1234_0: Evaṃ saṅkhāre sallakkhetvā ṭhitassa pana bhikkhussa dasabalassa sāsane mūlaṃ otiṇṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1234_1: nāma hoti, patiṭṭhā laddhā nāma, cūḷasotāpanno nāma hoti niyatagatiko. Tathārūpaṃ
atk-abh02a:1234_2: pana utusappāyaṃ, puggalasappāyaṃ, bhojanasappāyaṃ, dhammasavaṇasappāyaṃ labhitvā
atk-abh02a:1234_3: ekāsane ekapallaṅkavaragato tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā saṅkhāre
atk-abh02a:1234_4: sammasanto arahattaṃ gaṇhātīti idaṃ dhātuvasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā nigamanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1235_0: Yassa pana neva vaṇṇato upaṭṭhāti na paṭikūlato na suññato tena ‘na me upaṭṭhātī’ti
atk-abh02a:1235_1: na kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā nisīditabbaṃ, koṭṭhāsamanasikāreyeva pana yogo kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1235_2: Porāṇakattherā kira ‘koṭṭhāsamanasikārova pamāṇa’nti āhaṃsu. Iccassa punappunaṃ koṭṭhāsavasena
atk-abh02a:1235_3: sajjhāyaṃ karontassa koṭṭhāsā paguṇā honti. Kadā pana paguṇā nāma hontīti? Yadā ‘kesā’ti
atk-abh02a:1236_0: Athassa yathā nāma cakkhumato purisassa dvattiṃsavaṇṇānaṃ pupphānaṃ ekasuttaganthitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1236_1: mālaṃ olokentassa paṭipāṭiyā vā pana nikhāte dvattiṃsavatipāde paṭikkamitvā olokentassa
atk-abh02a:1236_2: paṭipāṭiyāva dvattiṃsavaṇṇāni pupphāni vatipādā vā pākaṭā honti, evameva dvattiṃsa
atk-abh02a:1236_3: koṭṭhāsā upaṭṭhahanti, vicarantā tiracchānagatāpi manussāpi sattāti na upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-abh02a:1236_4: koṭṭhāsāti upaṭṭhahanti, khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ koṭṭhāsantare pakkhippamānaṃ viya hoti.
atk-abh02a:1237_0: Koṭṭhāsānaṃ paguṇakālato paṭṭhāya tīsu mukhesu ekena mukhena vimuccissati. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1237_1: vaṇṇato vā paṭikūlato vā suññato vā upaṭṭhāti. Yathā nāma pūve pacitukāmā itthī madditvā
atk-abh02a:1237_2: ṭhapitapiṭṭhato yaṃ yaṃ icchati taṃ taṃ pacati, yathā vā pana same bhūmippadese ṭhapitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1237_3: udakapūraṃ kumbhaṃ yato yato āvijjhanti tato tatova udakaṃ nikkhamati; evameva koṭṭhāsānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1237_4: paguṇakālato paṭṭhāya tīsu mukhesu ekena mukhena vimuccissati. Ākaṅkhamānassa vaṇṇato,
atk-abh02a:1237_5: ākaṅkhamānassa paṭikūlato, ākaṅkhamānassa suññato kammaṭṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhahissatiyeva.
atk-abh02a:1237_6: Ayaṃ ettako uggahasandhi nāma. Imasmiṃ uggahasandhismiṃ ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pattā bhikkhu
atk-abh02a:1238_0: Yassa pana uggahasandhismiṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, tena kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā,
atk-abh02a:1238_1: sace yattha ācariyo vasati, so āvāso sappāyo hoti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce, sappāyaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1238_2: vasitabbaṃ. Vasantena aṭṭhārasa vihāradose vajjetvā pañcaṅgasamannāgate senāsane
atk-abh02a:1238_3: vasitabbaṃ, sayampi pañcaṅgasamannāgatena bhavitabbaṃ. Tato pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena
atk-abh02a:1238_4: rattiṭṭhānaṃ vā divāṭṭhānaṃ vā pavisitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1239_0: Kathaṃ? Ādito tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva anupubbato manasikātabbaṃ, na ekantarikā.
atk-abh02a:1239_1: Anupubbato manasikaronto hi dvattiṃsapadaṃ nisseṇiṃ padapaṭipāṭiyā akkamanto pāsādaṃ
atk-abh02a:1239_2: āruyha pāsādānisaṃsaṃ anubhavanakapuriso viya ‘kesā lomā’ti paṭipāṭiyā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1239_3: manasikaronto kammaṭṭhānato ca na parihāyati, pāsādānisaṃsasadise ca nava lokuttaradhamme
atk-abh02a:1239_4: anubhavati. Anupubbato manasikarontenāpi ca nātisīghato nātisaṇikato manasikātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1239_5: Atisīghato manasikarontassa hi kiñcāpi kammaṭṭhānaṃ paguṇaṃ hoti, avibhūtaṃ pana
atk-abh02a:1240_0: Atisaṇikato manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchati, antarāva osakkitabbaṃ
atk-abh02a:1240_1: hoti. Yathā hi puriso tiyojanaṃ maggaṃ sāyaṃ kacchaṃ bandhitvā paṭipanno nikkhantaṭṭhānato
atk-abh02a:1240_2: paṭṭhāya sītalacchāyaṃ disvā vissamati, ramaṇīyaṃ vālikatalaṃ disvā piṭṭhiṃ pasāreti,
atk-abh02a:1240_3: vanapokkharaṇiṃ disvā pānīyaṃ pivati nhāyati, pabbataṃ disvā āruyha pabbatarāmaṇeyyakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1240_4: passati, taṃ antarāyeva sīho vā byaggho vā dīpi vā hanati, corā vā pana viluppanti
atk-abh02a:1240_5: ceva hananti ca; evameva atisaṇikaṃ manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na
atk-abh02a:1241_0: Tasmā nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇikaṃ ekadivasaṃ tiṃsavāre manasikātabbaṃ; pātova dasa vāre,
atk-abh02a:1241_1: majjhanhike dasavāre, sāyanhe dasa vāre sajjhāyo kātabbo, no kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yathā
atk-abh02a:1241_2: hi pātova uṭṭhāya mukhaṃ no dhovituṃ na vaṭṭati, khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ no khādituṃ
atk-abh02a:1241_3: no bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati; etaṃ pana vaṭṭeyya; idameva ekantena no kātuṃ na vaṭṭati;
atk-abh02a:1241_4: karonto mahantaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati. Yathā hi ekassa purisassa tīṇi khettāni;
atk-abh02a:1241_5: ekaṃ khettaṃ aṭṭhakumbhaṃ deti, ekaṃ soḷasa, ekaṃ dvattiṃsa; tena tīṇipi khettāni
atk-abh02a:1241_6: paṭijaggituṃ asakkontena dve chaḍḍetvā ekaṃ dvattiṃsakumbhadāyakameva paṭijaggitabbaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1241_7: tattheva kasanavapananiddānādīni kātabbāni; tadevassa itaresu dvīsu uṭṭhānakadāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1241_8: dassati; evameva sesaṃ mukhadhovanādikammaṃ chaḍḍetvāpi ettheva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1241_9: no kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Karonto mahantaṃ atthaṃ gaṇhitvā tiṭṭhatīti ettāvatā majjhimā
atk-abh02a:1242_0: Evaṃ paṭipannenāpi vikkhepo paṭibāhitabbo. Kammaṭṭhānañhi vissajjetvā citte bahiddhā
atk-abh02a:1242_1: vikkhepaṃ gacchante kammaṭṭhānato parihāyati, vaṭṭabhayaṃ samatikkamituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh02a:1242_2: Yathā hi eko puriso sahassuddhāraṃ sādhetvā vaḍḍhiṃ labhitvā addhānaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge
atk-abh02a:1242_4: daṇḍakasetuṃ āruyha gacchanto akkamanapadaṃ vissajjetvā ito cito ca olokento paripatitvā
atk-abh02a:1242_5: kumbhīlādibhattaṃ hoti, evameva ayampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā sacitte bahiddhā
atk-abh02a:1242_6: vikkhepaṃ gacchante kammaṭṭhānato parihāyati, vaṭṭabhayaṃ samatikkamituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh02a:1243_0: Tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – purisassa sahassuddhāraṃ sādhetvā vaḍḍhiṃ laddhakālo
atk-abh02a:1243_1: viya hi imassa bhikkhuno ācariyasantike kammaṭṭhānassa uggahitakālo; antarā gambhīragirikandarā
atk-abh02a:1243_2: viya saṃsāro; tassa kumbhīlādīhi daṭṭhakālo viya vaṭṭamūlakāni mahādukkhāni; ekapadikadaṇḍakasetu
atk-abh02a:1243_3: viya imassa bhikkhuno sajjhāyavīthi; tassa purisassa ekapadikaṃ daṇḍakasetuṃ āruyha
atk-abh02a:1243_4: akkamanapadaṃ vissajjetvā ito cito ca olokentassa paripatitvā kumbhīlādīnaṃ bhattabhāvaṃ
atk-abh02a:1243_5: āpannakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā vikkhittacittassa
atk-abh02a:1243_6: kammaṭṭhānato parihāyitvā vaṭṭabhayaṃ samatikkamituṃ asamatthabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1244_0: Tasmā kesā manasikātabbā. Kese manasikaritvā cittuppādassa bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ paṭibāhitvā
atk-abh02a:1244_1: suddhacitteneva ‘lomā nakhā dantā taco’ti manasikātabbaṃ. Evaṃ manasikaronto kammaṭṭhānato
atk-abh02a:1244_2: na parihāyati, vaṭṭabhayaṃ samatikkamati. Opammaṃ panettha tadeva parivattetvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1244_3: Sahassuddhāraṃ sādhetvā vaḍḍhiṃ labhitvā chekassa purisassa daṇḍakasetuṃ āruyha nivāsanapārupanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1244_4: saṃvidhāya dhātupatthaddhakāyaṃ katvā sotthinā paratīragamanaṃ viya chekassa bhikkhuno
atk-abh02a:1244_5: kese manasikaritvā cittuppādassa bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ paṭibāhitvā suddhacitteneva ‘lomā
atk-abh02a:1244_6: nakhā dantā taco’ti manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānato aparihāyitvā vaṭṭabhayaṃ samatikkamanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1245_0: Evaṃ bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ paṭibāhantenāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamanato
atk-abh02a:1245_1: manasikātabbaṃ. ‘Kesā lomā’ti paṇṇattiṃ vissajjetvā ‘paṭikūlaṃ paṭikūla’nti sati
atk-abh02a:1245_2: ṭhapetabbā. Paṭhamaṃyeva pana paṭikūlato na upaṭṭhāti. Yāva na upaṭṭhāti tāva paṇṇatti
atk-abh02a:1245_3: na vissajjetabbā. Yadā upaṭṭhāti tadā paṇṇattiṃ vissajjetvā ‘paṭikūla’nti manasikātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1245_4: Karontena ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi paṭikūlato manasikātabbā. Tacapañcakasmiñhi
atk-abh02a:1245_5: vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavaseneva pañcavidhampi pāṭikūlyaṃ labbhati. Sesesupi yaṃ
atk-abh02a:1245_6: yaṃ labbhati, tassa tassa vasena manasikāro pavattetabbo.
atk-abh02a:1246_0: Tattha kesādayo pañca koṭṭhāsā subhanimittaṃ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇanti saṅkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1246_1: gatā. Ye keci rajjanakasattā nāma, sabbe te imesu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu rajjanti. Ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1246_2: pana bhikkhu mahājanassa rajjanaṭṭhāne ‘paṭikūla’nti appanaṃ pāpeti. Tattha appanāppattito
atk-abh02a:1247_0: Tatridaṃ opammaṃ – yathā hi cheko dhanuggaho rājānaṃ ārādhetvā satasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1247_1: gāmavaraṃ labhitvā sannaddhapañcāvudho tattha gacchanto antarāmagge dvattiṃsa core
atk-abh02a:1247_2: disvā tesu pañcacorajeṭṭhake ghāteyya; tesaṃ ghātitakālato paṭṭhāya tesu dve ekamaggaṃ
atk-abh02a:1247_3: paṭipajjamānā nāma na honti; evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dhanuggahassa rājānaṃ ārādhetvā
atk-abh02a:1247_4: gāmavaraṃ laddhakālo viya hi imassa bhikkhuno ācariyasantike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā
atk-abh02a:1247_5: ṭhitakālo; dvattiṃsa corā viya dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsā; pañca corajeṭṭhakā viya kesādayo
atk-abh02a:1247_6: pañca; corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno sabbasattānaṃ rajjanaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1247_7: tacapañcake ‘paṭikūla’nti appanāya pāpitakālo; sesacorānaṃ pāṇippahāreneva palāyitakālo
atk-abh02a:1248_0: Evaṃ paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamantena ca anupubbamuñcanato manasikāro pavattetabbo – kese
atk-abh02a:1248_1: manasikarontena manasikaronteneva kesesu sāpekkhena hutvā lomesu sati pesetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1248_2: Yāva lomā na upaṭṭhahanti tāva ‘kesā kesā’ti manasikātabbā. Yadā pana lomā upaṭṭhahanti
atk-abh02a:1248_3: tadā kese vissajjetvā lomesu sati upaṭṭhapetabbā. Evaṃ nakhādīsupi manasikāro pavattetabbo.
atk-abh02a:1249_0: Tatridaṃ opammaṃ – yathā hi jalūkā gacchamānā yāva purato patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati tāva
atk-abh02a:1249_1: pacchato naṅguṭṭhena gahitaṭṭhānaṃ na muñcati; yadā pana purato patiṭṭhaṃ labhati
atk-abh02a:1249_2: tadā naṅguṭṭhaṃ ukkhipitvā mukhena gahitaṭṭhāne ṭhapeti; evameva kese manasikarontena
atk-abh02a:1249_3: manasikaronteneva kesesu sāpekkhena hutvā lomesu sati pesetabbā. Yāva lomā na upaṭṭhahanti
atk-abh02a:1249_4: tāva ‘kesā kesā’ti manasikātabbā. Yadā lomā upaṭṭhahanti tadā kese vissajjetvā lomesu
atk-abh02a:1249_5: sati upaṭṭhapetabbā. Evaṃ nakhādīsupi manasikāro pavattetabbo.
atk-abh02a:1250_0: Evaṃ pavattentena appanā hotīti vuttamanasikārakosallaṃ sampādetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Idañhi
atk-abh02a:1250_1: appanākammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa appanaṃ pāpuṇāti; paṭhamaṃyeva tāva na upaṭṭhāti;
atk-abh02a:1250_2: anamataggasmiñhi saṃsāravaṭṭe ca nānārammaṇesu vaḍḍhitaṃ cittaṃ ‘kesā’ti āvajjitamatte
atk-abh02a:1250_4: sajjhāyasotānusārena āgantvā kesesu patiṭṭhāti. Manasikarontassa manasikarontassa
atk-abh02a:1250_5: pana so so koṭṭhāso upaṭṭhāti. Sati samādhināpi tiṭṭhamānā pavattati. Tena yo yo
atk-abh02a:1250_6: koṭṭhāso adhikataraṃ upaṭṭhāti tattha tattha dviguṇena yogaṃ katvā appanā pāpetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1250_7: Evaṃ appanāya pāpitakālato paṭṭhāya sesakoṭṭhāsesu akilamanto appanaṃ pāpeti. Tattha
atk-abh02a:1251_0: Apicettha evampi yojanā veditabbā – dvattiṃsatālakasmiñhi tālavane makkaṭo paṭivasati.
atk-abh02a:1251_1: Taṃ gahetukāmo luddo koṭiyaṃ ṭhitatālamūle ṭhatvā ukkuṭṭhimakāsi. Mānajātiko makkaṭo
atk-abh02a:1251_2: taṃ taṃ tālaṃ laṅghitvā pariyantatāle aṭṭhāsi. Luddo tatthapi gantvā ukkuṭṭhimakāsi.
atk-abh02a:1251_3: Makkaṭo puna tatheva purimatāle patiṭṭhāsi. So aparāparaṃ anubandhiyamāno kilamanto
atk-abh02a:1251_4: tassa tasseva tālassa mūle ṭhatvā ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhikāle uṭṭhahitvā gacchanto gacchanto
atk-abh02a:1251_5: atikilamanto ekassa tālassa makuḷapaṇṇasūciṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā dhanukoṭiyā vijjhitvā
atk-abh02a:1252_0: Tattha dvattiṃsa tālā viya dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsā; makkaṭo viya cittaṃ; luddo viya yogāvacaro;
atk-abh02a:1252_1: luddena tālamūle ṭhatvā ukkuṭṭhikāle mānajātikassa makkaṭassa palāyitvā pariyantakoṭiyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1252_2: ṭhitakālo viya anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe ca nānārammaṇesu vaḍḍhitacittassa ‘kesā’ti
atk-abh02a:1252_3: āvajjitamatte sajjhāyasotānusārena gantvā matthaluṅge patiṭṭhānaṃ; pariyantakoṭiyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1252_4: ṭhatvā ukkuṭṭhe orimakoṭiṃ āgamanakālo viya ‘matthaluṅga’nti āvajjitamatte sajjhāyasotānusārena
atk-abh02a:1252_5: gantvā kesesu patiṭṭhānaṃ; aparāparaṃ anubandhiyamānassa kilamantassa ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1252_6: uṭṭhānakālo viya manasikarontassa manasikarontassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ koṭṭhāse upaṭṭhahante
atk-abh02a:1252_7: satiyā patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhāya gamanaṃ; dhanukoṭiyā vijjhitvā gaṇhantassāpi apalāyanakālo
atk-abh02a:1252_8: viya yo koṭṭhāso adhikataraṃ upaṭṭhāti, tasmiṃ dviguṇaṃ manasikāraṃ katvā appanāya pāpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1253_0: Tattha appanāya pāpitakālato paṭṭhāya sesakoṭṭhāsesu akilamantova appanaṃ pāpessati.
atk-abh02a:1253_1: Tasmā ‘paṭikūlaṃ paṭikūla’nti punappunaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ samannāharitabbaṃ, takkāhataṃ
atk-abh02a:1253_2: vitakkāhataṃ kātabbaṃ. Evaṃ karontassa cattāro khandhā paṭikūlārammaṇā honti, appanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1253_4: heṭṭhā vuttasadisameva. Ekaṃ pana koṭṭhāsaṃ manasikarontassa ekameva paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1253_5: nibbattati. Pāṭiyekkaṃ manasikarontassa dvattiṃsa paṭhamajjhānāni nibbattanti. Hatthe
atk-abh02a:1254_0: So taṃ nimittanti so bhikkhu taṃ kammaṭṭhānanimittaṃ. Āsevatīti sevati bhajati. Bhāvetīti
atk-abh02a:1254_1: vaḍḍheti. Bahulīkarotīti punappunaṃ karoti. Svāvatthitaṃ vavatthapetīti suvavatthitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1254_2: karoti. Bahiddhā kāye cittaṃ upasaṃharatīti evaṃ katvā bahiddhā parassa kāye attano
atk-abh02a:1255_0: Atthissa kāyeti atthi assa kāye. Ajjhattabahiddhākāye cittaṃ upasaṃharatīti kālena
atk-abh02a:1255_1: attano kālena paresaṃ kāye cittaṃ upanāmeti. Atthi kāyeti idaṃ yasmā na ekantena
atk-abh02a:1255_2: attano kāyo nāpi parasseva kāyo adhippeto, tasmā vuttaṃ. Ettha pana attano jīvamānakasarīre
atk-abh02a:1255_3: ‘paṭikūla’nti parikammaṃ karontassa appanāpi upacārampi jāyati. Parassa jīvamānakasarīre
atk-abh02a:1255_4: ‘paṭikūla’nti manasikarontassa neva appanā jāyati, na upacāraṃ. Nanu ca dasasu asubhesu
atk-abh02a:1255_5: ubhayampetaṃ jāyatīti? Āma, jāyati. Tāni hi anupādinnakapakkhe ṭhitāni. Tasmā tattha
atk-abh02a:1255_6: appanāpi upacārampi jāyati. Idaṃ pana upādinnakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ. Tenevettha ubhayampetaṃ
atk-abh02a:1255_7: na jāyati. Asubhānupassanāsaṅkhātā pana vipassanābhāvanā hotīti veditabbā. Imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1256: Idānettha evaṃ sabbaṃ manasikārasādhāraṇaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ. Etesañhi –
atk-abh02a:1259_0: Tattha ‘nimittato’ti dvattiṃsākāre saṭṭhisataṃ nimittāni, yesaṃ vasena yogāvacaro
atk-abh02a:1259_1: dvattiṃsākāraṃ koṭṭhāsato pariggaṇhāti, seyyathidaṃ – kesassa vaṇṇanimittaṃ, saṇṭhānanimittaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1259_2: disānimittaṃ, okāsanimittaṃ, paricchedanimittanti pañca nimittāni honti. Lomādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1260_0: ‘Lakkhaṇato’ti dvattiṃsākāre aṭṭhavīsatisataṃ lakkhaṇāni honti, yesaṃ vasena yogāvacaro
atk-abh02a:1260_1: dvattiṃsākāraṃ lakkhaṇato manasikaroti, seyyathidaṃ – kese thaddhattalakkhaṇaṃ, ābandhattalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1260_2: uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ, vitthambhanalakkhaṇanti cattāri lakkhaṇāni honti. Lomādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1261_0: ‘Dhātuto’ti dvattiṃsākāre “catudhāturo ayaṃ, bhikkhu, puriso”ti vuttāsu dhātūsu aṭṭhavīsatisataṃ
atk-abh02a:1261_1: dhātuyo honti, yāsaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ dhātuto pariggaṇhāti, seyyathidaṃ
atk-abh02a:1261_2: – kese kakkhaḷatā pathavīdhātu, ābandhanatā āpodhātu, uṇhatā tejodhātu, vitthambhanatā
atk-abh02a:1261_3: vāyodhātūti catasso dhātuyo honti. Lomādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1262_0: ‘Suññato’ti dvattiṃsākāre channavuti suññatā honti, yāsaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1262_1: suññato vipassati, seyyathidaṃ – kesā suññā attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena
atk-abh02a:1262_2: vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vāti. Kese tāva attasuññatā, attaniyasuññatā,
atk-abh02a:1262_3: niccabhāvasuññatāti tisso suññatā honti. Lomādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1263_0: ‘Khandhādito’ti dvattiṃsākāre kesādīsu khandhādivasena pariggayhamānesu kesā kati
atk-abh02a:1263_1: khandhā honti, kati āyatanāni, kati dhātuyo, kati saccāni, kati satipaṭṭhānānītiādinā
atk-abh02a:1264_0: 357. Evaṃ ajjhattādibhedato tividhena kāyānupassanaṃ vitthārato dassetvā idāni “kāyānupassī
atk-abh02a:1264_1: viharati ātāpī sampajāno”tiādīni padāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ anupassītiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1264_2: Tattha yāya anupassanāya kāyānupassī nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ tattha katamā anupassanā?
atk-abh02a:1264_3: Yā paññā pajānanātiādi vuttaṃ. Ātāpītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1265_0: Tattha paññā pajānanātiādīni heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:1265_1: Upetotiādīni sabbāni aññamaññavevacanāni. Apica āsevanavasena upeto, bhāvanāvasena
atk-abh02a:1265_2: suṭṭhu upetoti samupeto. Upāgato samupāgato, upapanno sampannoti imesupi dvīsu dukesu
atk-abh02a:1265_3: ayameva nayo. Bahulīkāravasena pana samannāgatoti evamettha yojanā veditabbā. Iminā
atk-abh02a:1266_0: Viharatīti pade ‘tattha katamo vihāro’ti pucchaṃ akatvā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya
atk-abh02a:1266_1: desento iriyatītiādimāha. Tassattho – catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ aññatarasamaṅgībhāvato
atk-abh02a:1266_2: iriyati. Tehi iriyāpathacatukkehi kāyasakaṭavattanena vattati. Ekaṃ iriyāpathadukkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1266_3: aparena iriyāpathena bādhitvā ciraṭṭhitikabhāvena sarīrakkhanato pāleti. Ekasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1266_4: iriyāpathe asaṇṭhahitvā sabbiriyāpathavatanato yapeti. Tena tena iriyāpathena tathā
atk-abh02a:1266_5: tathā kāyassa yāpanato yāpeti. Cirakālavattāpanato carati. Iriyāpathena iriyāpathaṃ
atk-abh02a:1267_0: 362. Sveva kāyo lokoti yasmiṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharati, sveva kāyo lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:1267_1: loko. Yasmā panassa kāye pahīyamānaṃ abhijjhādomanassaṃ vedanādīsupi pahīyati eva,
atk-abh02a:1268_0: Santātiādīsupi nirodhavasena santatāya santā. Bhāvanāya samitattā samitā. Vatthupariññāya
atk-abh02a:1268_1: appavattivūpasamavasena vūpasantā. Nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ gatāti atthaṅgatā. Punappunaṃ
atk-abh02a:1268_2: nibbattiyā paṭibāhitattā ativiya atthaṃ gatāti abbhatthaṅgatā. Appitāti vināsitā,
atk-abh02a:1268_3: appavattiyaṃ ṭhapitātipi attho. Byappitāti suvināsitā, ativiya appavattiyaṃ ṭhapitātipi
atk-abh02a:1268_4: attho. Yathā puna na anvassavanti evaṃ sositattā sositā. Suṭṭhu sositāti visositā,
atk-abh02a:1268_5: sukkhāpitāti attho. Vigatantā katāti byantī katā. Ettha ca anupassanāya kammaṭṭhānavihārena
atk-abh02a:1268_6: kammaṭṭhānikassa kāyapariharaṇaṃ, ātāpena sammappadhānaṃ, satisampajaññena kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇūpāyo;
atk-abh02a:1268_7: satiyā vā kāyānupassanāvasena paṭiladdho samatho, sampajaññena vipassanā, abhijjhādomanassavinayena
atk-abh02a:1271_0: 363. Vedanānupassanāniddesepi heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Sukhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1271_1: vedanaṃ vedayamānotiādīsu pana sukhaṃ vedananti kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1271_2: vedayamāno ‘ahaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānātīti attho. Tattha kāmaṃ uttānaseyyakāpi
atk-abh02a:1271_3: dārakā thaññapivanādikāle sukhaṃ vedayamānā ‘sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmā’ti pajānanti,
atk-abh02a:1271_4: na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evarūpañhi jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ nappajahati,
atk-abh02a:1271_5: sattasaññaṃ na ugghāṭeti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti. Imassa
atk-abh02a:1271_6: pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ pajahati, sattasaññaṃ ugghāṭeti, kammaṭṭhānañceva
atk-abh02a:1271_7: satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā ca hoti. ‘Idañhi ko vedayati, kassa vedanā, kiṃ kāraṇā vedanā’ti
atk-abh02a:1272_0: Tattha ko vedayatīti? Na koci satto vā puggalo vā vedayati. Kassa vedanāti? Na kassaci
atk-abh02a:1272_1: sattassa vā puggalassa vā vedanā. Kiṃ kāraṇā vedanāti? Vatthuārammaṇā ca panesā vedanā.
atk-abh02a:1272_2: Tasmā esa evaṃ pajānāti – ‘taṃ taṃ sukhādīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayati;
atk-abh02a:1272_3: taṃ pana vedanāpavattiṃ upādāya ‘ahaṃ vedayāmī’ti vohāramattaṃ hotī’ti. Evaṃ vatthuṃ
atk-abh02a:1272_4: ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatīti sallakkhento ‘esa sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti
atk-abh02a:1272_5: pajānātīti veditabbo, cittalapabbate aññataro thero viya.
atk-abh02a:1273_0: Thero kira aphāsukakāle balavavedanāya nitthunanto aparāparaṃ parivattati. Tameko
atk-abh02a:1273_1: daharo āha – “kataraṃ vo, bhante, ṭhānaṃ rujatī”ti? “Āvuso, pāṭiyekkaṃ rujanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1273_2: nāma natthi; vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatī”ti. “Evaṃ jānanakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-abh02a:1273_3: adhivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati no, bhante”ti. “Adhivāsemi, āvuso”ti. “Adhivāsanā, bhante, seyyo”ti.
atk-abh02a:1273_4: Thero adhivāsesi. Vāto yāva hadayā phālesi. Mañcake antāni rāsīkatāni ahesuṃ. Thero
atk-abh02a:1273_5: daharassa dassesi – “vaṭṭatāvuso, ettakā adhivāsanā”ti? Daharo tuṇhī ahosi. Thero
atk-abh02a:1273_6: vīriyasamādhiṃ yojetvā sahapaṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi.
atk-abh02a:1274_0: Yathā ca sukhaṃ, evaṃ dukkhaṃ…pe… nirāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘nirāmisaṃ
atk-abh02a:1274_1: adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti. Iti bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā
atk-abh02a:1274_2: arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento vedanāvasena kathesi. Duvidhañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ – rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1274_3: arūpakammaṭṭhānañca; rūpapariggaho arūpapariggahotipi etadeva vuccati. Tattha bhagavā
atk-abh02a:1274_4: rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento saṅkhepamanasikāravasena vā vitthāramanasikāravasena vā
atk-abh02a:1274_5: catudhātuvavatthānaṃ kathesi. Tadubhayampi visuddhimagge sabbākārato dassitameva.
atk-abh02a:1275_0: Arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ pana kathento yebhuyyena vedanāvasena kathesi. Tividho hi arūpakammaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1275_1: abhiniveso – phassavasena, vedanāvasena, cittavasenāti. Kathaṃ? Ekaccassa hi saṃkhittena
atk-abh02a:1275_2: vā vitthārena vā pariggahite rūpakammaṭṭhāne tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittacetasikānaṃ paṭhamābhinipāto
atk-abh02a:1275_3: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusanto uppajjamāno phasso pākaṭo hoti. Ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantī
atk-abh02a:1275_4: uppajjamānā vedanā pākaṭā hoti. Ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā vijānantaṃ uppajjamānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1276_0: Tattha yassa phasso pākaṭo hoti, sopi ‘na kevalaṃ phassova uppajjati; tena saddhiṃ
atk-abh02a:1276_1: tadevārammaṇaṃ anubhavamānā vedanāpi uppajjati, sañjānamānā saññāpi, cetayamānā cetanāpi,
atk-abh02a:1276_2: vijānanamānaṃ viññāṇampi uppajjatī’ti phassapañcamakeyeva pariggaṇhāti. Yassa vedanā
atk-abh02a:1276_3: pākaṭā hoti, sopi ‘na kevalaṃ vedanāva uppajjati; tāya saddhiṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ phusamāno
atk-abh02a:1276_4: phassopi uppajjati, sañjānanamānā saññāpi, cetayamānā cetanāpi, vijānanamānaṃ viññāṇampi
atk-abh02a:1276_5: uppajjatī’ti phassapañcamakeyeva pariggaṇhāti. Yassa viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, sopi
atk-abh02a:1276_6: ‘na kevalaṃ viññāṇameva uppajjati; tena saddhiṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ phusamāno phassopi
atk-abh02a:1276_7: uppajjati, anubhavamānā vedanāpi, sañjānanamānā saññāpi, cetayamānā cetanāpi uppajjatī’ti
atk-abh02a:1277_0: So ‘ime phassapañcamakā dhammā kiṃnissitā’ti upadhārento ‘vatthunissitā’ti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1277_1: Vatthu nāma karajakāyo; yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “idañca pana me viññāṇaṃ etthasitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1277_2: etthapaṭibaddha”nti. So atthato bhūtāni ceva upādārūpāni ca. Evamettha vatthu rūpaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1277_3: phassapañcamakā nāmanti nāmarūpameva passati. Rūpañcettha rūpakkhandho, nāmaṃ cattāro
atk-abh02a:1277_4: arūpino khandhāti pañcakkhandhamattaṃ hoti. Nāmarūpavinimuttā hi pañcakkhandhā pañcakkhandhavinimuttaṃ
atk-abh02a:1278_0: So ‘ime pañcakkhandhā kiṃhetukā’ti upaparikkhanto ‘avijjādihetukā’ti passati; tato
atk-abh02a:1278_1: paccayo ceva paccayuppannañca idaṃ; añño satto vā puggalo vā natthi; suddhasaṅkhārapuñjamattamevāti
atk-abh02a:1278_3: anattā’ti sammasanto vicarati. So ‘ajja ajjā’ti paṭivedhaṃ ākaṅkhamāno tathārūpe
atk-abh02a:1278_4: divase utusappāyaṃ, puggalasappāyaṃ, bhojanasappāyaṃ, dhammasavanasappāyaṃ vā labhitvā
atk-abh02a:1278_5: ekapallaṅkena nisinnova vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāti. Evaṃ imesaṃ
atk-abh02a:1278_6: tiṇṇampi janānaṃ yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1279_0: Idha pana bhagavā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento vedanāvasena kathesi. Phassavasena vā
atk-abh02a:1279_1: hi viññāṇavasena vā kathiyamānaṃ na pākaṭaṃ hoti, andhakāraṃ viya khāyati. Vedanāvasena
atk-abh02a:1279_2: pana pākaṭaṃ hoti. Kasmā? Vedanānaṃ uppattipākaṭatāya. Sukhadukkhavedanānañhi uppatti
atk-abh02a:1279_3: pākaṭā. Yadā sukhaṃ uppajjati, sakalasarīraṃ khobhentaṃ maddantaṃ pharamānaṃ abhisandayamānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1279_4: satadhotasappiṃ khādāpayantaṃ viya, satapākatelaṃ makkhāpayamānaṃ viya, udakaghaṭasahassena
atk-abh02a:1279_5: pariḷāhaṃ nibbāpayamānaṃ viya, ‘aho sukhaṃ! Aho sukhanti’! Vācaṃ nicchārayamānameva
atk-abh02a:1279_6: uppajjati. Yadā dukkhaṃ uppajjati, sakalasarīraṃ khobhentaṃ maddantaṃ pharamānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1279_7: abhisandayamānaṃ tattaphālaṃ pavesentaṃ viya, vilīnatambalohena āsiñcantaṃ viya,
atk-abh02a:1279_8: sukkhatiṇavanappatimhi araññe dāruukkākalāpaṃ pakkhipamānaṃ viya ‘aho dukkhaṃ! Aho
atk-abh02a:1279_9: dukkhanti!’ Vippalāpayamānameva uppajjati. Iti sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ uppatti pākaṭā hoti.
atk-abh02a:1280_0: Adukkhamasukhā pana duddīpanā andhakārā avibhūtā. Sā sukhadukkhānaṃ apagame sātāsātapaṭikkhepavasena
atk-abh02a:1280_1: majjhattākārabhūtā adukkhamasukhā vedanāti nayato gaṇhantassa pākaṭā hoti. Yathā
atk-abh02a:1280_2: kiṃ? Antarā piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ āruhitvā palāyantassa migassa anupathaṃ gacchanto migaluddako
atk-abh02a:1280_3: piṭṭhipāsāṇassa orabhāge aparabhāgepi padaṃ disvā majjhe apassantopi ‘ito āruḷho,
atk-abh02a:1280_4: ito oruḷho, majjhe piṭṭhipāsāṇe iminā padesena gato bhavissatī’ti nayato jānāti.
atk-abh02a:1280_5: Evaṃ āruḷhaṭṭhāne padaṃ viya hi sukhāya vedanāya uppatti pākaṭā hoti; oruḷhaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1280_6: padaṃ viya dukkhāya vedanāya uppatti pākaṭā hoti. ‘Ito āruḷho, ito oruḷho, majjhe
atk-abh02a:1280_7: evaṃ gato’ti nayato gahaṇaṃ viya sukhadukkhānaṃ apagame sātāsātapaṭikkhepavasena
atk-abh02a:1280_8: majjhattākārabhūtā adukkhamasukhā vedanāti nayato gaṇhantassa pākaṭā hoti.
atk-abh02a:1281_0: Evaṃ bhagavā paṭhamaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā pacchā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento
atk-abh02a:1281_1: vedanāvasena vinivattetvā dassesi; na kevalañca idheva evaṃ dasseti, dīghanikāyamhi
atk-abh02a:1281_2: mahānidāne, sakkapañhe, mahāsatipaṭṭhāne, majjhimanikāyamhi satipaṭṭhāne ca cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhaye,
atk-abh02a:1281_3: mahātaṇhāsaṅkhaye, cūḷavedalle, mahāvedalle, raṭṭhapālasutte, māgaṇḍiyasutte, dhātuvibhaṅge,
atk-abh02a:1281_5: sakale vedanāsaṃyutteti evaṃ anekesu suttesu paṭhamaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā pacchā
atk-abh02a:1281_6: arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ vedanāvasena vinivattetvā dassesi. Yathā ca tesu tesu, evaṃ imasmimpi
atk-abh02a:1281_7: satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge paṭhamaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā pacchā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1282_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vedanantiādīsu ayaṃ aparopi pajānanapariyāyo – sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti
atk-abh02a:1282_1: pajānātīti sukhavedanākkhaṇe dukkhāya vedanāya abhāvato sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno
atk-abh02a:1282_2: ‘sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti. Tena yā pubbe bhūtapubbā dukkhā vedanā, tassā
atk-abh02a:1282_3: idāni abhāvato imissā ca sukhāya ito paṭhamaṃ abhāvato vedanā nāma aniccā addhuvā
atk-abh02a:1282_4: vipariṇāmadhammāti itiha tattha sampajāno hoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-abh02a:1283_0: “Yasmiṃ, aggivessana, samaye sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1283_1: vedeti, na adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, sukhaṃyeva tasmiṃ samaye vedanaṃ vedeti.
atk-abh02a:1283_2: Yasmiṃ, aggivessana, samaye dukkhaṃ…pe… adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, neva tasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1283_3: samaye sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, na dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, adukkhamasukhaṃyeva tasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1283_4: samaye vedanaṃ vedeti. Sukhāpi kho, aggivessana, vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā
atk-abh02a:1283_5: khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā. Dukkhāpi kho…pe… adukkhamasukhāpi
atk-abh02a:1283_6: kho, aggivessana, vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā…pe… nirodhadhammā. Evaṃ passaṃ, aggivessana,
atk-abh02a:1283_7: sutavā ariyasāvako sukhāyapi vedanāya nibbindati, dukkhāyapi vedanāya nibbindati,
atk-abh02a:1283_8: adukkhamasukhāyapi vedanāya nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati, vimuttasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1283_9: vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti; ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ
atk-abh02a:1284_0: Sāmisaṃ vā sukhantiādīsu sāmisā sukhā nāma pañcakāmaguṇāmisanissitā cha gehassitasomanassavedanā;
atk-abh02a:1284_1: nirāmisā sukhā nāma cha nekkhammassitasomanassavedanā; sāmisā dukkhā nāma cha gehassitadomanassavedanā;
atk-abh02a:1284_2: nirāmisā dukkhā nāma cha nekkhammassitadomanassavedanā; sāmisā adukkhamasukhā nāma
atk-abh02a:1284_3: cha gehasitaupekkhāvedanā; nirāmisā adukkhamasukhā nāma cha nekkhammassitaupekkhāvedanā.
atk-abh02a:1284_4: Tāsaṃ vibhāgo uparipaṇṇāse pāḷiyaṃ āgatoyeva. So taṃ nimittanti so taṃ vedanānimittaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1284_5: Bahiddhā vedanāsūti parapuggalassa vedanāsu. Sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānanti parapuggalaṃ
atk-abh02a:1284_6: sukhavedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ. Ajjhattabahiddhāti kālena attano kālena parassa vedanāsu
