atk-abh02a:1284_7: cittaṃ upasaṃharati. Imasmiṃ vāre yasmā neva attā, na paro niyamito; tasmā vedanāpariggahamattameva
atk-abh02a:1284_8: dassetuṃ “idha bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ sukhā vedanā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-abh02a:1287_0: 365. Cittānupassanāniddesepi heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Sarāgaṃ
atk-abh02a:1287_1: vā cittantiādīsu pana sarāganti aṭṭhavidhaṃ lobhasahagataṃ. Vītarāganti lokiyakusalābyākataṃ.
atk-abh02a:1287_2: Idaṃ pana yasmā sammasanaṃ na dhammasamodhānaṃ, tasmā idha ekapadepi lokuttaraṃ na
atk-abh02a:1287_3: labbhati. Yasmā pahānekaṭṭhavasena rāgādīhi saha vattanti pahīyanti, tasmā dvīsu
atk-abh02a:1287_4: padesu nippariyāyena na labbhantīti na gahitāni. Sesāni cattāri akusalacittāni neva
atk-abh02a:1287_5: purimapadaṃ, na pacchimapadaṃ bhajanti. Sadosanti duvidhaṃ domanassasahagataṃ. Vītadosanti
atk-abh02a:1287_6: lokiyakusalābyākataṃ. Sesāni dasa akusalacittāni neva purimapadaṃ, na pacchimapadaṃ
atk-abh02a:1287_7: bhajanti. Samohanti vicikicchāsahagatañceva uddhaccasahagatañcāti duvidhaṃ. Yasmā
atk-abh02a:1287_8: pana moho sabbākusalesu uppajjati, tasmā sesānipi idha vaṭṭanti eva. Imasmiṃ yeva
atk-abh02a:1287_9: hi duke dvādasākusalacittāni pariyādiṇṇānīti. Vītamohanti lokiyakusalābyākataṃ. Saṃkhittanti
atk-abh02a:1287_10: thinamiddhānupatitaṃ. Etañhi saṅkuṭitacittaṃ nāma. Vikkhittanti uddhaccasahagataṃ.
atk-abh02a:1288_0: Mahaggatanti rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacarañca. Amahaggatanti kāmāvacaraṃ. Sauttaranti kāmāvacaraṃ.
atk-abh02a:1288_1: Anuttaranti rūpāvacarañca arūpāvacarañca. Tatrāpi sauttaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ, anuttaraṃ
atk-abh02a:1288_2: arūpāvacarameva. Samāhitanti yassa appanāsamādhi upacārasamādhi vā atthi. Asamāhitanti
atk-abh02a:1288_5: natthi. Sarāgamassa cittanti sarāgaṃ assa cittaṃ. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
atk-abh02a:1292_0: 367. Ettāvatā yasmā kāyānupassanāya rūpakkhandhapariggahova kathito, vedanānupassanāya
atk-abh02a:1292_3: dassento kathañca bhikkhūtiādimāha. Tattha santanti abhiṇhasamudācāravasena saṃvijjamānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1292_4: Asantanti asamudācāravasena vā pahīnattā vā avijjamānaṃ. Yathā cāti yena kāraṇena
atk-abh02a:1292_5: kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti. Tañca pajānātīti tañca kāraṇaṃ pajānāti. Iminā nayena
atk-abh02a:1293_0: Tattha subhanimitte ayonisomanasikārena kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti. Subhanimittaṃ
atk-abh02a:1293_1: nāma subhampi subhanimittaṃ, subhārammaṇampi subhanimittaṃ. Ayonisomanasikāro nāma
atk-abh02a:1293_2: anupāyamanasikāro uppathamanasikāro, anicce niccanti vā dukkhe sukhanti vā anattani
atk-abh02a:1293_3: attāti vā asubhe subhanti vā manasikāro. Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato kāmacchando
atk-abh02a:1294: “Atthi, bhikkhave, subhanimittaṃ. Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1295_0: Asubhanimitte pana yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti. Asubhanimittaṃ nāma asubhampi
atk-abh02a:1295_1: asubhanimittaṃ, asubhārammaṇampi asubhanimittaṃ. Yonisomanasikāro nāma upāyamanasikāro
atk-abh02a:1295_2: pathamanasikāro, anicce aniccanti vā dukkhe dukkhanti vā anattani anattāti vā asubhe
atk-abh02a:1295_3: asubhanti vā manasikāro. Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato kāmacchando pahīyati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-abh02a:1296: “Atthi, bhikkhave, asubhanimittaṃ. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamanāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya, vepullāyā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1297_0: Apica cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – asubhanimittassa uggaho, asubhabhāvanānuyogo,
atk-abh02a:1297_1: indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti. Dasavidhañhi
atk-abh02a:1297_2: asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhantassāpi kāmacchando pahīyati, bhāventassāpi; indriyesu pihitadvārassāpi;
atk-abh02a:1297_3: catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ ālopānaṃ okāse sati udakaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlatāya bhojane mattaññunopi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1300_1: pahīyati; ṭhānanisajjādīsu dasaasubhanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-abh02a:1300_2: “cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti. Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa
atk-abh02a:1300_3: kāmacchandassa arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1301_0: Paṭighanimitte ayonisomanasikārena pana byāpādassa uppādo hoti. Tattha paṭighampi
atk-abh02a:1301_1: paṭighanimittaṃ nāma; paṭighārammaṇampi paṭighanimittaṃ. Ayonisomanasikāro sabbattha
atk-abh02a:1301_2: ekalakkhaṇova. Taṃ tasmiṃ nimitte bahulaṃ pavattayato byāpādo uppajjati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-abh02a:1302: “Atthi, bhikkhave, paṭighanimittaṃ. Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1303_0: Mettāya pana cetovimuttiyā yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti. Tattha mettāti vutte
atk-abh02a:1303_1: appanāpi upacāropi vaṭṭati; cetovimuttīti appanāva. Yonisomanasikāro vuttalakkhaṇova.
atk-abh02a:1303_2: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato byāpādo pahīyati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-abh02a:1304: “Atthi, bhikkhave, mettācetovimutti. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya, vepullāyā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1305_0: Apica cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – mettānimittassa uggaho, mettābhāvanānuyogo,
atk-abh02a:1305_2: Odissakānodissakadisāpharaṇānañhi aññataravasena mettaṃ uggaṇhantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati.
atk-abh02a:1305_3: Odhiso anodhiso disāpharaṇavasena mettaṃ bhāventassāpi. ‘Tvaṃ etassa kuddho kiṃ karissasi,
atk-abh02a:1305_4: kimassa sīlādīni vināsetuṃ sakkhissasi? Nanu tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva
atk-abh02a:1305_5: gamissasi? Parassa kujjhanaṃ nāma vītaccitaṅgāratattaayosalākagūthādīni gahetvā parassa
atk-abh02a:1305_6: paharitukāmatāsadisaṃ hoti. Esopi tava kuddho kiṃ karissati? Kiṃ te sīlādīni vināsetuṃ
atk-abh02a:1305_7: sakkhissati? Esa attano kammenāgantvā attano kammeneva gamissati; appaṭicchitapaheṇakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1305_8: viya paṭivātakhittarajomuṭṭhi viya ca etassevesa kodho matthake patissatī’ti. Evaṃ
atk-abh02a:1305_9: attano ca parassa ca kammassakataṃ paccavekkhatopi, ubhayakammassakataṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-abh02a:1305_10: paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhitassāpi, assaguttattherasadise mettābhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi
atk-abh02a:1305_11: byāpādo pahīyati; ṭhānanisajjādīsu mettānissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-abh02a:1305_12: “cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti. Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa
atk-abh02a:1305_13: byāpādassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1306_0: Aratītiādīsu ayonisomanasikārena thinamiddhassa uppādo hoti. Arati nāma ukkaṇṭhitatā.
atk-abh02a:1306_1: Tandī nāma kāyālasiyatā. Vijambhikā nāma kāyavināmanā. Bhattasammado nāma bhattamucchā
atk-abh02a:1306_2: bhattapariḷāho. Cetaso līnattaṃ nāma cittassa līnākāro. Imesu aratiādīsu ayonisomanasikāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1306_3: bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-abh02a:1307_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, arati tandī vijambhikā bhattasammado cetaso ca līnattaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh02a:1307_1: ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā thinamiddhassa uppādāya,
atk-abh02a:1308_0: Ārambhadhātuādīsu pana yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti. Ārambhadhātu nāma paṭhamārambhavīriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1308_1: Nikkamadhātu nāma kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavataraṃ. Parakkamadhātu nāma paraṃ
atk-abh02a:1308_2: paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ. Imasmiṃ tippabhede vīriye yonisomanasikāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1308_3: bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-abh02a:1309_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, ārambhadhātu, nikkamadhātu, parakkamadhātu. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro
atk-abh02a:1309_1: – ayamanāhāro anuppannassa vā thinamiddhassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā thinamiddhassa
atk-abh02a:1310_0: Apica cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – atibhojane nimittaggāho, iriyāpathasamparivattanatā,
atk-abh02a:1310_2: bhuttavamitaka tatravaṭṭaka alaṃsāṭaka kākamāsakabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1310_3: nisinnassa hi samaṇadhammaṃ karoto thinamiddhaṃ mahāhatthī viya ottharantaṃ āgacchati.
atk-abh02a:1310_4: Catupañcaālopaokāsaṃ pana ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlassa bhikkhuno taṃ na
atk-abh02a:1310_5: hotīti atibhojane nimittaṃ gaṇhantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati. Yasmiṃ iriyāpathe
atk-abh02a:1310_6: thinamiddhaṃ okkamati tato aññaṃ parivattentassāpi, rattiṃ candālokadīpālokaukkāloke
atk-abh02a:1310_7: divā sūriyālokaṃ manasikarontassāpi, abbhokāse vasantassāpi, mahākassapattherasadise
atk-abh02a:1310_8: pahīnathinamiddhe kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati; ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-abh02a:1310_9: dhutaṅganissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā thinamiddhassa
atk-abh02a:1310_10: pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti. Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa thinamiddhassa arahattamaggena
atk-abh02a:1311_0: Cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārena uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādo hoti. Avūpasamo nāma
atk-abh02a:1311_1: avūpasantākāro; uddhaccakukkuccamevetaṃ atthato. Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ
atk-abh02a:1312_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, cetaso avūpasamo. Tattha ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro – ayamāhāro
atk-abh02a:1312_1: anuppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1313: Samādhisaṅkhāte pana cetaso vūpasame yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-abh02a:1314_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, cetaso vūpasamo. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro – ayamanāhāro
atk-abh02a:1314_1: anuppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhāvāya, vepullāyā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1315_0: Apica cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – bahussutatā, paripucchakatā,
atk-abh02a:1315_1: vinaye pakataññutā, vuḍḍhasevitā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti. Bāhusaccenapi hi
atk-abh02a:1315_2: ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi
atk-abh02a:1315_4: ciṇṇavasībhāvatāya pakataññunopi, vuḍḍhe mahallakatthere upasaṅkamantassāpi, upālittherasadise
atk-abh02a:1315_5: vinayadhare kalyāṇamitte sevantassapi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati; ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-abh02a:1315_6: kappiyākappiyanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa
atk-abh02a:1315_7: pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti. Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīne uddhaccakukkucce uddhaccassa
atk-abh02a:1315_8: arahattamaggena kukkuccassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1316_0: Vicikicchāṭhānīyesu dhammesu ayonisomanasikārena vicikicchāya uppādo hoti. Vicikicchāṭhānīyā
atk-abh02a:1316_1: dhammā nāma punappunaṃ vicikicchāya kāraṇattā vicikicchāva. Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1316_2: bahulaṃ pavattayato vicikicchā uppajjati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-abh02a:1317_1: ayamāhāro anuppannāya vā vicikicchāya uppādāya, uppannāya vā vicikicchāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1318: Kusalādidhammesu yonisomanasikārena panassā pahānaṃ hoti. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-abh02a:1319_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, kusalākusalā dhammā, sāvajjānavajjā dhammā, hīnappaṇītā dhammā,
atk-abh02a:1319_1: kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro – ayamanāhāro anuppannāya
atk-abh02a:1319_2: vā vicikicchāya uppādāya, uppannāya vā vicikicchāya bhiyyobhāvāya, vepullāyā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1320_0: Apica cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya saṃvattanti – bahussutatā, paripucchakatā,
atk-abh02a:1320_1: vinaye pakataññutā, adhimokkhabahulatā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti. Bāhusaccenapi
atk-abh02a:1320_2: hi ekaṃ vā…pe… pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi vicikicchā
atk-abh02a:1320_3: pahīyati. Tīṇi ratanāni ārabbha paripucchābahulassāpi, vinaye ciṇṇavasībhāvassāpi,
atk-abh02a:1320_5: kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati. Ṭhānanissajjādīsu tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1320_6: guṇanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya
atk-abh02a:1320_7: saṃvattantī”ti. Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnāya vicikicchāya sotāpattimaggena
atk-abh02a:1323: Bojjhaṅgapabbe santanti paṭilābhavasena vijjamānaṃ. Asantanti appaṭilābhavasena avijjamānaṃ. Yathā ca anuppannassātiādīsu pana satisambojjhaṅgassa tāva –
atk-abh02a:1324_1: – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa
atk-abh02a:1324_2: bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti – evaṃ uppādo hoti. Tattha
atk-abh02a:1324_3: satiyeva satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā. Yonisomanasikāro vuttalakkhaṇoyeva. Taṃ
atk-abh02a:1325_0: Apica cattāro dhammā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – satisampajaññaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1325_2: Abhikkantādīsu hi sattasu ṭhānesu satisampajaññena, bhattanikkhittakākasadise muṭṭhassatipuggale
atk-abh02a:1325_5: uppajjati. Evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1327_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, kusalākusalā dhammā…pe… kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā. Tattha
atk-abh02a:1327_2: uppādāya, uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya
atk-abh02a:1329_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – paripucchakatā,
atk-abh02a:1329_4: visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Yadā hissa kesanakhalomāni dīghāni honti, sarīraṃ vā ussannadosañceva
atk-abh02a:1329_5: sedamalamakkhitañca, tadā ajjhattikaṃ vatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ. Yadā pana
atk-abh02a:1329_6: cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti, senāsanaṃ vā uklāpaṃ, tadā bāhiraṃ vatthu
atk-abh02a:1329_7: avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ. Tasmā kesādichedanena uddhaṃvirecanaadhovirecanādīhi
atk-abh02a:1329_8: sarīrasallahukabhāvakaraṇena, ucchādananhāpanena ca ajjhattikavatthu visadaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1329_10: ajjhattikabāhiravatthumhi avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi avisadaṃ hoti
atk-abh02a:1329_11: aparisuddhaṃ; aparisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso
atk-abh02a:1329_12: viya. Visade pana ajjhattikabāhiravatthumhi uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ
atk-abh02a:1329_13: hoti parisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
atk-abh02a:1330_0: Indriyasamattapaṭipādanā nāma saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ samabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Sace hissa
atk-abh02a:1330_1: saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, itarāni mandāni, tato vīriyindriyaṃ paggahakiccaṃ, satindriyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1330_2: upaṭṭhānakiccaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ avikkhepakiccaṃ, paññindriyaṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ
atk-abh02a:1330_3: na sakkoti. Tasmā taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vā yathā vā manasikaroto balavaṃ
atk-abh02a:1330_4: jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena hāpetabbaṃ. Vakkalittheravatthu cettha nidassanaṃ. Sace
atk-abh02a:1330_5: pana vīriyindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:1330_6: na itarāni itarakiccabhedaṃ. Tasmā taṃ passaddhādibhāvanāya hāpetabbaṃ. Tatrāpi soṇattheravatthu
atk-abh02a:1330_7: dassetabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ attano kiccesu asamatthatā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1331_0: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samataṃ pasaṃsanti. Balavasaddho
atk-abh02a:1331_1: hi mandapañño muddhappasanno hoti, avatthusmiṃ pasīdati. Balavapañño mandasaddho
atk-abh02a:1331_2: kerāṭikapakkhaṃ bhajati, bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hoti ‘cittuppādamatteneva
atk-abh02a:1331_3: kusalaṃ hotī’ti atidhāvitvā dānādīni puññāni akaronto niraye uppajjati. Ubhinnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1331_4: pana samatāya vatthusmiṃyeva pasīdati. Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ, samādhissa
atk-abh02a:1331_5: kosajjapakkhattā, kosajjaṃ adhibhavati. Balavavīriyaṃ mandasamādhiṃ, vīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā,
atk-abh02a:1331_6: uddhaccaṃ adhibhavati. Samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati.
atk-abh02a:1331_7: Vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati. Tasmā tadubhayampi samaṃ
atk-abh02a:1331_8: kātabbaṃ. Ubhayasamatāya hi appanā hoti. Apica samādhikammikassa balavatīpi saddhā
atk-abh02a:1331_9: vaṭṭati. Evaṃ so saddahanto okappento appanaṃ pāpuṇissati.
atk-abh02a:1332_0: Samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati. Evañhi so appanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1332_1: pāpuṇāti. Vipassanākammikassa paññā balavatī vaṭṭati. Evañhi so lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1332_2: pāpuṇāti. Ubhinnaṃ pana samatāya appanā hotiyeva. Sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1332_3: Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato, kosajjapakkhikena
atk-abh02a:1332_4: ca samādhinā kosajjapātato rakkhati. Tasmā sā, loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbabyañjanesu,
atk-abh02a:1332_5: sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbarājakiccesu, sabbattha icchitabbā. Tenāha “sati ca
atk-abh02a:1332_6: pana sabbatthikā vuttā bhagavatā. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Cittañhi satipaṭisaraṇaṃ, ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā
atk-abh02a:1332_7: ca sati; na vinā satiyā cittassa paggahaniggaho hotī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1333_3: gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā. Tadadhimuttatā
atk-abh02a:1333_5: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1335_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, ārambhadhātu nikkamadhātu parakkamadhātu. Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro
atk-abh02a:1335_1: – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa
atk-abh02a:1337_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇatā,
atk-abh02a:1338_0: Tattha nirayesu pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇato paṭṭhāya mahādukkhaṃ anubhavanakālepi,
atk-abh02a:1338_2: pana sakaṭavahanādikālepi, pettivisaye anekānipi vassasahassāni ekaṃ buddhantarampi
atk-abh02a:1338_4: aṭṭhicammamatteneva attabhāvena vātātapādidukkhānubhavanakālepi na sakkā vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ
atk-abh02a:1338_5: uppādetuṃ. ‘Ayameva te, bhikkhu, kālo vīriyakaraṇāyā’ti evaṃ apāyabhayaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi
atk-abh02a:1338_6: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati. ‘Na sakkā kusītena nava lokuttaradhammā laddhuṃ; āraddhavīriyeneva
atk-abh02a:1338_7: sakkā; ayamānisaṃso vīriyassā’ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinopi uppajjati. ‘Sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhamahāsāvakeheva
atk-abh02a:1338_8: te gatamaggo gantabbo; so ca na sakkā kusītena gantu’nti evaṃ gamanavīthiṃ paccavekkhantassāpi
atk-abh02a:1338_9: uppajjati. ‘Ye taṃ piṇḍapātādīhi upaṭṭhahanti, ime te manussā neva ñātakā, na dāsakammakarā,
atk-abh02a:1338_10: nāpi taṃ nissāya ‘jīvissāmā’ti te paṇītāni piṇḍapātādīni denti; atha kho attano kārānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1338_11: mahapphalataṃ paccāsiṃsamānā denti. Satthārāpi ‘ayaṃ ime paccaye paribhuñjitvā kāyadaḷhībahulo
atk-abh02a:1338_12: sukhaṃ viharissatī’ti na evañca sampassatā tuyhaṃ paccayā anuññatā; atha kho ‘ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1338_13: ime paribhuñjamāno samaṇadhammaṃ katvā vaṭṭadukkhato muccissatī’ti te paccayā anuññātā.
atk-abh02a:1338_14: So dāni tvaṃ kusīto viharanto na taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ apacāyissasi. Āraddhavīriyasseva
atk-abh02a:1338_15: hi piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ nāma hotī’ti evaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1339_0: Thero kira kassakaleṇe nāma paṭivasati. Tassa ca gocaragāme ekā mahāupāsikā theraṃ
atk-abh02a:1339_1: puttaṃ katvā paṭijaggati. Sā ekadivasaṃ araññaṃ gacchantī dhītaraṃ āha – “amma, asukasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1339_2: ṭhāne purāṇataṇḍulā, asukasmiṃ khīraṃ, asukasmiṃ sappi, asukasmiṃ phāṇitaṃ. Tava
atk-abh02a:1339_3: bhātikassa ayyamittassa āgatakāle bhattaṃ pacitvā khīrasappiphāṇitehi saddhiṃ dehi,
atk-abh02a:1339_4: tvañca bhuñjeyyāsī”ti. “Tvaṃ pana kiṃ bhuñjissasi, ammā”ti? “Ahaṃ pana hiyyo pakkaṃ
atk-abh02a:1339_5: pārivāsikabhattaṃ kañjiyena bhuttamhī”ti. “Divā kiṃ bhuñjissasi, ammā”ti? “Sākapaṇṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1339_6: pakkhipitvā kaṇataṇḍulehi ambilayāguṃ pacitvā ṭhapehi, ammā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1340_0: Thero cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ nīharantova taṃ saddaṃ sutvā attānaṃ ovadi – ‘mahāupāsikā
atk-abh02a:1340_1: kira kañjiyena pārivāsikabhattaṃ bhuñji; divāpi kaṇapaṇṇambilayāguṃ bhuñjissati;
atk-abh02a:1340_2: tuyhaṃ atthāya pana purāṇataṇḍulādīni ācikkhati. Taṃ nissāya kho panesā neva khettaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1340_3: na vatthuṃ, na bhattaṃ, na vatthaṃ paccāsīsati; tisso pana sampattiyo patthayamānā
atk-abh02a:1340_4: deti. Tvaṃ etissā tā sampattiyo dātuṃ sakkhissasi, na sakkhissasīti? Ayaṃ kho pana
atk-abh02a:1340_5: piṇḍapāto tayā sarāgena sadosena samohena na sakkā bhuñjitu’nti pattaṃ thavikāya
atk-abh02a:1340_6: pakkhipitvā gaṇṭhikaṃ muñcitvā nivattitvā kassakaleṇameva gantvā pattaṃ heṭṭhāmañce
atk-abh02a:1340_7: cīvaraṃ cīvaravaṃse ṭhapetvā ‘arahattaṃ apāpuṇitvā na nikkhamissāmī’ti vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-abh02a:1340_8: nisīdi. Dīgharattaṃ appamatto hutvā nivutthabhikkhu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purebhattameva
atk-abh02a:1340_9: arahattaṃ patvā vikasamānamiva padumaṃ mahākhīṇāsavo sitaṃ karontova nisīdi. Leṇadvāre
atk-abh02a:1342: Yassa te āsavā khīṇā, dakkhiṇeyyosi mārisā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1343: Udānaṃ udānetvā – ‘bhante, piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ tumhādisānaṃ arahantānaṃ bhikkhaṃ datvā mahallakitthiyo dukkhā muccissantī’ti āha.
atk-abh02a:1344_0: Thero uṭṭhahitvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā kālaṃ olokento ‘pātoyevā’ti ñatvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-abh02a:1344_1: gāmaṃ pāvisi. Dārikāpi bhattaṃ sampādetvā ‘idāni me bhātā āgamissati, idāni me bhātā
atk-abh02a:1344_2: āgamissatīti dvāraṃ vivaritvā olokayamānā nisīdi. Sā, there gharadvāraṃ sampatte,
atk-abh02a:1344_3: pattaṃ gahetvā sappiphāṇitayojitassa khīrapiṇḍapātassa pūretvā hatthe ṭhapesi. Thero
atk-abh02a:1344_4: ‘sukhaṃ hotū’ti anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Sāpi taṃ olokayamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh02a:1345_0: Therassa hi tadā ativiya parisuddho chavivaṇṇo ahosi, vippasannāni indriyāni, mukhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1345_1: bandhanā muttatālapakkaṃ viya ativiya virocittha. Mahāupāsikā araññā āgantvā – “kiṃ,
atk-abh02a:1345_2: amma, bhātiko te āgato”ti pucchi. Sā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Upāsikā ‘ajja me
atk-abh02a:1345_3: puttassa pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta’nti ñatvā “abhiramati te, amma, bhātā buddhasāsane,
atk-abh02a:1346_0: Mahantaṃ kho panetaṃ satthu dāyajjaṃ yadidaṃ satta ariyadhanāni nāma. Taṃ na sakkā
atk-abh02a:1346_1: kusītena gahetuṃ. Yathā hi vippaṭipannaṃ puttaṃ mātāpitaro ‘ayaṃ amhākaṃ aputto’ti
atk-abh02a:1346_2: paribāhiraṃ karonti; so tesaṃ accayena dāyajjaṃ na labhati; evaṃ kusītopi idaṃ ariyadhanadāyajjaṃ
atk-abh02a:1346_3: na labhati, āraddhavīriyova labhatīti dāyajjamahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1346_4: ‘Mahā kho pana te satthā. Satthuno hi te mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhigaṇhanakālepi abhinikkhamanepi
atk-abh02a:1346_6: parinibbānakālepi dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha. Yuttaṃ nu te evarūpassa satthuno
atk-abh02a:1346_7: sāsane pabbajitvā kusītena bhavitu’nti evaṃ satthumahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1347_0: ‘Jātiyāpi tvaṃ idāni na lāmakajātikosi; asambhinnāya mahāsammatapaveṇiyā āgate okkākarājavaṃse
atk-abh02a:1347_1: jāto; sirisuddhodanamahārājassa ca mahāmāyādeviyā ca nattā; rāhulabhaddassa kaniṭṭho.
atk-abh02a:1347_2: Tayā nāma evarūpena jinaputtena hutvā na yuttaṃ kusītena viharitu’nti evaṃ jātimahattaṃ
atk-abh02a:1347_3: paccavekkhatopi uppajjati. ‘Sāriputtamoggallānā ceva asītimahāsāvakā ca vīriyeneva
atk-abh02a:1347_4: lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu. Tvaṃ etesaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjasi, nappaṭipajjasī’ti
atk-abh02a:1348_0: Kucchiṃ pūretvā ṭhitaajagarasadise vissaṭṭhakāyikacetasikavīriye kusītapuggale parivajjentassāpi
atk-abh02a:1348_1: āraddhavīriye pahitatte puggale sevantassāpi ṭhānanisajjādīsu viriyuppādanatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1348_2: ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi uppajjati. Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1350_1: – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa
atk-abh02a:1351: Evaṃ uppādo hoti. Tattha pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā nāma. Tassā uppādakamanasikāro yonisomanasikāro nāma.
atk-abh02a:1352_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – buddhānussati, dhammasaṅghasīlacāgadevatānussati,
atk-abh02a:1353_0: Buddhaguṇe anussarantassāpi hi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo
atk-abh02a:1353_1: uppajjati; dhammasaṅghaguṇe anussarantassāpi, dīgharattaṃ akkhaṇḍaṃ katvā rakkhitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1353_2: catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi, gihino dasasīlaṃ pañcasīlaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-abh02a:1353_3: dubbhikkhabhayādīsu paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ datvā ‘evaṃ nāma adamhā’ti cāgaṃ
atk-abh02a:1353_4: paccavekkhantassāpi, gihinopi evarūpe kāle sīlavantānaṃ dinnadānaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-abh02a:1353_5: yehi guṇehi samannāgatā devatā devattaṃ pattā tathārūpānaṃ guṇānaṃ attani atthitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1353_6: paccavekkhantassāpi, samāpattiyā vikkhambhite kilese saṭṭhipi sattatipi vassāni na
atk-abh02a:1353_8: saṃsūcitalūkhabhāve buddhādīsu pasādasinehābhāvena gadrabhapiṭṭhe rajasadise lūkhapuggale
atk-abh02a:1353_9: parivajjentassāpi, buddhādīsu pasādabahule muducitte siniddhapuggale sevantassāpi,
atk-abh02a:1353_11: pītiuppādanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi uppajjati. Evaṃ uppannassa panassa
atk-abh02a:1355_1: – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa
atk-abh02a:1356_0: Evaṃ uppādo hoti. Apica satta dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti
atk-abh02a:1356_3: Paṇītañhi siniddhaṃ sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjantassāpi, sītuṇhesu utūsu ṭhānādīsu ca
atk-abh02a:1356_4: iriyāpathesu sappāyaṃ utuñca iriyāpathañca sevantassāpi passaddhi uppajjati. Yo pana
atk-abh02a:1356_5: mahāpurisajātiko sabbautuiriyāpathakkhamova hoti, na taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yassa
atk-abh02a:1356_6: sabhāgavisabhāgatā atthi, tasseva visabhāge utuiriyāpathe vajjetvā sabhāge sevantassāpi
atk-abh02a:1356_7: uppajjati. Majjhattapayogo vuccati attano ca parassa ca kammassakatapaccavekkhaṇā;
atk-abh02a:1356_8: iminā majjhattapayogena uppajjati. Yo leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paraṃ viheṭhayamānova vicarati,
atk-abh02a:1356_9: evarūpaṃ sāraddhakāyaṃ puggalaṃ parivajjentassāpi, saṃyatapādapāṇiṃ passaddhakāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1356_11: uppajjati. Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1358_1: – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa
atk-abh02a:1359: Evaṃ uppādo hoti. Tattha samathova samathanimittaṃ, avikkhepaṭṭhena ca abyagganimittanti.
atk-abh02a:1360_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – vatthuvisadakiriyatā,
atk-abh02a:1360_1: indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā, nimittakusalatā, samaye cittassa paggaṇhanatā, samaye
atk-abh02a:1360_2: cittassa niggahaṇanatā, samaye sampahaṃsanatā, samaye ajjhupekkhaṇatā, asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā,
atk-abh02a:1361_0: Nimittakusalatā nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā. Samaye cittassa paggahaṇanatāti
atk-abh02a:1361_1: yasmiṃ samaye atisithilavīriyatādīhi līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayavīriyapītisambojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpanena
atk-abh02a:1361_2: tassa paggaṇhanaṃ. Samaye cittassa niggahaṇanatāti yasmiṃ samaye accāraddhavīriyatādīhi
atk-abh02a:1361_4: tassa niggaṇhanaṃ. Samaye sampahaṃsanatāti yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paññāpayogamandatāya
atk-abh02a:1361_5: vā upasamasukhānadhigamena vā nirassādaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇena
atk-abh02a:1361_6: saṃvejeti. Aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūni nāma jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni cattāri, apāyadukkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1361_7: pañcamaṃ, atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1361_8: dukkhanti. Ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena ca pasādaṃ janeti. Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanatāti.
atk-abh02a:1362_0: Samaye ajjhupekkhanatā nāma yasmiṃ samaye sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma alīnaṃ anuddhaṭaṃ
atk-abh02a:1362_1: anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tadāyaṃ paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
atk-abh02a:1362_2: na byāpāraṃ āpajjati sārathī viya samappavattesu assesu. Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatāti.
atk-abh02a:1362_3: Asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā nāma upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā appattānaṃ vikkhittacittānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1362_4: puggalānaṃ ārakā parivajjanaṃ. Samāhitapuggalasevanatā nāma upacārena vā appanāya
atk-abh02a:1362_5: vā samāhitacittānaṃ sevanā bhajanā payirupāsanā. Tadadhimuttatā nāma ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-abh02a:1362_6: samādhiuppādanatthaṃyeva ninnapoṇapabbhāracittatā. Evañhi paṭipajjato esa uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1362_7: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1364_1: – ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa
atk-abh02a:1365_0: Evaṃ uppādo hoti. Tattha upekkhāva upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā nāma. Apica
atk-abh02a:1365_1: pañca dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – sattamajjhattatā, saṅkhāramajjhattatā,
atk-abh02a:1366_0: Tattha dvīhākārehi sattamajjhattataṃ samuṭṭhāpeti – ‘tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā
atk-abh02a:1366_1: attanova kammena gamissasi. Esopi attano kammena āgantvā attanova kammena gamissati.
atk-abh02a:1366_2: Tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī’ti evaṃ kammassakatapaccavekkhaṇena ca ‘paramatthato sattoyeva
atk-abh02a:1366_3: natthi. So tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī’ti evaṃ nissattapaccavekkhaṇena ca. Dvīhevākārehi saṅkhāramajjhattataṃ
atk-abh02a:1366_4: samuṭṭhāpeti – ‘idaṃ cīvaraṃ anupubbena vaṇṇavikārañceva jiṇṇabhāvañca upagantvā
atk-abh02a:1366_5: pādapuñchanacoḷakaṃ hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiyā chaḍḍanīyaṃ bhavissati. Sace panassa sāmiko
atk-abh02a:1366_6: bhaveyya, nāssa evaṃ vinassituṃ dadeyyā’ti evaṃ assāmikabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena ca.
atk-abh02a:1366_7: ‘Anaddhaniyaṃ idaṃ tāvakālika’nti evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena ca. Yathā ca
atk-abh02a:1367_0: Sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatāti ettha yo puggalo gihī vā attano puttadhītādike,
atk-abh02a:1367_1: pabbajito vā attano antevāsikasamānupajjhāyakādike mamāyati, sahattheneva nesaṃ kesacchedanasūcikammacīvaradhovanarajanapattapacanādīni
atk-abh02a:1367_2: karoti, muhuttampi apassanto ‘asuko sāmaṇero kuhiṃ? Asuko daharo kuhi’nti? Bhantamigo
atk-abh02a:1367_3: viya ito cito ca āloketi; aññena kesacchedanādīnaṃ atthāya ‘muhuttaṃ tāva asukaṃ
atk-abh02a:1367_4: pesethā’ti yāciyamānopi ‘amhepi taṃ attano kammaṃ na kārema, tumhe naṃ gahetvā kilamessathā’ti
atk-abh02a:1368_0: Yo pana cīvarapattathālakakattarayaṭṭhiādīni mamāyati, aññassa hatthena parāmasitumpi
atk-abh02a:1368_1: na deti, tāvakālikaṃ yācitopi ‘mayampi imaṃ mamāyantā na paribhuñjāma, tumhākaṃ kiṃ
atk-abh02a:1368_2: dassāmā’ti vadati – ayaṃ saṅkhārakelāyano nāma. Yo pana tesu dvīsupi vatthūsu majjhatto
atk-abh02a:1368_3: udāsīno – ayaṃ sattasaṅkhāramajjhatto nāma. Iti ayaṃ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo evarūpe
atk-abh02a:1368_6: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh02a:1370_0: Imesupi dvīsu pabbesu suddhavipassanāva kathitā. Iti ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāge
atk-abh02a:1370_1: nānācittesu labbhanti. Aññeneva hi cittena kāyaṃ pariggaṇhāti, aññena vedanaṃ, aññena
atk-abh02a:1370_2: cittaṃ, aññena dhamme pariggaṇhāti; lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe pana ekacitteyeva labbhanti.
atk-abh02a:1370_3: Ādito hi kāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā āgatassa vipassanāsampayuttā sati kāyānupassanā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_4: Tāya satiyā samannāgato puggalo kāyānupassī nāma. Vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggaṃ
atk-abh02a:1370_5: pattassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayuttā sati kāyanupassanā nāma. Tāya satiyā samannāgato
atk-abh02a:1370_6: puggalo kāyānupassī nāma. Vedanaṃ pariggaṇhitvā…. Cittaṃ pariggaṇhitvā…. Dhamme pariggaṇhitvā
atk-abh02a:1370_7: āgatassa vipassanāsampayuttā sati dhammānupassanā nāma. Tāya satiyā samannāgato puggalo
atk-abh02a:1370_8: dhammānupassī nāma. Vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggaṃ pattassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayuttā
atk-abh02a:1370_9: sati dhammānupassanā nāma. Tāya satiyā samannāgato puggalo dhammānupassī nāma. Evaṃ
atk-abh02a:1370_10: tāva desanā puggale tiṭṭhati. Kāye pana ‘subha’nti vipallāsappahānā kāyapariggāhikā
atk-abh02a:1370_11: sati maggena samijjhatīti kāyānupassanā nāma. Vedanāya ‘sukha’nti vipallāsappahānā
atk-abh02a:1370_12: vedanāpariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhatīti vedanānupassanā nāma. Citte ‘nicca’nti
atk-abh02a:1370_13: vipallāsappahānā cittapariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhatīti cittānupassanā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_14: Dhammesu ‘attā’ti vipallāsappahānā dhammapariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhatīti dhammānupassanā
atk-abh02a:1370_15: nāma. Iti ekāva maggasampayuttā sati catukiccasādhanaṭṭhena cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh02a:1373_0: 374. Abhidhammabhājanīye lokuttarasatipaṭṭhānavasena desanāya āraddhattā yathā kāyādiārammaṇesu
atk-abh02a:1373_1: lokiyasatipaṭṭhānesu tanti ṭhapitā, evaṃ aṭṭhapetvā sabbānipi kāyānupassādīni satipaṭṭhānāni
atk-abh02a:1373_2: dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ vibhattassa desanānayassa mukhamattameva dassentena niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-abh02a:1374_0: Tattha nayabhedo veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Kāyānupassanāya tāva sotāpattimagge jhānābhinivese
atk-abh02a:1374_2: imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ catukkapañcakanayānaṃ vasena dasa nayā honti.
atk-abh02a:1374_3: Evaṃ sesesupīti vīsatiyā abhinivesesu dve nayasatāni. Tāni catūhi adhipatīhi catuguṇitāni
atk-abh02a:1374_4: aṭṭha. Iti suddhikāni dve sādhipatīni aṭṭhāti sabbampi nayasahassaṃ hoti. Tathā vedanānupassanādīsu
atk-abh02a:1374_5: suddhikasatipaṭṭhāne cāti sotāpattimagge pañca nayasahassāni. Yathā ca sotāpattimagge,
atk-abh02a:1374_6: evaṃ sesamaggesupīti kusale vīsati nayasahassāni; suññatāpaṇihitānimittādibhedesu
atk-abh02a:1374_7: pana tato tiguṇe vipāke saṭṭhi nayasahassānīti. Evameva sakiccasādhakānañceva saṃsiddhikakiccānañca
atk-abh02a:1374_8: kusalavipākasatipaṭṭhānānaṃ niddesavasena duvidho kāyānupassanādivasena ca suddhikavasena
atk-abh02a:1374_9: ca kusale pañcannaṃ vipāke pañcannanti dasannaṃ niddesavārānaṃ vasena dasappabhedo
atk-abh02a:1376_0: 386. Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva satipaṭṭhānānaṃ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu
atk-abh02a:1376_1: pana sabbānipi etāni appamāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattanato appamāṇārammaṇāneva,
atk-abh02a:1376_2: na maggārammaṇāni; sahajātahetuvasena pana maggahetukāni; vīriyaṃ vā vīmaṃsaṃ vā
atk-abh02a:1376_3: jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipatīni; chandacittajeṭṭhakāya maggabhāvanāya
atk-abh02a:1376_4: navattabbāni maggādhipatīnīti phalakālepi navattabbāneva; atītādīsu ekārammaṇabhāvenapi
atk-abh02a:1376_5: navattabbāni; nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇāni nāma hontīti. Evametasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1376_7: hi suttantabhājanīyasmiṃyeva lokiyalokuttaramissakā satipaṭṭhānā kathitā; abhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakesu
atk-abh02a:1376_8: pana lokuttarāyevāti. Evamayaṃ satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvā bhājetvā dassitoti.
atk-abh02a:1381_0: 390. Idāni tadanantare sammappadhānavibhaṅge cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Tena na
atk-abh02a:1381_1: tato heṭṭhā na uddhanti sammappadhānaparicchedaṃ dīpeti. Sammappadhānāti kāraṇappadhānā
atk-abh02a:1381_2: upāyappadhānā yonisopadhānā. Idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane paṭipannako bhikkhu. Anuppannānanti
atk-abh02a:1381_3: anibbattānaṃ. Pāpakānanti lāmakānaṃ. Akusalānaṃ dhammānanti akosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1381_4: Anuppādāyāti na uppādanatthāya. Chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatāsaṅkhātaṃ kusalacchandaṃ
atk-abh02a:1381_5: janeti uppādeti. Vāyamatīti payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti. Vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti kāyikacetasikaṃ
atk-abh02a:1381_6: vīriyaṃ karoti. Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti teneva sahajātavīriyena cittaṃ ukkhipati. Padahatīti
atk-abh02a:1381_7: padhānavīriyaṃ karoti. Paṭipāṭiyā panetāni cattāripi padāni āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi yojetabbāni.
atk-abh02a:1382_0: Uppannānaṃ pāpakānanti anuppannanti avattabbataṃ āpannānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ. Pahānāyāti
atk-abh02a:1382_1: pajahanatthāya. Anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānanti anibbattānaṃ kosallasambhūtānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1382_2: dhammānaṃ. Uppādāyāti uppādanatthāya. Uppannānanti nibbattānaṃ. Ṭhitiyāti ṭhitatthāya.
atk-abh02a:1382_3: Asammosāyāti anassanatthaṃ. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti punappunaṃ bhāvāya. Vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāya.
atk-abh02a:1382_4: Bhāvanāyāti vaḍḍhiyā. Pāripūriyāti paripūraṇatthāya. Ayaṃ tāva catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1383_0: 391. Idāni paṭipāṭiyā tāni padāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ kathañca bhikkhu anuppannānantiādinā
atk-abh02a:1383_1: nayena niddesavāro āraddho. Tattha yaṃ heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahe āgatasadisaṃ, taṃ tassa
atk-abh02a:1383_2: vaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana tasmiṃ anāgataṃ, tattha chandaniddese
atk-abh02a:1383_3: tāva yo chandoti yo chandaniyavasena chando. Chandikatāti chandikabhāvo, chandakaraṇākāro
atk-abh02a:1383_4: vā. Kattukamyatāti kattukāmatā. Kusaloti cheko. Dhammacchandoti sabhāvacchando. Ayañhi
atk-abh02a:1383_5: chando nāma taṇhāchando, diṭṭhichando, vīriyachando, dhammacchandoti bahuvidho nānappakārako.
atk-abh02a:1383_6: Tesu dhammacchandoti imasmiṃ ṭhāne kattukamyatākusaladhammacchando adhippeto.
atk-abh02a:1384_0: Imaṃ chandaṃ janetīti chandaṃ kurumānova chandaṃ janeti nāma. Sañjanetīti upasaggena
atk-abh02a:1384_1: padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Uṭṭhapetīti chandaṃ kurumānova taṃ uṭṭhapeti nāma. Samuṭṭhapetīti
atk-abh02a:1384_2: upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Nibbattetīti chandaṃ kurumānova taṃ nibbatteti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1384_3: Abhinibbattetīti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Apica chandaṃ karontova chandaṃ janeti

atk-abh02a:1384_6: nāma. Anosakkanatāya alīnavuttitāya anolīnavuttitāya abhimukhabhāvena nibbattento
atk-abh02a:1385_0: 394. Vīriyaniddese vīriyaṃ karontova vīriyaṃ ārabhati nāma. Dutiyapadaṃ upasaggena
atk-abh02a:1385_1: vaḍḍhitaṃ. Vīriyaṃ karontoyeva ca āsevati bhāveti nāma. Punappunaṃ karonto vahulīkaroti.
atk-abh02a:1385_2: Āditova karonto ārabhati. Punappunaṃ karonto samārabhati. Bhāvanāvasena bhajanto
