atk-abh02a:1386_1: Punappunaṃ paggaṇhanto sampaggaṇhāti. Evaṃ sampaggahitaṃ yathā na patati tathā naṃ
atk-abh02a:1387_0: 406. Ṭhitiyātipadassa niddese sabbesampi asammosādīnaṃ ṭhitivevacanabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh02a:1387_1: yā ṭhiti so asammosotiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha hi heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ padaṃ uparimassa uparimassa
atk-abh02a:1387_2: padassa attho, uparimaṃ uparimaṃ padaṃ heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa atthotipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1387_3: Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti. Ayaṃ tāva pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-abh02a:1388_0: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayakathā. Ayañhi sammappadhānakathā nāma duvidhā – lokiyā lokuttarā
atk-abh02a:1388_1: ca. Tattha lokiyā sabbapubbabhāge hoti. Sā kassapasaṃyuttapariyāyena lokiyamaggakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:1390_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu ‘anuppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā uppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’nti
atk-abh02a:1390_1: ātappaṃ karoti; ‘uppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīyamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’nti
atk-abh02a:1390_2: ātappaṃ karoti; ‘anuppannā me kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’nti
atk-abh02a:1390_3: ātappaṃ karoti. ‘Uppannā me kusalā dhammā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’nti ātappaṃ karotī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1391_0: Ettha ca ‘anuppannā me kusalā dhammā’ti samathavipassanā ceva maggo ca. Uppannā kusalā
atk-abh02a:1391_1: nāma samathavipassanāva. Maggo pana sakiṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhamāno anatthāya saṃvattanako
atk-abh02a:1391_2: nāma natthi. So hi phalassa paccayaṃ datvāva nirujjhati. Purimasmiṃ vā samathavipassanāva
atk-abh02a:1391_3: gahetabbāti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana na yuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1392_0: Tattha “uppannā samathavipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattantī”ti atthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1392_1: idaṃ vatthu – eko kira khīṇāsavatthero ‘mahācetiyañca mahābodhiñca vandissāmī’ti
atk-abh02a:1392_2: samāpattilābhinā bhaṇḍagāhakasāmaṇerena saddhiṃ janapadato mahāvihāraṃ āgantvā vihārapariveṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1392_3: pāvisi; sāyanhasamaye mahābhikkhusaṅghe cetiyaṃ vandamāne cetiyaṃ vandanatthāya na
atk-abh02a:1392_4: nikkhami. Kasmā? Khīṇāsavānañhi tīsu ratanesu mahantaṃ gāravaṃ hoti. Tasmā bhikkhusaṅghe
atk-abh02a:1392_5: vanditvā paṭikkante manussānaṃ sāyamāsabhuttavelāya sāmaṇerampi ajānāpetvā ‘cetiyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1392_6: vandissāmī’ti ekakova nikkhami. Sāmaṇero ‘kiṃ nu kho thero avelāya ekakova gacchati,
atk-abh02a:1392_7: jānissāmī’ti upajjhāyassa padānupadikova nikkhami. Thero anāvajjanena tassa āgamanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1392_8: ajānanto dakkhiṇadvārena mahācetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruḷho. Sāmaṇeropi anupadaṃyeva āruḷho.
atk-abh02a:1393_0: Mahāthero mahācetiyaṃ ulloketvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā
atk-abh02a:1393_1: haṭṭhapahaṭṭho mahācetiyaṃ vandati. Sāmaṇero therassa vandanākāraṃ disvā ‘upajjhāyo
atk-abh02a:1393_2: me ativiya pasannacitto vandati; kiṃ nu kho pupphāni labhitvā pūjaṃ kareyyā’ti cintesi.
atk-abh02a:1393_3: There vanditvā uṭṭhāya sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā mahācetiyaṃ ulloketvā ṭhite sāmaṇero
atk-abh02a:1393_4: ukkāsitvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpesi. Thero parivattetvā olokento “kadā āgatosī”ti
atk-abh02a:1393_5: pucchi. “Tumhākaṃ cetiyaṃ vandanakāle, bhante; ativiya pasannā cetiyaṃ vandittha;
atk-abh02a:1393_6: kinnu kho pupphāni labhitvā pūjeyyāthā”ti? “Āma, sāmaṇera, imasmiṃ cetiye viya aññatra
atk-abh02a:1393_7: ettakaṃ dhātunidhānaṃ nāma natthi. Evarūpaṃ asadisaṃ mahāthūpaṃ pupphāni labhitvā
atk-abh02a:1393_8: ko na pūjeyyā”ti? “Tena hi, bhante, adhivāsetha, āharissāmī”ti tāvadeva jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-abh02a:1393_9: iddhiyā himavantaṃ gantvā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni gahetvā parissāvanaṃ pūretvā
atk-abh02a:1393_10: mahāthere dakkhiṇamukhato pacchimamukhe asampatteyeva āgantvā pupphaparissāvanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1393_11: hatthe ṭhapetvā “pūjetha bhante”ti āha. Thero “atimandāni no, sāmaṇera, pupphānī”ti
atk-abh02a:1393_12: āha. “Gacchatha, bhante, bhagavato guṇe āvajjetvā pūjethā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1394_0: Thero pacchimamukhanissitena sopānena āruyha kucchivedikābhūmiyaṃ pupphapūjaṃ kātuṃ
atk-abh02a:1394_1: āraddho. Vedikābhūmi paripuṇṇā; pupphāni patitvā dutiyabhūmiyaṃ jaṇṇuppamāṇena odhinā
atk-abh02a:1394_2: pūrayiṃsu. Tato otaritvā pādapiṭṭhikapantiṃ pūjesi; sāpi paripūri; paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ
atk-abh02a:1394_3: ñatvā heṭṭhimatale vikiranto agamāsi; sabbaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ paripūri; tasmiṃ paripuṇṇe
atk-abh02a:1394_4: “sāmaṇera, pupphāni na khīyantī”ti āha. “Parissāvanaṃ, bhante, adhomukhaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1394_5: Adhomukhaṃ katvā cālesi. Tadā pupphāni khīṇāni. Thero parissāvanaṃ sāmaṇerassa datvā
atk-abh02a:1394_6: saddhiṃ hatthipākārena cetiyaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā
atk-abh02a:1394_7: pariveṇaṃ gacchanto cintesi – ‘yāva mahiddhiko vatāyaṃ sāmaṇero; sakkhissati nu kho
atk-abh02a:1394_8: imaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ rakkhitunti? Tato ‘na sakkhissatī’ti disvā sāmaṇeraṃ āha – “sāmaṇera,
atk-abh02a:1394_9: tvaṃ idāni mahiddhiko; evarūpaṃ pana iddhiṃ nāsetvā pacchimakāle kāṇapesakāriyā hatthena
atk-abh02a:1394_10: madditaṃkañjiyaṃ pivissasī”ti. Daharakabhāvassa nāmesa doso yaṃ so upajjhāyassa kathāya
atk-abh02a:1394_11: saṃvejetvā ‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ me, bhante, ācikkhathā’ti na yāci; ‘amhākaṃ upajjhāyo kiṃ
atk-abh02a:1394_12: vadatī’ti taṃ pana asuṇanto viya agamāsi.
atk-abh02a:1395_0: Thero mahācetiyañca mahābodhiñca vanditvā sāmaṇeraṃ pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā anupubbena
atk-abh02a:1395_1: kuṭeḷitissamahāvihāraṃ agamāsi. Sāmaṇero upajjhāyassa padānupadiko hutvā bhikkhācāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1395_2: na gacchati. “Kataraṃ gāmaṃ pavisatha, bhante”ti pucchitvā pana ‘idāni me upajjhāyo
atk-abh02a:1395_3: gāmadvāraṃ sampatto bhavissatī’ti ñatvā attano ca upajjhāyassa ca pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā
atk-abh02a:1395_4: ākāsenāgantvā therassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā piṇḍāya pavisati. Thero sabbakālaṃ ovadati
atk-abh02a:1395_5: – “sāmaṇera, mā evamakāsi; puthujjaniddhi nāma calā anibaddhā; asappāyaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1395_6: labhitvā appamattakeneva bhijjati; santāya samāpattiyā parihīnā brahmacariyavāse
atk-abh02a:1395_7: santhambhituṃ na sakkontī”ti. Sāmaṇero ‘kiṃ katheti mayhaṃ upajjhāyo’ti sotuṃ na
atk-abh02a:1395_8: icchati, tatheva karoti. Thero anupubbena cetiyavandanaṃ karonto kammupendavihāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1395_9: nāma gato. Tattha vasantepi there sāmaṇero tatheva karoti.
atk-abh02a:1396_0: Athekadivasaṃ ekā pesakāradhītā abhirūpā paṭhamavaye ṭhitā kammupendagāmato nikkhamitvā
atk-abh02a:1396_1: padumassaraṃ oruyha gāyamānā pupphāni bhañjati. Tasmiṃ samaye sāmaṇero padumassaramatthakena
atk-abh02a:1396_2: gacchati gacchanto pana, sakkaralasikāya kāṇamakkhikā viya, tassā gītasadde bajjhi;
atk-abh02a:1396_3: tāvadeva iddhi antarahitā, chinnapakkho kāko viya ahosi. Santasamāpattibalena pana
atk-abh02a:1396_4: tattheva udakapiṭṭhe apatitvā simbalitūlaṃ viya patamānaṃ anupubbena padumassaratīre
atk-abh02a:1396_5: aṭṭhāsi. So vegena gantvā upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā nivatti. Mahāthero ‘pagevetaṃ
atk-abh02a:1396_6: mayā diṭṭhaṃ, nivāriyamānopi na nivattissatī’ti kiñci avatvā piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-abh02a:1397_0: Sāmaṇero gantvā padumassaratīre aṭṭhāsi tassā paccuttaraṇaṃ āgamayamāno. Sāpi sāmaṇeraṃ
atk-abh02a:1397_1: ākāsena gacchantañca punāgantvā ṭhitañca disvā ‘addhā esa maṃ nissāya ukkaṇṭhito’ti
atk-abh02a:1397_2: ñatvā ‘paṭikkama sāmaṇerā’ti āha. Sopi paṭipakkami. Itarā paccuttaritvā sāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-abh02a:1397_3: taṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘kiṃ, bhante’ti pucchi. So tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Sā bahūhi kāraṇehi
atk-abh02a:1397_4: gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ brahmacariyavāse ānisaṃsañca dassetvā ovadamānāpi tassa ukkaṇṭhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1397_5: vinodetuṃ asakkontī ‘ayaṃ mama kāraṇā evarūpāya iddhiyā parihīno; na dāni yuttaṃ
atk-abh02a:1397_6: pariccajitu’nti. ‘Idheva tiṭṭhā’ti vatvā gharaṃ gantvā mātāpitūnaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-abh02a:1397_7: Tepi āgantvā nānappakāraṃ ovadamānā vacanaṃ aggaṇhantaṃ āhaṃsu – “tvaṃ amhe uccākulāti
atk-abh02a:1397_8: mā sallakkhesi. Mayaṃ pesakārā. Sakkhissasi pesakārakammaṃ kātu”nti? Sāmaṇero āha
atk-abh02a:1397_9: – “upāsaka, gihībhūto nāma pesakārakammaṃ vā kareyya naḷakārakammaṃ vā, kiṃ iminā,
atk-abh02a:1397_10: mā sāṭakamatte lobhaṃ karothā”ti. Pesakārako udare baddhasāṭakaṃ datvā gharaṃ netvā dhītaraṃ adāsi.
atk-abh02a:1398_0: So pesakārakammaṃ uggaṇhitvā pesakārehi saddhiṃ sālāya kammaṃ karoti. Aññesaṃ itthiyo
atk-abh02a:1398_1: pātova bhattaṃ sampādetvā āhariṃsu. Tassa bhariyā na tāva āgacchati. So itaresu kammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1398_2: vissajjetvā bhuñjamānesu tasaraṃ vaṭṭento nisīdi. Sā pacchā āgamāsi. Atha naṃ so
atk-abh02a:1398_3: ‘aticirena āgatāsī’ti tajjesi. Mātugāmo ca nāma api cakkavattirājānaṃ attani paṭibaddhacittaṃ
atk-abh02a:1398_4: ñatvā dāsaṃ viya sallakkheti. Tasmā sā evamāha – “aññesaṃ ghare dārupaṇṇaloṇādīni
atk-abh02a:1398_5: sannihitāni; bāhirato āharitvā dāyakā pesakārakāpi atthi. Ahaṃ pana ekikā; tvampi
atk-abh02a:1398_6: ‘mayhaṃ ghare idaṃ atthi, idaṃ natthī’ti na jānāsi. Sace icchasi bhuñja, no ce icchasi
atk-abh02a:1398_7: mā bhuñjā”ti. So ‘na kevalaṃ ussūre bhattaṃ āharasi, vācāyapi maṃ ghaṭṭesī’ti kujjhitvā
atk-abh02a:1398_8: aññaṃ paharaṇaṃ apassanto tameva tasaradaṇḍakaṃ tasarato luñcitvā khipi. Sā taṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-abh02a:1398_9: disvā īsakaṃ parivatti. Tasaradaṇḍakassa ca koṭi nāma tikhiṇā hoti. Sā tassā parivattamānāya
atk-abh02a:1398_10: akkhikoṭiyaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi. Sā ubhohi hatthehi vegena akkhiṃ aggahesi. Bhinnaṭṭhānato lohitaṃ paggharati.
atk-abh02a:1399_0: So tasmiṃ kāle upajjhāyassa vacanaṃ anussari ‘idaṃ sandhāya maṃ upajjhāyo “anāgate
atk-abh02a:1399_1: kāle kāṇapesakāriyā hatthena madditaṃ kañjiyaṃ pivissasī”ti āha. Idaṃ therena diṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1399_2: bhavissati. Aho dīghadassī ayyo’ti mahāsaddena rodituṃ ārabhi. Tamenaṃ aññe “alaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1399_3: āvuso, mā rodi; akkhi nāma bhinnaṃ na sakkā rodanena paṭipākatikaṃ kātu”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1399_4: So “nāhaṃ etamatthaṃ rodāmi; apica kho idaṃ sandhāya rodāmī”ti sabbaṃ pavattiṃ paṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh02a:1399_5: kathesi. Evaṃ uppannā samathavipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattanti.
atk-abh02a:1400_0: Aparampi vatthu – tiṃsamattā bhikkhū kalyāṇiyaṃ mahācetiyaṃ vanditvā aṭavimaggena
atk-abh02a:1400_1: mahāmaggaṃ otaramānā antarāmagge jhāmakkhette kammaṃ katvā āgacchantaṃ ekaṃ manussaṃ
atk-abh02a:1400_2: addasaṃsu. Tassa sarīraṃ masimakkhitaṃ hoti, masimakkhitameva ca ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ kacchaṃ
atk-abh02a:1400_3: pīḷetvā nivatthaṃ. Olokiyamāno jhāmakhāṇuko viya khāyati. So divasabhāge kammaṃ katvā
atk-abh02a:1400_4: upaḍḍhajhāyamānānaṃ dārūnaṃ kalāpaṃ ukkhipitvā piṭṭhiyaṃ vippakiṇṇehi kesehi kummaggena
atk-abh02a:1400_5: āgantvā bhikkhūnaṃ sammukhe aṭṭhāsi. Sāmaṇerā disvā aññamaññaṃ olokayamānā “āvuso,
atk-abh02a:1400_6: tuyhaṃ pitā, tuyhaṃ mahāpitā, tuyhaṃ mātulo”ti hasamānā gantvā “ko nāmosi tvaṃ, upāsakā”ti
atk-abh02a:1400_7: nāmaṃ pucchiṃsu. So nāmaṃ pucchito vippaṭisārī hutvā dārukalāpaṃ chaḍḍetvā vatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1400_8: saṃvidhāya nivāsetvā mahāthere vanditvā “tiṭṭhatha tāva, bhante”ti āha. Mahātherā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1401_0: Daharasāmaṇerā āgantvā mahātherānaṃ sammukhāpi parihāsaṃ karonti. Upāsako āha – “bhante,
atk-abh02a:1401_1: tumhe maṃ passitvā parihasatha; ettakeneva matthakaṃ pattamhāti sallakkhetha. Ahampi
atk-abh02a:1401_2: pubbe tumhādisova samaṇo ahosiṃ. Tumhākaṃ pana cittekaggatāmattampi natthi. Ahaṃ
atk-abh02a:1401_3: imasmiṃ sāsane mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo ahosiṃ; ākāsaṃ gahetvā pathaviṃ karomi, pathaviṃ
atk-abh02a:1401_4: ākāsaṃ; dūraṃ gaṇhitvā santikaṃ karomi, santikaṃ dūraṃ; cakkavāḷasahassaṃ khaṇena
atk-abh02a:1401_5: vinivijjhāmi. Hatthe me passatha; idāni pana makkaṭahatthasadisā. Ahaṃ imeheva hatthehi
atk-abh02a:1401_6: idha nisinnova candimasūriye parāmasiṃ. Imesaṃyeva pādānaṃ candimasūriye pādakathalikaṃ
atk-abh02a:1401_7: katvā nisīdiṃ. Evarūpā me iddhi pamādena antarahitā. Tumhe mā pamajjittha. Pamādena
atk-abh02a:1401_8: hi evarūpaṃ byasanaṃ pāpuṇanti. Appamattā viharantā jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karonti.
atk-abh02a:1401_9: Tasmā tumhe maññeva ārammaṇaṃ karitvā appamattā hotha, bhante”ti tajjetvā ovādamadāsi.
atk-abh02a:1401_10: Te tassa kathentasseva saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā vipassamānā tiṃsa janā tattheva arahattaṃ
atk-abh02a:1401_11: pāpuṇiṃsūti. Evampi uppannā samathavipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattantīti
atk-abh02a:1402_0: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe panetaṃ ekameva vīriyaṃ catukiccasādhanavasena cattāri nāmāni
atk-abh02a:1402_1: labhati. Tattha anuppannānanti asamudācāravasena vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena vā anuppannānaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1402_2: aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā nāma natthi. Anuppannā
atk-abh02a:1402_3: pana uppajjamānāpi eteyeva uppajjanti, pahīyamānāpi eteyeva pahīyanti.
atk-abh02a:1403_0: Tattha ekaccassa vattavasena kilesā na samudācaranti. Ekaccassa ganthadhutaṅgasamādhivipassanā
atk-abh02a:1403_1: navakammikānaṃ aññataravasena. Kathaṃ? Ekacco hi vattasampanno hoti. Tassa dvāsītikhuddakavattāni,
atk-abh02a:1403_3: ca karontasseva kilesā okāsaṃ na labhanti; aparabhāge panassa vattaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-abh02a:1403_4: bhinnavattassa vicarato ayonisomanasikārañceva sativossaggañca āgamma uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1404_0: Ekacco ganthayutto hoti; ekampi nikāyaṃ gaṇhāti, dvepi, tayopi, cattāropi, pañcapi.
atk-abh02a:1404_1: Tasseva tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ atthavasena pāḷivasena anusandhivasena pubbāparavasena
atk-abh02a:1404_2: gaṇhantassa sajjhāyantassa cintentassa vācentassa desentassa pakāsentassa kilesā
atk-abh02a:1404_3: okāsaṃ na labhanti; aparabhāge panassa ganthakammaṃ pahāya kusītassa vicarato ayonisomanasikārasativossagge
atk-abh02a:1404_4: āgamma uppajjanti. Evampi asamudācāravasena anuppannā uppajjanti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1405_0: Ekacco pana dhutaṅgadharo hoti, terasa dhutaṅgaguṇe samādāya vattati. Tassa dhutaṅgaguṇe
atk-abh02a:1405_1: pariharantassa kilesā okāsaṃ na labhanti; aparabhāge panassa dhutaṅgāni vissajjetvā
atk-abh02a:1405_2: bāhullāya āvaṭṭassa vicarato ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma uppajjanti. Evampi
atk-abh02a:1406_0: Ekacco pana aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasī hoti. Tassa paṭhamajjhānādīsu āvajjanavasīādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1406_1: vasena viharantassa kilesā okāsaṃ na labhanti; aparabhāge panassa parihīnajjhānassa
atk-abh02a:1406_2: vā vissaṭṭhajjhānassa vā bhassādīsu anuyuttassa viharato ayonisomanasikārasativossagge
atk-abh02a:1406_3: āgamma uppajjanti. Evampi asamudācāravasena anuppannā kilesā uppajjanti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1407_0: Ekacco pana vipassako hoti; sattasu vā vipassanāsu aṭṭhārasasu vā mahāvipassanāsu
atk-abh02a:1407_1: kammaṃ karonto viharati. Tassevaṃ viharato kilesā okāsaṃ na labhanti; aparabhāge
atk-abh02a:1407_2: panassa vipassanākammaṃ pahāya kāyadaḷhībahulassa viharato ayonisomanasikārasativossagge
atk-abh02a:1407_3: āgamma uppajjanti. Evampi asamudācāravasena anuppannā kilesā uppajjanti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1408_0: Ekacco pana navakammiko hoti, uposathāgārabhojanasālādīni karoti. Tassa tesaṃ upakaraṇāni
atk-abh02a:1408_1: cintentassa kilesā okāsaṃ na labhanti; aparabhāge panassa navakamme niṭṭhite vā vissaṭṭhe
atk-abh02a:1408_2: vā ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma uppajjanti. Evampi asamudācāravasena anuppannā
atk-abh02a:1409_0: Ekacco pana brahmalokā āgato suddhasatto hoti. Tassa anāsevanāya kilesā okāsaṃ na
atk-abh02a:1409_1: labhanti; aparabhāge panassa laddhāsevanassa ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma
atk-abh02a:1409_2: uppajjanti. Evampi asamudācāravasena anuppannā kilesā uppajjanti nāma. Evaṃ tāva
atk-abh02a:1410_0: Kathaṃ ananubhūtārammaṇavasena? Idhekacco ananubhūtapubbaṃ manāpiyādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1410_1: labhati. Tassa tattha ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma rāgādayo kilesā uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1410_2: Evaṃ ananubhūtārammaṇavasena anuppannā uppajjanti nāma. Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe pana ekameva vīriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1411_0: Ye ca evaṃ anuppannā uppajjeyyuṃ, te yathā neva uppajjanti, evaṃ nesaṃ anuppādakiccaṃ
atk-abh02a:1411_1: uppannānañca pahānakiccaṃ sādheti. Tasmā uppannānaṃ pāpakānanti ettha pana catubbidhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1411_2: uppannaṃ – vattamānuppannaṃ, bhutvā vigatuppannaṃ, okāsakatuppannaṃ, bhūmiladdhuppannanti.
atk-abh02a:1411_3: Tattha ye kilesā vijjamānā uppādādisamaṅgino – idaṃ vattamānuppannaṃ nāma. Kamme
atk-abh02a:1411_4: pana javite ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitvā niruddhavipāko bhutvā vigataṃ nāma. Kammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1411_5: uppajjitvā niruddhaṃ bhutvā vigataṃ nāma. Tadubhayampi bhutvā vigatuppannanti saṅkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1411_6: gacchati. Kusalākusalakammaṃ aññassa kammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa
atk-abh02a:1411_7: okāsaṃ karoti. Evaṃ kate okāse vipāko uppajjamāno okāsakaraṇato paṭṭhāya uppannoti
atk-abh02a:1412_0: Pañcakkhandhā pana vipassanāya bhūmi nāma. Te atītādibhedā honti. Tesu anusayitakilesā
atk-abh02a:1412_1: pana atītā vā anāgatā vā paccuppannā vāti na vattabbā. Atītakkhandhesu anusayitāpi
atk-abh02a:1412_2: hi appahīnāva honti. Anāgatakkhandhesu, paccuppannakkhandhesu anusayitāpi appahīnāva
atk-abh02a:1412_3: honti. Idaṃ bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāma. Tenāhu porāṇā – “tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu asamugghātitā
atk-abh02a:1413_0: Aparampi catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ – samudācāruppannaṃ, ārammaṇādhigahituppannaṃ, avikkhambhituppannaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1413_1: asamugdhātituppannanti. Tattha sampati vattamānaṃyeva ‘samudācāruppannaṃ’ nāma. Sakiṃ
atk-abh02a:1413_2: cakkhūni ummīletvā ārammaṇe nimitte gahite anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe kilesā nuppajjissantīti
atk-abh02a:1413_3: na vattabbā. Kasmā? Ārammaṇassa adhigahitattā. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā khīrarukkhassa kuṭhāriyā
atk-abh02a:1413_4: āhatāhataṭṭhāne khīraṃ na nikkhamissatīti na vattabbaṃ, evaṃ. Idaṃ ‘ārammaṇādhigahituppannaṃ’
atk-abh02a:1413_5: nāma. Samāpattiyā avikkhambhitakilesā pana imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne nuppajjissantīti na
atk-abh02a:1413_6: vattabbā. Kasmā? Avikkhambhitattā. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā sace khīrarukkhaṃ kuṭhāriyā āhaneyyuṃ,
atk-abh02a:1413_7: ‘imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne khīraṃ na nikkhameyyā’ti na vattabbaṃ, evaṃ. Idaṃ ‘avikkhambhituppannaṃ’
atk-abh02a:1413_8: nāma. Maggena asamugghātitakilesā pana bhavagge nibbattassāpi nuppajjissantīti purimanayeneva
atk-abh02a:1414_0: Imesu uppannesu vattamānuppannaṃ, bhutvāvigatuppannaṃ, okāsakatuppannaṃ, samudācāruppannanti
atk-abh02a:1414_1: catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ na maggavajjhaṃ; bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ, ārammaṇādhiggahituppannaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1414_2: avikkhambhituppannaṃ, asamugghātituppannanti catubbidhaṃ maggavajjhaṃ. Maggo hi uppajjamāno
atk-abh02a:1414_3: ete kilese pajahati. So ye kilese pajahati, te atītā vā anāgatā vā paccuppannā vāti
atk-abh02a:1415_0: “Hañci atīte kilese pajahati, tena hi khīṇaṃ khepeti, niruddhaṃ nirodheti, vigataṃ
atk-abh02a:1415_1: vigameti, atthaṅgataṃ atthaṃ gameti, atītaṃ yaṃ natthi taṃ pajahati. Hañci anāgate
atk-abh02a:1415_2: kilese pajahati, tena hi ajātaṃ pajahati, anibbattaṃ anuppannaṃ apātubhūtaṃ pajahati,
atk-abh02a:1415_3: anāgataṃ yaṃ natthi taṃ pajahati. Hañci paccuppanne kilese pajahati, tena hi ratto
atk-abh02a:1415_4: rāgaṃ pajahati, duṭṭho dosaṃ, mūḷho mohaṃ, vinibaddho mānaṃ, parāmaṭṭho diṭṭhiṃ,
atk-abh02a:1415_5: vikkhepagato uddhaccaṃ, aniṭṭhaṅgato vicikicchaṃ, thāmagato anusayaṃ pajahati; kaṇhasukkadhammā
atk-abh02a:1415_6: yuganaddhā samameva vattanti; saṃkilesikā maggabhāvanā hoti…pe… tena hi natthi maggabhāvanā,
atk-abh02a:1415_7: natthi phalasacchikiriyā, natthi kilesappahānaṃ, natthi dhammābhisamayo’ti. ‘Atthi
atk-abh02a:1415_8: maggabhāvanā…pe… atthi dhammābhisamayo’ti. Yathā kathaṃ viya? Seyyathāpi taruṇo rukkho…pe…
atk-abh02a:1416_0: Iti pāḷiyaṃ ajātaphalarukkho āgato; jātaphalarukkhena pana dīpetabbaṃ. Yathā hi saphalo
atk-abh02a:1416_1: taruṇaambarukkho. Tassa phalāni manussā paribhuñjeyyuṃ, sesāni pātetvā pacchiyo pūreyyuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1416_2: Athañño puriso taṃ pharasunā chindeyya. Tenassa neva atītāni phalāni nāsitāni honti,
atk-abh02a:1416_3: na anāgatapaccuppannāni ca nāsitāni; atītāni hi manussehi paribhuttāni, anāgatāni
atk-abh02a:1416_4: anibbattāni na sakkā nāsetuṃ. Yasmiṃ pana samaye so chinno tadā phalāniyeva natthīti
atk-abh02a:1416_5: paccuppannānipi anāsitāni. Sace pana rukkho acchinno assa, athassa pathavīrasañca
atk-abh02a:1416_6: āporasañca āgamma yāni phalāni nibbatteyyuṃ, tāni nāsitāni honti. Tāni hi ajātāneva
atk-abh02a:1416_7: na jāyanti, anibbattāneva na nibbattanti, apātubhūtāneva na pātubhavanti. Evameva
atk-abh02a:1416_8: maggo nāpi atītādibhede kilese pajahati, nāpi na pajahati. Yesañhi kilesānaṃ maggena
atk-abh02a:1416_9: khandhesu apariññātesu uppatti siyā, maggena uppajjitvā khandhānaṃ pariññātattā te
atk-abh02a:1416_10: kilesā ajātāva na jāyanti, anibbattāva na nibbattanti, apātubhūtāva na pātubhavanti.
atk-abh02a:1416_11: Taruṇaputtāya itthiyā puna avijāyanatthaṃ byādhitānaṃ rogavūpasamatthaṃ pītabhesajjehi
atk-abh02a:1416_12: cāpi ayamattho vibhāvetabbo. Evaṃ maggo ye kilese pajahati, te atītā vā anāgatā vā
atk-abh02a:1416_13: paccuppannā vāti na vattabbā. Na ca maggo kilese na pajahati. Ye pana maggo kilese
atk-abh02a:1417_0: Na kevalañca maggo kileseyeva pajahati, kilesānaṃ pana appahīnattā ye uppajjeyyuṃ
atk-abh02a:1417_1: upādinnakkhandhā, tepi pajahatiyeva. Vuttampi cetaṃ “sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa
atk-abh02a:1417_2: nirodhena satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca
atk-abh02a:1417_3: etthete nirujjhantī”ti vitthāro. Iti maggo upādinnato anupādinnato ca vuṭṭhāti. Bhavavasena
atk-abh02a:1417_4: pana sotāpattimaggo apāyabhavato vuṭṭhāti. Sakadāgāmimaggo sugatibhavekadesato; anāgāmimaggo
atk-abh02a:1417_5: sugatikāmabhavato; vuṭṭhāti arahattamaggo rūpārūpabhavato vuṭṭhāti, sabbabhavehi
atk-abh02a:1418_0: Atha maggakkhaṇe kathaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppādāya bhāvanā hoti? Kathaṃ vā uppannānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1418_1: ṭhitiyāti? Maggappavattiyā eva. Maggo hi pavattamāno pubbe anuppannapubbattā anuppanno
atk-abh02a:1418_2: nāma vuccati. Anāgatapubbañhi ṭhānaṃ gantvā ananubhūtapubbaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ anubhavitvā
atk-abh02a:1418_3: vattāro bhavanti – ‘anāgataṭṭhānaṃ āgatamha, ananubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ anubhavāmā’ti.
atk-abh02a:1418_4: Yā cassa pavatti, ayameva ṭhiti nāmāti ṭhitiyā bhāvetīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Evametassa
atk-abh02a:1418_5: bhikkhuno idaṃ lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe vīriyaṃ “anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1418_6: anuppādāyā”tiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati. Ayaṃ lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe sammappadhānakathā.
atk-abh02a:1421_0: 408. Abhidhammabhājanīye sabbānipi sammappadhānāni dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ vibhattassa desanānayassa
atk-abh02a:1421_1: mukhamattameva dassentena niddiṭṭhāni. Tattha nayabhedo veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Paṭhamasammappadhāne
atk-abh02a:1421_2: tāva sotāpattimagge jhānābhinivese suddhikapaṭipadā, suddhikasuññatā, suññatapaṭipadā,
atk-abh02a:1421_3: suddhikaappaṇihitā, appaṇihitapaṭipadāti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ catukkapañcakanayānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1421_4: vasena dasa nayā honti. Evaṃ sesesupīti vīsatiyā abhinivesesu dve nayasatāni. Tāni
atk-abh02a:1421_5: catūhi adhipatīhi catugguṇitāni aṭṭha. Iti suddhikāni dve sādhipatīni aṭṭhāti sabbampi
atk-abh02a:1421_6: nayasahassaṃ hoti. Tathādutiyasammappadhānādīsu suddhikasammappadhāne cāti sotāpattimagge
atk-abh02a:1421_7: pañcanayasahassāni. Yathā ca sotāpattimagge, evaṃ sesamaggesupīti kusalavaseneva
atk-abh02a:1421_8: vīsati nayasahassāni. Vipāke pana sammappadhānehi kattabbakiccaṃ natthīti vipākavāro
atk-abh02a:1421_9: na gahitoti. Sammappadhānāni panettha nibbattitalokuttarāneva kathitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:1424_0: 427. Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva sammappadhānānaṃ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu
atk-abh02a:1424_1: pana sabbānipi etāni appamāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattito appamāṇārammaṇāneva, na
atk-abh02a:1424_2: maggārammaṇāni; sahajātahetuvasena pana maggahetukāni; vīmaṃsaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle
atk-abh02a:1424_3: maggādhipatīni; chandacittajeṭṭhikāya maggabhāvanāya na vattabbāni maggādhipatīnīti;
atk-abh02a:1424_4: vīriyajeṭṭhikāya pana aññassa vīriyassa abhāvā na vattabbāni maggādhipatīnīti vā
atk-abh02a:1424_5: na maggādhipatīnīti vā; atītādīsu ekārammaṇabhāvenapi na vattabbāni; nibbānassa pana
atk-abh02a:1424_6: bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇāni nāma hontīti. Evametasmiṃ pañhāpucchake nibbattitalokuttarāneva
atk-abh02a:1424_7: sammappadhānāni kathitāni. Sammāsambuddhena hi suttantabhājanīyasmiṃyeva lokiyalokuttaramissakā
atk-abh02a:1424_8: sammappadhānā kathitā; abhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakesu pana lokuttarāyevāti. Evamayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1429_0: 431. Idāni tadanantare iddhipādavibhaṅge cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Iddhipādāti
atk-abh02a:1429_1: ettha ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā
atk-abh02a:1429_2: vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontītipi iddhi. Paṭhamenatthena iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti
atk-abh02a:1429_3: attho. Dutiyenatthena iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo; pādoti patiṭṭhā, adhigamupāyoti attho.
atk-abh02a:1429_4: Tena hi yasmā uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti, tasmā pādoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1429_5: Evaṃ tāva “cattāro iddhipādā”ti ettha attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1430_0: Idāni te bhājetvā dassetuṃ idha bhikkhūtiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1430_2: vā samādhi chandasamādhi. Kattukamyatāchandaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhissetaṃ
atk-abh02a:1430_3: adhivacanaṃ. Padhānabhūtā saṅkhārā padhānasaṅkhārā. Catukiccasādhakassa sammappadhānavīriyassetaṃ
atk-abh02a:1430_4: adhivacanaṃ. Samannāgatanti chandasamādhinā ca padhānasaṅkhārehi ca upetaṃ. Iddhipādanti
atk-abh02a:1430_5: nipphattipariyāyena vā ijjhanakaṭṭhena ijjhanti etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā
atk-abh02a:1430_6: hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena iddhīti saṅkhaṃ gatānaṃ upacārajjhānādikusalacittasampayuttānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1430_8: attho. Yañhi parato “iddhipādoti tathābhūtassa vedanākkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho”ti
atk-abh02a:1430_9: vuttaṃ, taṃ iminā atthena yujjati. Iminā nayena sesesupi attho veditabbo. Yatheva
atk-abh02a:1430_10: hi chandaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhi chandasamādhīti vutto, evaṃ vīriyaṃ…pe…
atk-abh02a:1430_11: cittaṃ. Vīmaṃsaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhi vīmaṃsasamādhīti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1431_0: Idāni chandasamādhiādīni padāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ kathañca bhikkhūtiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1431_1: Tattha chandañce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvāti yadi bhikkhu chandaṃ adhipatiṃ chandaṃ
atk-abh02a:1431_2: jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā samādhiṃ paṭilabhati nibbatteti,
atk-abh02a:1431_3: evaṃ nibbattito ayaṃ samādhi chandasamādhi nāma vuccatīti attho. Vīriyañcetiādīsupi
atk-abh02a:1431_4: eseva nayo. Ime vuccanti padhānasaṅkhārāti ettāvatā chandiddhipādaṃ bhāvayamānassa
atk-abh02a:1431_6: abhisaññūhitvāti taṃ sabbaṃ ekato rāsiṃ katvāti attho. Saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti etaṃ vohāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1432: 433. Idāni “chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhāro”ti etasmiṃ padasamūhe chandādidhamme bhājetvā dassetuṃ tattha katamo chandotiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-abh02a:1433_0: Upeto hotīti iddhipādasaṅkhāto dhammarāsi upeto hoti. Tesaṃ dhammānanti tesaṃ sampayuttānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1433_1: chandādidhammānaṃ. Iddhi samiddhītiādīni sabbāni nipphattivevacanāneva. Evaṃ santepi
atk-abh02a:1433_2: ijjhanakaṭṭhena iddhi. Sampuṇṇā iddhi samiddhi; upasaggena vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Ijjhanākāro
atk-abh02a:1433_3: ijjhanā. Samijjhanāti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Attano santāne pātubhāvavasena
atk-abh02a:1433_4: labhanaṃ lābho. Parihīnānampi vīriyārambhavasena puna lābho paṭilābho; upasaggena
atk-abh02a:1433_5: vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Pattīti adhigamo. Aparihānavasena sammā pattīti sampatti. Phusanāti
atk-abh02a:1433_6: paṭilābhaphusanā. Sacchikiriyāti paṭilābhasacchikiriyāva. Upasampadāti paṭilābhaupasampadā evāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1434_0: Tayābhūtassāti tena ākārena bhūtassa; te chandādidhamme paṭilabhitvā ṭhitassāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1434_1: Vedanākkhandhotiādīhi chandādayo anto katvā cattāropi khandhā kathitā. Te dhammeti
atk-abh02a:1434_2: te cattāro arūpakkhandhe; chandādayo vā tayo dhammetipi vuttaṃ. Āsevatītiādīni vuttatthāneva.
atk-abh02a:1435_0: Ettāvatā kiṃ kathitanti? Catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ matthakappattaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1435_1: Eko hi bhikkhu chandaṃ avassayati; kattukamyatākusaladhammacchandena atthanipphattiyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1435_2: sati ‘ahaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattessāmi, natthi mayhaṃ etassa nibbattane bhāro’ti
atk-abh02a:1435_3: chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbatteti.
atk-abh02a:1435_4: Eko vīriyaṃ avassayati. Eko cittaṃ, eko paññaṃ avassayati. Paññāya atthanipphattiyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1435_5: sati ‘ahaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattessāmi, natthi mayhaṃ etassa nibbattane bhāro’ti
atk-abh02a:1435_6: paññaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ paññaṃ dhuraṃ paññaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbatteti.
atk-abh02a:1436_0: Kathaṃ? Yathā hi catūsu amaccaputtesu ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā vicarantesu eko upaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1436_1: avassayi, eko sūrabhāvaṃ, eko jātiṃ, eko mantaṃ. Kathaṃ? Tesu hi paṭhamo ‘upaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1436_2: appamādakāritāya atthanipphattiyā sati labbhamānaṃ lacchāmetaṃ ṭhānantara’nti upaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1436_3: avassayi. Dutiyo ‘upaṭṭhāne appamattopi ekacco saṅgāme paccupaṭṭhite saṇṭhātuṃ na
atk-abh02a:1436_4: sakkoti; avassaṃ kho pana rañño paccanto kuppissati; tasmiṃ kuppite rathadhure kammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1436_5: katvā rājānaṃ ārādhetvā āharāpessāmetaṃ ṭhānantara’nti sūrabhāvaṃ avassayi. Tatiyo
atk-abh02a:1436_6: ‘sūrabhāvepi sati ekacco hīnajātiko hoti; jātiṃ sodhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ dadantā mayhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1436_7: dassantī’ti jātiṃ avassayi. Catuttho ‘jātimāpi eko amantanīyo hoti; mantena kattabbakicce
atk-abh02a:1436_8: uppanne āharāpessāmetaṃ ṭhānantara’nti mantaṃ avassayi. Te sabbepi attano attano
atk-abh02a:1437_0: Tattha upaṭṭhāne appamatto hutvā ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya chandaṃ avassāya kattukamyatākusaladhammacchandena
atk-abh02a:1437_1: atthanibbattiyaṃ sati ‘ahaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattessāmi, natthi mayhaṃ etassa
atk-abh02a:1437_2: nibbattane bhāro’ti chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako
atk-abh02a:1437_3: daṭṭhabbo, raṭṭhapālatthero viya. So hi āyasmā chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1437_4: nibbattesi. Sūrabhāvena rājānaṃ ārādhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya vīriyaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1437_5: vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ vīriyaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako daṭṭhabbo, soṇatthero
atk-abh02a:1437_6: viya. So hi āyasmā vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-abh02a:1438_0: Jātisampattiyā ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ cittaṃ dhuraṃ cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ
atk-abh02a:1438_1: katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako daṭṭhabbo, sambhūtatthero viya. So hi āyasmā cittaṃ
atk-abh02a:1438_2: dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi. Mantaṃ avassāya ṭhānantarappatto viya vīmaṃsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1438_3: jeṭṭhakaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ dhuraṃ vīmaṃsaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako daṭṭhabbo,
atk-abh02a:1438_4: thero mogharājā viya. So hi āyasmā vīmaṃsaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-abh02a:1439_0: Ettha ca tayo chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasaṅkhātā dhammā iddhīpi honti iddhipādāpi.
atk-abh02a:1439_1: Sesā pana sampayuttakā cattāro khandhā iddhipādāyeva. Vīriyacittavīmaṃsasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasaṅkhātāpi
atk-abh02a:1439_2: tayo dhammā iddhīpi honti iddhipādāpi. Sesā pana sampayuttakā cattāro khandhā iddhipādāyeva.
atk-abh02a:1440_0: Bhedato pana ‘chando’ iddhi nāma. Chandadhurena bhāvitā cattāro khandhā chandiddhipādo
atk-abh02a:1440_1: nāma. Samādhi padhānasaṅkhāroti dve dhammā saṅkhārakkhandhavasena chandiddhipāde
atk-abh02a:1440_2: pavisanti; pāde paviṭṭhātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Tattheva ‘samādhi’ iddhi nāma. Samādhidhurena
atk-abh02a:1440_3: bhāvitā cattāro khandhā samādhiddhipādo nāma. Chando padhānasaṅkhāroti dve dhammā
atk-abh02a:1440_4: saṅkhārakkhandhavasena samādhiddhipāde pavisanti; pāde paviṭṭhātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati
atk-abh02a:1440_5: eva. Tattheva ‘padhānasaṅkhāro’ iddhi nāma. Padhānasaṅkhārabhāvitā cattāro khandhā
atk-abh02a:1440_6: padhānasaṅkhāriddhipādo nāma. Chando samādhīti dve dhammā saṅkhārakkhandhavasena
atk-abh02a:1440_7: padhānasaṅkhāriddhipāde pavisanti; pāde paviṭṭhātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Tattheva
atk-abh02a:1440_8: ‘vīriyaṃ’ iddhi nāma, ‘cittaṃ’ iddhi nāma, ‘vīmaṃsā’ iddhi nāma…pe… pāde paviṭṭhātipi
atk-abh02a:1440_9: vattuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Ayaṃ bhedato kathā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1441_0: Ettha pana abhinavaṃ natthi; gahitameva vibhūtadhātukaṃ kataṃ. Kathaṃ? Chando, samādhi,
atk-abh02a:1441_1: padhānasaṅkhāroti ime tayo dhammā iddhīpi honti iddhipādāpi. Sesā sampayuttakā cattāro
atk-abh02a:1441_2: khandhā iddhipādāyeva. Ime hi tayo dhammā ijjhamānā sampayuttakehi catūhi khandhehi
atk-abh02a:1441_3: saddhiṃyeva ijjhanti, na vinā. Sampayuttakā pana cattāro khandhā ijjhanakaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:1441_4: iddhi nāma honti, patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena pādo nāma. ‘Iddhī’ti vā ‘iddhipādo’ti vā na aññassa
atk-abh02a:1441_5: kassaci adhivacanaṃ, sampayuttakānaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃyeva adhivacanaṃ. Vīriyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1441_6: cittaṃ, vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhāroti tayo dhammā…pe… catunnaṃ khandhānaṃyeva adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1442_0: Apica pubbabhāgo pubbabhāgo iddhipādo nāma; paṭilābho paṭilābho iddhi nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1442_1: Ayamattho upacārena vā vipassanāya vā dīpetabbo. Paṭhamajjhānaparikammañhi iddhipādo
atk-abh02a:1442_3: iddhipādo nāma, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ iddhi nāma. Sotāpattimaggassa vipassanā iddhipādo
atk-abh02a:1442_4: nāma, sotāpattimaggo iddhi nāma. Sakadāgāmi, anāgāmi, arahattamaggassa vipassanā
atk-abh02a:1442_5: iddhipādo nāma, arahattamaggo iddhi nāma. Paṭilābhenāpi dīpetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Paṭhamajjhānañhi
atk-abh02a:1442_6: iddhipādo nāma, dutiyajjhānaṃ iddhi nāma; dutiyajjhānaṃ iddhipādo nāma, tatiyajjhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1442_7: iddhi nāma…pe… anāgāmimaggo iddhipādo nāma, arahattamaggo iddhi nāma.
atk-abh02a:1443_0: Kenaṭṭhena iddhi? Kenaṭṭhena pādoti? Ijjhanakaṭṭheneva iddhi. Patiṭṭhānaṭṭheneva
atk-abh02a:1443_1: pādo. Evamidhāpi iddhīti vā pādoti vā na aññassa kassaci adhivacanaṃ, sampayuttakānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1443_2: catunnaṃ khandhānaṃyeva adhivacananti. Evaṃ vutte pana idamāhaṃsu – catunnaṃ khandhānameva
atk-abh02a:1443_3: adhivacanaṃ bhaveyya, yadi satthā parato uttaracūḷabhājanīyaṃ nāma na āhareyya. Uttaracūḷabhājanīye
atk-abh02a:1443_4: pana “chandoyeva chandiddhipādo, vīriyameva, cittameva, vīmaṃsāva vīmaṃsiddhipādo”ti
atk-abh02a:1443_5: kathitaṃ. Keci pana “iddhi nāma anipphannā, iddhipādo nipphanno”ti vadiṃsu. Tesaṃ
atk-abh02a:1443_6: vacanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā iddhīpi iddhipādopi ‘nipphanno tilakkhaṇabbhāhato’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1443_7: kataṃ. Iti imasmiṃ suttantabhājanīye lokiyalokuttaramissakā iddhipādā kathitāti.
atk-abh02a:1446_1: iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī”ti vuttaṭṭhānasmiñhi lokuttarāni cattāri nayasahassāni vibhattāni.
atk-abh02a:1446_2: Vīriyasamādhiādīsupi eseva nayo. Tathā uttaracūḷabhājanīye chandiddhipāde cattāri
atk-abh02a:1446_3: nayasahassāni vibhattāni, vīriyacittavīmaṃsiddhipāde cattāri cattārīti sabbānipi
atk-abh02a:1446_4: aṭṭhannaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena dvattiṃsa nayasahassāni vibhattāni. Evametaṃ nibbattitalokuttarānaṃyeva
atk-abh02a:1446_5: iddhipādānaṃ vasena dvattiṃsanayasahassappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1448_0: 462. Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva iddhipādānaṃ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu
atk-abh02a:1448_1: pana sabbepete appamāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattito appamāṇārammaṇā eva, na maggārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a:1448_2: sahajātahetuvasena pana maggahetukā, na maggādhipatino. Cattāro hi adhipatayo aññamaññaṃ
atk-abh02a:1448_3: garuṃ na karonti. Kasmā? Sayaṃ jeṭṭhakattā. Yathā hi samajātikā samavayā samathāmā
atk-abh02a:1448_4: samasippā cattāro rājaputtā attano attano jeṭṭhakatāya aññamaññassa apacitiṃ na karonti,
atk-abh02a:1448_5: evamimepi cattāro adhipatayo pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ jeṭṭhakadhammatāya aññamaññaṃ
atk-abh02a:1448_6: garuṃ na karontīti ekanteneva na maggādhipatino. Atītādīsu ekārammaṇabhāvepi na vattabbā.
atk-abh02a:1448_7: Nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇā nāma hontīti. Evametasmiṃ pañhāpucchake
atk-abh02a:1448_8: nibbattitalokuttarāva iddhipādā kathitā. Sammāsambuddhena hi suttantabhājanīyasmiṃyeva
atk-abh02a:1448_10: lokuttarāyevāti. Evamayaṃ iddhipādavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvāva dassitoti.
atk-abh02a:1453_0: 466. Idāni tadanantare bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge sattāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Bojjhaṅgāti bodhiyā
atk-abh02a:1453_1: bodhissa vā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yā esā dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:1453_4: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā bodhīti vuccati, bujjhati kilesasantānaniddāya
atk-abh02a:1453_5: uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikaroti, tassā
atk-abh02a:1453_6: dhammasāmaggīsaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā, jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādīni viya. Yo
atk-abh02a:1453_7: panesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako bodhīti
atk-abh02a:1453_8: vuccati, tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā, senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā
atk-abh02a:1454_0: Apica “bojjhaṅgāti kenaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā? Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā, bujjhantīti
atk-abh02a:1454_1: bojjhaṅgā, anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, paṭibujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti
atk-abh02a:1455_0: Satisambojjhaṅgotiādīsu pasattho sundaro ca bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo, satiyeva sambojjhaṅgo
atk-abh02a:1455_1: satisambojjhaṅgo. Tattha upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇo satisambojjhaṅgo, pavicayalakkhaṇo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo,
atk-abh02a:1455_4: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo. Tesu “satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti vacanato
atk-abh02a:1455_5: sabbesaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ upakārakattā satisambojjhaṅgo paṭhamaṃ vutto. Tato paraṃ “so
atk-abh02a:1455_6: tathā sato viharanto taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinatī”tiādinā nayena evaṃ anukkameneva
atk-abh02a:1456_0: Kasmā panete satteva vuttā, anūnā anadhikāti? Līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato
atk-abh02a:1456_1: ca. Ettha hi tayo bojjhaṅgā līnassa paṭipakkhā, yathāha – “yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a:1456_2: samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya,
atk-abh02a:1456_3: kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”ti. Tayo
atk-abh02a:1456_4: uddhaccassa paṭipakkhā, yathāha – “yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ
atk-abh02a:1456_5: hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa
atk-abh02a:1456_6: bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”ti. Eko panettha loṇadhūpanaṃ viya
atk-abh02a:1456_7: sabbabyañjanesu, sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbesu rājakiccesu, sabbabojjhaṅgesu
atk-abh02a:1456_8: icchitabbato sabbatthiko, yathāha – “satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1456_9: “Sabbatthaka”ntipi pāḷi. Dvinnampi sabbattha icchitabbanti attho. Evaṃ līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato
atk-abh02a:1457_0: 467. Idāni nesaṃ ekasmiṃyevārammaṇe attano attano kiccavasena nānākaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh02a:1457_1: tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgotiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane
atk-abh02a:1457_2: bhikkhu. Satimā hotīti paññāya paññavā, yasena yasavā, dhanena dhanavā viya satiyā
atk-abh02a:1457_3: satimā hoti, satisampannoti attho. Paramenāti uttamena; tañhi paramatthasaccassa
atk-abh02a:1457_4: nibbānassa ceva maggassa ca anulomato paramaṃ nāma hoti uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ. Satinepakkenāti
atk-abh02a:1457_5: nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā; satiyā ceva nepakkena cāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1458_0: Kasmā pana imasmiṃ satibhājanīye paññā saṅgahitāti? Satiyā balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1458_1: Sati hi paññāya saddhimpi uppajjati vināpi, paññāya saddhiṃ uppajjamānā balavatī
atk-abh02a:1458_2: hoti, vinā uppajjamānā dubbalā. Tenassā balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ paññā saṅgahitā. Yathā
atk-abh02a:1458_3: hi dvīsu disāsu dve rājamahāmattā tiṭṭheyyuṃ; tesu eko rājaputtaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭheyya,
atk-abh02a:1458_4: eko attano dhammatāya ekakova tesu rājaputtaṃ gahetvā ṭhito attanopi tejena rājaputtassapi
atk-abh02a:1458_5: tejena tejavā hoti; attano dhammatāya ṭhito na tena samatejo hoti; evameva rājaputtaṃ
atk-abh02a:1458_6: gahetvā ṭhitamahāmatto viya paññāya saddhiṃ uppannā sati, attano dhammatāya ṭhito
atk-abh02a:1458_7: viya vinā paññāya uppannā. Tattha yathā rājaputtaṃ gahetvā ṭhito attanopi tejena
atk-abh02a:1458_8: rājaputtassapi tejena tejavā hoti, evaṃ paññāya saddhiṃ uppannā sati balavatī hoti;
atk-abh02a:1458_9: yathā attano dhammatāya ṭhito na tena samatejo hoti, evaṃ vinā paññāya uppannā dubbalā
atk-abh02a:1459_0: Cirakatampīti attano vā parassa vā kāyena cirakataṃ vattaṃ vā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ vā kasiṇaparikammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1459_1: vā. Cirabhāsitampīti attanā vā parena vā vācāya cirabhāsitaṃ bahukampi, vattasīse
atk-abh02a:1459_2: ṭhatvā dhammakathaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānavinicchayaṃ vā, vimuttāyatanasīse vā ṭhatvā dhammakathameva.
atk-abh02a:1459_3: Saritā hotīti taṃ kāyaviññattiṃ vacīviññattiñca samuṭṭhāpetvā pavattaṃ arūpadhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1459_4: ‘evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ niruddho’ti saritā hoti. Anussaritāti punappunaṃ saritā. Ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1459_5: vuccati satisambojjhaṅgoti ayaṃ evaṃ uppannā sesabojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā
atk-abh02a:1460_0: So tathā sato viharantoti so bhikkhu tenākārena uppannāya satiyā sato hutvā viharanto.
atk-abh02a:1460_1: Taṃ dhammanti taṃ cirakataṃ cirabhāsitaṃ heṭṭhā vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ. Paññāya pavicinatīti
atk-abh02a:1460_2: paññāya ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti pavicinati. Pavicaratīti ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti
atk-abh02a:1460_3: tattha paññaṃ carāpento pavicarati. Parivīmaṃsaṃ āpajjatīti olokanaṃ gavesanaṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh02a:1460_4: Ayaṃ vuccatīti idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1461_0: Tassa taṃ dhammanti tassa bhikkhuno taṃ heṭṭhā vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ. Āraddhaṃ hotīti
atk-abh02a:1461_1: paripuṇṇaṃ hoti paggahitaṃ. Asallīnanti āraddhattāyeva asallīnaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccatīti
atk-abh02a:1461_2: idaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ vipassanāsampayuttaṃ vīriyaṃ vīriyasambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1462: Nirāmisāti kāmāmisalokāmisavaṭṭāmisānaṃ abhāvena nirāmisā parisuddhā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā pīti pītisambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1463_0: Pītimanassāti pītisampayuttacittassa. Kāyopi passambhatīti khandhattayasaṅkhāto nāmakāyo
atk-abh02a:1463_1: kilesadarathapaṭippassaddhiyā passambhati. Cittampīti viññāṇakkhandhopi tatheva passambhati.
atk-abh02a:1463_2: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā passaddhi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1464_0: Passaddhakāyassa sukhinoti passaddhakāyatāya uppannasukhena sukhitassa. Samādhiyatīti
atk-abh02a:1464_1: sammā ādhiyati, niccalaṃ hutvā ārammaṇe ṭhapīyati, appanāppattaṃ viya hoti. Ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1464_2: vuccatīti ayaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā cittekaggatā samādhisambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1465_0: Tathā samāhitanti tena appanāppattena viya samādhinā samāhitaṃ. Sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā
atk-abh02a:1465_1: hotīti suṭṭhu ajjhupekkhitā hoti; tesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānavaḍḍhane abyāvaṭo hutvā ajjhupekkhati.
atk-abh02a:1465_2: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ channaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ anosakkanaanativattanabhāvasādhako majjhattākāro
atk-abh02a:1466: Ettāvatā kiṃ kathitaṃ nāma hoti? Apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekacittakkhaṇe nānārasalakkhaṇā pubbabhāgavipassanā bojjhaṅgā kathitā hontīti.
atk-abh02a:1468_0: 468-469. Idāni yena pariyāyena satta bojjhaṅgā cuddasa honti, tassa pakāsanatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1468_1: dutiyanayaṃ dassento puna satta bojjhaṅgātiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbapadavaṇṇanā
atk-abh02a:1468_2: – ajjhattaṃ dhammesu satīti ajjhattikasaṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa uppannā sati. Bahiddhā
atk-abh02a:1468_3: dhammesu satīti bahiddhāsaṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa uppannā sati. Yadapīti yāpi. Tadapīti
atk-abh02a:1468_4: sāpi. Abhiññāyāti abhiññeyyadhamme abhijānanatthāya. Sambodhāyāti sambodhi vuccati
atk-abh02a:1468_5: maggo, maggatthāyāti attho. Nibbānāyāti vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā; sā tattha natthīti nibbānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1468_6: tadatthāya, asaṅkhatāya amatadhātuyā sacchikiriyatthāya saṃvattatīti attho. Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1469_0: Kāyikaṃ vīriyanti caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa uppannavīriyaṃ. Cetasikaṃ vīriyanti “na
atk-abh02a:1469_1: tāvāhaṃ imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi yāva me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī”ti
atk-abh02a:1469_2: evaṃ kāyapayogaṃ vinā uppannavīriyaṃ. Kāyapassaddhīti tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ darathapassaddhi.
atk-abh02a:1469_4: vinicchayo. Imasmiṃ naye satta bojjhaṅgā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.
atk-abh02a:1470_0: Porāṇakattherā pana ‘ettakena pākaṭaṃ na hotī’ti vibhajitvā dassesuṃ. Etesu hi ajjhattadhammesu
atk-abh02a:1470_1: sati pavicayo upekkhāti ime tayo attano khandhārammaṇattā lokiyāva honti. Tathā maggaṃ
atk-abh02a:1470_2: appattaṃ kāyikavīriyaṃ. Avitakkaavicārā pana pītisamādhiyo lokuttarā honti. Sesā
atk-abh02a:1471_0: Tattha ajjhattaṃ tāva dhammesu satipavicayaupekkhā ajjhattārammaṇā, lokuttarā pana
atk-abh02a:1471_1: bahiddhārammaṇāti tesaṃ lokuttarabhāvo mā yujjittha. Caṅkamappayogena nibbattavīriyampi
atk-abh02a:1471_2: lokiyanti vadanto na kilamati. Avitakkaavicārā pana pītisamādhiyo kadā lokuttarā
atk-abh02a:1471_3: hontīti? Kāmāvacare tāva pītisambojjhaṅgo labbhati, avitakkaavicārā pīti na labbhati.
atk-abh02a:1471_4: Rūpāvacare avitakkaavicārā pīti labbhati, pītisambojjhaṅgo pana na labbhati. Arūpāvacare
atk-abh02a:1471_5: sabbena sabbaṃ na labbhati. Ettha pana alabbhamānakaṃ upādāya labbhamānakāpi paṭikkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1471_6: Evamayaṃ avitakkaavicāro pītisambojjhaṅgo kāmāvacaratopi nikkhanto rūpāvacaratopi
atk-abh02a:1472_0: Tathā kāmāvacare samādhisambojjhaṅgo labbhati, avitakkaavicāro pana samādhi na labbhati.
atk-abh02a:1472_1: Rūpāvacaraarūpāvacaresu avitakkaavicāro samādhi labbhati, samādhisambojjhaṅgo pana
atk-abh02a:1472_2: na labbhati. Ettha pana alabbhamānakaṃ upādāya labbhamānakopi paṭikkhitto. Evamayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1472_3: avitakkaavicāro samādhi kāmāvacaratopi nikkhanto rūpāvacaratopi arūpāvacaratopīti
atk-abh02a:1473_0: Apica lokiyaṃ gahetvā lokuttaro kātabbo; lokuttaraṃ gahetvā lokiyo kātabbo. Ajjhattadhammesu
atk-abh02a:1473_1: hi satipavicayaupekkhānaṃ lokuttarabhāvanākālopi atthi. Tatridaṃ suttaṃ – “ajjhattavimokkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1473_2: khvāhaṃ, āvuso, sabbupādānakkhayaṃ vadāmi; evamassime āsavā nānusentī”ti iminā suttena
atk-abh02a:1473_3: lokuttarā honti. Yadā pana caṅkamapayogena nibbatte kāyikavīriye anupasanteyeva vipassanā
atk-abh02a:1473_4: maggena ghaṭīyati, tadā taṃ lokuttaraṃ hoti. Ye pana therā “kasiṇajjhāne, ānāpānajjhāne,
atk-abh02a:1473_5: brahmavihārajjhāne ca bojjhaṅgo uddharanto na vāretabbo”ti vadanti, tesaṃ vāde avitakkaavicārā
atk-abh02a:1475_0: 470-471. Idāni bojjhaṅgānaṃ bhāvanāvasena pavattaṃ tatiyanayaṃ dassento puna satta
atk-abh02a:1475_1: bojjhaṅgātiādimāha. Tatthāpi ayaṃ anupubbapadavaṇṇanā – bhāvetīti vaḍḍheti; attano
atk-abh02a:1475_2: santāne punappunaṃ janeti abhinibbatteti. Vivekanissitanti viveke nissitaṃ. Vivekoti
atk-abh02a:1475_4: pañcavidho. Tattha tadaṅgaviveko nāma vipassanā. Vikkhambhanaviveko nāma aṭṭha samāpattiyo.
atk-abh02a:1475_5: Samucchedaviveko nāma maggo. Paṭippassaddhiviveko nāma phalaṃ. Nissaraṇaviveko nāma
atk-abh02a:1475_6: sabbanimittanissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ. Evametasmiṃ pañcavidhe viveke nissitaṃ vivekanissitanti
atk-abh02a:1476_0: Tathā hi ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyogamanuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato
atk-abh02a:1476_1: tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ, ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ, maggakāle pana kiccato
atk-abh02a:1476_3: Pañcavivekanissitampīti eke. Te hi na kevalaṃ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesu eva
atk-abh02a:1476_5: uddharanti, na ca paṭisiddhā aṭṭhakathācariyehi. Tasmā tesaṃ matena etesaṃ jhānānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1476_6: pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ. Yathā ca vipassanākkhaṇe “ajjhāsayato
atk-abh02a:1476_8: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Esa nayo virāganissitādīsu. Vivekatthā eva hi virāgādayo.
atk-abh02a:1477_0: Kevalañcettha vossaggo duvidho – pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti. Tattha
atk-abh02a:1477_1: ‘pariccāgavossaggo’ti vipassanākkhaṇe ca tadaṅgavasena maggakkhaṇe ca samucchedavasena
atk-abh02a:1477_3: pana ārammaṇakaraṇena nibbānapakkhandanaṃ. Tadubhayampi imasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaramissake
atk-abh02a:1477_4: atthavaṇṇanānaye vaṭṭati. Tathā hi ayaṃ sati sambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese
atk-abh02a:1478_0: Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggatthaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca,
atk-abh02a:1478_1: paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcāti idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Ayañhi bojjhaṅgabhāvanamanuyutto bhikkhu
atk-abh02a:1478_3: paripaccati, yathā ca paripakko hoti, tathā naṃ bhāvetīti. Esa nayo sesabojjhaṅgesupi.
atk-abh02a:1481_0: 472. Abhidhammabhājanīye sattapi bojjhaṅge ekato pucchitvā vissajjanassa ca pāṭiyekkaṃ
atk-abh02a:1481_1: pucchitvā vissajjanassa ca vasena dve nayā. Tesaṃ atthavaṇṇanā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1482_0: Upekkhāsambojjhaṅganiddese pana upekkhanavasena upekkhā. Upekkhanākāro upekkhanā.
atk-abh02a:1482_1: Upekkhitabbayutte samappavatte dhamme ikkhati, na codetīti upekkhā. Puggalaṃ upekkhāpetīti
atk-abh02a:1482_2: upekkhanā. Bojjhaṅgabhāvappattiyā lokiyaupekkhanāya adhikā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā.
atk-abh02a:1482_3: Abyāpārāpajjanena majjhattabhāvo majjhattatā. Sā pana cittassa, na sattassāti dīpetuṃ
atk-abh02a:1483_0: Nayā panettha gaṇetabbā – sattannampi hi bojjhaṅgānaṃ ekato pucchitvā vissajjane
atk-abh02a:1483_1: ekekamagge nayasahassaṃ nayasahassanti cattāri nayasahassāni vibhattāni. Pāṭiyekkaṃ
atk-abh02a:1483_2: pucchitvā vissajjane ekekabojjhaṅgavasena cattāri cattārīti satta catukkā aṭṭhavīsati.
atk-abh02a:1483_3: Tāni purimehi catūhi saddhiṃ dvattiṃsāti sabbānipi abhidhammabhājanīye dvattiṃsa
atk-abh02a:1483_4: nayasahassāni vibhattāni kusalāneva. Yasmā pana phalakkhaṇepi bojjhaṅgā labbhanti,
atk-abh02a:1483_5: kusalahetukāni ca sāmaññaphalāni, tasmā tesupi bojjhaṅgadassanatthaṃ kusalaniddesapubbaṅgamāya
atk-abh02a:1483_6: eva tantiyā vipākanayo āraddho. Sopi ekato pucchitvā vissajjanassa ca, pāṭiyekkaṃ
atk-abh02a:1483_7: pucchitvā vissajjanassa ca vasena duvidho hoti. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1483_8: Vipāke pana kusalato tiguṇā nayā kātabbāti.
atk-abh02a:1486_0: 482. Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva bojjhaṅgānaṃ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu
atk-abh02a:1486_1: pana sabbepete appamāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattito appamāṇārammaṇā eva, na maggārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a:1486_2: Sahajātahetuvasena panettha kusalā maggahetukā, vīriyaṃ vā vīmaṃsaṃ vā jeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1486_3: katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipatino, chandacittajeṭṭhikāya maggabhāvanāya na vattabbā
atk-abh02a:1487_0: Atītādīsu ekārammaṇabhāvenapi na vattabbā, nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇā
atk-abh02a:1487_1: nāma hontīti. Evametasmiṃ pañhāpucchakepi nibbattitalokuttarāva bojjhaṅgā kathitā.
atk-abh02a:1487_2: Sammāsambuddhena hi suttantabhājanīyasseva paṭhamanayasmiṃ lokiyā, dutiyatatiyesu
atk-abh02a:1487_3: lokiyalokuttaramissakā bojjhaṅgā kathitā. Abhidhammabhājanīyassa pana catūsupi nayesu
atk-abh02a:1487_4: imasmiñca pañhāpucchake lokuttarāyevāti evamayaṃ bojjhaṅgavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ
atk-abh02a:1492_0: 486. Idāni tadanantare maggavibhaṅge ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggotiādi sabbaṃ saccavibhaṅge
atk-abh02a:1492_2: dassite dutiyanayepi sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitantiādi sabbaṃ bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge
atk-abh02a:1492_3: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Evamidaṃ dvinnampi nayānaṃ vasena suttantabhājanīyaṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakameva kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1494_0: 490. Abhidhammabhājanīye ‘ariyo’ti avatvā aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ avuttepi
atk-abh02a:1494_1: ayaṃ ariyo eva. Yathā hi muddhābhisittassa rañño muddhābhisittāya deviyā kucchismiṃ
atk-abh02a:1494_2: jāto putto rājaputtoti avuttepi rājaputtoyeva hoti, evamayampi ariyoti avuttepi ariyo
atk-abh02a:1494_3: evāti veditabbo. Sesamidhāpi saccavibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1495_0: 493. Pañcaṅgikavārepi aṭṭhaṅgikoti avuttepi aṭṭhaṅgiko eva veditabbo. Lokuttaramaggo
atk-abh02a:1495_1: hi pañcaṅgiko nāma natthi. Ayamettha ācariyānaṃ samānatthakathā. Vitaṇḍavādī panāha
atk-abh02a:1495_2: – “lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgiko nāma natthi, pañcaṅgikoyeva hotī”ti. So “suttaṃ āharāhī”ti
atk-abh02a:1495_3: vutto addhā aññaṃ apassanto imaṃ mahāsaḷāyatanato suttappadesaṃ āharissati “yā tathābhūtassa
atk-abh02a:1495_4: diṭṭhi, sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi. Yo tathābhūtassa saṅkappo, vāyāmo, sati, yo tathābhūtassa
atk-abh02a:1495_5: samādhi, svāssa hoti sammāsamādhi. Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo
atk-abh02a:1496_0: Tato “etassa anantaraṃ suttapadaṃ āharā”ti vattabbo. Sace āharati iccetaṃ kusalaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1496_1: no ce āharati sayaṃ āharitvā “evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ
atk-abh02a:1496_2: gacchatī”ti “iminā te satthusāsanena vādo bhinno; lokuttaramaggo pañcaṅgiko nāma
atk-abh02a:1497_0: Imāni pana tīṇi aṅgāni pubbe parisuddhāni vattanti, lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe parisuddhatarāni
atk-abh02a:1497_1: honti. Atha ‘pañcaṅgiko maggo’ti idaṃ kimatthaṃ gahitanti? Atirekakiccadassanatthaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1497_2: Yasmiñhi samaye micchāvācaṃ pajahati, sammāvācaṃ pūreti, tasmiṃ samaye sammākammantasammāājīvā
atk-abh02a:1497_3: natthi. Imāni pañcakārāpakaṅgāneva micchāvācaṃ pajahanti; sammāvācā pana sayaṃ virativasena
atk-abh02a:1497_4: pūreti. Yasmiṃ samaye micchākammantaṃ pajahati, sammākammantaṃ pūreti, tasmiṃ samaye
atk-abh02a:1497_5: sammāvācāsammāājīvā natthi. Imāni pañca kārāpakaṅgāneva micchākammantaṃ pajahanti;
atk-abh02a:1497_6: sammākammanto pana sayaṃ virativasena pūreti. Yasmiṃ samaye micchāājīvaṃ pajahati,
atk-abh02a:1497_7: sammāājīvaṃ pūreti, tasmiṃ samaye sammāvācāsammākammantā natthi. Imāni pañca kārāpakaṅgāneva
atk-abh02a:1497_8: micchāājīvaṃ pajahanti; sammāājīvo pana sayaṃ virativasena pūreti. Imaṃ etesaṃ pañcannaṃ
atk-abh02a:1497_9: kārāpakaṅgānaṃ kiccātirekataṃ dassetuṃ pañcaṅgiko maggoti gahitaṃ. Lokuttaramaggo
atk-abh02a:1497_10: pana aṭṭhaṅgikova hoti, pañcaṅgiko nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1498_0: “Yadi sammāvācādīhi saddhiṃ aṭṭhaṅgikoti vadatha, catasso sammāvācācetanā, tisso
atk-abh02a:1498_1: sammākammantacetanā, satta sammāājīvacetanāti imamhā cetanābahuttā kathaṃ muccissatha?
atk-abh02a:1498_2: Tasmā pañcaṅgikova lokuttaramaggo”ti. “Cetanābahuttā ca pamuccissāma; aṭṭhaṅgikova

atk-abh02a:1498_5: “bhāṇakosmī”ti vadati, “suttaṃ āharā”ti vattabbo. Sace suttaṃ āharati iccetaṃ kusalaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1498_6: no ce āharati sayaṃ uparipaṇṇāsato āharitabbaṃ –

atk-abh02a:1500_0: “Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammāvācā sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā? Musāvādā veramaṇī,
atk-abh02a:1500_1: pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī – ayaṃ,

atk-abh02a:1505_2: ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī – ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo”ti.
atk-abh02a:1506_0: Evamettha catūhi vacīduccaritehi, tīhi kāyaduccaritehi, micchājīvato cāti ekekāva
atk-abh02a:1506_1: virati ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgāti vuttā. “Kuto ettha cetanābahuttaṃ? Kuto
atk-abh02a:1506_2: pañcaṅgiko maggo? Idaṃ te suttaṃ akāmakassa lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgikoti dīpeti”.
atk-abh02a:1506_3: Sace ettakena sallakkheti iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce sallakkheti aññānipi kāraṇāni āharitvā
atk-abh02a:1507_0: “Yasmiṃ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati, samaṇopi
atk-abh02a:1507_1: tattha na upalabbhati…pe… imasmiṃ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
atk-abh02a:1507_2: upalabbhati; idheva, subhadda, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā samaṇehi aññehīti.
atk-abh02a:1508: Aññesupi anekesu suttasatesu aṭṭhaṅgikova maggo āgato. Kathāvatthuppakaraṇepi vuttaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1511_0: “Attheva suttantoti”? “Āmantā”“tena hi aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti. Sace pana ettakenāpi
atk-abh02a:1511_1: saññattiṃ na gacchati, “gaccha, vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivāhī”ti uyyojetabbo. Uttarimpana
atk-abh02a:1512_0: Nayā panettha gaṇetabbā. Aṭṭhaṅgikamaggasmiñhi ekato pucchitvā ekato vissajjane catūsu
atk-abh02a:1512_1: maggesu cattāri nayasahassāni vibhattāni. Pañcaṅgikamagge ekato pucchitvā ekato vissajjane
atk-abh02a:1512_2: cattāri; pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchitvā pāṭiyekkaṃ vissajjane cattāri cattārīti pañcasu aṅgesu
atk-abh02a:1512_3: vīsati. Iti purimāni aṭṭha imāni ca vīsatīti sabbānipi maggavibhaṅge aṭṭhavīsati
atk-abh02a:1512_4: nayasahassāni vibhattāni. Tāni ca kho nibbattitalokuttarāni kusalāneva. Vipāke pana
atk-abh02a:1515_0: 504. Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva maggaṅgānaṃ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu
atk-abh02a:1515_1: pana sabbānipetāni appamāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattito appamāṇārammaṇāneva, na maggārammaṇāni.
atk-abh02a:1515_2: Neva hi maggo na phalaṃ maggaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti. Sahajātahetuvasena panettha kusalāni
atk-abh02a:1515_3: maggahetukāni; vīriyaṃ vā vīmaṃsaṃ vā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipatīni;
atk-abh02a:1515_4: chandacittajeṭṭhikāya maggabhāvanāya na vattabbāni maggādhipatīnīti; phalakālepi na vattabbāneva.
atk-abh02a:1516_0: Atītādīsu ekārammaṇabhāvenapi na vattabbāni; nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇāni
atk-abh02a:1516_1: nāma hontīti evametasmiṃ pañhāpucchakepi nibbattitalokuttarāneva maggaṅgāni kathitāni.
atk-abh02a:1516_2: Sammāsambuddhena hi suttantabhājanīyasmiṃyeva lokiyalokuttarāni maggaṅgāni kathitāni;
atk-abh02a:1516_3: abhidhammabhājanīye pana pañhāpucchake ca lokuttarānevāti evamayaṃ maggavibhaṅgopi
atk-abh02a:1522_0: 508. Idāni tadanantare jhānavibhaṅge yā tāva ayaṃ sakalassāpi suttantabhājanīyassa
atk-abh02a:1522_1: paṭhamaṃ mātikā ṭhapitā, tattha idhāti vacanaṃ pubbabhāgakaraṇīyasampadāya sampannassa
atk-abh02a:1522_3: ca tathābhāvapaṭisedhanaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā
atk-abh02a:1522_4: samaṇehi aññehī”ti. Bhikkhūti tesaṃ jhānānaṃ nibbattakapuggalaparidīpanaṃ. Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti
atk-abh02a:1522_5: idamassa pātimokkhasaṃvare patiṭṭhitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Viharatīti idamassa tadanurūpavihārasamaṅgībhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1522_6: Ācāragocarasampannoti idamassa heṭṭhā pātimokkhasaṃvarassa upari jhānānuyogassa ca
atk-abh02a:1522_7: upakāradhammaparidīpanaṃ. Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti idamassa pātimokkhato
atk-abh02a:1522_8: acavanadhammatāparidīpanaṃ. Samādāyāti idamassa sikkhāpadānaṃ anavasesato ādānaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1522_9: Sikkhatīti idamassa sikkhāya samaṅgībhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Sikkhāpadesūti idamassa sikkhitabbadhammaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1523_1: vadanti eva. Guttadvāroti idamassa chasu dvāresu saṃvihitārakkhabhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1523_2: Bhojane mattaññūti idamassa santosādiguṇaparidīpanaṃ. Pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogamanuyuttoti
atk-abh02a:1523_3: idamassa kāraṇabhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Sātaccaṃ nepakkanti idamassa paññāpariggahitena
atk-abh02a:1524_0: So abhikkante…pe… tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hotīti idamassa sabbattha satisampajaññasamannāgatattaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1524_1: So vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajatīti idamassa anurūpasenāsanapariggahaparidīpanaṃ. Araññaṃ…pe…
atk-abh02a:1524_3: araññagato vāti idamassa vuttappakārena senāsanena yuttabhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Nisīdatīti
atk-abh02a:1524_4: idamassa yogānurūpairiyāpathaparidīpanaṃ. Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti idamassa
atk-abh02a:1524_5: yogārambhaparidīpanaṃ. So abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyātiādi panassa kammaṭṭhānānuyogena
atk-abh02a:1524_6: nīvaraṇappahānaparidīpanaṃ. Tasseva pahīnanīvaraṇassa vivicceva kāmehītiādi paṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh02a:1525_0: Api ca idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane jhānuppādako bhikkhu. Idāni yasmā jhānuppādakena
atk-abh02a:1525_1: bhikkhunā cattāri sīlāni sodhetabbāni, tasmāssa pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti iminā
atk-abh02a:1525_3: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti iminā tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sīlānaṃ anavasesato ādānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1525_4: Indriyesu guttadvāroti iminā indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ. Bhojane mattaññūti iminā paccayasannissitasīlaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1525_5: Pubbarattāpararattantiādinā sīle patiṭṭhitassa jhānabhāvanāya upakārake dhamme. So
atk-abh02a:1525_6: abhikkantetiādinā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aparihānāya kammaṭṭhānassa ca asammosāya satisampajaññasamāyogaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1525_7: So vivittantiādinā bhāvanānurūpasenāsanapariggahaṃ. So araññagato vātiādinā taṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1525_9: jhānabhāvanārambhena jhānapaccanīkadhammappahānaṃ. So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyātiādinā
atk-abh02a:1528_0: 509. Idāni yathānikkhittaṃ mātikaṃ paṭipāṭiyā bhājetvā dassetuṃ idhāti imissā diṭṭhiyātiādi
atk-abh02a:1528_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha imissā diṭṭhiyātiādīhi dasahi padehi sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṃ sabbaññubuddhasāsanameva
atk-abh02a:1528_2: kathitaṃ. Tañhi buddhena bhagavatā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhīti vuccati. Tasseva khamanavasena
atk-abh02a:1528_3: khanti, ruccanavasena ruci, gahaṇavasena ādāyo, sabhāvaṭṭhena dhammo, sikkhitabbaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:1528_4: vinayo, tadubhayenāpi dhammavinayo, pavuttavasena pāvacanaṃ, seṭṭhacariyaṭṭhena brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1528_5: anusiṭṭhidānavasena satthusāsananti vuccati. Tasmā imissā diṭṭhiyātiādīsu imissā
atk-abh02a:1528_6: buddhadiṭṭhiyā, imissā buddhakhantiyā, imissā buddharuciyā, imasmiṃ buddhaādāye,
atk-abh02a:1529_0: “Ye ca kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi – ‘ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya,
atk-abh02a:1529_1: saṃyogāya saṃvattanti no visaṃyogāya, ācayāya saṃvattanti no apacayāya, upādāya saṃvattanti
atk-abh02a:1529_2: no paṭinissaggiyā, mahicchatāya saṃvattanti no appicchatāya, asantuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti
atk-abh02a:1529_3: no santuṭṭhiyā, saṅgaṇikāya saṃvattanti no pavivekāya, kosajjāya saṃvattanti no vīriyārambhāya,
atk-abh02a:1529_4: dubbharatāya saṃvattanti no subharatāyā’ti ekaṃsena hi, gotami, dhāreyyāsi – ‘neso
atk-abh02a:1529_5: dhammo, neso vinayo, netaṃ satthusāsana’nti. Ye ca kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi
atk-abh02a:1529_6: – ‘ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti no sarāgāya…pe… subharatāya saṃvattanti no dubbharatāyā’ti.
atk-abh02a:1529_7: Ekaṃsena hi, gotami, dhāreyyāsi – ‘eso dhammo, eso vinayo, etaṃ satthusāsana”nti.
atk-abh02a:1530: Evaṃ vutte imasmiṃ buddhadhammavinaye, imasmiṃ buddhapāvacane, imasmiṃ buddhabrahmacariye, imasmiṃ buddhasatthusāsaneti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1531_0: Apicetaṃ sikkhāttayasaṅkhātaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ bhagavatā diṭṭhattā sammādiṭṭhipaccayattā
atk-abh02a:1531_1: sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamattā ca diṭṭhi, bhagavato khamanavasena khanti, ruccanavasena
atk-abh02a:1531_2: ruci, gahaṇavasena ādāyo. Attano kārakaṃ apāyesu apatamānaṃ dhāretīti dhammo. Sova
atk-abh02a:1531_3: saṃkilesapakkhaṃ vinatīti vinayo. Dhammo ca so vinayo cāti dhammavinayo. Kusaladhammehi
atk-abh02a:1531_4: vā akusaladhammānaṃ esa vinayoti dhammavinayo. Teneva vuttaṃ – “ye ca kho tvaṃ, gotami,
atk-abh02a:1531_5: dhamme jāneyyāsi – ‘ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti no sarāgāya…pe… ekaṃsena, gotami,
atk-abh02a:1531_6: dhāreyyāsi ‘eso dhammo, eso vinayo, etaṃ satthusāsana’nti.
atk-abh02a:1532: Dhammena vā vinayo, na daṇḍādīhīti dhammavinayo, vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1537_0: Dhammāya vā vinayo dhammavinayo. Anavajjadhammatthañhesa vinayo, na bhavabhogāmisatthaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1537_1: Tenāha bhagavā – “nayidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati janakuhanattha”nti vitthāro.
atk-abh02a:1537_2: Puṇṇattheropi āha – “anupādāparinibbānatthaṃ kho, āvuso, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1537_3: vussatī”ti. Visiṭṭhaṃ vā nayatīti vinayo. Dhammato vinayo dhammavinayo. Saṃsāradhammato
atk-abh02a:1537_4: hi sokādidhammato vā esa visiṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ nayati. Dhammassa vā vinayo, na titthakarānanti
atk-abh02a:1537_5: dhammavinayo; dhammabhūto hi bhagavā, tasseva vinayo. Yasmā vā dhammāyeva abhiññeyyā
atk-abh02a:1537_6: pariññeyyā pahātabbā bhāvetabbā sacchikātabbā ca, tasmā esa dhammesu vinayo, na sattesu,
atk-abh02a:1537_7: na jīvesu cāti dhammavinayo. Sātthasabyañjanatādīhi aññesaṃ vacanato padhānaṃ vacananti
atk-abh02a:1537_8: pavacanaṃ; pavacanameva pāvacanaṃ. Sabbacariyāhi visiṭṭhacariyābhāvena brahmacariyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1537_9: Devamanussānaṃ satthubhūtassa bhagavato sāsananti satthusāsanaṃ; satthubhūtaṃ vā
atk-abh02a:1537_10: sāsanantipi satthusāsanaṃ. “So vo mamaccayena satthā”ti hi dhammavinayova satthāti
atk-abh02a:1538_0: Yasmā pana imasmiṃyeva sāsane sabbapakārajjhānanibbattako bhikkhu dissati, na aññatra,
atk-abh02a:1538_1: tasmā tattha tattha ‘imissā’ti ca ‘imasmi’nti ca ayaṃ niyamo katoti veditabboti.
atk-abh02a:1539_0: 510. Bhikkhuniddese samaññāyāti paññattiyā, vohārenāti attho. Samaññāya eva hi ekacco
atk-abh02a:1539_1: bhikkhūti paññāyati. Tathā hi nimantanādimhi bhikkhūsu gaṇīyamānesu sāmaṇerepi gahetvā
atk-abh02a:1539_2: ‘sataṃ bhikkhū, sahassaṃ bhikkhū’ti vadanti. Paṭiññāyāti attano paṭijānanena. Paṭiññāyapi
atk-abh02a:1539_3: hi ekacco bhikkhūti paññāyati. Tassa “ko ettha āvuso”ti? “Ahaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhū”ti
atk-abh02a:1539_4: evamādīsu sambhavo daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ pana ānandattherena vuttattā dhammikā paṭiññā.
atk-abh02a:1539_5: Rattibhāge pana dussīlāpi paṭipathaṃ āgacchantā “ko etthā”ti vutte adhammikāya paṭiññāya
atk-abh02a:1540_0: Bhikkhatīti yācati. Yo hi koci bhikkhati, bhikkhaṃ esati gavesati, so taṃ labhatu
atk-abh02a:1540_1: vā mā vā, atha kho bhikkhatīti bhikkhu. Bhikkhakoti byañjanena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ; bhikkhanadhammatāya
atk-abh02a:1540_2: bhikkhūti attho. Bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti buddhādīhi ajjhupagataṃ bhikkhācariyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1540_3: ajjhupagatattā bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagato nāma. Yo hi koci appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1540_4: pahāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito, kasigorakkhādīhi jīvitakappanaṃ hitvā liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva
atk-abh02a:1540_5: bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu. Parappaṭibaddhajīvikattā vā vihāramajjhe kājabhattaṃ
atk-abh02a:1540_6: bhuñjamānopi bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu. Piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāya pabbajjāya
atk-abh02a:1541_0: Agghaphassavaṇṇabhedena bhinnaṃ paṭaṃ dhāretīti bhinnapaṭadharo. Tattha satthakacchedanena
atk-abh02a:1541_1: agghabhedo veditabbo. Sahassagghanakopi hi paṭo satthakena khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinno
atk-abh02a:1541_2: bhinnaggho hoti, purimagghato upaḍḍhampi na agghati. Suttasaṃsibbanena phassabhedo
atk-abh02a:1541_3: veditabbo. Sukhasamphassopi hi paṭo suttehi saṃsibbito bhinnaphasso hoti, kharasamphassataṃ
atk-abh02a:1541_4: pāpuṇāti. Sūcimalādīhi vaṇṇabhedo veditabbo. Suparisuddhopi hi paṭo sūcikammato paṭṭhāya
atk-abh02a:1541_5: sūcimalena, hatthasedamalajallikādīhi, avasāne rajanakappakaraṇehi ca bhinnavaṇṇo
atk-abh02a:1541_6: hoti, pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahati. Evaṃ tīhākārehi bhinnapaṭadhāraṇato bhinnapaṭadharoti
atk-abh02a:1541_7: bhikkhu. Gihīvatthavisabhāgānaṃ vā kāsāvānaṃ dhāraṇamatteneva bhinnapaṭadharoti bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1542_0: Bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhu. Sotāpattimaggena pañca kilese bhindatīti
atk-abh02a:1542_1: bhikkhu. Sakadāgāmimaggena cattāro, anāgāmimaggena cattāro, arahattamaggena aṭṭha
atk-abh02a:1542_2: kilese bhindatīti bhikkhu. Ettāvatā cattāro maggaṭṭhā dassitā. Bhinnattāti iminā
atk-abh02a:1542_3: pana cattāro phalaṭṭhā. Sotāpanno hi sotāpattimaggena pañca kilese bhinditvā ṭhito.
atk-abh02a:1542_4: Sakadāgāmī sakadāgāmimaggena cattāro, anāgāmī anāgāmimaggena cattāro, arahā arahattamaggena
atk-abh02a:1542_5: aṭṭha kilese bhinditvā ṭhito. Evamayaṃ catubbidho phalaṭṭho bhinnattā pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1543_0: Odhiso kilesānaṃ pahānāti ettha dve odhī – maggodhi ca kilesodhi ca. Odhi nāma sīmā,
atk-abh02a:1543_1: mariyādā. Tattha sotāpanno maggodhinā odhiso kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu. Tassa hi catūsu
atk-abh02a:1543_2: maggesu ekeneva odhinā kilesā pahīnā, na sakalena maggacatukkena. Sakadāgāmīanāgāmīsupi
atk-abh02a:1543_3: eseva nayo. Sotāpanno ca kilesodhināpi odhiso kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu. Tassa hi
atk-abh02a:1543_4: pahātabbakilesesu odhināva kilesā pahīnā, na sabbena sabbaṃ. Arahā pana anodhisova
atk-abh02a:1543_5: kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu. Tassa hi maggacatukkena anodhināva kilesā pahīnā, na ekāya
atk-abh02a:1543_6: maggasīmāya. Pahātabbakilesesu ca anodhisova kilesā pahīnā. Ekāpi hi kilesasīmā ṭhitā
atk-abh02a:1543_7: nāma natthi. Evaṃ so ubhayathāpi anodhiso kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1544_0: Sekkhoti puthujjanakalyāṇakena saddhiṃ satta ariyā. Tisso sikkhā sikkhantīti sekkhā.
atk-abh02a:1544_1: Tesu yo koci sekkho bhikkhuti veditabbo. Na sikkhatīti asekkho. Sekkhadhamme atikkamma
atk-abh02a:1544_2: aggaphale ṭhito tato uttari sikkhitabbābhāvato khīṇāsavo asekkhoti vuccati. Avaseso
atk-abh02a:1544_3: puthujjanabhikkhu tisso sikkhā neva sikkhati, na sikkhitvā ṭhitoti nevasekkhanāsekkhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1545_0: Sīlaggaṃ samādhiggaṃ paññaggaṃ vimuttagganti idaṃ aggaṃ patvā ṭhitattā aggo bhikkhu
atk-abh02a:1545_1: nāma. Bhadroti apāpako. Kalyāṇaputhujjanādayo hi yāva arahā tāva bhadrena sīlena
atk-abh02a:1545_2: samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena ca samannāgatattā bhadro bhikkhūti
atk-abh02a:1545_3: saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Maṇḍo bhikkhūti pasanno bhikkhu; sappimaṇḍo viya anāvilo vippasannoti
atk-abh02a:1545_4: attho. Sāroti tehiyeva sīlasārādīhi samannāgatattā, nīlasamannāgamena nīlo paṭo viya,
atk-abh02a:1545_5: sāro bhikkhūti veditabbo. Vigatakilesapheggubhāvato vā khīṇāsavova sāroti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1546_0: Tattha ca “bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhu, odhiso kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu,
atk-abh02a:1546_1: sekkho bhikkhū”ti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu satta sekkhā kathitā. “Bhinnattā pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1546_2: dhammānanti bhikkhu, anodhiso kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu, asekkho bhikkhu, aggo bhikkhu,
atk-abh02a:1546_3: maṇḍo bhikkhū”ti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu khīṇāsavova kathito. “Nevasekkhanāsekkho”ti
atk-abh02a:1546_4: ettha puthujjanova kathito. Sesaṭṭhānesu puthujjanakalyāṇako, satta sekkhā, khīṇāsavoti
atk-abh02a:1547_0: Evaṃ samaññādīhi bhikkhuṃ dassetvā idāni upasampadāvasena dassetuṃ samaggena saṅghenātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1547_1: Tattha samaggena saṅghenāti sabbantimena paricchedena pañcavaggakaraṇīye kamme yāvatikā
atk-abh02a:1547_2: bhikkhū kammappattā, tesaṃ āgatattā chandārahānaṃ chandassa āhaṭattā sammukhībhūtānañca
atk-abh02a:1547_3: appaṭikkosanato ekasmiṃ kamme samaggabhāvaṃ upagatena. Ñatticatutthenāti tīhi anussāvanāhi
atk-abh02a:1547_4: ekāya ca ñattiyā kātabbena. Kammenāti dhammikena vinayakammena. Akuppenāti vatthuñattianussāvanasīmāparisasampattisampannattā
atk-abh02a:1547_5: akopetabbataṃ appaṭikkositabbataṃ upagatena. Ṭhānārahenāti kāraṇārahena satthusāsanārahena.
atk-abh02a:1548_0: Upasampanno nāma uparibhāvaṃ samāpanno, pattoti attho. Bhikkhubhāvo hi uparibhāvo.
atk-abh02a:1548_1: Tañcesa yathāvuttena kammena samāpannattā upasampannoti vuccati. Etena yā imā ehibhikkhūpasampadā,
atk-abh02a:1548_5: imā tissova thāvarā. Sesā buddhe dharamāneyeva ahesuṃ. Tāsu upasampadāsu imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1549_0: 511. Pātimokkhasaṃvaraniddese pātimokkhanti sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. Tañhi, yo naṃ pāti rakkhati,
atk-abh02a:1549_1: taṃ mokkheti mocayati āpāyikādīhi dukkhehi, tasmā pātimokkhanti vuttaṃ. Sīlaṃ patiṭṭhātiādīni
atk-abh02a:1549_2: tasseva vevacanāni. Tattha sīlanti kāmañcetaṃ saha kammavācāpariyosānena ijjhanakassa
atk-abh02a:1549_3: pātimokkhassa vevacanaṃ, evaṃ santepi dhammato etaṃ sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā
atk-abh02a:1549_4: viramantassa vattappaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-abh02a:1549_5: paṭisambhidāyaṃ “kiṃ sīla”nti? Cetanā sīlaṃ, cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ, saṃvaro sīlaṃ, avītikkamo sīla”nti.
atk-abh02a:1550_0: Tattha cetanā sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa
atk-abh02a:1550_1: cetanā. Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa virati. Apica cetanā sīlaṃ
atk-abh02a:1550_2: nāma pāṇātipātādīni pajahantassa satta kammapathacetanā. Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma “abhijjhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1550_3: pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharatī”tiādinā nayena saṃyuttamahāvagge vuttā anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā.
atk-abh02a:1550_4: Saṃvaro sīlanti ettha pañcavidhena saṃvaro veditabbo – pātimokkhasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro,
atk-abh02a:1550_5: ñāṇasaṃvaro, khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti. Tassa nānākaraṇaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1550_6: Avītikkamo sīlanti samādiṇṇasīlassa kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo. Ettha ca saṃvarasīlaṃ
atk-abh02a:1550_7: avītikkamasīlanti idameva nippariyāyato sīlaṃ; cetanā sīlaṃ cetasikaṃ sīlanti pariyāyato sīlanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1551_0: Yasmā pana pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena bhikkhu sāsane patiṭṭhāti nāma, tasmā taṃ ‘patiṭṭhā’ti
atk-abh02a:1551_1: vuttaṃ; patiṭṭhahati vā ettha bhikkhu, kusaladhammā eva vā ettha patiṭṭhahantīti
atk-abh02a:1552: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1553: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti ca. ;
atk-abh02a:1554: “Patiṭṭhā, mahārāja, sīlaṃ sabbesaṃ kusaladhammāna”nti ca “sīle patiṭṭhitassa kho, mahārāja, sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī”ti ca ādisuttavasena veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1556: “Tasmātiha tvaṃ, uttiya, ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. Ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ? Sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ diṭṭhi ca ujukā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1557_0: Yathā hi nagaravaḍḍhakī nagaraṃ māpetukāmo paṭhamaṃ nagaraṭṭhānaṃ sodheti, tato aparabhāge
atk-abh02a:1557_1: vīthicatukkasiṅghāṭakādiparicchedena vibhajitvā nagaraṃ māpeti; evameva yogāvacaro
atk-abh02a:1557_2: āditova sīlaṃ visodheti, tato aparabhāge samathavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni sacchikaroti.
atk-abh02a:1557_3: Yathā vā pana rajako paṭhamaṃ tīhi khārehi vatthaṃ dhovitvā parisuddhe vatthe yadicchakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1557_4: raṅgajātaṃ upaneti; yathā vā pana cheko cittakāro rūpaṃ likhitukāmo āditova bhittiparikammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1557_5: karoti, tato aparabhāge rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti; evameva yogāvacaro āditova sīlaṃ visodhetvā
atk-abh02a:1557_6: aparabhāge samathavipassanādayo dhamme sacchikaroti. Tasmā sīlaṃ “ādī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1558_0: Tadetaṃ caraṇasarikkhatāya caraṇaṃ. Caraṇāti hi pādā vuccanti. Yathā hi chinnacaraṇassa
atk-abh02a:1558_1: purisassa disaṃgamanābhisaṅkhāro na jāyati, paripuṇṇapādasseva jāyati; evameva yassa
atk-abh02a:1558_2: sīlaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti khaṇḍaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ, tassa nibbānagamanāya ñāṇagamanaṃ na sampajjati.
atk-abh02a:1558_3: Yassa pana taṃ abhinnaṃ hoti akkhaṇḍaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ tassa nibbānagamanāya ñāṇagamanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1559_0: Tadetaṃ saṃyamanavasena saṃyamo, saṃvaraṇavasena saṃvaro. Ubhayenāpi sīlasaṃyamo
atk-abh02a:1559_1: ceva sīlasaṃvaro ca kathito. Vacanattho panettha saṃyameti vītikkamavipphandanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1559_2: puggalaṃ vā saṃyameti, vītikkamavasena tassa vipphandituṃ na detīti saṃyamo. Vītikkamassa
atk-abh02a:1559_3: pavesanadvāraṃ saṃvarati pidahatītipi saṃvaro. Mokkhanti uttamaṃ mukhabhūtaṃ vā.
atk-abh02a:1559_4: Yathā hi sattānaṃ catubbidho āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgamaṅgāni pharati, evaṃ yoginopi
atk-abh02a:1559_5: catubhūmakakusalaṃ sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṃ sampādeti. Tena vuttaṃ “mokkha”nti.
atk-abh02a:1559_6: Pamukhe sādhūti pāmokkhaṃ; pubbaṅgamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ padhānanti attho. Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1559_7: samāpattiyāti catubhūmakakusalānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya pāmokkhaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1560_0: Kāyiko avītikkamoti tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ. Vācasikoti catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1560_1: Kāyikavācasikoti tadubhayaṃ. Iminā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ pariyādāya dasseti. Saṃvutoti
atk-abh02a:1560_2: pihito; saṃvutindriyo pihitindriyoti attho. Yathā hi saṃvutadvāraṃ gehaṃ “saṃvutagehaṃ
atk-abh02a:1560_3: pihitageha”nti vuccati, evamidha saṃvutindriyo “saṃvuto”ti vutto. Pātimokkhasaṃvarenāti
atk-abh02a:1560_4: pātimokkhena ca saṃvarena ca, pātimokkhasaṅkhātena vā saṃvarena. Upetotiādīni vuttatthāneva.
atk-abh02a:1561: 512. Iriyatītiādīhi sattahipi padehi pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitassa bhikkhuno iriyāpathavihāro kathito.
atk-abh02a:1562_0: 513. Ācāragocaraniddese kiñcāpi bhagavā samaṇācaraṃ samaṇagocaraṃ kathetukāmo “ācāragocarasampannoti
atk-abh02a:1562_1: atthi ācāro, atthi anācāro”ti padaṃ uddhari. Yathā pana maggakusalo puriso maggaṃ
atk-abh02a:1562_2: acikkhanto ‘vāmaṃ muñca dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhā’ti paṭhamaṃ muñcitabbaṃ sabhayamaggaṃ uppathamaggaṃ
atk-abh02a:1562_3: ācikkhati, pacchā gahetabbaṃ khemamaggaṃ ujumaggaṃ; evameva maggakusalapurisasadiso
atk-abh02a:1562_4: dhammarājā paṭhamaṃ pahātabbaṃ buddhappaṭikuṭṭhaṃ anācāraṃ ācikkhitvā pacchā ācāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1562_5: ācikkhitukāmo “tattha katamo anācāro”tiādimāha. Purisena hi ācikkhitamaggo sampajjeyya
atk-abh02a:1562_6: vā na vā, tathāgatena ācikkhitamaggo apaṇṇako, indena vissaṭṭhaṃ vajiraṃ viya, avirajjhanako
atk-abh02a:1562_7: nibbānanagaraṃyeva samosarati. Tena vuttaṃ – “puriso maggakusaloti kho, tissa, tathāgatassetaṃ
atk-abh02a:1563_0: Yasmā vā sasīsaṃ nahānena pahīnasedamalajallikassa purisassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanavidhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1563_1: viya pahīnapāpadhammassa kalyāṇadhammasamāyogo sampannarūpo hoti, tasmā sedamalajallikkaṃ
atk-abh02a:1563_2: viya pahātabbaṃ paṭhamaṃ anācāraṃ ācikkhitvā, pahīnasedamalajallikassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanavidhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1563_3: viya pacchā ācāraṃ ācikkhitukāmopi tattha katamo anācārotiādimāha. Tattha kāyiko
atk-abh02a:1563_4: vītikkamoti tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ; vācasiko vītikkamoti catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1563_5: kāyikavācasiko vītikkamoti tadubhayaṃ. Evaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlasseva vītikkamaṃ dassesi.
atk-abh02a:1564_0: Yasmā pana na kevalaṃ kāyavācāhi eva anācāraṃ ācarati, manasāpi ācarati eva, tasmā
atk-abh02a:1564_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “sabbampi dussīlyaṃ anācāro”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ekacciyaṃ anācāraṃ vibhajitvā
atk-abh02a:1564_2: dassento idhekacco veḷudānenātiādimāha. Tattha veḷudānenāti paccayahetukena veḷudānena.
atk-abh02a:1564_3: Vihāre uṭṭhitañhi araññato vā āharitvā rakkhitagopitaṃ veḷuṃ ‘evaṃ me paccayaṃ dassantī’ti
atk-abh02a:1564_4: upaṭṭhākānaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Evañhi jīvitaṃ kappento anesanāya micchājīvena jīvati.
atk-abh02a:1564_5: So diṭṭheva dhamme garahaṃ pāpuṇāti, samparāye ca apāyaparipūrako hoti. Attano puggalikaveḷuṃ
atk-abh02a:1564_7: dadamāno bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Saṅghikepi eseva nayo. Sace pana taṃ issaravatāya
atk-abh02a:1565_0: Kataro pana veḷu garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, kataro na hotīti? Yo tāva aropimo sayaṃjātako,
atk-abh02a:1565_1: so saṅghena paricchinnaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṃ, tato paraṃ na garubhaṇḍaṃ; ropitaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1565_2: sabbena sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ. So pana pamāṇena paricchinno telanāḷippamāṇopi garubhaṇḍaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1565_3: na tato heṭṭhā. Yassa pana bhikkhuno telanāḷiyā vā kattaradaṇḍena vā attho, tena
atk-abh02a:1565_4: phātikammaṃ katvā gahetabbo. Phātikammaṃ tadagghanakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā vaṭṭati, ūnakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1565_5: na vaṭṭati. Hatthakammampi udakāharaṇamattaṃ vā appaharitakaraṇamattaṃ vā na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a:1565_6: taṃ thāvaraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmā pokkharaṇito vā paṃsuṃ uddharitvā sopānaṃ vā attharāpetvā
atk-abh02a:1565_7: visamaṭṭhānaṃ vā samaṃ katvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Phātikammaṃ akatvā gahito tattha vasanteneva
atk-abh02a:1565_8: paribhuñjitabbo; pakkamantena saṅghikaṃ katvā ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ. Asatiyā gahetvā
atk-abh02a:1565_9: gatena yattha gato sarati, tato paccāharitabbo. Sace antarā bhayaṃ hoti, sampattavihare ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1566_0: Manussā vihāraṃ gantvā veḷuṃ yācanti. Bhikkhū ‘saṅghiko’ti dātuṃ na visahanti. Manussā
atk-abh02a:1566_1: punappunaṃ yācanti vā tajjenti vā. Tadā bhikkhūhi ‘daṇḍakammaṃ katvā gaṇhathā’ti
atk-abh02a:1566_2: vattuṃ vaṭṭati; veḷudānaṃ nāma na hoti. Sace te daṇḍakammatthāya vāsipharasuādīni
atk-abh02a:1566_3: vā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ vā denti, gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “daḍḍhagehā
atk-abh02a:1566_4: manussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na vāretabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1567_0: Sace saṅghassa veḷugumbe veḷudūsikā uppajjanti, taṃ akoṭṭāpentānaṃ veḷu nassati,
atk-abh02a:1567_1: kiṃ kātabbanti? Bhikkhācāre manussānaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace koṭṭetuṃ na icchanti ‘samabhāgaṃ
atk-abh02a:1567_2: labhissathā’ti vattabbā; na icchantiyeva ‘dve koṭṭhāse labhissathā’ti vattabbā. Evampi
atk-abh02a:1567_3: anicchantesu ‘naṭṭhena attho natthi, tumhākaṃ khaṇe sati daṇḍakammaṃ karissatha,
atk-abh02a:1567_4: koṭṭetvā gaṇhathā’ti vattabbā; veḷudānaṃ nāma na hoti. Veḷugumbe aggimhi uṭṭhitepi,
atk-abh02a:1567_5: udakena vuyhamānaveḷūsupi eseva nayo. Rukkhesupi ayameva kathāmaggo. Rukkho pana
atk-abh02a:1567_6: sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇo garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Saṅghike rukkhe koṭṭāpetvā saṅghaṃ anāpucchitvāpi
atk-abh02a:1567_7: saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ kātuṃ labbhati. Vacanapathacchedanatthaṃ pana āpucchitvāva kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1568_0: Puggalikaṃ kātuṃ labbhati, na labbhatīti? Na labbhati. Hatthakammasīsena pana ekasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1568_1: gehe mañcaṭṭhānamattaṃ labbhati, tīsu gehesu ekaṃ gehaṃ labhati. Sace dabbhasambhārā
atk-abh02a:1568_2: puggalikā honti, bhūmi saṅghikā, ekaṃ gehaṃ katvā samabhāgaṃ labhati, dvīsu gehesu
atk-abh02a:1568_3: ekaṃ gehaṃ labhati. Saṅghikarukkhe saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ bādhente saṅghaṃ anāpucchā hāretuṃ
atk-abh02a:1568_4: vaṭṭati, na vaṭṭatīti? Vaṭṭati. Vacanapathacchedanatthaṃ pana āpucchitvāva hāretabbo.
atk-abh02a:1568_5: Sace rukkhaṃ nissāya saṅghassa mahanto lābho hoti, na hāretabbo. Puggalikarukkhe
