atk-abh02a:1568_6: saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ bādhente rukkhasāmikassa ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace harituṃ na icchati,
atk-abh02a:1568_7: chedāpetvā hāretabbo. ‘Rukkhaṃ me dethā’ti codentassa rukkhaṃ agghāpetvā mūlaṃ dātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1568_8: Saṅghike rukkhe puggalikāvāsaṃ, puggalike ca puggalikāvāsaṃ bādhentepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1568_9: Valliyampi ayameva kathāmaggo. Valli pana yattha vikkāyati, dullabhā hoti, tattha
atk-abh02a:1568_10: garubhaṇḍaṃ. Sā ca kho upaḍḍhabāhuppamāṇato paṭṭhāya; tato heṭṭhā vallikhaṇḍaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ na hoti.
atk-abh02a:1569_0: Pattadānādīsupi pattadānenāti paccayahetukena pattadānenātiādi sabbaṃ veḷudāne vuttanayeneva
atk-abh02a:1569_1: veditabbaṃ. Garubhaṇḍatāya panettha ayaṃ vinicchayo. Pattampi hi yattha vikkāyati,
atk-abh02a:1569_2: gandhikādayo gandhapaliveṭhanādīnaṃ atthāya gaṇhanti, tādise dullabhaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṃ
atk-abh02a:1570_0: Tālapaṇṇampi imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne kathetabbaṃ. Tālapaṇṇampi hi sayaṃjāte tālavane saṅghena
atk-abh02a:1570_1: paricchinnaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṃ, na tato paraṃ. Ropimatālesu sabbampi garubhaṇḍaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1570_2: Tassa pamāṇaṃ heṭṭhimakoṭiyā aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇopi rittapotthako. Tiṇampi ettheva pakkhipitvā
atk-abh02a:1570_3: kathetabbaṃ. Yattha pana tiṇaṃ natthi tattha muñjapalālanāḷikerapaṇṇādīhipi chādenti.
atk-abh02a:1570_4: Tasmā tānipi tiṇeneva saṅgahitāni. Iti muñjapalālādīsu yaṃkiñci muṭṭhippamāṇaṃ tiṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1570_5: nāḷikerapaṇṇādīsu ca ekapaṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ vā bahiārāme saṅghassa
atk-abh02a:1570_6: tiṇavatthumhi jātatiṇaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Taṃ pana saṅghakamme
atk-abh02a:1570_7: ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhā vuttaveḷumhipi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1571_0: Pupphadāne “ettakesu rukkhesu pupphāni vissajjetvā yāgubhattavatthe upanentu, ettakesu
atk-abh02a:1571_1: senāsanapaṭisaṅkharaṇe upanentū”ti evaṃ niyamitaṭṭhāne eva pupphāni garubhaṇḍāni
atk-abh02a:1571_2: honti. Paratīre sāmaṇerā pupphāni ocinitvā rāsiṃ karonti, pañcaṅgasamannāgato pupphabhājako
atk-abh02a:1571_3: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gaṇetvā koṭṭhāse karoti, so sampattaparisāya saṅghaṃ anāpucchitvāva
atk-abh02a:1571_4: dātuṃ labhati; asammatena pana āpucchitvāva dātabbaṃ. Bhikkhu pana kassa pupphāni
atk-abh02a:1571_5: dātuṃ labhati, kassa na labhatīti? Mātāpitūnaṃ gehaṃ haritvāpi gehato pakkosāpetvāpi
atk-abh02a:1571_6: ‘vatthupūjaṃ karothā’ti dātuṃ labhati, piḷandhanatthāya dātuṃ na labhati; sesañātīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1571_7: pana haritvā na dātabbaṃ, pakkosāpetvā ‘pūjaṃ karothā’ti dātabbaṃ; sesajanassa pūjanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1571_8: sampattassa apaccāsīsantena dātabbaṃ; pupphadānaṃ nāma na hoti. Vihāre bahūni pupphāni
atk-abh02a:1571_9: pupphanti. Bhikkhunā piṇḍāya carantena manusse disvā ‘vihāre bahūni pupphāni, pūjethā’ti
atk-abh02a:1571_10: vattabbaṃ. Vacanamatte doso natthi. ‘Manussā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ ādāya āgamissantī’ti
atk-abh02a:1571_11: cittena pana na vattabbaṃ. Sace vadati, khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ na paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1571_12: Manussā attano dhammatāya ‘vihāre pupphāni atthī’ti pucchitvā ‘asukadivase vihāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1571_13: āgamissāma, sāmaṇerānaṃ pupphāni ocinituṃ mā dethā’ti vadanti. Bhikkhū sāmaṇerānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1571_14: kathetuṃ pamuṭṭhā. Sāmaṇerehi pupphāni ocinitvā ṭhapitāni. Manussā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā
atk-abh02a:1571_15: “bhante, mayaṃ tumhākaṃ asukadivaseyeva ārocayimha – ‘sāmaṇerānaṃ pupphāni ocinituṃ
atk-abh02a:1571_16: mā dethā’ti. Kasmā na vārayitthā”ti? “Sati me pamuṭṭhā, pupphāni ocinitamattāneva,
atk-abh02a:1571_17: tāva na pūjā katā”ti vattabbaṃ. “Gaṇhatha pūjethā”ti na vattabbaṃ. Sace vadati, āmisaṃ
atk-abh02a:1572_0: Aparo bhikkhu sāmaṇerānaṃ ācikkhati “asukagāmavāsino pupphāni mā ocinitthā”ti āhaṃsūti.
atk-abh02a:1572_1: Manussāpi āmisaṃ āharitvā dānaṃ datvā vadanti – “amhākaṃ manussā na bahukā, sāmaṇere
atk-abh02a:1572_2: amhehi saha pupphāni ocinituṃ āṇāpethā”ti. “Sāmaṇerehi bhikkhā laddhā; ye bhikkhācāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1572_3: na gacchanti, te sayameva jānissanti, upāsakā”ti vattabbaṃ. Ettakaṃ nayaṃ labhitvā
atk-abh02a:1572_4: sāmaṇere putte vā bhātike vā katvā pupphāni ocināpetuṃ doso natthi; pupphadānaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-abh02a:1573_0: Phaladāne phalampi pupphaṃ viya niyamitameva garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Vihāre bahukamhi phalāphale
atk-abh02a:1573_1: sati aphāsukamanussā āgantvā yācanti. Bhikkhū ‘saṅghika’nti dātuṃ na ussahanti. Manussā
atk-abh02a:1573_2: vippaṭisārino akkosanti paribhāsanti. Tattha kiṃ kātabbanti? Phalehi vā rukkhehi
atk-abh02a:1573_3: vā paricchinditvā katikā kātabbā – ‘asukesu ca rukkhesu ettakāni phalāni gaṇhantā,
atk-abh02a:1573_4: ettakesu vā rukkhesu phalāni gaṇhantā na vāretabbā’ti. Corā pana issarā vā balakkārena
atk-abh02a:1573_5: gaṇhantā na vāretabbā; kuddhā te sakalavihārampi nāseyyuṃ. Ādīnavo pana kathetabboti.
atk-abh02a:1574_0: Sinānadāne sinānacuṇṇāni koṭṭitāni na garubhaṇḍāni. Akoṭṭito rukkhattacova garubhaṇḍaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1574_1: Cuṇṇaṃ pana agilānassa rajananipakkaṃ vaṭṭati. Gilānassa yaṃkiñci cuṇṇaṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-abh02a:1574_2: Mattikāpi ettheva pakkhipitvā kathetabbā. Mattikāpi yattha dullabhā hoti, tattheva
atk-abh02a:1574_3: garubhaṇḍaṃ. Sāpi heṭṭhimakoṭiyā tiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇāva tato heṭṭhā na garubhaṇḍanti.
atk-abh02a:1575_0: Dantakaṭṭhadāne dantakaṭṭhaṃ acchinnakameva garubhaṇḍaṃ. Yesaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ saṅghato
atk-abh02a:1575_1: dantakaṭṭhavāro pāpuṇāti, te attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ dātuṃ na labhanti.
atk-abh02a:1575_2: Yehi pana ‘ettakāni dantakaṭṭhāni āharitabbānī’ti paricchinditvā vāraṃ gahitāni,
atk-abh02a:1575_3: te atirekāni ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ dātuṃ labhanti. Ekena bhikkhunā dantakaṭṭhamāḷakato
atk-abh02a:1575_4: bahūni dantakaṭṭhāni na gahetabbāni, devasikaṃ ekekameva gahetabbaṃ. Pāṭiyekkaṃ vasantenāpi
atk-abh02a:1575_5: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gaṇayitvā yattakāni attano pāpuṇanti tattakāneva gahetvā gantabbaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1575_6: antarā āgantukesu vā āgatesu disaṃ vā pakkamantena āharitvā gahitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetabbāni.
atk-abh02a:1576_0: Cāṭukamyatāyātiādīsu cāṭukamyatā vuccati attānaṃ dāsaṃ viya nīcaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā parassa
atk-abh02a:1576_1: khalitavacanampi saṇṭhapetvā piyakāmatāya paggayhavacanaṃ. Muggasūpyatāyāti muggasūpasamānāya
atk-abh02a:1576_2: saccālikena jīvitakappanatāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yathā hi muggasūpe paccante bahū muggā
atk-abh02a:1576_3: pākaṃ gacchanti, thokā na gacchanti; evameva saccālikena jīvitakappake puggale bahu
atk-abh02a:1576_4: alikaṃ hoti, appakaṃ saccaṃ. Yathā vā muggasūpassa appavisanaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh02a:1576_5: evameva saccālikavuttino puggalassa appaviṭṭhavācā nāma natthi; siṅghāṭakaṃ viya
atk-abh02a:1576_6: icchiticchitadhārāya patiṭṭhāti. Tenassa sā musāvāditā muggasūpyatāti vuttā. Pāribhaṭayatāti
atk-abh02a:1576_7: paribhaṭakammabhāvo. Paribhaṭassa hi kammaṃ pāribhaṭayaṃ, tassa bhāvo pāribhaṭayatā;
atk-abh02a:1577_0: Jaṅghapesanikanti gāmantaradesantarādīsu tesaṃ tesaṃ gihīnaṃ sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1577_1: Idañhi jaṅghapesanikaṃ nāma attano mātāpitūnaṃ, ye cassa mātāpitaro upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-abh02a:1577_2: tesaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā katthaci gamanavasena vaṭṭati. Cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā attano
atk-abh02a:1577_3: vā kammaṃ karontānaṃ vaḍḍhakīnampi sāsanaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati. Manussā “dānaṃ dassāma,
atk-abh02a:1577_4: pūjaṃ karissāma, bhikkhusaṅghassa ācikkhathā”ti vadanti; “asukattherassa nāma dethā”ti
atk-abh02a:1577_5: piṇḍapātaṃ vā bhesajjaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā denti; “vihāre pūjaṃ karothā”ti mālāgandhavilepanādīni
atk-abh02a:1577_6: vā dhajapatākādīni vā nīyyādenti, sabbaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati; jaṅghapesanikaṃ nāma na
atk-abh02a:1577_7: hoti. Sesānaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā gacchantassa padavāre padavāre doso.
atk-abh02a:1578_0: Aññataraññatarenāti etesaṃ vā veḷudānādīnaṃ aññataraññatarena vejjakammabhaṇḍāgārikakammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1578_2: jīvitakappanakakammānaṃ yena kenaci. Buddhapaṭikuṭṭhenāti buddhehi garahitena paṭisiddhena.
atk-abh02a:1578_3: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ sabbopi anācāro nāma kathīyati. Ācāraniddeso vuttapaṭipakkhanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1579_0: 514. Gocaraniddesepi paṭhamaṃ agocarassa vacane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1579_1: Tattha ca gocaroti piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānaṃ gocaro, ayuttaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1579_2: agocaro. Vesiyā gocaro assāti vesiyagocaro; mittasanthavavasena upasaṅkamitaṭṭhānanti
atk-abh02a:1579_3: attho. Tattha vesiyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyo yena kenacideva sulabhajjhācāratāmittasatthavasinehavasena
atk-abh02a:1579_4: upasaṅkamanto vesiyāgocaro nāma hoti. Tasmā evaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ na vaṭṭati. Kiṃ kāraṇā?
atk-abh02a:1579_5: Ārakkhavipattito. Evaṃ upasaṅkamantassa hi ciraṃ rakkhitagopitopi samaṇadhammo katipāheneva
atk-abh02a:1579_6: nassati; sacepi na nassati garahaṃ labhati. Dakkhiṇāvasena pana upasaṅkamantena satiṃ
atk-abh02a:1579_7: upaṭṭhāpetvā upasaṅkamitabbaṃ. Vidhavā vuccanti matapatikā vā pavutthapatikā vā.
atk-abh02a:1579_9: ussannakilesā avūpasantapariḷāhā napuṃsakā. Tesaṃ sabbesampi upasaṅkamane ādīnavo
atk-abh02a:1579_10: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Bhikkhunīsupi eseva nayo. Apica bhikkhū nāma ussannabrahmacariyā
atk-abh02a:1579_11: honti, tathā bhikkhuniyo. Te aññamaññaṃ santhavavasena katipāheneva rakkhitagopitasamaṇadhammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1579_12: nāsenti. Gilānapucchakena pana gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhunā pupphāni labhitvā pūjanatthāyapi
atk-abh02a:1580_0: Pānāgāranti surāpānagharaṃ. Taṃ brahmacariyantarāyakarehi surāsoṇḍehi avivittaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1580_1: Tattha tehi saddhiṃ saha soṇḍavasena upasaṅkamituṃ na vaṭṭati; brahmacariyantarāyo
atk-abh02a:1580_2: hoti. Saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhītiādīsu rājānoti abhisittā vā hontu anabhisittā vā
atk-abh02a:1580_3: ye rajjaṃ anusāsanti. Rājamahāmattāti rājūnaṃ issariyasadisāya mahatiyā issariyamattāya
atk-abh02a:1580_4: samannāgatā. Titthiyāti viparītadassanā bāhiraparibbājakā. Titthiyasāvakāti bhattivasena
atk-abh02a:1580_5: tesaṃ paccayadāyakā. Etehi saddhiṃ saṃsaggajāto hotīti attho.
atk-abh02a:1581_0: Ananulomikena saṃsaggenāti ananulomikasaṃsaggo nāma tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ ananulomo
atk-abh02a:1581_2: pāpuṇāti, seyyathidaṃ – rājarājamahāmattehi saddhiṃ sahasokitā, sahananditā, samasukhadukkhatā,
atk-abh02a:1581_3: uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanāva yogaṃ āpajjanatā, titthiyatitthiyasāvakehi saddhiṃ
atk-abh02a:1581_5: Tattha rājarājamahāmattehi saddhiṃ saṃsaggo brahmacariyantarāyaṃ karoti. Itarehi
atk-abh02a:1581_6: titthiyasāvakehi tesaṃ laddhigahaṇaṃ. Tesaṃ pana vādaṃ bhinditvā attano laddhiṃ gaṇhāpetuṃ
atk-abh02a:1582_0: Idāni aparenapi pariyāyena agocaraṃ dassetuṃ yāni vā pana tāni kulānītiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1582_1: Tattha assaddhānīti buddhādīsu saddhāvirahitāni; buddho sabbaññū, dhammo niyyāniko,
atk-abh02a:1582_2: saṅgho suppaṭipannoti na saddahanti. Appasannānīti cittaṃ pasannaṃ anāvilaṃ kātuṃ
atk-abh02a:1582_3: na sakkonti. Akkosakaparibhāsakānīti akkosakāni ceva paribhāsakāni ca; ‘corosi, bālosi,
atk-abh02a:1582_4: mūḷhosi, oṭṭhosi, goṇosi, gadrabhosi, āpāyikosi, nerayikosi, tiracchānagatosi, natthi
atk-abh02a:1582_5: tuyhaṃ sugati, duggatiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā’ti evaṃ dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanti; ‘hotu,
atk-abh02a:1582_6: idāni taṃ paharissāma, bandhissāma, vadhissāmā’ti evaṃ bhayadassanena paribhāsanti
atk-abh02a:1582_7: cāti attho. Anatthakāmānīti atthaṃ na icchanti, anatthameva icchanti. Ahitakāmānīti
atk-abh02a:1582_8: ahitameva icchanti, hitaṃ na icchanti. Aphāsukakāmānīti phāsukaṃ na icchanti, aphāsukameva
atk-abh02a:1582_9: icchanti. Ayogakkhemakāmānīti catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbhayaṃ na icchanti, sabhayameva
atk-abh02a:1582_10: icchanti. Bhikkhūnanti ettha sāmaṇerāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Bhikkhunīnanti ettha
atk-abh02a:1582_11: sikkhamānasāmaṇeriyopi. Sabbesampi hi bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitānañceva saraṇagatānañca
atk-abh02a:1582_12: catunnampi parisānaṃ tāni anatthakāmāniyeva. Tathārūpāni kulānīti evarūpāni khattiyakulādīni
atk-abh02a:1582_13: kulāni. Sevatīti nissāya jīvati. Bhajatīti upasaṅkamati. Payirupāsatīti punappunaṃ
atk-abh02a:1582_14: upasaṅkamati. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ vesiyādigocarassa vesiyādiko, rājādisaṃsaṭṭhassa
atk-abh02a:1582_15: rājādiko, assaddhakulādisevakassa assaddhakulādiko cāti tippakāropi ayuttagocaro
atk-abh02a:1583_0: Tassa iminā pariyāyena agocaratā veditabbā. Vesiyādiko tāva pañcakāmaguṇanissayato
atk-abh02a:1583_1: agocaroti veditabbo, yathāha – “ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo? Yadidaṃ
atk-abh02a:1583_2: pañca kāmaguṇā”ti rājādiko jhānānuyogassa anupanissayato lābhasakkārāsanicakkanipphādanato
atk-abh02a:1584_0: Gocaraniddese na vesiyagocarotiādīni vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbāni. Opānabhūtānītiādīsu
atk-abh02a:1584_1: pana opānabhūtānīti udapānabhūtāni; bhikkhusaṅghassa, cātumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī
atk-abh02a:1584_2: viya, yathāsukhaṃ ogāhanakkhamāni cittamahāmattassa gehasadisāni. Tassa kira gehe
atk-abh02a:1584_3: kālatthambho yuttoyeva. Gharadvāraṃ sampattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paccayavekallaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1584_4: Ekadivasaṃ bhesajjavattameva saṭṭhi kahāpaṇāni nikkhamanti. Kāsāvapajjotānīti bhikkhubhikkhunīhi
atk-abh02a:1584_5: nivatthapārutānaṃ kāsāvānaṃyeva pabhāya ekobhāsāni bhūtapālaseṭṭhikulasadisāni. Isivātapaṭivātānīti
atk-abh02a:1584_6: gehaṃ pavisantānaṃ nikkhamantānañca bhikkhubhikkhunīsaṅkhātānaṃ isīnaṃ cīvaravātena
atk-abh02a:1584_7: ceva samiñjanapasāraṇādijanitasarīravātena ca paṭivātāni pavāyitāni viniddhutakibbisāni vā.
atk-abh02a:1585_0: 515. Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvitāniddese aṇumattānīti aṇuppamāṇā. Vajjāti dosā.
atk-abh02a:1585_1: Yāni tāni vajjānīti yāni tāni garahitabbaṭṭhena vajjāni. Appamattakānīti parittamattakāni
atk-abh02a:1585_2: khuddakappamāṇāni. Oramattakānīti parittatopi orimappamāṇattā oramattakāni. Lahusānīti
atk-abh02a:1585_3: lahukāni. Lahusammatānīti lahūti sammatāni. Saṃyamakaraṇīyānīti saṃyamena kattabbapaṭikammāni.
atk-abh02a:1585_4: Saṃvarakaraṇīyānīti saṃvarena kātabbāni saṃvarena kattabbapaṭikammāni. Cittuppādakaraṇīyānīti
atk-abh02a:1585_6: kattabbapaṭikammāni. Kāni pana tānīti? Divāvihāravāsī sumatthero tāva āha – “anāpattigamanīyāni
atk-abh02a:1585_7: cittuppādamattakāni yāni ‘na puna evarūpaṃ karissāmī’ti manasā āvajjitamatteneva
atk-abh02a:1585_8: sujjhanti. Adhiṭṭhānāvikammaṃ nāmetaṃ kathita”nti. Antevāsiko panassa tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero
atk-abh02a:1585_9: panāha – “idaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlasseva bhājanīyaṃ. Tasmā sabbalahukaṃ dukkaṭadubbhāsitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1585_10: idha vajjanti veditabbaṃ. Vuṭṭhānāvikammaṃ nāmetaṃ kathita”nti. Itiimesūti evaṃpakāresu
atk-abh02a:1585_11: imesu. Vajjadassāvīti vajjato dosato dassanasīlo. Bhayadassāvīti catubbidhassa bhayassa
atk-abh02a:1585_12: kāraṇattā bhayato dassanasīlo. Ādīnavadassāvīti idha nindāvahanato, āyatiṃ dukkhavipākato,
atk-abh02a:1585_13: upariguṇānaṃ antarāyakaraṇato, vippaṭisārajananato ca etena nānappakārena ādīnavato dassanasīlo.
atk-abh02a:1586_0: Nissaraṇadassāvīti yaṃ tattha nissaraṇaṃ tassa dassanasīlo. Kiṃ panettha nissaraṇanti?
atk-abh02a:1586_2: kathitaṃ. Antevāsikattheravāde tāva “āpattigamanīyatāya sati vuṭṭhānāvikammaṃ nissaraṇa”nti kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1587_0: Tattha tathārūpo bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjato bhayato passati nāma. Taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh02a:1587_1: ayaṃ nayo kathito – paramāṇu nāma, aṇu nāma, tajjārī nāma, rathareṇu nāma, likkhā
atk-abh02a:1587_2: nāma, ūkā nāma, dhaññamāso nāma, aṅgulaṃ nāma, vidatthi nāma, ratanaṃ nāma, yaṭṭhi
atk-abh02a:1587_3: nāma, usabhaṃ nāma, gāvutaṃ nāma, yojanaṃ nāma. Tattha ‘paramāṇu’ nāma ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko
atk-abh02a:1587_4: maṃsacakkhussa āpāthaṃ nāgacchati, dibbacakkhusseva āgacchati. ‘Aṇu’ nāma bhitticchiddatālacchiddehi
atk-abh02a:1587_5: paviṭṭhasūriyarasmīsu vaṭṭi vaṭṭi hutvā paribbhamanto paññāyati. ‘Tajjārī’ nāma gopathamanussapathacakkapathesu
atk-abh02a:1587_6: chijjitvā ubhosu passesu uggantvā tiṭṭhati. ‘Rathareṇu’ nāma tattha tattheva allīyati.
atk-abh02a:1587_7: Likkhādayo pākaṭā eva. Etesu pana chattiṃsa paramāṇavo ekassa aṇuno pamāṇaṃ. Chattiṃsa
atk-abh02a:1587_8: aṇū ekāya tajjāriyā pamāṇaṃ. Chattiṃsa tajjāriyo eko rathareṇu. Chattiṃsa rathareṇū
atk-abh02a:1587_9: ekā likkhā. Satta likkhā ekā ūkā. Satta ūkā eko dhaññamāso. Sattadhaññamāsappamāṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1587_10: ekaṃ aṅgulaṃ. Tenaṅgulena dvādasaṅgulāni vidatthi. Dve vidatthiyo ratanaṃ. Satta
atk-abh02a:1587_11: ratanāni yaṭṭhi. Tāya yaṭṭhiyā vīsati yaṭṭhiyo usabhaṃ. Asīti usabhāni gāvutaṃ. Cattāri
atk-abh02a:1587_12: gāvutāni yojanaṃ. Tena yojanena aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedho sinerupabbatarājā.
atk-abh02a:1587_14: katvā daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti – ayaṃ bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni bhayato passati nāma. Yopi
atk-abh02a:1587_15: bhikkhu sabbalahukaṃ dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattaṃ paṭhamapārājikasadisaṃ katvā daṭṭhuṃ
atk-abh02a:1587_16: sakkoti – ayaṃ aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjato bhayato passati nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1588_0: 516. Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūtipadaniddese bhikkhusikkhāti bhikkhūhi sikkhitabbasikkhā.
atk-abh02a:1588_1: Sā bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇāpi asādhāraṇāpi bhikkhusikkhā eva nāma. Bhikkhunīsikkhāti
atk-abh02a:1588_2: bhikkhunīhi sikkhitabbasikkhā. Sāpi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇāpi asādhāraṇāpi bhikkhunīsikkhā
atk-abh02a:1588_3: eva nāma. Sāmaṇerasikkhamānasāmaṇerīnaṃ sikkhāpi ettheva paviṭṭhā. Upāsakasikkhāti
atk-abh02a:1588_4: upāsakehi sikkhitabbasikkhā. Sā pañcasīladasasīlavasena vaṭṭati. Upāsikāsikkhāti
atk-abh02a:1588_5: upāsikāhi sikkhitabbasikkhā. Sāpi pañcasīladasasīlavasena vaṭṭati. Tattha bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1588_6: sikkhā yāva arahattamaggā vaṭṭati. Upāsakaupāsikānaṃ sikkhā yāva anāgāmimaggā. Tatrāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1588_7: bhikkhu attanā sikkhitabbasikkhāpadesu eva sikkhati. Sesasikkhā pana atthuddhāravasena
atk-abh02a:1588_8: sikkhāpadassa atthadassa dassanatthaṃ vuttā. Iti imāsu sikkhāsūti evaṃpakārāsu etāsu
atk-abh02a:1588_9: sikkhāsu. Sabbena sabbanti sabbena sikkhāsamādānena sabbaṃ sikkhaṃ. Sabbathā sabbanti
atk-abh02a:1588_10: sabbena sikkhitabbākārena sabbaṃ sikkhaṃ. Asesaṃ nissesanti sesābhāvato asesaṃ; satisammosena
atk-abh02a:1588_11: bhinnassāpi sikkhāpadassa puna pākatikakaraṇato nissesaṃ. Samādāya vattatīti samādiyitvā
atk-abh02a:1588_12: gahetvā vattati. Tena vuccatīti yena kāraṇena etaṃ sabbaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ sabbena sikkhitabbākārena
atk-abh02a:1588_13: samādiyitvā sikkhati pūreti, tena vuccati “samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū”ti.
atk-abh02a:1589_0: 517-8. Indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññūtipadadvayassa niddese kaṇhapakkhassa
atk-abh02a:1589_1: paṭhamavacane payojanaṃ ācāraniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tattha katamā indriyesu
atk-abh02a:1589_2: aguttadvāratātiādīsu pana yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ nikkhepakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
atk-abh02a:1590_1: pubbe pubbarattaṃ; iminā paṭhamayāmañceva pacchābhattañca gaṇhāti. Rattiyā pacchā
atk-abh02a:1590_2: apararattaṃ; iminā pacchimayāmañceva purebhattañca gaṇhāti. Majjhimayāmo panassa
atk-abh02a:1590_3: bhikkhuno niddākilamathavinodanokāsoti na gahito. Jāgariyānuyoganti jāgariyassa asupanabhāvassa
atk-abh02a:1590_4: anuyogaṃ. Anuyutto hotīti taṃ anuyogasaṅkhātaṃ āsevanaṃ bhāvanaṃ anuyutto hoti sampayutto.
atk-abh02a:1590_5: Niddese panassa idha bhikkhu divasanti pubbaṇho, majjhanho, sāyanhoti tayopi divasakoṭṭhāsā
atk-abh02a:1590_6: gahitā. Caṅkamena nisajjāyāti sakalampi divasaṃ iminā iriyāpathadvayeneva viharanto.
atk-abh02a:1590_7: Cittassa āvaraṇato āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi pañcahipi nīvaraṇehi sabbākusaladhammehi
atk-abh02a:1590_8: vā cittaṃ parisodheti. Tehi dhammehi visodheti parimoceti. Ṭhānaṃ panettha kiñcāpi
atk-abh02a:1590_9: na gahitaṃ, caṅkamanisajjāsannissitaṃ pana katvā gahetabbameva. Paṭhamayāmanti sakalasmimpi
atk-abh02a:1591_0: Sīhaseyyanti ettha kāmabhogīseyyā, petaseyyā, sīhaseyyā, tathāgataseyyāti catasso
atk-abh02a:1591_1: seyyā. Tattha “yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, kāmabhogī vāmena passena sentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogīseyyā.
atk-abh02a:1591_2: Tesu hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi. “Yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, petā
atk-abh02a:1591_3: uttānā sentī”ti ayaṃ petaseyyā; appamaṃsalohitattā hi aṭṭhisaṅghāṭajaṭitā ekena passena
atk-abh02a:1591_4: sayituṃ na sakkonti, uttānāva senti. Sīho, bhikkhave, migarājā dakkhiṇena passena
atk-abh02a:1591_5: seyyaṃ kappeti…pe… attamano hotī”ti ayaṃ sīhaseyyā; tejussadattā hi sīho migarājā
atk-abh02a:1591_6: dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne dve pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi
atk-abh02a:1591_7: pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1591_8: matthake sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā sayati; divasampi sayitvā pabujjhamāno na uttasanto pabujjhati,
atk-abh02a:1591_9: sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkheti; sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā
atk-abh02a:1591_10: ṭhitaṃ hoti ‘nayidaṃ tuyhaṃ jātiyā na sūrabhāvassa anurūpa’nti anattamano hutvā tattheva
atk-abh02a:1591_11: sayati, na gocarāya pakkamati; avijahitvā ṭhite pana ‘tuyhaṃ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa
atk-abh02a:1591_12: ca anurūpamida’nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṃ vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ
atk-abh02a:1591_13: vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati. Catutthajjhānaseyyā pana
atk-abh02a:1591_14: tathāgataseyyāti vuccati. Tāsu idha sīhaseyyā āgatā. Ayañhi tejussadairiyāpathattā uttamaseyyā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1592_0: Pāde pādanti dakkhiṇapāde vāmapādaṃ. Accādhāyāti atiādhāya īsakaṃ atikkamma ṭhapetvā
atk-abh02a:1592_1: gopphakena hi gopphake jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1592_2: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti, seyyā aphāsukā hoti; yathā pana na saṅghaṭṭeti, evaṃ atikkamma
atk-abh02a:1592_3: ṭhapite vedanā nuppajjati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, seyyā phāsukā hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “pāde
atk-abh02a:1592_4: pādaṃ accādhāyā”ti. Sato sampajānoti satiyā ceva sampajānapaññāya ca samannāgato
atk-abh02a:1592_5: hutvā. Iminā supariggāhakaṃ satisampajaññaṃ kathitaṃ. Uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasikaritvāti
atk-abh02a:1592_6: asukavelāya nāma uṭṭhahissāmī’ti evaṃ uṭṭhānavelāparicchedakaṃ uṭṭhānasaññaṃ citte
atk-abh02a:1592_7: upetvā. Evaṃ katvā nipanno hi yathāparicchinnakāleyeva uṭṭhātuṃ yutto.
atk-abh02a:1593_0: 520-521. Sātaccaṃ nepakkanti satataṃ pavattayitabbato sātaccasaṅkhātaṃ vīriyañceva
atk-abh02a:1593_1: paripākagatattā nepakkasaṅkhātaṃ paññañca yutto anuyutto pavattayamānoyeva jāgariyānuyogaṃ
atk-abh02a:1593_2: anuyutto viharatīti attho. Ettha ca vīriyaṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ kathitaṃ, paññāpi
atk-abh02a:1593_3: vīriyagatikā eva; vīriye lokiyamhi lokiyā, lokuttare lokuttarāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1594_0: 522. Bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānanti catusaccabodhisaṅkhātassa maggañāṇassa pakkhe bhavānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1594_1: dhammānaṃ. Ettāvatā sabbepi sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme samūhato gahetvā lokiyāyapi
atk-abh02a:1594_2: bhāvanāya ekārammaṇe ekato pavattanasamatthe bojjhaṅgeyeva dassento satta bojjhaṅgātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1594_3: Te lokiyalokuttaramissakāva kathitāti veditabbā. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
atk-abh02a:1595_0: 523. Abhikkantetiādiniddese abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha tāva abhikkantaṃ vuccati
atk-abh02a:1595_1: purato gamanaṃ. Paṭikkantanti nivattanaṃ. Tadubhayampi catūsu iriyāpathesu labbhati.
atk-abh02a:1595_2: Gamane tāva purato kāyaṃ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma, paṭinivattanto paṭikkamati
atk-abh02a:1595_3: nāma. Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṃ purato onāmento abhikkamati nāma, pacchato apanāmento
atk-abh02a:1595_4: paṭikkamati nāma. Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova āsannassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṃsaranto
atk-abh02a:1595_5: abhikkamati nāma, pacchimaaṅgappadesaṃ paccāsaṃsaranto paṭikkamati nāma. Nipajjāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1596_0: Sampajānakārī hotīti sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī, sampajaññasseva vā kārī. So hi
atk-abh02a:1596_1: abhikkantādīsu sampajaññaṃ karoteva, na katthaci sampajaññavirahito hoti. Taṃ pana
atk-abh02a:1596_2: sampajaññaṃ yasmā satisampayuttameva hoti, tenassa niddese “sato sampajāno abhikkamati,
atk-abh02a:1597_0: Ayañhi abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā na muṭṭhassatī asampajāno hoti; satiyā pana
atk-abh02a:1597_1: samannāgato paññāya ca sampajānoyeva abhikkamati ceva paṭikkamati ca; sabbesu abhikkamādīsu
atk-abh02a:1597_2: catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ otāreti. Catubbidhañhi sampajaññaṃ – sātthakasampajaññaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1597_4: uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā ‘kinnu me ettha gatena attho atthi, natthī’ti atthānatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1597_6: dhammato vaḍḍhi. Cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā disvāpi hi buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ, saṅghadassanena
atk-abh02a:1597_7: saṅghārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:1597_8: There disvā tesaṃ ovāde patiṭṭhāya, asubhaṃ disvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ uppādetvā
atk-abh02a:1597_9: tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tasmā etesaṃ dassanaṃ sātthaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1597_10: Keci pana “āmisatopi vaḍḍhi atthoyeva; taṃ nissāya brahmacariyānuggahāya paṭipannattā”ti vadanti.
atk-abh02a:1598_0: Tasmiṃ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ ‘sappāyasampajaññaṃ’,
atk-abh02a:1598_1: seyyathidaṃ – cetiyadassanaṃ tāva sātthaṃ. Sace pana cetiyassa mahatiyā pūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare
atk-abh02a:1598_2: parisā sannipatanti, attano vibhavānurūpaṃ itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni
atk-abh02a:1598_3: viya sañcaranti, tatra cassa iṭṭhe ārammaṇe lobho, aniṭṭhe paṭigho, asamapekkhane
atk-abh02a:1598_4: moho uppajjati, kāyasaṃsaggāpattiṃ vā āpajjati, jīvitabrahmacariyānaṃ vā antarāyo
atk-abh02a:1598_5: hoti. Evaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ asappāyaṃ hoti. Vuttappakāraantarāyābhāve sappāyaṃ. Bodhidassanepi
atk-abh02a:1598_6: eseva nayo. Saṅghadassanampi sātthaṃ. Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbarattiṃ
atk-abh02a:1598_7: dhammassavanaṃ karontesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca
atk-abh02a:1598_8: hoti. Evaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ asappāyaṃ hoti; antarāyābhāve sappāyaṃ hoti. Mahāparisaparivārānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1599_0: Asubhadassanampi sātthaṃ. Tadatthadīpanatthañca idaṃ vatthu – eko kira daharabhikkhu
atk-abh02a:1599_1: sāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato. Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto
atk-abh02a:1599_2: asubhaṃ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto
atk-abh02a:1599_3: tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Daharo
atk-abh02a:1599_4: taṃ apassanto “sāmaṇerā”ti pakkosi. So ‘mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā
atk-abh02a:1599_5: saddhiṃ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā, aññasmiṃ divase uparivisesaṃ nibbattessāmī’ti
atk-abh02a:1599_6: cintetvā “kiṃ, bhante”ti paṭivacanaṃ adāsi. “Ehī”ti ca vutto ekavacaneneva āgantvā
atk-abh02a:1599_7: “bhante, iminā tāva maggena gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṃ puratthābhimukho ṭhatvā
atk-abh02a:1599_8: olokethā”ti āha. So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi. Evaṃ ekaṃ asubhaṃ dvinnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1599_9: janānaṃ atthāya jātaṃ. Evaṃ sātthampi panetaṃ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṃ asappāyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1599_10: mātugāmassa ca purisāsubhaṃ, sabhāgameva sappāyanti. Evaṃ sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1600_0: Evaṃ pariggahitasātthasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu attano cittaruciyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1600_1: kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocaraṃ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṃ gahetvāva gamanaṃ ‘gocarasampajaññaṃ’
atk-abh02a:1601_0: Idhekacco bhikkhu harati na paccāharati, ekacco na harati paccāharati, ekacco pana
atk-abh02a:1601_1: neva harati na paccāharati, ekacco harati ca paccāharati ca. Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṃ
atk-abh02a:1601_2: caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetvā, tathā rattiyā paṭhamayāme
atk-abh02a:1601_3: majjhimayāme seyyaṃ kappetvā pacchimayāmepi nisajjācaṅkamehi vītināmetvā pageva cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ
atk-abh02a:1601_4: katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ āsiñcitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā ācariyupajjhāyavattādīni
atk-abh02a:1601_5: sabbāni khandhakavattāni samādāya vattati, so sarīraparikammaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā
atk-abh02a:1601_6: dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṃ gāhāpento kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitvā, bhikkhācāravelāya uṭṭhahitvā
atk-abh02a:1601_7: kammaṭṭhānasīseneva pattacīvaramādāya senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova
atk-abh02a:1601_8: cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā, sace buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti taṃ avissajjetvāva cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1601_9: pavisati, aññaṃ ce kammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti sopānamūle ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṃ viya
atk-abh02a:1601_10: taṃ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ ce,
atk-abh02a:1601_11: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ, khuddakaṃ ce, tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1601_12: katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ. Cetiyaṃ vanditvā bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pattenāpi buddhassa
atk-abh02a:1601_13: bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccākāraṃ dassetvā bodhi vanditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1602_0: So evaṃ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā, paṭisāmitaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1602_1: hatthena gaṇhanto viya, nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva
atk-abh02a:1602_2: cīvaraṃ pārupitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati. Atha naṃ manussā disvā ‘ayyo no āgato’ti
atk-abh02a:1602_3: paccuggantvā pattaṃ gahetvā āsanasālāya vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ datvā yāva bhattaṃ
atk-abh02a:1602_4: na niṭṭhāti tāva pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā purato nisīditvā pañhaṃ vā pucchanti
atk-abh02a:1602_5: dhammaṃ vā sotukāmā honti. Sacepi na kathāpenti “janasaṅgahatthaṃ dhammakathā nāma
atk-abh02a:1602_6: kātabbāyevā”ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti. Dhammakathā hi kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma
atk-abh02a:1602_7: natthi. Tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ vatvā nivattiyamānehipi
atk-abh02a:1602_8: manussehi anugatova gāmato nikkhamitvā tattha te nivattetvā maggaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-abh02a:1603_0: Atha naṃ puretaraṃ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā
atk-abh02a:1603_1: paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti. Porāṇakabhikkhū kira ‘amhākaṃ upajjhāyo,
atk-abh02a:1603_2: amhākaṃ ācariyo’ti na mukhaṃ oloketvā vattaṃ karonti, sampattaparicchedeneva karonti.
atk-abh02a:1603_3: Te taṃ pucchanti “bhante, ete manussā tumhākaṃ kiṃ honti? Mātipakkhato sambandhā
atk-abh02a:1603_4: pitipakkhato”ti? “Kiṃ disvā pucchathā”ti? “Tumhesu etesaṃ pemaṃ bahumāna”nti. “Āvuso,
atk-abh02a:1603_5: yaṃ mātāpitūhipi dukkaraṃ taṃ ete manussā amhākaṃ karonti. Pattacīvarampi no etesaṃ
atk-abh02a:1603_6: santakameva, etesaṃ ānubhāvena neva bhaye bhayaṃ, na chātake chātakaṃ jānāma. Edisā
atk-abh02a:1603_7: nāma amhākaṃ upakārino natthī”ti tesaṃ guṇe kathento gacchati. Ayaṃ vuccati ‘harati na paccāharatī’ti.
atk-abh02a:1604_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ karontassa kammajatejo pajjalati,
atk-abh02a:1604_1: anupādinnakaṃ muñcitvā upādinnakaṃ gaṇhāti, sarīrato sedā muccanti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1604_2: vīthiṃ nārohati, so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasāva cetiyaṃ vanditvā gorūpānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1604_3: nikkhamanavelāyameva gāmaṃ yāgubhikkhāya pavisitvā yāguṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā
atk-abh02a:1604_4: pivati. Athassa dvattikkhattuṃ ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejodhātu upādinnakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1604_5: muñcitvā anupādinnakaṃ gaṇhāti, ghaṭasatena nhāto viya tejodhātupariḷāhanibbānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1604_6: patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṃ paribhuñjitvā pattañca mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte
atk-abh02a:1604_7: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-abh02a:1604_8: tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva āgacchati. Ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1604_9: vuccati ‘na harati paccāharatī’ti. Edisā ca bhikkhū yāguṃ pivitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā
atk-abh02a:1604_10: buddhasāsane arahattaṃ pattā nāma gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā. Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu
atk-abh02a:1604_11: gāmesu āsanasālāya na taṃ āsanaṃ atthi, yattha yāguṃ pivitvā arahattaṃ pattā bhikkhū natthīti.
atk-abh02a:1605_0: Yo pamādavihārī hoti nikkhittadhuro sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetokhīlavinibandhabaddhacitto
atk-abh02a:1605_1: viharanto ‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī’tipi saññaṃ akatvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena
atk-abh02a:1605_2: gihīsaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho nikkhamati – ayaṃ vuccati
atk-abh02a:1606_0: Yo panāyaṃ “harati ca paccāharati cā”ti vutto, so gatapaccāgatikavattavasena veditabbo
atk-abh02a:1606_1: – atthakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasampi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattārīsampi
atk-abh02a:1606_2: paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṃ katvā viharanti – “āvuso, tumhe na
atk-abh02a:1606_3: iṇaṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā pabbajitā; dukkhā muñcitukāmā panettha pabbajitā.
atk-abh02a:1606_4: Tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṃ gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha. Ṭhāne, nisajjāya, sayane uppannakilesaṃ
atk-abh02a:1607_0: Te evaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā, aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu
atk-abh02a:1607_1: pāsāṇā honti, tāya saññāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontāva gacchanti. Sace kassaci gamane
atk-abh02a:1607_2: kileso uppajjati, tattheva naṃ niggaṇhāti. Tathā asakkonto tiṭṭhati. Athassa pacchato
atk-abh02a:1607_3: āgacchantopi tiṭṭhati. So ‘ayaṃ bhikkhu tuyhaṃ uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ jānāti, ananucchavikaṃ
atk-abh02a:1607_4: te eta’nti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati. Tathā asakkonto
atk-abh02a:1607_5: nisīdati. Athassa pacchato āgacchantopi nisīdatīti so eva nayo. Ariyabhūmiṃ okkamituṃ
atk-abh02a:1607_6: asakkontopi taṃ kilesaṃ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati, na kammaṭṭhānavippayuttena
atk-abh02a:1607_7: cittena pādaṃ uddharati, uddharati ce paṭinivattitvā purimapadesaññeva eti, ālindakavāsī
atk-abh02a:1607_8: mahāphussadevatthero viya. So kira ekūnavīsati vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento
atk-abh02a:1607_9: eva vihāsi. Manussāpi antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā
atk-abh02a:1607_10: theraṃ tathāgacchantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ thero punappunaṃ nivattitvā gacchati, kiṃ nu kho
atk-abh02a:1607_11: maggamūḷho udāhu kiñci pamuṭṭho”ti samullapanti. So taṃ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva
atk-abh02a:1607_12: samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahattapattadivase
atk-abh02a:1607_13: cassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṃ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi. Cattāropi
atk-abh02a:1607_14: mahārājāno sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamiṃsu. Tañca obhāsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1607_15: disvā vanavāsī mahātissatthero taṃ dutiyadivase pucchi – “rattibhāge āyasmato santike
atk-abh02a:1607_16: obhāso ahosi. Kiṃ so obhāso”ti? Thero vikkhepaṃ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi
atk-abh02a:1607_17: hoti, maṇiobhāsopī”ti evamādimāha. Tato “paṭicchādetha tumhe”ti nibaddho “āmā”ti
atk-abh02a:1608_0: Kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya ca. Sopi kira gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento
atk-abh02a:1608_1: ‘paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmī’ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva
atk-abh02a:1608_2: adhiṭṭhāsi; puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So
atk-abh02a:1608_3: kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto vippayuttena cittena uddhate pāde paṭinivattento
atk-abh02a:1608_4: gāmasīmaṃ gantvā ‘gāvī nu kho, pabbajito nu kho’ti āsaṅkanīyappadese ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ
atk-abh02a:1608_5: pārupitvā kacchakantarato udakena pattaṃ dhovitvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ karoti. Kiṃ kāraṇā?
atk-abh02a:1608_6: ‘Mā me bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ vā vandituṃ vā āgate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenāpi
atk-abh02a:1608_7: kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosī’ti. ‘Ajja, bhante, katimī’ti divasaṃ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1608_8: vā pañhaṃ vā pucchito pana udakaṃ gilitvā āroceti; sace divasādipucchakā na honti,
atk-abh02a:1609_0: Kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsa bhikkhū viya ca. Te kira āsāḷhipuṇṇimāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1609_1: katikavattaṃ akaṃsu – “arahattaṃ appatvā aññamaññaṃ nālapissāmā”ti. Gāmañca piṇḍāya
atk-abh02a:1609_2: pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā pavisiṃsu, divasādīsu pucchitesu vuttanayena paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1609_3: Tattha manussā niṭṭhubhanaṭṭhānaṃ disvā jāniṃsu – ‘ajja eko āgato, ajja dve’ti; evañca
atk-abh02a:1609_4: cintesuṃ – ‘kinnu kho ete amheheva saddhiṃ na sallapanti udāhu aññamaññampi? Yadi
atk-abh02a:1609_5: aññamaññampi na sallapanti, addhā vivādajātā bhavissanti; etha ne aññamaññaṃ khamāpessāmā’ti
atk-abh02a:1609_6: sabbe vihāraṃ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhūsu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṃsu. Tato yo
atk-abh02a:1609_7: tesu cakkhumā puriso so āha – “na, bho, kalahakārakānaṃ vasanokāso īdiso hoti. Susammaṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1609_9: Te tatova nivattā. Tepi bhikkhū antotemāseyeva arahattaṃ patvā mahāpavāraṇāya visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1610_0: Evaṃ kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya, kalambutitthavihāre vassūpagatabhikkhū
atk-abh02a:1610_1: viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṃ gantvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1610_2: katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo
atk-abh02a:1610_3: vā natthi, taṃ vīthiṃ paṭipajjati. Tattha piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya javena
atk-abh02a:1610_4: gacchati, na hi javanapiṇḍapātikadhutaṅgaṃ nāma kiñci atthi, visamabhūmibhāgappattaṃ
atk-abh02a:1610_5: pana udakasakaṭaṃ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati, anugharaṃ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṃ vā
atk-abh02a:1610_6: adātukāmaṃ vā sallakkhetuṃ tadanurūpaṃ kālaṃ āgamento bhikkhaṃ gahetvā antogāme vā
atk-abh02a:1610_7: bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā, yathāphāsuke patirūpe okāse nisīditvā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1610_9: paccavekkhanto aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhāreti neva davāya, na madāya, na maṇḍanāya,
atk-abh02a:1610_10: na vibhūsanāya…pe… phāsuvihāro cāti. Bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ bhattakilamathaṃ
atk-abh02a:1610_11: paṭippassambhetvā yathā purebhattaṃ, evaṃ pacchābhattaṃ purimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmañca
atk-abh02a:1610_12: kammaṭṭhānameva manasikaroti. Ayaṃ vuccati ‘harati ca paccāharati cā’ti.
atk-abh02a:1611_0: Imaṃ pana haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento, yadi upanissayasampanno
atk-abh02a:1611_1: hoti, paṭhamavaye eva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, no ce paṭhamavaye pāpuṇāti atha majjhimavaye,
atk-abh02a:1611_2: no ce majjhimavaye pāpuṇāti atha pacchimavaye, no ce pacchimavaye pāpuṇāti atha maraṇasamaye,
atk-abh02a:1611_3: no ce maraṇasamaye pāpuṇāti atha devaputto hutvā, no ce devaputto hutvā pāpuṇāti
atk-abh02a:1611_4: anuppanne buddhe nibbatto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikaroti, no ce paccekabodhiṃ sacchikaroti
atk-abh02a:1611_5: atha buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño vā hoti – seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo,
atk-abh02a:1611_6: mahāpañño vā – seyyathāpi thero sāriputto, mahiddhiko vā – seyyathāpi thero mahāmoggallāno,
atk-abh02a:1611_7: dhutaṅgadharo vā – seyyathāpi thero mahākassapo, dibbacakkhuko vā – seyyathāpi thero
atk-abh02a:1611_8: anuruddho, vinayadharo vā – seyyathāpi thero upāli, dhammakathiko vā – seyyathāpi
atk-abh02a:1611_9: thero puṇṇo mantāṇiputto, āraññiko vā – seyyathāpi thero revato, bahussuto vā – seyyathāpi
atk-abh02a:1611_10: thero ānando, sikkhākāmo vā – seyyathāpi thero rāhulo buddhaputtoti. Iti imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1611_11: catukke yvāyaṃ harati ca paccāharati ca, tassa gocarasampajaññaṃ sikhāppattaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1612_0: Abhikkamādīsu pana asammuyhanaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ. Taṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ – idha bhikkhu
atk-abh02a:1612_1: abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhabālaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu ‘attā abhikkamati,
atk-abh02a:1612_2: attanā abhikkamo nibbattito’ti vā ‘ahaṃ abhikkamāmi, mayā abhikkamo nibbattito’ti
atk-abh02a:1612_3: vā sammuyhanti, tathā asammuyhanto ‘abhikkamāmī’ti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena
atk-abh02a:1612_4: saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati. Iti cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravasena
atk-abh02a:1612_5: ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāto abhikkamati. Tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe
atk-abh02a:1612_6: pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti
atk-abh02a:1612_7: balavatiyo; tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu. Vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo
atk-abh02a:1612_8: omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti balavatiyo; tathā sannikkhepanasannirujjhanesu
atk-abh02a:1612_9: tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti; tathā atiharaṇe
atk-abh02a:1612_10: pavattā vītiharaṇaṃ, vītiharaṇe pavattā vossajjanaṃ, vossajjane pavattā sannikkhepanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1612_11: sannikkhepane pavattā sannirujjhanaṃ na pāpuṇanti; tattha tattheva pabbaṃ pabbaṃ
atk-abh02a:1612_12: sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilaṃ viya paṭapaṭāyantā bhijjanti.
atk-abh02a:1612_13: Tattha ko eko abhikkamati? Kassa vā ekassa abhikkamanaṃ? Paramatthato hi dhātūnaṃyeva
atk-abh02a:1612_14: gamanaṃ, dhātūnaṃ ṭhānaṃ, dhātūnaṃ nisajjā, dhātūnaṃ sayanaṃ, tasmiṃ tasmiñhi koṭṭhāse saddhiṃ rūpehi –
atk-abh02a:1613: Aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati;
atk-abh02a:1616: Niṭṭhito abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotītipadassa attho.
atk-abh02a:1617_0: Ālokite vilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṃ nāma purato pekkhanaṃ, vilokitaṃ nāma anudisāpekkhanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1617_1: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato pekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti.
atk-abh02a:1617_2: Tāni idha na gahitāni. Sāruppavasena pana imāneva dve gahitāni. Iminā vā mukhena
atk-abh02a:1618: Tattha ‘ālokessāmī’ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ ‘sātthakasampajaññaṃ’. Taṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-abh02a:1619_0: “Sace, bhikkhave, nandassa puratthimā disā āloketabbā hoti, sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā
atk-abh02a:1619_1: nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi – ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato na abhijjhādomanassā
atk-abh02a:1619_2: pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssavissantī’ti. Itiha sātthakasampajāno hoti. “Sace, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a:1619_3: nandassa pacchimā disā, uttarā disā, dakkhiṇā disā, uddhaṃ, adho, anudisā anuviloketabbā
atk-abh02a:1619_4: hoti, sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ anuviloketi – evaṃ me anudisaṃ
atk-abh02a:1620: Apica idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1621_1: attano kammaṭṭhānavaseneva, kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1622_0: Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi. ‘Ālokessāmī’ti pana citte uppajjamāne
atk-abh02a:1622_1: teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1622_2: Iti cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravasena heṭṭhimaṃ akkhidalaṃ adho sīdati, uparimaṃ
atk-abh02a:1622_3: uddhaṃ laṅgheti. Koci yantakena vivaranto nāma natthi. Tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ
atk-abh02a:1622_4: sādhentaṃ uppajjatī’ti evaṃ pajānanaṃ panettha ‘asammohasampajaññaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1623: Apica mūlapariññāāgantukatāvakālikabhāvavasena panettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ. Mūlapariññāvasena tāva –
atk-abh02a:1626_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ pavattati; taṃ āvattetvā
atk-abh02a:1626_1: kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā; tannirodhā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ
atk-abh02a:1626_2: sādhayamānaṃ; tannirodhā vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā; tannirodhā
atk-abh02a:1626_4: voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā; tannirodhā sattakkhattuṃ javanaṃ javati. Tattha paṭhamajavanepi
atk-abh02a:1626_5: ‘ayaṃ itthī, ayaṃ puriso’ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṃ na hoti;
atk-abh02a:1626_6: dutiyajavanepi…pe… sattamajavanepi. Etesu pana, yuddhamaṇḍale yodhesu viya, heṭṭhupariyavasena
atk-abh02a:1626_7: bhijjitvā patitesu ‘ayaṃ itthī, ayaṃ puriso’ti rajjanādivasena ālokitavilokitaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1627_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthagate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṃ sakasakakiccanipphādanavasena
atk-abh02a:1627_1: āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṃ uppajjati. Taṃ pubbe uppannānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1627_2: āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti. Tassa yathā paragehe
atk-abh02a:1627_3: kiñci yācituṃ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesupi tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1627_4: na yuttaṃ, evaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu
atk-abh02a:1627_5: amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ ayuttanti. Evaṃ ‘āgantukabhāvavasena’ asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1628_0: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti, tāni saddhiṃ
atk-abh02a:1628_1: sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti, aññamaññaṃ na passantīti ittarāni tāvakālikāni
atk-abh02a:1628_2: honti. Tattha yathā ekasmiṃ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekakassa taṅkhaṇaṃyeva
atk-abh02a:1628_3: maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma, evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu
atk-abh02a:1628_4: āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇaṃññeva maraṇadhammassa javanassāpi
atk-abh02a:1628_5: rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti. Evaṃ ‘tāvakālikabhāvavasena’
atk-abh02a:1629_1: ceva rūpāni ca rūpakkhandho, dassanaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, taṃsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandho,
atk-abh02a:1629_2: saññā saññākkhandho, phassādikā saṅkhārakkhandho. Evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1629_3: samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketi?
atk-abh02a:1630_0: Tathā cakkhu cakkhāyatanaṃ, rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ, dassanaṃ manāyatanaṃ, vedanādayo taṃsampayuttā
atk-abh02a:1630_1: dhammā dhammāyatanaṃ. Evametesaṃ catunnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-abh02a:1630_2: Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketi?
atk-abh02a:1631_0: Tathā cakkhu cakkhudhātu, rūpaṃ rūpadhātu, dassanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, taṃsampayuttā
atk-abh02a:1631_1: vedanādayo dhammā dhammadhātu. Evametāsaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1631_2: paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketi?
atk-abh02a:1632_0: Tathā cakkhu nissayapaccayo, rūpaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo, āvajjanaṃ anantarasamanantaraanantarūpanissayanatthivigatapaccayo,
atk-abh02a:1632_1: āloko upanissayapaccayo, vedanādayo sahajātādipaccayā. Evametesaṃ paccayānaṃ samavāye
atk-abh02a:1632_2: ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketīti? Evamettha khandhāyatanadhātupaccayapaccavekkhaṇavasenāpi
atk-abh02a:1633_0: Samiñjite pasāriteti pabbānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇe. Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1633_1: akatvā hatthapādānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṃ pariggahetvā tattha atthapariggaṇhanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1633_2: ‘sātthakasampajaññaṃ’. Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṃ samiñjitvā vā pasāretvā eva vā
atk-abh02a:1633_3: ṭhitassa khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti, cittaṃ ekaggataṃ na labhati, kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1633_4: paripatati, visesaṃ nādhigacchati; kāle samiñjantassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā
atk-abh02a:1633_5: nuppajjanti, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ gacchati, visesamadhigacchatīti.
atk-abh02a:1634: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ ‘sappāyasampajaññaṃ’.
atk-abh02a:1635_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – mahācetiyaṅgaṇe kira daharabhikkhū sajjhāyaṃ gaṇhanti. Tesaṃ piṭṭhipasse
atk-abh02a:1635_1: daharabhikkhuniyo dhammaṃ suṇanti. Tatreko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
atk-abh02a:1635_2: patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto. Aparo bhikkhu pādaṃ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi.
atk-abh02a:1635_3: Aṭṭhiṃ āhacca pādo jhāyi. Aparo bhikkhu vammike pasāresi. So āsīvisena daṭṭho. Aparo
atk-abh02a:1635_4: bhikkhu cīvarakuṭidaṇḍake pasāresi. Taṃ maṇisappo ḍaṃsi. Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā
atk-abh02a:1636_0: ‘Gocarasampajaññaṃ’ pana mahātheravatthunā dīpetabbaṃ – mahāthero kira divāṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1636_1: nisinno antevāsikehi saddhiṃ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1636_2: ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjesi. Taṃ antevāsikā pucchiṃsu – “kasmā, bhante, sahasā hatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1636_3: samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjitthā”ti? “Yato paṭṭhāya mayā,
atk-abh02a:1636_4: āvuso, kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikātuṃ āraddho, na me kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo.
atk-abh02a:1636_5: Idāni pana me tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samiñjito. Tasmā
atk-abh02a:1636_6: puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesi”nti. “Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhunā nāma evarūpena
atk-abh02a:1637_0: ‘Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjento vā pasārento vā natthi. Vuttappakāracittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphārena
atk-abh02a:1637_1: pana, suttākaḍḍhanavasena dāruyantassa hatthapādacalanaṃ viya, samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1638_2: tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca piṇḍāya carato “āmisalābho sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā
atk-abh02a:1638_3: nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho ‘attho’ nāma. Tassa vasena ‘sātthakasampajaññaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1639_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṃ sukhumaṃ sappāyaṃ, sītālukassa ghanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1639_1: dupaṭṭaṃ; viparītaṃ asappāyaṃ. Yassa kassaci jiṇṇaṃ asappāyameva. Aggaḷādidānena
atk-abh02a:1639_2: hissa taṃ palibodhakaraṃ hoti. Tathā paṭṭuṇṇadukūlādibhedaṃ corānaṃ lobhanīyacīvaraṃ.
atk-abh02a:1639_3: Tādisañhi araññe ekakassa nivāsantarāyakaraṃ jīvitantarāyakarañcāpi hoti. Nippariyāyena
atk-abh02a:1639_4: pana yaṃ nimittakammādimicchājīvavasena uppannaṃ, yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā
atk-abh02a:1639_5: abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, taṃ asappāyaṃ; viparītaṃ sappāyaṃ. Tassa
atk-abh02a:1640_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṃ pārupanto natthi. Vuttappakāracittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-abh02a:1640_1: pana cīvarapārupanaṃ hoti. Tattha cīvarampi acetanaṃ, kāyopi acetano. Cīvaraṃ na
atk-abh02a:1640_2: jānāti – ‘mayā kāyo pārupito’ti, kāyopi na jānāti – ‘ahaṃ cīvarena pārupito’ti. Dhātuyova
atk-abh02a:1640_3: dhātusamūhaṃ paṭicchādenti, paṭapilotikāya potthakarūpapaṭicchādane viya. Tasmā neva
atk-abh02a:1640_4: sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ, na asundaraṃ labhitvā domanassaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1640_5: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūpavatthādīhi sakkāraṃ karonti, keci
atk-abh02a:1640_7: somanassaṃ vā domanassaṃ vā karonti. Evameva neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ
atk-abh02a:1640_8: kātabbaṃ, na asundaraṃ labhitvā domanassanti. Evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-abh02a:1641_0: Pattadhāraṇepi pattaṃ sahasāva aggahetvā ‘imaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1641_2: veditabbaṃ. Kisadubbalasarīrassa pana garupatto asappāyo; yassa kassaci catupañcagaṇṭhikāhato
atk-abh02a:1641_3: dubbisodhanīyo asappāyova. Duddhotapatto hi na vaṭṭati; taṃ dhovantasseva cassa palibodho
atk-abh02a:1641_4: hoti. Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyova cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo. Nimittakammādivasena
atk-abh02a:1641_5: pana laddho, yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti,
atk-abh02a:1641_6: ayaṃ ekantāsappāyova viparīto sappāyo. Tassa vasenettha ‘sappāyasampajaññaṃ’ kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavaseneva
atk-abh02a:1642_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṃ gaṇhanto natthi. Vuttappakāracittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravaseneva
atk-abh02a:1642_1: pana pattaggahaṇaṃ nāma hoti. Tattha pattopi acetano, hatthāpi acetanā. Patto na
atk-abh02a:1642_2: jānāti – ‘ahaṃ hatthehi gahito’ti. Hatthāpi na jānanti – ‘patto amhehi gahito’ti.
atk-abh02a:1642_3: Dhātuyova dhātusamūhaṃ gaṇhanti, saṇḍāsena aggivaṇṇapattagahaṇe viyāti. Evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-abh02a:1643_0: Apica yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe
atk-abh02a:1643_1: anāthasālāyaṃ anāthamanusse disvā dayālukā purisā tesaṃ vaṇabandhapaṭṭacoḷakāni ceva
atk-abh02a:1643_2: kapālādīhi ca bhesajjāni upanāmenti. Tattha coḷakānipi kesañci saṇhāni kesañci thūlāni
atk-abh02a:1643_3: pāpuṇanti. Bhesajjakapālakānipi kesañci susaṇṭhānāni kesañci dussaṇṭhānāni pāpuṇanti.
atk-abh02a:1643_4: Na te tattha sumanā vā honti dummanā vā. Vaṇapaṭicchādanamatteneva hi coḷakena, bhesajjapariggahaṇamatteneva
atk-abh02a:1643_5: ca kapālakena tesaṃ attho. Evameva yo bhikkhu vaṇacoḷakaṃ viya cīvaraṃ, bhesajjakapālakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1643_6: viya ca pattaṃ, kapāle bhesajjamiva ca patte laddhabhikkhaṃ sallakkheti – ayaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe
atk-abh02a:1644_0: Asitādīsu asiteti piṇḍapātādibhojane. Pīteti yāguādipāne. Khāyiteti piṭṭhakhajjakādikhādane.
atk-abh02a:1644_1: Sāyiteti madhuphāṇitādisāyane. Tattha “neva davāyā”tiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi
atk-abh02a:1645_0: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa aphāsu hoti, taṃ tassa asappāyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1645_1: Yaṃ pana nimittakammādivasena paṭiladdhaṃ, yañcassa bhuñjato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
atk-abh02a:1645_2: kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, taṃ ekantaṃ asappāyameva; viparītaṃ sappāyaṃ. Tassa vasenettha
atk-abh02a:1646_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi. Vuttappakāracittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-abh02a:1646_1: pana pattapaṭiggahaṇaṃ nāma hoti. Cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte
atk-abh02a:1646_2: otāraṇaṃ nāma hoti. Cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva ālopakaraṇaṃ, ālopauddharaṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1646_3: mukhavivaraṇañca hoti. Na koci kuñcikāya, na yantakena hanukaṭṭhiṃ vivarati. Cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-abh02a:1646_4: ālopassa mukhe ṭhapanaṃ, uparidantānaṃ musalakiccasādhanaṃ, heṭṭhādantānaṃ udukkhalakiccasādhanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1646_5: jivhāya hatthakiccasādhanañca hoti. Iti naṃ tattha aggajivhāya tanukakheḷo mūlajivhāya
atk-abh02a:1646_6: bahalakheḷo makkheti. Taṃ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattitaṃ kheḷaudakatemitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1646_7: uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṃ koci kaṭacchunā vā dabbiyā vā anto pavesento nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a:1646_8: vāyodhātuyāva pavisati. Paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ koci palālasanthāraṃ katvā dhārento nāma
atk-abh02a:1646_9: natthi; vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhati. Ṭhitaṃ ṭhitaṃ koci uddhanaṃ katvā aggiṃ jāletvā
atk-abh02a:1646_10: pacanto nāma natthi; tejodhātuyāva paccati. Pakkaṃ pakkaṃ koci daṇḍakena vā yaṭṭhiyā
atk-abh02a:1646_11: vā bahi nīhārako nāma natthi; vāyodhātuyeva nīharati. Iti vāyodhātu atiharati ca
atk-abh02a:1646_12: vītiharati ca dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca. Pathavīdhātu
atk-abh02a:1646_13: dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca. Āpodhātu sineheti
atk-abh02a:1646_14: ca allattañca anupāleti. Tejodhātu antopaviṭṭhaṃ paripāceti. Ākāsadhātu añjaso hoti.
atk-abh02a:1646_15: Viññāṇadhātu tattha tattha sammāpayogamanvāya ābhujatīti. Evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-abh02a:1647_0: Apica gamanato, pariyesanato, paribhogato, āsayato, nidhānato, aparipakkato, paripakkato,
atk-abh02a:1647_2: ‘asammohasampajaññaṃ’ veditabbaṃ. Vitthārakathā panettha visuddhimagge āhārapaṭikūlasaññāniddesato gahetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1648_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe. Tattha pakkakāle uccārapassāvaṃ
atk-abh02a:1648_1: akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti, akkhīni bhamanti, cittaṃ na ekaggaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1648_2: aññe ca rogā uppajjanti; karontassa pana sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti ayamettha attho. Tassa
atk-abh02a:1649_0: Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṃ karontassa pana āpatti hoti, ayaso vaḍḍhati, jīvitantarāyo
atk-abh02a:1649_1: hoti; patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṃ. Tassa vasena
atk-abh02a:1650_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci uccārapassāvakammaṃ karonto natthi. Cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-abh02a:1650_1: pana uccārapassāvakammaṃ hoti. Yathā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṃ akāmatāya
atk-abh02a:1650_2: nikkhamati, yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati, evaṃ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu
atk-abh02a:1650_3: sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi nikkhamanti. So panāyaṃ evaṃ
atk-abh02a:1650_4: nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano hoti na parassa; kevalaṃ pana
atk-abh02a:1650_5: sarīranissandova hoti. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā udakatumbhato purāṇaudakaṃ chaḍḍentassa neva
atk-abh02a:1650_6: taṃ attano hoti na paresaṃ, kevalaṃ paṭijagganamattameva hoti, evanti. Evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-abh02a:1651: Gatādīsu gateti gamane. Ṭhiteti ṭhāne. Nisinneti nisajjāya. Sutteti sayane. Tattha abhikkantādīsu vuttanayeneva sampajānakāritā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1652_0: Ayaṃ panettha aparopi nayo – eko hi bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento
atk-abh02a:1652_1: gacchati. Eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva gacchati. Tathā eko bhikkhu tiṭṭhanto,
atk-abh02a:1652_2: nisīdanto, sayanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento sayati. Eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva sayati.
atk-abh02a:1653_0: Ettakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamena dīpayiṃsu. Yo hi bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ otaritvā
atk-abh02a:1653_2: pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi
atk-abh02a:1653_3: pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamanavemajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo
atk-abh02a:1653_4: appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamane pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva
atk-abh02a:1653_5: niruddhā, ṭhāne pavattā nisajjaṃ, nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā’ti
atk-abh02a:1653_6: evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti; uṭṭhahanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva
atk-abh02a:1653_7: uṭṭhāti – ayaṃ bhikkhu gatādīsu sampajānakārī nāma hotīti.
atk-abh02a:1654_0: Evaṃ pana sutte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1654_1: Tasmā yo bhikkhu yāva sakkoti tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā
atk-abh02a:1654_2: sayati – ‘kāyo acetano, mañco acetano. Kāyo na jānāti – ahaṃ mañce sayitoti. Mañcopi
atk-abh02a:1654_3: na jānāti – mayi kāyo sayitoti. Acetano kāyo acetane mañce sayito’ti. Evaṃ pariggaṇhanto
atk-abh02a:1654_4: pariggaṇhantoyeva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti, pabujjhamāno kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhati.
atk-abh02a:1655_0: Jāgariteti jāgaraṇe. Tattha ‘kiriyāmayapavattassa appavattiyā sati jāgaritaṃ nāma
atk-abh02a:1655_1: na hoti; kiriyāmayapavattavaḷañje pavattante jāgaritaṃ nāma hotī’ti pariggaṇhanto
atk-abh02a:1655_2: bhikkhu jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti. Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca
atk-abh02a:1655_3: koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1656_0: Bhāsiteti kathane. Tattha ‘upādārūpassa saddāyatanassa appavatte sati bhāsitaṃ nāma
atk-abh02a:1656_1: na hoti; tasmiṃ pavattante hotī’ti pariggāhako bhikkhu bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma
atk-abh02a:1656_2: hoti. Vimuttāyatanasīsena dhammaṃ desentopi bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1656_3: kathaṃ kathentopi bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1657_0: Tuṇhībhāveti akathane. Tattha ‘upādārūpassa saddāyatanassa pavattiyaṃ sati tuṇhībhāvo
atk-abh02a:1657_1: nāma natthi; appavattiyaṃ hotī’ti pariggāhako bhikkhu tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma
atk-abh02a:1657_2: hoti. Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnopi dutiyajjhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1658_0: Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato. So heṭṭhā abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha
atk-abh02a:1658_1: bhikkhācāragāmaṃ gacchato ca āgacchato ca addhānagamanavasena kathito. Gate ṭhite
atk-abh02a:1658_2: nisinneti ettha vihāre cuṇṇikapāduddhārairiyāpathavasena kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1660_0: 526. So vivittanti iminā kiṃ dasseti? Etassa bhikkhuno upāsanaṭṭhānaṃ yogapathaṃ
atk-abh02a:1660_1: sappāyasenāsanaṃ dasseti. Yassa hi abbhantare ettakā guṇā atthi, tassa anucchaviko
atk-abh02a:1660_2: araññavāso. Yassa panete natthi, tassa ananucchaviko. Evarūpassa hi araññavāso kāḷamakkaṭaacchataracchadīpimigādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1660_3: aṭavīvāsasadiso hoti. Kasmā? Icchāya ṭhatvā paviṭṭhattā. Tassa hi araññavāsamūlako
atk-abh02a:1660_4: koci attho natthi; araññavāsañceva āraññake ca dūseti; sāsane appasādaṃ uppādeti.
atk-abh02a:1660_5: Yassa pana abbhantare ettakā guṇā atthi, tasseva so anucchaviko. So hi araññavāsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1660_6: nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhitvā parinibbāti, sakalaaraññavāsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1660_7: upasobheti, āraññikānaṃ sīsaṃ dhovati, sakalasāsanaṃ pasāreti. Tasmā satthā evarūpassa
atk-abh02a:1660_8: bhikkhuno upāsanaṭṭhānaṃ yogapathaṃ sappāyasenāsanaṃ dassento so vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1660_9: bhajatītiādimāha. Tattha vivittanti suññaṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ. Etameva hi atthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1660_10: dassetuṃ tañca anākiṇṇantiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha anākiṇṇanti asaṅkiṇṇaṃ asambādhaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh02a:1660_11: yassa senāsanassa sāmantā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi pabbatagahanaṃ vanagahanaṃ nadīgahanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1660_12: hoti, na koci avelāya upasaṅkamituṃ sakkoti – idaṃ santikepi anākiṇṇaṃ nāma. Yaṃ
atk-abh02a:1660_13: pana aḍḍhayojanikaṃ vā yojanikaṃ vā hoti – idaṃ dūratāya eva anākiṇṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1661_0: 527. Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ. Tassa pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ mañco pīṭhantiādi
atk-abh02a:1661_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha mañcoti cattāro mañcā – masārako, bundikābaddho, kuḷīrapādako, āhaccapādakoti.
atk-abh02a:1661_2: Tathā pīṭhaṃ. Bhisīti pañca bhisiyo – uṇṇābhisi, coḷabhisi, vākabhisi, tiṇabhisi,
atk-abh02a:1661_3: paṇṇabhisīti. Bimbohananti sīsupadhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ vitthārato vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ
atk-abh02a:1661_4: vaṭṭati, dīghato mañcavitthārappamāṇaṃ. Vihāroti samantā parihārapathaṃ antoyeva
atk-abh02a:1661_5: rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni dassetvā katasenāsanaṃ. Aḍḍhayogoti supaṇṇavaṅkagehaṃ. Pāsādoti
atk-abh02a:1661_6: dve kaṇṇikāni gahetvā kato dīghapāsādo. Aṭṭoti paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ iṭṭhakāhi
atk-abh02a:1661_7: kato bahalabhittiko catupañcabhūmiko patissayaviseso. Māḷoti bhojanasālasadiso maṇḍalamāḷo;
atk-abh02a:1661_8: vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ekakūṭasaṅgahito caturassapāsādoti vuttaṃ. Leṇanti pabbataṃ
atk-abh02a:1661_9: khaṇitvā vā pabbhārassa appahonakaṭṭhāne kuṭṭaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā vā katasenāsanaṃ. Guhāti
atk-abh02a:1661_10: bhūmidari vā yattha rattindivaṃ dīpaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, pabbataguhā vā bhūmiguhā vā.
atk-abh02a:1661_11: Rukkhamūlanti rukkhassa heṭṭhā parikkhittaṃ vā aparikkhittaṃ vā. Veḷugumboti veḷugaccho.
atk-abh02a:1661_12: Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti ṭhapetvā vā etāni mañcādīni yattha bhikkhū
atk-abh02a:1661_13: sannipatanti, yaṃ tesaṃ sannipātārahaṭṭhānaṃ, sabbametaṃ senāsanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1662_0: 528. Bhajatīti upeti. Sambhajatīti tattha abhirativasena anukkaṇṭhito suṭṭhu upeti.
atk-abh02a:1662_1: Sevatīti nivāsanavasena sevati nisevatīti anukkaṇṭhamāno sannisito hutvā sevati.
atk-abh02a:1663_0: 529. Idāni yaṃ taṃ vivittanti vuttaṃ, tassa pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ araññaṃ rukkhamūlantiādi
atk-abh02a:1663_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha araññanti vinayapariyāyena tāva “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca
atk-abh02a:1663_2: avasesaṃ arañña”nti āgataṃ. Suttantapariyāyena āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya “āraññakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1663_3: nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikapacchima”nti āgataṃ. Vinayasuttantā pana ubhopi pariyāyadesanā
atk-abh02a:1663_4: nāma. Abhidhammo nippariyāyadesanāti abhidhammapariyāyena araññaṃ dassetuṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-abh02a:1663_5: bahi indakhīlāti vuttaṃ; indakhīlato bahi nikkhamitvāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1664_0: 530. Rukkhamūlādīnaṃ pakatiyā ca suviññeyyabhāvato rukkhamūlaṃyeva rukkhamūlantiādi
atk-abh02a:1664_1: vuttaṃ. Apicettha rukkhamūlanti yaṃkiñci sītacchāyaṃ vivittaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ. Pabbatanti
atk-abh02a:1664_2: selaṃ. Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa
atk-abh02a:1664_3: nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Kandaranti
atk-abh02a:1664_4: kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena daritaṃ udakena bhinnaṃ pabbatappadesaṃ; yaṃ nitumbantipi
atk-abh02a:1664_5: nadīkuñjantipi vadanti. Tattha hi rajatapaṭṭasadisā vālikā honti, matthake maṇivitānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1664_6: viya vanagahanaṃ, maṇikkhandhasadisaṃ udakaṃ sandati. Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1664_7: pivitvā gattāni sītaṃ katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññapetvā nisinnassa
atk-abh02a:1664_8: samaṇadhammaṃ karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Giriguhanti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ antaraṃ,
atk-abh02a:1664_9: ekasmiṃyeva vā umaṅgasadisaṃ mahāvivaraṃ. Susānalakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1665_0: 531. Vanapatthanti gāmantaṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ, yattha na kasanti
atk-abh02a:1665_1: na vapanti. Tenevassa niddese “vanapatthanti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”ntiādi
atk-abh02a:1665_2: vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā rukkhamūlādīsu idamevekaṃ bhājetvā dassitaṃ, tasmāssa nikkhepapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh02a:1665_3: niddesaṃ akatvā sabbapariyante niddeso katoti veditabbo. Abbhokāsanti acchannaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1665_4: Ākaṅkhamāno panettha cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasati. Palālapuñjanti palālarāsi. Mahāpalālapuñjato
atk-abh02a:1665_5: hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti, gacchagumbādīnampi upari
atk-abh02a:1665_6: palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti; taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1665_7: Vanapatthaniddese salomahaṃsānanti yattha paviṭṭhassa lomahaṃso uppajjati; evarūpānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1665_8: bhīsanakasenāsanānaṃ. Pariyantānanti dūrabhāvena pariyante ṭhitānaṃ. Na manussūpacārānanti
atk-abh02a:1665_9: kasanavapanavasena manussehi upacaritabbaṃ vanantaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitānaṃ. Durabhisambhavānanti
atk-abh02a:1667_0: 533. Appanigghosanti nagaranigghosasaddena appanigghosaṃ. Yasmā pana ubhayampetaṃ
atk-abh02a:1667_1: saddaṭṭhena ekaṃ, tasmāssa niddese “yadeva taṃ appasaddaṃ tadeva taṃ appanigghosa”nti
atk-abh02a:1667_2: vuttaṃ. Vijanavātanti anusañcaraṇajanassa sarīravātena virahitaṃ. Vijanavādantipi
atk-abh02a:1667_3: pāṭho; antojanavādena virahitanti attho. Yasmā pana yaṃ appanigghosaṃ, tadeva janasañcaraṇena
atk-abh02a:1667_4: ca janavādena ca virahitaṃ hoti, tasmāssa niddese “yadeva taṃ appanigghosaṃ tadeva
atk-abh02a:1667_5: taṃ vijanavāta”nti vuttaṃ. Manussarāhaseyyakanti manussānaṃ rahassakiriyaṭṭhāniyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1667_6: Yasmā pana taṃ janasañcaraṇarahitaṃ hoti, tenassa niddese “yadeva taṃ vijanavātaṃ
atk-abh02a:1667_7: tadeva taṃ manussarāhaseyyaka”nti vuttaṃ. Paṭisallānasāruppanti vivekānurūpaṃ. Yasmā
atk-abh02a:1667_8: pana taṃ niyameneva manussarāhaseyyakaṃ hoti, tasmāssa niddese “yadeva taṃ manussarāhaseyyakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1668: 534. Araññagatādiniddese araññaṃ vuttameva. Tathā rukkhamūlaṃ. Avasesaṃ pana sabbampi senāsanaṃ suññāgārena saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1669_0: 535. Pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvāti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ bandhitvā. Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti
atk-abh02a:1669_1: uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujuṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-abh02a:1669_2: Evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṃsanhārūni na paṇamanti. Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā
atk-abh02a:1669_3: khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā nuppajjanti. Tāsu na uppajjamānāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ
atk-abh02a:1669_4: hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paripatati, vuḍḍhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati.
atk-abh02a:1670: 536. Ujuko hoti kāyo ṭhito paṇihitoti idampi hi imamevatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1671_0: 537. Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā, mukhasamīpe
atk-abh02a:1671_1: vā katvāti attho. Teneva vuttaṃ “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā
atk-abh02a:1671_2: mukhanimitte vā”ti. Mukhanimittanti cettha uttaroṭṭhassa vemajjhappadeso daṭṭhabbo,
atk-abh02a:1671_3: yattha nāsikavāto paṭihaññati; atha vā parīti pariggahaṭṭho, mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho,
atk-abh02a:1671_4: satīti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho; tena vuccati “parimukhaṃ sati”nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha
atk-abh02a:1671_5: attho daṭṭhabbo. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepo “pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satiṃ katvā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1672_0: 538. Abhijjhāniddeso uttānatthoyeva. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepavaṇṇanā – abhijjhaṃ loke
atk-abh02a:1672_1: pahāyāti lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā loko. Tasmā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu
atk-abh02a:1672_2: rāgaṃ pahāya kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh02a:1673: 539. Vigatābhijjhenāti vikkhambhanavasena pahīnattā vigatābhijjhena, na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1674_0: 541. Abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodhetīti abhijjhāto cittaṃ parisodheti; yathā naṃ sā
atk-abh02a:1674_1: muñcati ceva, muñcitvā ca na puna gaṇhāti, evaṃ karotīti attho. Niddesapadesu panassa
atk-abh02a:1674_2: āsevanto sodheti, bhāvento visodheti, bahulīkaronto parisodhetīti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1675_0: 542-543. Byāpādadosaṃ pahāyātiādīnampi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Byāpajjati
atk-abh02a:1675_1: iminā cittaṃ pūtikummāsādayo viya pakatiṃ jahatīti byāpādo. Vikārappattiyā padussati,
atk-abh02a:1675_2: paraṃ vā padūseti vināsetīti padoso. Ubhayametaṃ kodhassevādhivacanaṃ. Teneva vuttaṃ
atk-abh02a:1675_3: “yo byāpādo so padoso; yo padoso so byāpādo”ti. Yasmā cesa sabbasaṅgāhikavasena niddiṭṭho,
atk-abh02a:1676_0: 546. Thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ, middhaṃ cetasikagelaññaṃ; thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1676_1: Santā hontīti ime dvepi dhammā nirodhasantatāya santā hontīti. Idaṃ sandhāyettha vacanabhedo kato.
atk-abh02a:1677: 549. Ālokasaññīti rattimpi divāpi diṭṭhālokasañjānanasamatthāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya saññāya samannāgato.
atk-abh02a:1678: 550. Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato. Idaṃ ubhayaṃ ālokasaññāya upakārakattā vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1679_0: 553. Vigatathinamiddhatāya pana ālokasaññāya niddesapadesu cattattātiādīni aññamaññavevacanāneva.
atk-abh02a:1679_1: Tattha cattattāti cattakāraṇā. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Cattattāti idaṃ panettha
atk-abh02a:1679_2: sakabhāvapariccajanavasena vuttaṃ. Vantattāti idaṃ puna anādiyanabhāvadassanavasena.
atk-abh02a:1679_3: Muttattāti idaṃ santatito vinimocanavasena. Pahīnattāti idaṃ muttassāpi katthaci
atk-abh02a:1679_4: ṭhānābhāvavasena. Paṭinissaṭṭhattāti idaṃ pubbe ādinnapubbassa nissaggadassanavasena.
atk-abh02a:1679_5: Paṭimuñcato vā nissaṭṭhattā bhāvanābalena abhibhuyya nissaṭṭhattāti attho. Pahīnapaṭinissaṭṭhattāti
atk-abh02a:1679_6: yathāvikkhambhanavaseneva pahānaṃ hoti, punappunaṃ santatiṃ na ajjhāruhati, tathā
atk-abh02a:1679_7: paṭinissaṭṭhattāti. Ālokā hotīti sappabhā hoti. Nirāvaraṇaṭṭhena vivaṭā. Nirupakkilesaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:1680: 556. Uddhaccakukkuccanti ettha uddhatākāro uddhaccaṃ, ārammaṇe anicchayatāya vatthujjhācāro kukkuccaṃ. Idhāpi “santā hontī”ti purimanayeneva vacanabhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1681_0: 558. Tiṇṇavicikicchoti vicikicchaṃ taritvā atikkamitvā ṭhito. Niddesepissa tiṇṇoti
atk-abh02a:1681_1: idaṃ vicikicchāya animuggabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ. Uttiṇṇoti idaṃ tassā atikkamadassanavasena.
atk-abh02a:1681_2: Nittiṇṇoti idaṃ bhāvanābalena abhibhuyya upaddave tiṇṇabhāvadassanavasena. Pāraṅgatoti
atk-abh02a:1681_3: nibbicikicchābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ vicikicchāpāraṃ gato. Pāramanuppattoti tadeva pāraṃ bhāvanānuyogena
atk-abh02a:1682_0: 559. Akathaṃkathīti ‘kathamidaṃ kathamida’nti evaṃ pavattāya kathaṃkathāya virahito.
atk-abh02a:1682_1: Kusalesu dhammesūti anavajjadhammesu. Na kaṅkhatīti ‘ime nu kho kusalā’ti kaṅkhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1682_2: na uppādeti. Na vicikicchatīti te dhamme sabhāvato vinicchetuṃ na kicchati, na kilamati.
atk-abh02a:1682_3: Akathaṃkathī hotīti ‘kathaṃ nu kho ime kusalā’ti kathaṃkathāya rahito hoti. Nikkathaṃkathī
atk-abh02a:1682_4: vigatakathaṃkathoti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Vacanattho panettha kathaṃkathāto nikkhantoti
atk-abh02a:1683: 562. Upakkileseti upakkilesabhūte. Te hi cittaṃ upagantvā kilissanti. Tasmā upakkilesāti vuccanti.
atk-abh02a:1684_0: 563. Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti yasmā ime nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya

atk-abh02a:1752_0: ‘Mūlato’ pāṇātipāto dosamohamūlo. Adinnādānaṃ kiñcikāle lobhamohamūlaṃ, kiñcikāle
atk-abh02a:1752_1: dosamohamūlaṃ. Micchācāro lobhamohamūlo. Musāvādo kiñcikāle lobhamohamūlo, kiñcikāle
atk-abh02a:1754: ‘Sāvajjato’ pāṇātipāto atthi appasāvajjo, atthi mahāsāvajjo. Tathā adinnādānādīni. Tesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ heṭṭhā dassitameva.
atk-abh02a:1755_0: Ayaṃ pana aparo nayo – kunthakipillikassa hi vadho appasāvajjo, tato mahantatarassa
atk-abh02a:1755_1: mahāsāvajjo; sopi appasāvajjo, tato mahantatarāya sakuṇikāya mahāsāvajjo; tato godhāya,

atk-abh02a:1755_3: mahāsāvajjo, tatopi dussīlamanussassa, tato gorūpasīlakamanussassa, tato saraṇagatassa,
atk-abh02a:1755_4: tato pañcasikkhāpadikassa, tato sāmaṇerassa, tato puthujjanabhikkhuno, tato sotāpannassa,
atk-abh02a:1755_5: tato sakadāgāmissa, tato anāgāmissa, tato khīṇāsavassa vadho atimahāsāvajjoyeva.

atk-abh02a:1756_1: tato saraṇagatassa, tato pañcasikkhāpadikassa, tato sāmaṇerassa, tato puthujjanabhikkhuno,

atk-abh02a:1757_0: Micchācāro dussīlāya itthiyā vītikkame appasāvajjo, tato gorūpasīlakāya mahāsāvajjo;
atk-abh02a:1757_1: tato saraṇagatāya, pañcasikkhāpadikāya, sāmaṇeriyā, puthujjanabhikkhuniyā, sotāpannāya,
atk-abh02a:1757_2: sakadāgāminiyā, tato anāgāminiyā vītikkame mahāsāvajjo, khīṇāsavāya pana bhikkhuniyā
atk-abh02a:1758_0: Musāvādo kākaṇikamattassa atthāya musākathane appasāvajjo, tato aḍḍhamāsakassa, māsakassa,
atk-abh02a:1758_1: pañcamāsakassa, aḍḍhakahāpaṇassa, kahāpaṇassa, tato anagghaniyabhaṇḍassa atthāya
atk-abh02a:1758_2: musākathane mahāsāvajjo, musā kathetvā pana saṅghaṃ bhindantassa ekantamahāsāvajjova.
atk-abh02a:1759: Surāpānaṃ pasatamattassa pāne appasāvajjaṃ, añjalimattassa pāne mahāsāvajjaṃ; kāyacālanasamatthaṃ pana bahuṃ pivitvā gāmaghātanigamaghātakammaṃ karontassa ekantamahāsāvajjameva.
atk-abh02a:1760_0: Pāṇātipātañhi patvā khīṇāsavassa vadho mahāsāvajjo; adinnādānaṃ patvā khīṇāsavasantakassa
atk-abh02a:1760_1: haraṇaṃ, micchācāraṃ patvā khīṇāsavāya bhikkhuniyā vītikkamanaṃ, musāvādaṃ patvā
atk-abh02a:1760_2: musāvādena saṅghabhedo, surāpānaṃ patvā kāyacālanasamatthaṃ bahuṃ pivitvā gāmanigamaghātanaṃ

atk-abh02a:1761: ‘Payogato’ti pāṇātipāto sāhatthikopi hoti āṇattikopi. Tathā adinnādānaṃ. Micchācāramusāvādasurāpānāni sāhatthikānevāti.
atk-abh02a:1762_0: Evamettha pāṇātipātādīnaṃ dhammādivasena vinicchayaṃ ñatvā pāṇātipātā veramaṇītiādīnampi
atk-abh02a:1762_1: dhammato, koṭṭhāsato, ārammaṇato, vedanāto, mūlato, kammato, khaṇḍato, samādānato,
atk-abh02a:1763_1: pañcapi kammapathā eva. ‘Ārammaṇato’ti pāṇātipātā veramaṇī parassa jīvitindriyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1763_2: ārammaṇaṃ katvā attano veracetanāya viramati. Itarāsupi eseva nayo. Sabbāpi hi etā
atk-abh02a:1763_3: vītikkamitabbavatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā veracetanāhiyeva viramanti. ‘Vedanāto’ti sabbāpi
atk-abh02a:1763_4: sukhavedanā vā honti majjhattavedanā vā. ‘Mūlato’ti ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa
atk-abh02a:1763_5: alobhaadosaamohamūlā honti, ñāṇavippayuttacittena viramantassa alobhaadosamūlā honti.
atk-abh02a:1763_6: ‘Kammato’ti musāvādā veramaṇīyevettha vacīkammaṃ; sesā kāyakammaṃ. ‘Khaṇḍato’ti gahaṭṭhā
atk-abh02a:1763_7: yaṃ yaṃ vītikkamanti, taṃ tadeva khaṇḍaṃ hoti bhijjati, avasesaṃ na bhijjati. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1763_8: Gahaṭṭhā hi anibaddhasīlā honti, yaṃ yaṃ sakkonti taṃ tadeva gopenti. Sāmaṇerānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1763_9: pana ekasmiṃ vītikkamante sabbāni bhijjanti. Na kevalañca etāni, sesasīlānipi bhijjantiyeva.
atk-abh02a:1763_10: Tesaṃ pana vītikkamo daṇḍakammavatthuko. ‘Puna evarūpaṃ na karissāmī’ti daṇḍakamme
atk-abh02a:1763_11: kate sīlaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti. ‘Samādānato’ti sayameva ‘pañca sīlāni adhiṭṭhahāmī’ti
atk-abh02a:1763_12: adhiṭṭhahantenapi, pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ samādiyantenapi samādiṇṇāni honti. Aññassa
atk-abh02a:1763_13: santike nisīditvā ‘pañca sīlāni samādiyāmī’ti samādiyantenapi, pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ
atk-abh02a:1763_14: samādiyantenapi samādinnāneva honti. ‘Payogato’ sabbānipi sāhatthikapayogānevāti veditabbāni.

atk-abh02a:1774_0: 718. Idāni tadanantare paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge catassoti gaṇanaparicchedo. Paṭisambhidāti
atk-abh02a:1774_1: pabhedā. Yasmā pana parato atthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidātiādimāha, tasmā na aññassa
atk-abh02a:1774_2: kassaci pabhedā, ñāṇasseva pabhedāti veditabbā. Iti “catasso paṭisambhidā”ti padena
atk-abh02a:1774_3: cattāro ñāṇappabhedāti ayamattho saṅgahito. Atthapaṭisambhidāti atthe paṭisambhidā;
atk-abh02a:1774_5: ñāṇanti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Dhammappabhedassa hi sallakkhaṇavibhāvanāvavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ

atk-abh02a:1774_7: niruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā nāma. Paṭibhānappabhedassa
atk-abh02a:1775_0: Idāni yathānikkhittā paṭisambhidā bhājetvā dassento atthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1775_1: Tattha atthoti saṅkhepato hetuphalaṃ. Tañhi hetuvasena araṇīyaṃ gantabbaṃ pattabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1775_2: tasmā atthoti vuccati. Pabhedato pana yaṃkiñci paccayasamuppannaṃ, nibbānaṃ, bhāsitattho,
atk-abh02a:1775_3: vipāko, kiriyāti ime pañca dhammā atthoti veditabbā. Taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh02a:1776_0: Dhammoti saṅkhepato paccayo. So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca,
atk-abh02a:1776_1: tasmā dhammoti vuccati. Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako hetu, ariyamaggo,
atk-abh02a:1776_2: bhāsitaṃ, kusalaṃ, akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammoti veditabbā. Taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh02a:1777_0: Tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca yā sabhāvanirutti, tassā
atk-abh02a:1777_1: abhilāpe taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe
atk-abh02a:1777_2: pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā. Evamayaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā saddārammaṇā
atk-abh02a:1777_3: nāma jātā, na paññattiārammaṇā. Kasmā? Yasmā saddaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti, ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1777_4: na sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānanti. Paṭisambhidāppatto hi “phasso”ti vutte “ayaṃ sabhāvaniruttī”ti
atk-abh02a:1777_5: jānāti, “phassā”ti vā “phassa”nti vā vutte pana “ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti.
atk-abh02a:1777_6: Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Aññaṃ panesa nāmaākhyātaupasaggabyañjanasaddaṃ jānāti na
atk-abh02a:1777_7: jānātīti? Yadaggena saddaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti, ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti
atk-abh02a:1777_8: jānāti, tadaggena tampi jānissatīti. Taṃ pana nayidaṃ paṭisambhidākiccanti paṭikkhipitvā
atk-abh02a:1778_0: Tissadattatthero kira bodhimaṇḍe suvaṇṇasalākaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhārasasu bhāsāsu ‘katarabhāsāya
atk-abh02a:1778_1: kathemī’ti pavāresi. Taṃ pana tena attano uggahe ṭhatvā pavāritaṃ, na paṭisambhidāya
atk-abh02a:1778_2: ṭhitena. So hi mahāpaññatāya taṃ taṃ bhāsaṃ kathāpetvā kathāpetvā uggaṇhi; tato uggahe
atk-abh02a:1779_0: Bhāsaṃ nāma sattā uggaṇhantīti vatvā ca panettha idaṃ kathitaṃ. Mātāpitaro hi daharakāle
atk-abh02a:1779_1: kumārake mañce vā pīṭhe vā nipajjāpetvā taṃ taṃ kathayamānā tāni tāni kiccāni karonti.
atk-abh02a:1779_2: Dārakā tesaṃ taṃ taṃ bhāsaṃ vavatthāpenti – iminā idaṃ vuttaṃ, iminā idaṃ vuttanti.
atk-abh02a:1779_3: Gacchante gacchante kāle sabbampi bhāsaṃ jānanti. Mātā damiḷī, pitā andhako. Tesaṃ
atk-abh02a:1779_4: jāto dārako sace mātukathaṃ paṭhamaṃ suṇāti, damiḷabhāsaṃ bhāsissati; sace pitukathaṃ
atk-abh02a:1779_5: paṭhamaṃ suṇāti, andhakabhāsaṃ bhāsissati. Ubhinnampi pana kathaṃ assuṇanto māgadhabhāsaṃ bhāsissati.
atk-abh02a:1780_0: Yopi agāmake mahāraññe nibbatto, tattha añño kathento nāma natthi, sopi attano dhammatāya
atk-abh02a:1780_1: vacanaṃ samuṭṭhāpento māgadhabhāsameva bhāsissati. Niraye, tiracchānayoniyaṃ, pettivisaye,
atk-abh02a:1780_2: manussaloke, devaloketi sabbattha māgadhabhāsāva ussannā. Tattha sesā oṭṭakirātaandhakayonakadamiḷabhāsādikā
atk-abh02a:1780_4: māgadhabhāsā na parivattati. Sammāsabuddhopi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ tantiṃ āropento
atk-abh02a:1780_5: māgadhabhāsāya eva āropesi. Kasmā? Evañhi atthaṃ āharituṃ sukhaṃ hoti. Māgadhabhāsāya
atk-abh02a:1780_6: hi tantiṃ āruḷhassa buddhavacanassa paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ sotapathāgamanameva papañco;
atk-abh02a:1780_7: sote pana saṅghaṭṭitamatteyeva nayasatena nayasahassena attho upaṭṭhāti. Aññāya pana
atk-abh02a:1780_8: bhāsāya tantiṃ āruḷhaṃ pothetvā pothetvā uggahetabbaṃ hoti. Bahumpi uggahetvā pana
atk-abh02a:1780_9: puthujjanassa paṭisambhidāppatti nāma natthi. Ariyasāvako no paṭisambhidāppato nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1781_0: Ñāṇesu ñāṇanti sabbatthakañāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ñāṇaṃ paccavekkhantassa pabhedagataṃ
atk-abh02a:1781_1: ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti. Imā pana catassopi paṭisambhidā dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṃ
atk-abh02a:1781_2: gacchanti, pañcahi kāraṇehi visadā hontīti veditabbā. Katamesu dvīsu? Sekkhabhūmiyañca
atk-abh02a:1781_5: asekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedaṃ gatā. Ānandattherassa cittassa gahapatino dhammikassa upāsakassa
atk-abh02a:1781_6: upālissa gahapatino khujjuttarāya upāsikāyāti evamādīnaṃ paṭisambhidā sekkhabhūmiyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1781_7: pabhedaṃ gatāti imāsu dvīsu bhūmīsu pabhedaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh02a:1782_0: Katamehi pañcahi kāraṇehi paṭisambhidā visadā hontīti? Adhigamena, pariyattiyā, savanena,
atk-abh02a:1782_1: paripucchāya, pubbayogenāti. Tattha ‘adhigamo’ nāma arahattaṃ. Tañhi pattassa paṭisambhidā
atk-abh02a:1782_2: visadā honti. ‘Pariyatti’ nāma buddhavacanaṃ. Tañhi uggaṇhantassa paṭisambhidā visadā
atk-abh02a:1782_3: honti. ‘Savanaṃ’ nāma dhammassavanaṃ. Sakkaccañhi dhammaṃ suṇantassa paṭisambhidā
atk-abh02a:1782_4: visadā honti. ‘Paripucchā’ nāma aṭṭhakathā. Uggahitapāḷiyā atthaṃ kathentassa hi
atk-abh02a:1782_5: paṭisambhidā visadā honti. ‘Pubbayogo’ nāma pubbayogāvacaratā, atītabhave haraṇapaccāharaṇanayena
