atk-abh02a:1782_8: So kira tambapaṇṇidīpe buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā paratīraṃ gantvā yonakadhammarakkhitattherassa
atk-abh02a:1782_9: santike buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgacchanto nāvaṃ abhiruhanatitthe ekasmiṃ pade uppannakaṅkho
atk-abh02a:1782_10: yojanasatamaggaṃ nivattitvā ācariyassa santikaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge ekassa kuṭumbikassa
atk-abh02a:1782_11: pañhaṃ kathesi. So pasīditvā satasahassagghanikaṃ kambalaṃ adāsi. Sopi taṃ āharitvā

atk-abh02a:1782_13: Pacchimāya janatāya anuggahatthāyāti. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “amhākaṃ gatamaggaṃ āvajjetvā

atk-abh02a:1782_17: therassa vīmaṃsanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu. Thero paṭisambhidāppattatāya pucchitapucchite pañhe kathesīti.
atk-abh02a:1783_0: Pariyattiyā pana tissadattattherassa ceva nāgasenattherassa ca paṭisambhidā visadā

atk-abh02a:1791_0: 725. Tattha tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā. Atthapaṭisambhidā lokiyalokuttaramissakā.

atk-abh02a:1791_4: catasso catasso paṭisambhidā vibhattāti veditabbā. Akusalacittesupi eseva nayo. Vipākakiriyavāresu

atk-abh02a:1792_0: Kasmā pana yathā kusalākusalavāresu “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1792_1: evamidha “yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ime vipākā, tesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti evaṃ na vuttanti?
atk-abh02a:1792_2: Heṭṭhā vuttattā. Yadi evaṃ, “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti heṭṭhā vuttattā
atk-abh02a:1792_3: ayaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāpi idha na vattabbā siyāti? No na vattabbā. Kasmā? Heṭṭhā vipākakiriyacittuppādavasena
atk-abh02a:1792_4: avuttattā. Kiriyavāre ca “yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ime kiriyā”ti vacanameva na yujjatīti dvīsupi
atk-abh02a:1792_5: imesu vāresu tisso tissova paṭisambhidā vibhattā.
atk-abh02a:1793_0: Tattha yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hotīti yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ phasso
atk-abh02a:1793_1: hotītiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ “ayaṃ phasso, ayaṃ vedanā”ti evaṃ paññatti
atk-abh02a:1793_2: hoti. Tattha dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṃ atthe dhamme ca pavattamānāya tassā
atk-abh02a:1793_3: dhammaniruttiyā sabhāvapaññattiyā abhilāpe ñāṇaṃ. Abhilāpasaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
atk-abh02a:1793_4: uppannañāṇameva idhāpi kathitaṃ. Yena ñāṇenāti yena paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāñāṇena.
atk-abh02a:1793_5: Tāni ñāṇāni jānātīti itarāni tīṇi paṭisambhidāñāṇāni jānāti.
atk-abh02a:1794_0: Idāni yathā yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tāni ñāṇāni jānāti, tathā tassa tesu pavattiṃ dassetuṃ imāni
atk-abh02a:1794_1: ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti vuttaṃ. Tattha idamatthajotakānīti imassa atthassa jotakāni
atk-abh02a:1794_2: pakāsakāni; imaṃ nāma atthaṃ jotenti pakāsenti paricchindantīti attho. Iti ñāṇesu
atk-abh02a:1794_3: ñāṇanti iminā ākārena pavattaṃ tīsu ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1795_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā ‘imissā idaṃ kiccaṃ, imissā idaṃ kicca’nti
atk-abh02a:1795_1: itarāsaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ kiccaṃ jānāti, sayaṃ pana tāsaṃ kiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:1795_2: bahussutadhammakathiko viya appassutadhammakathikassa. Dve kira bhikkhū. Eko bahussuto,
atk-abh02a:1795_3: eko appassuto. Te ekatova ekaṃ dhammakathāmaggaṃ uggaṇhiṃsu. Tattha appassuto sarasampanno
atk-abh02a:1795_4: ahosi, itaro mandassaro. Tesu appassuto gatagataṭṭhāne attano sarasampattiyā sakalaparisaṃ
atk-abh02a:1795_5: khobhetvā dhammaṃ kathesi. Dhammaṃ suṇamānā haṭṭhatuṭṭhamānasā hutvā – ‘yathā esa
atk-abh02a:1795_6: dhammaṃ kathesi, eko tipiṭakadharo maññe bhavissatī’ti vadanti. Bahussutabhikkhu
atk-abh02a:1795_7: pana – ‘dhammasavane jānissatha ayaṃ tipiṭakadharo vā no vā’ti āha. So kiñcāpi evamāha,
atk-abh02a:1795_8: yathā pana sakalaparisaṃ khobhetvā dhammaṃ kathetuṃ sakkoti, evamassa kathanasamatthatā
atk-abh02a:1795_9: natthi. Tattha kiñcāpi paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā, bahussuto viya appassutassa, itarāsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1795_10: kiccaṃ jānāti, sayaṃ pana taṃ kiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.

atk-abh02a:1813_4: vuttehi terasahi, tathā dutiyapadena, tatiyapadena niyamitapaññāvasena vuttehi dvādasahīti
atk-abh02a:1814_1: dvīhi pañcakehi, chakkamātikā ekena chakkena, sattakamātikā “sattasattati ñāṇavatthūnī”ti
atk-abh02a:1814_2: evaṃ saṅkhepato vuttehi ekādasahi sattakehi, aṭṭhakamātikā ekena aṭṭhakena, navakamātikā ekena navakena.
atk-abh02a:1816_0: 760. Dasakamātikā “dasa tathāgatassa tathāgatabalānī”tiādinā ekeneva dasakena nikkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1816_1: Tattha dasāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Tathāgatassāti yathā vipassīādayo pubbakā isayo āgatā
atk-abh02a:1816_2: tathā āgatassa; yathā ca te gatā tathā gatassa. Tathāgatabalānīti aññehi asādhāraṇāni
atk-abh02a:1816_3: tathāgatasseva balāni; yathā vā pubbabuddhānaṃ balāni puññussayasampattiyā āgatāni
atk-abh02a:1816_4: tathā āgatabalānītipi attho. Tattha duvidhaṃ tathāgatassa balaṃ – kāyabalañca ñāṇabalañca.
atk-abh02a:1816_5: Tesu kāyabalaṃ hatthikulānusāreneva veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi –
atk-abh02a:1820_0: Tattha ‘kāḷāvaka’nti pakatihatthikulaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ purisānaṃ kāyabalaṃ
atk-abh02a:1820_1: taṃ ekassa kāḷāvakahatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ kāḷāvakānaṃ balaṃ taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyassa.
atk-abh02a:1820_2: Yaṃ dasannaṃ gaṅgeyyānaṃ taṃ ekassa paṇḍarassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ paṇḍarānaṃ taṃ ekassa
atk-abh02a:1820_3: tambassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ tambānaṃ taṃ ekassa piṅgalassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ piṅgalānaṃ taṃ
atk-abh02a:1820_4: ekassa gandhahatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gandhahatthīnaṃ taṃ ekassa maṅgalassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-abh02a:1820_5: maṅgalānaṃ taṃ ekassa hemavatassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ hemavatānaṃ taṃ ekassa uposathassa.
atk-abh02a:1820_6: Yaṃ dasannaṃ uposathānaṃ taṃ ekassa chaddantassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ taṃ ekassa
atk-abh02a:1820_7: tathāgatassa. Nārāyanasaṅkhātabalantipi idameva vuccati. Tadetaṃ pakatihatthīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1820_8: gaṇanāya hatthikoṭisahassānaṃ, purisagaṇanāya dasannaṃ purisakoṭisahassānaṃ balaṃ
atk-abh02a:1821_0: Ñāṇabalaṃ pana idha tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva dasabalañāṇaṃ. Mahāsīhanāde dasabalañāṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1821_1: catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ, aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇaṃ, catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ, pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1821_2: saṃyuttake āgatāni tesattati ñāṇāni, sattasattati ñāṇānīti evaṃ aññānipi anekāni
atk-abh02a:1821_3: ñāṇasahassāni – etaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ nāma. Idhāpi ñāṇabalameva adhippetaṃ ñāṇañhi akampiyaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:1822_0: Yehi balehi samannāgatoti yehi dasahi ñāṇabalehi upeto samupeto. Āsabhaṃ ṭhānanti
atk-abh02a:1822_1: seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ uttamaṭṭhānaṃ; āsabhā vā pubbabuddhā, tesaṃ ṭhānanti attho. Api ca
atk-abh02a:1822_2: gavasatajeṭṭhako usabho, gavasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho; vajasatajeṭṭhako vā usabho,
atk-abh02a:1822_3: vajasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho; sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko mahābhāravaho
atk-abh02a:1822_4: asanisatasaddehipi akampanīyo nisabho. So idha usabhoti adhippeto. Idampi hi tassa
atk-abh02a:1822_5: pariyāyavacanaṃ. Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ. Ṭhānanti catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā
atk-abh02a:1822_6: acalaṭṭhānaṃ. Idaṃ pana āsabhaṃ viyāti āsabhaṃ. Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho
atk-abh02a:1822_7: usabhabalena samannāgato catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh02a:1822_8: evaṃ tathāgatopi dasahi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ
atk-abh02a:1822_9: uppīḷetvā sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena
atk-abh02a:1822_10: tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ tiṭṭhamāno ca taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, upagacchati, na paccakkhāti,
atk-abh02a:1822_11: attani āropeti. Tena vuttaṃ “āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānātī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1823_0: Parisāsūti aṭṭhasu parisāsu. Sīhanādaṃ nadatīti seṭṭhanādaṃ abhītanādaṃ nadati, sīhanādasadisaṃ
atk-abh02a:1823_1: vā nādaṃ nadati. Ayamattho sīhanādasuttena dīpetabbo. Yathā vā sīho sahanato ca hananato
atk-abh02a:1823_2: ca sīhoti vuccati, evaṃ tathāgato lokadhammānaṃ sahanato parappavādānañca hananato
atk-abh02a:1823_3: sīhoti vuccati. Evaṃ vuttassa sīhassa nādaṃ sīhanādaṃ. Tattha yathā sīho sīhabalena
atk-abh02a:1823_4: samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati, evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi
atk-abh02a:1823_5: tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso “iti rūpa”ntiādinā
atk-abh02a:1823_6: nayena nānāvidhadesanāvilāsasampannaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati. Tena vuttaṃ “parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadatī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1824: Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetīti ettha brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ visuddhaṃ. Cakkasaddo ca panāyaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1827: Dhammacakke idha mato, tañca dvedhā vibhāvaye.
atk-abh02a:1828_0: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna”ntiādīsu hi ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1828_1: sampattiyaṃ dissati. “Heṭṭhā pādatalesu cakkāni jātānī”ti ettha lakkhaṇe. “Cakkaṃva
atk-abh02a:1828_2: vahato pada”nti ettha rathaṅge. “Catucakkaṃ navadvāra”nti ettha iriyāpathe. “Dadaṃ
atk-abh02a:1828_3: bhuñja mā ca pamādo, cakkaṃ pavattaya sabbapāṇina”nti ettha dāne. “Dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1828_4: pāturahosī”ti ettha ratanacakke. “Mayā pavattitaṃ cakka”nti ettha dhammacakke. “Icchāhatassa
atk-abh02a:1828_5: posassa cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”ti ettha uracakke. “Khurapariyantena cepi cakkenā”ti
atk-abh02a:1828_6: ettha paharaṇacakke. “Asanivicakka”nti ettha asanimaṇḍale. Idha panāyaṃ dhammacakke mato.
atk-abh02a:1829_0: Taṃ pana dhammacakkaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti – paṭivedhañāṇañca desanāñāṇañca. Tattha paññāpabhāvitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1829_1: attano ariyaphalāvahaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ; karuṇāpabhāvitaṃ sāvakānaṃ ariyaphalāvahaṃ
atk-abh02a:1829_2: desanāñāṇaṃ. Tattha paṭivedhañāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppannanti duvidhaṃ. Tañhi abhinikkhamanato
atk-abh02a:1829_3: yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma; tusitabhavanato vā yāva
atk-abh02a:1829_4: mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma; dīpaṅkarabyākaraṇato
atk-abh02a:1829_5: paṭṭhāya vā yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma. Desanāñāṇampi
atk-abh02a:1829_6: pavattamānaṃ pavattanti duvidhaṃ. Tañhi yāva aññākoṇḍaññassa sotāpattimaggā pavattamānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1829_7: phalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāma. Tesu paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ, desanāñāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ. Ubhayampi
atk-abh02a:1830_0: Idāni yehi dasahi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, yāni āditova
atk-abh02a:1830_1: “dasa tathāgatassa tathāgatabalānī”ti nikkhittāni, tāni vitthārato dassetuṃ katamāni
atk-abh02a:1830_2: dasa? Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānatotiādimāha. Tattha ṭhānañca ṭhānatoti kāraṇañca
atk-abh02a:1830_3: kāraṇato. Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttitāya uppajjati ceva
atk-abh02a:1830_4: pavattati ca, tasmā ṭhānanti vuccati. Taṃ bhagavā “ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1830_5: hetū paccayā uppādāya taṃ taṃ ṭhāna”nti ca ‘ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ na
atk-abh02a:1830_6: hetū na paccayā uppādāya taṃ taṃ aṭṭhāna’nti ca pajānanto ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca
atk-abh02a:1830_7: aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Yampīti yena ñāṇena. Idampi tathāgatassāti idampi
atk-abh02a:1830_8: ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ nāma hotīti attho. Evaṃ sabbapadesu yojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1831_0: Kammasamādānānanti samādiyitvā katānaṃ kusalākusalakammānaṃ; kammameva vā kammasamādānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1831_1: Ṭhānaso hetusoti paccayato ceva hetuto ca. Tattha gatiupadhikālapayogā vipākassa
atk-abh02a:1832_0: Sabbattha gāmininti sabbagatigāminiñca agatigāminiñca. Paṭipadanti maggaṃ. Yathābhūtaṃ
atk-abh02a:1832_1: pajānātīti bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu ‘imassa cetanā nirayagāminī
atk-abh02a:1832_2: bhavissati, imassa tiracchānayonigāminī’ti iminā nayena ekavatthusmimpi kusalākusalacetanāsaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1833_0: Anekadhātunti cakkhudhātuādīhi kāmadhātuādīhi vā dhātūhi bahudhātuṃ. Nānādhātunti
atk-abh02a:1833_1: tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ vilakkhaṇatāya nānappakāradhātuṃ. Lokanti khandhāyatanadhātulokaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1833_2: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti tāsaṃ tāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhati.
atk-abh02a:1835_0: Parasattānanti padhānasattānaṃ. Parapuggalānanti tato paresaṃ hīnasattānaṃ; ekatthameva
atk-abh02a:1835_1: vā etaṃ padadvayaṃ veneyyavasena pana dvedhā vuttaṃ. Indriyaparopariyattanti saddhādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1835_2: indriyānaṃ parabhāvañca aparabhāvañca vuḍḍhiñca hāniñcāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1836_0: Jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnanti paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ, “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1836_1: aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ, savitakkasavicārādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādhīnaṃ, paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiādīnañca
atk-abh02a:1836_2: navannaṃ anupubbasamāpattīnaṃ. Saṃkilesanti hānabhāgiyadhammaṃ. Vodānanti visesabhāgiyadhammaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1836_3: Vuṭṭhānanti yena kāraṇena jhānādīhi vuṭṭhahanti, taṃ kāraṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1839: Āsavānaṃ khayanti kāmāsavādīnaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ āsavanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1840_0: Imānīti yāni heṭṭhā “dasa tathāgatassa tathāgatabalānī”ti avoca, imāni tānīti appanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1840_1: karotīti. Evamettha anupubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ ñatvā idāni yasmā tathāgato paṭhamaṃyeva
atk-abh02a:1840_2: ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇena veneyyasattānaṃ āsavakkhayādhigamassa ceva anadhigamassa ca ṭhānāṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
atk-abh02a:1840_4: ca. Atha nesaṃ kammavipākañāṇena vipākāvaraṇābhāvaṃ passati, tihetukapaṭisandhidassanato.
atk-abh02a:1840_7: passati, dhātuvemattadassanato. Atha nesaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇena adhimuttiṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:1840_8: payogaṃ anādiyitvāpi adhimuttivasena dhammadesanatthaṃ. Athevaṃ diṭṭhādhimuttīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1840_9: yathāsatti yathābalaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇena indriyaparopariyattaṃ
atk-abh02a:1840_11: panete sace dūre honti, atha jhānādipariññāṇena jhānādīsu vasībhūtattā iddhivisesena
atk-abh02a:1840_12: khippaṃ upagacchati. Upagantvā ca nesaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena pubbajātibhāvanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1840_13: dibbacakkhānubhāvato pattabbena cetopariyañāṇena sampatticittavisesaṃ passanto āsavakkhayañāṇānubhāvena
atk-abh02a:1840_14: āsavakkhayagāminiyā paṭipadāya vigatasammohattā āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ deseti. Tasmā
atk-abh02a:1840_15: iminā anukkamena imāni dasabalāni vuttānīti veditabbāni. Ayaṃ tāva mātikāya atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh02a:1842_0: 761. Idāni yathānikkhittāya mātikāya “pañcaviññāṇā na hetumevā”tiādinā nayena āraddhe
atk-abh02a:1842_1: niddesavāre na hetumevāti sādhāraṇahetupaṭikkhepaniddeso. Tattha “hetuhetu, paccayahetu,
atk-abh02a:1842_2: uttamahetu, sādhāraṇahetūti catubbidho hetū”tiādinā nayena yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ
atk-abh02a:1842_3: sabbaṃ rūpakaṇḍe “sabbaṃ rūpaṃ na hetumevā”tiādīnaṃ atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva. Ahetukamevātiādīsu
atk-abh02a:1842_4: byañjanasandhivasena makāro veditabbo; ahetukā evāti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1842_5: Apica “hetū dhammā nahetū dhammā”tiādīsu dhammakoṭṭhāsesu pañcaviññāṇāni hetū dhammāti
atk-abh02a:1842_6: vā sahetukā dhammāti vā na honti. Ekantena pana na hetūyeva, ahetukā yevāti imānipi
atk-abh02a:1842_7: nayenettha sabbapadesu attho veditabbo. Abyākatamevāti padaṃ vipākābyākatavasena
atk-abh02a:1842_8: vuttaṃ. Sārammaṇamevāti olubbhārammaṇavasena. Paccayārammaṇaṃ olubbhārammaṇanti hi
atk-abh02a:1842_9: duvidhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne olubbhārammaṇameva dhuraṃ, paccayārammaṇampi
atk-abh02a:1842_10: labbhatiyeva. Acetasikamevāti padaṃ cittaṃ, rūpaṃ, nibbānanti tīsu acetasikesu cittameva
atk-abh02a:1842_12: pariyāpannā eva, no apariyāpannā. Lokato vaṭṭato na niyyantīti aniyyānikā. Uppannaṃ
atk-abh02a:1842_13: manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti rūpakaṇḍe cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ paccuppannāneva rūpādīni ārabbha
atk-abh02a:1842_15: chahi viññāṇehi viññeyya”nti vuttaṃ. Pañcaviññāṇā pana yasmā paccuppannāpi cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1842_16: ārammaṇā na honti, manoviññāṇasseva honti, tasmā “manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1842_17: Aniccamevāti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccāyeva. Jarābhibhūtamevāti jarāya abhibhūtattā jarābhibhūtā eva.
atk-abh02a:1843: 762. Uppannavatthukā uppannārammaṇāti anāgatapaṭikkhepo. Na hi te anāgatesu vatthārammaṇesu uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1844_0: Purejātavatthukā purejātārammaṇāti sahuppattipaṭikkhepo. Na hi te sahuppannaṃ vatthuṃ
atk-abh02a:1844_1: vā ārammaṇaṃ vā paṭicca uppajjanti, sayaṃ pana pacchājātā hutvā purejātesu vatthārammaṇesu uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1845_0: Ajjhattikavatthukāti ajjhattajjhattavasena vuttaṃ. Tāni hi ajjhattike pañca pasāde
atk-abh02a:1845_1: vatthuṃ katvā uppajjanti. Bāhirārammaṇāti bāhirarūpādiārammaṇā. Tattha catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ
atk-abh02a:1845_2: – pañcaviññāṇā hi pasādavatthukattā ajjhattikā ajjhattikavatthukā, manoviññāṇaṃ hadayarūpaṃ
atk-abh02a:1845_3: vatthuṃ katvā uppajjanakāle ajjhattikaṃ bāhiravatthukaṃ, pañcaviññāṇasampayuttā tayo
atk-abh02a:1845_4: khandhā bāhirā ajjhattikavatthukā, manoviññāṇasampayuttā tayo khandhā hadayarūpaṃ
atk-abh02a:1846: Asambhinnavatthukāti aniruddhavatthukā. Na hi te niruddhaṃ atītaṃ vatthuṃ paṭicca uppajjanti. Asambhinnārammaṇatāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1847_0: Aññaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu ca ārammaṇañcātiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇassa hi aññaṃ vatthu,
atk-abh02a:1847_1: aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Aññaṃ sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotapasādādīsu aññataraṃ
atk-abh02a:1847_2: vatthuṃ, saddādīsu vā aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kappato kappaṃ gantvāpi na uppajjati;
atk-abh02a:1847_3: cakkhupasādameva pana vatthuṃ katvā rūpañca ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati. Evamassa vatthupi
atk-abh02a:1847_4: dvārampi ārammaṇampi nibaddhaṃ, aññaṃ vatthuṃ vā dvāraṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ vā na saṅkamati,
atk-abh02a:1847_5: nibaddhavatthu nibaddhadvāraṃ nibaddhārammaṇameva hutvā uppajjati. Sotaviññāṇādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1848_0: 763. Na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhontīti ettha aññamaññassa cakkhu sotassa,
atk-abh02a:1848_1: sotaṃ vā cakkhussāti evaṃ ekaṃ ekassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhotīti attho. Sace
atk-abh02a:1848_2: hi nīlādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ samodhānetvā sotindriyassa upaneyya ‘iṅgha tāva naṃ
atk-abh02a:1848_3: vavatthāpehi vibhāvehi – kiṃ nāmetaṃ ārammaṇa’nti, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vināpi mukhena
atk-abh02a:1848_4: attano dhammatāya evaṃ vadeyya – ‘are andhabāla, vassasatampi vassasahassampi paridhāvamāno
atk-abh02a:1848_5: aññatra mayā kuhiṃ etassa jānanakaṃ labhissasi; āhara naṃ cakkhupasāde upanehi; ahametaṃ
atk-abh02a:1848_6: ārammaṇaṃ jānissāmi – yadi vā nīlaṃ yadi vā pītakaṃ. Na hi eso aññassa visayo; mayhameveso
atk-abh02a:1848_7: visayo’ti. Sesaviññāṇesupi eseva nayo. Evamete aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhonti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1850: Manasikarontassāti āvajjaneneva manasikarontassa. Etāni hi cittāni āvajjanena samannāhaṭakāle manasikatakāleyeva ca uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1851: Na abbokiṇṇāti aññena viññāṇena abbokiṇṇā nirantarāva nuppajjanti. Etena tesaṃ anantaratā paṭikkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1852: 765. Na apubbaṃ acarimanti etena sabbesampi sahuppatti paṭikkhittā. Na aññamaññassa samanantarāti etena samanantaratā paṭikkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1853_0: 766. Āvaṭṭanā vātiādīni cattāripi āvajjanasseva nāmāni. Tañhi bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭanato
atk-abh02a:1853_1: āvaṭṭanā, tasseva ābhujanato ābhogo, rūpādīnaṃ samannāharaṇato samannāhāro, tesaṃyeva
atk-abh02a:1853_2: manasikaraṇato manasikāroti vuccati. Evamettha saṅkhepato pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ āvajjanaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1854: Na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātīti “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ekampi kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na paṭivijānāti.
atk-abh02a:1855_0: Aññatra abhinipātamattāti ṭhapetvā rūpādīnaṃ abhinipātamattaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
atk-abh02a:1855_1: supaṇḍitopi puriso, ṭhapetvā āpāthagatāni rūpādīni, aññaṃ kusalākusalesu ekadhammampi
atk-abh02a:1855_2: pañcahi viññāṇehi na paṭivijānāti. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ panettha dassanamattameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:1856_0: Manodhātuyāpīti sampaṭicchanamanodhātuyāpi. Sampiṇḍanattho cettha pikāro. Tasmā manodhātuyāpi
atk-abh02a:1856_1: tato parāhi manoviññāṇadhātūhipīti sabbehipi pañcadvārikaviññāṇehi na kañci kusalākusalaṃ
atk-abh02a:1857_0: Na kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappetītiādīsupi eseva nayo. Na hi pañcadvārikaviññāṇehi gamanādīsu
atk-abh02a:1857_1: kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappeti, na kāyakammaṃ na vacīkammaṃ paṭṭhapeti, na kusalākusalaṃ
atk-abh02a:1857_2: dhammaṃ samādiyati, na samādhiṃ samāpajjati lokiyaṃ vā lokuttaraṃ vā, na samādhito
atk-abh02a:1857_3: vuṭṭhāti lokiyā vā lokuttarā vā, na bhavato cavati, na bhavantare upapajjati. Sabbampi
atk-abh02a:1857_5: hoti, na pañcadvārikenāti sabbassāpetassa kiccassa karaṇe sahajavanakāni vīthicittāni
atk-abh02a:1857_6: paṭikkhittāni. Yathā cetesaṃ etāni kiccāni natthi, evaṃ niyāmokkamanādīnipi. Na hi
atk-abh02a:1857_7: pañcadvārikajavanena micchattaniyāmaṃ okkamati, na sammattaniyāmaṃ; na cetaṃ javanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1857_8: nāmagottamārabbha javati, na kasiṇādipaṇṇattiṃ; na lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena
atk-abh02a:1857_9: pavattati, na vuṭṭhānagāminībalavavipassanāvasena; na rūpārūpadhamme ārabbha javati,
atk-abh02a:1857_10: na nibbānaṃ; na cetena saddhiṃ paṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ uppajjati, na abhiññāñāṇaṃ, na sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1857_11: na paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ, na sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Sabbopi panesa pabhedo manodvārikajavaneyeva labbhati.
atk-abh02a:1858_0: Na supati na paṭibujjhati na supinaṃ passatīti sabbenāpi ca pañcadvārikacittena neva
atk-abh02a:1858_1: niddaṃ okkamati, na niddāyati, na paṭibujjhati, na kiñca supinaṃ passatīti imesu
atk-abh02a:1858_2: tīsu ṭhānesu saha javanena vīthicittaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1859_0: Niddāyantassa hi mahāvaṭṭiṃ jāletvā dīpe cakkhusamīpe upanīte paṭhamaṃ cakkhudvārikaṃ
atk-abh02a:1859_1: āvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ na āvaṭṭeti, manodvārikameva āvaṭṭeti. Atha javanaṃ javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ
atk-abh02a:1859_2: otarati. Dutiyavāre cakkhudvārikaṃ āvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti. Tato cakkhuviññāṇādīni
atk-abh02a:1859_3: javanapariyosānāni pavattanti. Tadanantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ pavattati. Tatiyavāre manodvārikaāvajjanena
atk-abh02a:1859_4: bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite manodvārikajavanaṃ javati. Tena cittena ñatvā ‘kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1860_0: Tathā niddāyantassa kaṇṇasamīpe tūriyesu paggahitesu, ghānasamīpe sugandhesu vā duggandhesu
atk-abh02a:1860_1: vā pupphesu upanītesu, mukhe sappimhi vā phāṇite vā pakkhitte, piṭṭhiyaṃ pāṇinā pahāre
atk-abh02a:1860_2: dinne paṭhamaṃ sotadvārikādīni āvajjanāni bhavaṅgaṃ na āvaṭṭenti, manodvārikameva
atk-abh02a:1860_3: āvaṭṭeti. Atha javanaṃ javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. Dutiyavāre sotadvārikādīni āvajjanāni
atk-abh02a:1860_4: bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭenti. Tato sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇādīni javanapariyosānāni pavattanti.
atk-abh02a:1860_5: Tadanantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ pavattati. Tatiyavāre manodvārikaāvajjanena bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite
atk-abh02a:1860_6: manodvārikajavanaṃ javati. Tena cittena ñatvā ‘kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne saddo – saṅkhasaddo,
atk-abh02a:1860_7: bherisaddo’ti vā ‘kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne gandho – mūlagandho, sāragandho’ti vā ‘kiṃ
atk-abh02a:1860_8: idaṃ mayhaṃ mukhe pakkhittarasaṃ – sappīti vā phāṇita’nti vā ‘kenamhi piṭṭhiyaṃ pahato,
atk-abh02a:1860_9: atithaddho me pahāro’ti vā vattāro honti. Evaṃ manodvārikajavaneneva paṭibujjhati,
atk-abh02a:1860_10: na pañcadvārikena. Supinampi teneva passati, na pañcadvārikena.
atk-abh02a:1861_0: Tañca panetaṃ supinaṃ passanto catūhi kāraṇehi passati – dhātukkhobhato vā anubhūtapubbato
atk-abh02a:1861_1: vā devatopasaṃhārato vā pubbanimittato vāti. Tattha pittādīnaṃ khobhakaraṇapaccayayogena
atk-abh02a:1861_2: khubhitadhātuko ‘dhātukkhobhato’ supinaṃ passati. Passanto ca nānāvidhaṃ supinaṃ
atk-abh02a:1861_3: passati – pabbatā patanto viya, ākāsena gacchanto viya, vāḷamigahatthicorādīhi anubaddho
atk-abh02a:1861_4: viya ca hoti. ‘Anubhūtapubbato’ passanto pubbe anubhūtapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ passati.
atk-abh02a:1861_5: ‘Devatopasaṃhārato’ passantassa devatā atthakāmatāya vā anatthakāmatāya vā atthāya
atk-abh02a:1861_6: vā anatthāya vā nānāvidhāni ārammaṇāni upasaṃharanti. So tāsaṃ devatānaṃ ānubhāvena
atk-abh02a:1861_7: tāni ārammaṇāni passati. Pubbanimittato passanto puññāpuññavasena uppajjitukāmassa
atk-abh02a:1861_8: atthassa vā anatthassa vā pubbanimittabhūtaṃ supinaṃ passati bodhisattamātā viya
atk-abh02a:1861_9: puttapaṭilābhanimittaṃ, bodhisatto viya pañca mahāsupine, kosalarājā viya ca soḷasa supineti.
atk-abh02a:1862_0: Tattha yaṃ dhātukkhobhato anubhūtapubbato ca supinaṃ passati, na taṃ saccaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1862_1: Yaṃ devatopasaṃhārato passati, taṃ saccaṃ vā hoti alikaṃ vā. Kuddhā hi devatā upāyena
atk-abh02a:1862_2: vināsetukāmā viparītampi katvā dassenti. Tatridaṃ vatthu – rohaṇe kira nāgamahāvihāre
atk-abh02a:1862_3: mahāthero bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anapaloketvāva ekaṃ nāgarukkhaṃ chindāpesi. Rukkhe adhivatthā
atk-abh02a:1862_4: devatā therassa kuddhā paṭhamameva naṃ palobhetvā pacchā ‘ito te sattadivasamatthake
atk-abh02a:1862_5: upaṭṭhāko rājā marissatī’ti supine ārocesi. Thero naṃ kathaṃ āharitvā rājorodhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1862_6: ācikkhi. Tā ekappahāreneva mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsu. Rājā ‘kiṃ eta’nti pucchi. Tā ‘evaṃ
atk-abh02a:1862_7: therena vutta’nti ārocayiṃsu. Rājā divase gaṇāpetvā sattāhe vītivatte kujjhitvā therassa
atk-abh02a:1863_0: Yaṃ pana pubbanimittato passati taṃ ekantasaccameva hoti. Etesañca catunnaṃ mūlakāraṇānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1863_1: saṃsaggabhedatopi supinabhedo hotiyeva. Tañca panetaṃ catubbidhaṃ supinaṃ sekkhaputhujjanāva
atk-abh02a:1863_2: passanti appahīnavipallāsattā; asekkhā na passanti pahīnavipallāsattā.
atk-abh02a:1864_0: Kiṃ pana taṃ passanto sutto passati, paṭibuddho? Udāhu neva sutto passati na paṭibuddhoti?
atk-abh02a:1864_1: Kiñcettha yadi tāva sutto passati, abhidhammavirodho āpajjati. Bhavaṅgacittena hi
atk-abh02a:1864_2: supati. Tañca rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṃ rāgādisampayuttaṃ vā na hoti. Supinaṃ passantassa
atk-abh02a:1864_3: ca īdisāni cittāni uppajjanti. Atha paṭibuddho passati, vinayavirodho āpajjati. Yañhi
atk-abh02a:1864_4: paṭibuddho passati, taṃ sabbohārikacittena passati. Sabbohārikacittena ca kate vītikkame
atk-abh02a:1864_5: anāpatti nāma natthi. Supinaṃ passantena pana kate vītikkame ekantaṃ anāpatti eva.
atk-abh02a:1864_6: Atha neva sutto na paṭibuddho passati, na supinaṃ nāma passati. Evañhi sati supinassa
atk-abh02a:1864_7: abhāvova āpajjati? Na abhāvo. Kasmā? Yasmā kapimiddhapareto passati. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ
atk-abh02a:1864_9: yutto. Yathā hi makkaṭassa niddā lahuparivattā hoti, evaṃ yā niddā punappunaṃ kusalādicittavokiṇṇattā
atk-abh02a:1864_10: lahuparivattā; yassā pavattiyaṃ punappunaṃ bhavaṅgato uttaraṇaṃ hoti, tāya yutto
atk-abh02a:1864_11: supinaṃ passati. Tenāyaṃ supino kusalopi hoti akusalopi abyākatopi 386. Tattha supinante
atk-abh02a:1864_13: akusalo, dvīhi antehi mutto āvajjanatadārammaṇakkhaṇe abyākatoti veditabbo. Supineneva
atk-abh02a:1864_14: ‘diṭṭhaṃ viya me, sutaṃ viya me’ti kathanakālepi abyākatoyeva.
atk-abh02a:1865_0: Kiṃ pana supine kataṃ kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ savipākaṃ avipākanti? Savipākaṃ; dubbalattā
atk-abh02a:1865_1: pana paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ na sakkoti, dinnāya aññakammena paṭisandhiyā pavatte vedanīyaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1866_0: Evaṃ yāthāvakavatthuvibhāvanā paññāti pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ na hetvaṭṭho yāthāvaṭṭho.
atk-abh02a:1866_1: Taṃ yāthāvaṭṭhaṃ vatthuṃ vibhāvetīti yāthāvakavatthuvibhāvanā. Tathā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1866_2: ahetukaṭṭho, jarābhibhūtaṭṭho, na supinaṃ passanaṭṭho, yāthāvaṭṭho. Taṃ yāthāvaṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1866_3: vatthuṃ vibhāvetīti yāthāvakavatthuvibhāvanā. Iti yā heṭṭhā “yāthāvakavatthuvibhāvanā
atk-abh02a:1866_4: paññā”ti mātikāya nikkhittā, sā evaṃ yāthāvakavatthuvibhāvanā paññāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1866_5: Tassā eva ca vasena evaṃ ekavidhena ñāṇavatthūti evaṃ ekekakoṭṭhāsena ñāṇagaṇanā
atk-abh02a:1869_0: 767. Duvidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese catūsu bhūmīsu kusaleti sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ catubhūmakakusalapaññā.
atk-abh02a:1869_1: Paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge vuttesu pañcasu atthesu attano attano bhūmipariyāpannaṃ vipākasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh02a:1869_2: atthaṃ jāpeti janeti pavattetīti atthajāpikā. Arahato abhiññaṃ uppādentassa samāpattiṃ
atk-abh02a:1869_3: uppādentassa kiriyābyākateti abhiññāya ceva samāpattiyā ca parikammasamaye kāmāvacarakiriyapaññā.
atk-abh02a:1869_4: Sā hi abhiññāsamāpattipabhedaṃ kiriyasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jāpeti janeti pavattetīti atthajāpikā
atk-abh02a:1869_5: paññāti vuttā. Ayaṃ pana aparopi pāḷimuttako aṭṭhakathānayo – yāpi hi purimā kāmāvacarakiriyā
atk-abh02a:1869_6: pacchimāya kāmāvacarakiriyāya anantarādivasena paccayo hoti, sāpi taṃ kiriyatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1869_7: jāpetīti atthajāpikā paññā nāma. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaresupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1870_0: Dutiyapadaniddese catūsu bhūmīsu vipāketi kāmāvacaravipāke paññā sahajātādipaccayavasena
atk-abh02a:1870_1: kāmāvacaravipākatthaṃ jāpetvā ṭhitāti jāpitatthā. Rūpāvacarādivipākapaññāsupi eseva
atk-abh02a:1870_2: nayo. Sabbāpi vā esā attano attano kāraṇehi jāpitā janitā pavattitā sayampi atthabhūtātipi
atk-abh02a:1870_3: jāpitatthā. Arahato uppannāya abhiññāya uppannāya samāpattiyāti vuttakiriyapaññāyapi
atk-abh02a:1870_4: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana aparopi pāḷimuttako aṭṭhakathānayo – kāmāvacarakiriyapaññāpi
atk-abh02a:1870_5: hi sahajātādivasena kāmāvacarakiriyasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jāpetvā ṭhitāti jāpitatthā.
atk-abh02a:1870_6: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakiriyapaññāsupi eseva nayo. Sabbāpi vā esā attano attano kāraṇehi
atk-abh02a:1870_7: jāpitā janitā pavattitā sayañca atthabhūtātipi jāpitatthā. Sesamettha sabbaṃ dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1873_0: 768. Tividhena ñāṇavatthuniddese yogavihitesūti yogo vuccati paññā; paññāvihitesu
atk-abh02a:1873_1: paññāpariṇāmitesūti attho. Kammāyatanesūti ettha kammameva kammāyatanaṃ; atha vā
atk-abh02a:1873_2: kammañca taṃ āyatanañca ājīvādīnantipi kammāyatanaṃ. Sippāyatanesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1873_3: Tattha duvidhaṃ kammaṃ – hīnañca ukkaṭṭhañca. Tattha hīnaṃ nāma vaḍḍhakīkammaṃ, pupphachaḍḍakakammanti
atk-abh02a:1873_4: evamādi. Ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma kasi, vaṇijjā, gorakkhanti evamādi. Sippampi duvidhaṃ hīnañca
atk-abh02a:1873_5: ukkaṭṭhañca. Tattha hīnaṃ sippaṃ nāma naḷakārasippaṃ, pesakārasippaṃ, kumbhakārasippaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1873_6: cammakārasippaṃ, nhāpitasippanti evamādi. Ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma sippaṃ muddā, gaṇanā, lekhañcāti
atk-abh02a:1873_7: evamādi vijjāva vijjāṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ dhammikameva gahitaṃ. Nāgamaṇḍalaparittasadisaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1873_9: ācariya, sippaṃ sikkhitu”nti sippāyatane paviṭṭhattā na gahitāni.
atk-abh02a:1874_0: Tattha eko paṇḍito manussānaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya attano ca dhammatāya gehapāsādayānanāvādīni
atk-abh02a:1874_1: uppādeti. So hi ‘ime manussā vasanaṭṭhānena vinā dukkhitā’ti hitakiriyāya ṭhatvā
atk-abh02a:1874_3: pāsāde karoti, ‘yāne asati anusañcaraṇaṃ nāma dukkha’nti jaṅghākilamathapaṭivinodanatthāya
atk-abh02a:1874_4: vayhasakaṭasandamānikādīni uppādeti, ‘nāvāya asati samuddādīsu sañcāro nāma natthī’ti
atk-abh02a:1874_5: nānappakāraṃ nāvaṃ uppādeti. So sabbampetaṃ neva aññehi kayiramānaṃ passati, na kataṃ
atk-abh02a:1874_6: uggaṇhāti, na kathentānaṃ suṇāti, attano pana dhammatāya cintāya karoti. Paññavatā
atk-abh02a:1874_7: hi attano dhammatāya katampi aññehi uggaṇhitvā karontehi katasadisameva hoti. Ayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1875_0: Ukkaṭṭhakammepi ‘kasikamme asati manussānaṃ jīvitaṃ na pavattatī’ti eko paṇḍito manussānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1875_1: phāsuvihāratthāya yuganaṅgalādīni kasibhaṇḍāni uppādeti; tathā nānappakāraṃ vāṇijakammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1875_2: gorakkhañca uppādeti. So sabbampetaṃ neva aññehi kariyamānaṃ passati…pe… katasadisameva
atk-abh02a:1876_0: Duvidhepi pana sippāyatane eko paṇḍito manussānaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya naḷakārasippādīni
atk-abh02a:1876_1: hīnasippāni, hatthamuddāya gaṇanasaṅkhātaṃ muddaṃ, acchinnakasaṅkhātaṃ gaṇanaṃ, mātikāppabhedakādibhedañca
atk-abh02a:1876_2: lekhaṃ uppādeti. So sabbampetaṃ neva aññehi kariyamānaṃ passati…pe… katasadisameva
atk-abh02a:1877_0: Ekacco pana paṇḍito amanussasarīsapādīhi upaddutānaṃ manussānaṃ tikicchanatthāya
atk-abh02a:1877_1: dhammikāni nāgamaṇḍalamantādīni vijjāṭṭhānāni uppādeti, tāni neva aññehi kariyamānāni
atk-abh02a:1877_2: passati, na katāni uggaṇhāti, na kathentānaṃ suṇāti, attano pana dhammatāya cintāya
atk-abh02a:1877_3: karoti. Paññavatā hi attano dhammatāya katampi aññehi uggaṇhitvā karontehi katasadisameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:1878_0: Kammassakataṃ vāti “idaṃ kammaṃ sattānaṃ sakaṃ, idaṃ no saka”nti evaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1878_1: Saccānulomikaṃ vāti vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Tañhi catunnaṃ saccānaṃ anulomanato saccānulomikanti
atk-abh02a:1878_2: vuccati. Idānissa pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ rūpaṃ aniccanti vātiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca
atk-abh02a:1878_3: aniccalakkhaṇameva āgataṃ, na dukkhalakkhaṇaanattalakkhaṇāni, atthavasena pana āgatānevāti
atk-abh02a:1878_4: daṭṭhabbāni – yañhi aniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattāti.
atk-abh02a:1879_0: Yaṃ evarūpinti yaṃ evaṃ heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ anulomikaṃ. Khantintiādīni sabbāni
atk-abh02a:1879_1: paññāvevacanāneva. Sā hi heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ kammāyatanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ kāraṇānaṃ apaccanīkadassanena
atk-abh02a:1879_2: anulometīti anulomikā. Tathā sattānaṃ hitacariyāya anulometi, maggasaccassa anulometi,
atk-abh02a:1879_3: paramatthasaccassa nibbānassa anulomanato anulometītipi anulomikā. Sabbānipi etāni
atk-abh02a:1879_4: kāraṇāni khamati sahati daṭṭhuṃ sakkotīti khanti, passatīti diṭṭhi, rocetīti ruci,
atk-abh02a:1879_5: mudatīti mudi, pekkhatīti pekkhā. Sabbepissā te kammāyatanādayo dhammā nijjhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1879_6: khamanti, visesato ca pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātā dhammā punappunaṃ aniccadukkhānattavasena
atk-abh02a:1880_0: Parato assutvā paṭilabhatīti aññassa upadesavacanaṃ assutvā sayameva cintento paṭilabhati.
atk-abh02a:1880_1: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ cintāmayā paññā nāma vuccati. Sā panesā na yesaṃ kesañci uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1880_2: abhiññātānaṃ pana mahāsattānameva uppajjati. Tatthāpi saccānulomikañāṇaṃ dvinnaṃyeva
atk-abh02a:1880_3: bodhisattānaṃ uppajjati. Sesapaññā sabbesampi pūritapāramīnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ uppajjatīti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1881_0: Parato sutvā paṭilabhatīti ettha kammāyatanādīni parena kariyamānāni vā katāni vā
atk-abh02a:1881_1: disvāpi yassa kassaci kathayamānassa vacanaṃ sutvāpi ācariyassa santike uggahetvāpi
atk-abh02a:1881_2: paṭiladdhā sabbā parato sutvāyeva paṭiladdhā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1882: Samāpannassāti samāpattisamaṅgissa; antosamāpattiyaṃ pavattā paññā bhāvanāmayā nāmāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1883_0: 769. Dānaṃ ārabbhāti dānaṃ paṭicca; dānacetanāpaccayāti attho. Dānādhigacchāti dānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1883_1: adhigacchantassa; pāpuṇantassāti attho. Yā uppajjatīti yā evaṃ dānacetanāsampayuttā
atk-abh02a:1883_2: paññā uppajjati, ayaṃ dānamayā paññā nāma. Sā panesā ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cintentassa,
atk-abh02a:1883_3: dānaṃ dentassa, dānaṃ datvā taṃ paccavekkhantassa pubbacetanā, muñcacetanā, aparacetanāti
atk-abh02a:1884_0: Sīlaṃ ārabbha sīlādhigacchāti idhāpi sīlacetanāsampayuttāva sīlamayā paññāti adhippetā.
atk-abh02a:1884_1: Ayampi ‘sīlaṃ pūressāmī’ti cintentassa, sīlaṃ pūrentassa, sīlaṃ pūretvā taṃ paccavekkhantassa
atk-abh02a:1884_2: pubbacetanā, muñcacetanā, aparacetanāti tividheneva uppajjati. Bhāvanāmayā heṭṭhā vuttāyeva.
atk-abh02a:1885_0: 770. Adhisīlapaññādīsu sīlādīni duvidhena veditabbāni – sīlaṃ, adhisīlaṃ; cittaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1885_1: adhicittaṃ; paññā, adhipaññāti. Tattha “uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1885_2: ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā”ti imāya tantiyā saṅgahitavasena pañcapi
atk-abh02a:1885_3: sīlāni dasapi sīlāni sīlaṃ nāma. Tañhi tathāgate uppannepi anuppannepi hoti. Anuppanne
atk-abh02a:1885_4: ke paññāpentīti? Tāpasaparibbājakā, sabbaññubodhisattā, cakkavattirājāno ca paññāpenti.
atk-abh02a:1885_5: Uppanne sammāsambuddhe bhikkhusaṅgho, bhikkhunīsaṅgho, upāsakā, upāsikāyo ca paññāpenti.
atk-abh02a:1885_6: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ pana sabbasīlehi adhikaṃ uppanneyeva tathāgate uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1885_7: no anuppanne. Sabbaññubuddhāyeva ca naṃ paññāpenti. “Imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ vītikkame
atk-abh02a:1885_8: idaṃ nāma hotī”ti paññāpanañhi aññesaṃ avisayo, buddhānaṃyeva esa visayo, buddhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1885_9: balaṃ. Iti yasmā pātimokkhasaṃvaro adhisīlaṃ, tasmā taṃ adhisīlapaññaṃ dassetuṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ
atk-abh02a:1886_0: Heṭṭhā vuttāya eva pana tantiyā saṅgahitavasena vaṭṭapādikā aṭṭha samāpattiyo cittaṃ
atk-abh02a:1886_1: nāma. Tañhi tathāgate uppannepi hoti anuppannepi. Anuppanne ke nibbattentīti? Tāpasaparibbājakā
atk-abh02a:1886_2: ceva sabbaññubodhisattā ca cakkavattirājāno ca. Uppanne bhagavati visesatthikā bhikkhuādayopi
atk-abh02a:1886_3: nibbattentiyeva. Vipassanāpādikā pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo sabbacittehi adhikā, uppanneyeva
atk-abh02a:1886_4: tathāgate uppajjanti, no anuppanne. Sabbaññubuddhā eva ca etā paññāpenti. Iti yasmā
atk-abh02a:1886_5: aṭṭha samāpattiyo adhicittaṃ, tasmā adhicittapaññaṃ dassetuṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ
atk-abh02a:1887_0: Heṭṭhā vuttāya eva pana tantiyā saṅgahitavasena kammassakatañāṇaṃ paññā nāma. Tañhi
atk-abh02a:1887_1: tathāgate uppannepi hoti anuppannepi. Anuppanne velāmadānavessantaradānādivasena
atk-abh02a:1887_2: uppajjati; uppanne tena ñāṇena mahādānaṃ pavattentānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi. Maggaphalapaññā
atk-abh02a:1887_3: pana sabbapaññāhi adhikā, uppanneyeva tathāgate vitthārikā hutvā pavattati, no anuppanne.
atk-abh02a:1887_4: Iti yasmā maggaphalapaññā adhipaññā, tasmā atirekapaññāya paññaṃ dassetuṃ catūsu
atk-abh02a:1888_0: Tattha siyā – sīlaṃ, adhisīlaṃ; cittaṃ, adhicittaṃ; paññā, adhipaññāti imesu chasu
atk-abh02a:1888_1: koṭṭhāsesu vipassanā paññā katarasannissitāti? Adhipaññāsannissitā. Tasmā yathā omakatarappamāṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1888_2: chattaṃ vā dhajaṃ vā upādāya atirekappamāṇaṃ atichattaṃ atidhajoti vuccati, evamidampi
atk-abh02a:1888_3: pañcasīlaṃ dasasīlaṃ upādāya pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ ‘adhisīlaṃ’ nāma; vaṭṭapādikā
atk-abh02a:1888_4: aṭṭha samāpattiyo upādāya vipassanāpādikā aṭṭha samāpattiyo ‘adhicittaṃ’ nāma, kammassakatapaññaṃ
atk-abh02a:1888_5: upādāya vipassanāpaññā ca maggapaññā ca phalapaññā ca ‘adhipaññā’ nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1889_0: 771. Āyakosallādiniddese yasmā āyoti vuḍḍhi, sā anatthahānito atthuppattito ca duvidhā;
atk-abh02a:1889_1: apāyoti avuḍḍhi, sāpi atthahānito anatthuppattito ca duvidhā; tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh02a:1889_2: ime dhamme manasikarototiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuccatīti yā imesaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ anuppattippahānesu
atk-abh02a:1889_3: kusaladhammānañca uppattiṭṭhitīsu paññā – idaṃ āyakosallaṃ nāma vuccati. Yā panesā
atk-abh02a:1889_5: – idaṃ apāyakosallaṃ nāmāti attho. Āyakosallaṃ tāva paññā hotu; apāyakosallaṃ kathaṃ
atk-abh02a:1889_6: paññā nāma jātāti? Paññavāyeva hi ‘mayhaṃ evaṃ manasikaroto anuppannā kusalā dhammā
atk-abh02a:1889_7: nuppajjanti uppannā ca nirujjhanti; anuppannā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā
atk-abh02a:1889_8: pavaḍḍhantī’ti pajānāti. So evaṃ ñatvā anuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppajjituṃ
atk-abh02a:1889_9: na deti, uppanne pajahati; anuppanne kusale uppādeti, uppanne bhāvanāpāripūriṃ pāpeti.
atk-abh02a:1889_10: Evaṃ apāyakosallampi paññā evāti veditabbaṃ. Sabbāpi tatrūpāyā paññā upāyakosallanti
atk-abh02a:1889_11: idaṃ pana accāyikakicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanatthaṃ ṭhānuppattiyakāraṇajānanavaseneva
atk-abh02a:1892_0: 793. Catubbidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese atthi dinnantiādīsu dinnapaccayā phalaṃ atthīti
atk-abh02a:1892_1: iminā upāyena attho veditabbo. Idaṃ vuccatīti yaṃ ñāṇaṃ ‘idaṃ kammaṃ sakaṃ, idaṃ
atk-abh02a:1892_2: no saka’nti jānāti – idaṃ kammassakatañāṇaṃ nāma vuccatīti attho. Tattha tividhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1892_3: kāyaduccaritaṃ, catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ, tividhaṃ manoduccaritanti idaṃ na sakakammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1892_4: nāma. Tīsu dvāresu dasavidhampi sucaritaṃ sakakammaṃ nāma. Attano vāpi hotu parassa
atk-abh02a:1892_5: vā sabbampi akusalaṃ na sakakammaṃ nāma. Kasmā? Atthabhañjanato anatthajananato ca.
atk-abh02a:1892_6: Attano vā hotu parassa vā sabbampi kusalaṃ sakakammaṃ nāma. Kasmā? Anatthabhañjanato
atk-abh02a:1892_7: atthajananato ca. Evaṃ jānanasamatthe imasmiṃ kammassakatañāṇe ṭhatvā bahuṃ dānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1892_8: datvā sīlaṃ pūretvā uposathaṃ samādiyitvā sukhena sukhaṃ sampattiyā sampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-abh02a:1892_9: nibbānaṃ pattānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo natthi. Yathā hi sadhano puriso pañcasu sakaṭasatesu
atk-abh02a:1892_10: sappimadhuphāṇitādīni ceva loṇatilataṇḍulādīni ca āropetvā kantāramaggaṃ paṭipanno
atk-abh02a:1892_11: kenacideva karaṇīyena atthe uppanne sabbesaṃ upakaraṇānaṃ gahitattā na cinteti, na
atk-abh02a:1892_12: paritassati, sukheneva khemantaṃ pāpuṇāti; evameva imasmimpi kammassakatañāṇe ṭhatvā
atk-abh02a:1892_13: bahuṃ dānaṃ datvā…pe… nibbānaṃ pattānaṃ gaṇanapatho natthi. Ṭhapetvā saccānulomikaṃ
atk-abh02a:1892_14: ñāṇanti maggasaccassa paramatthasaccassa ca anulomanato saccānulomikanti laddhanāmaṃ
atk-abh02a:1892_15: vipassanāñāṇaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā sabbāpi sāsavā kusalā paññā kammassakatañāṇamevāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1893: 794. Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇanti ettha ekameva maggañāṇaṃ catūsu saccesu ekapaṭivedhavasena catūsu ṭhānesu saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1894_0: 796. Dhamme ñāṇanti ettha maggapaññā tāva catunnaṃ saccānaṃ ekapaṭivedhavasena dhamme
atk-abh02a:1894_1: ñāṇaṃ nāma hotu; phalapaññā kathaṃ dhamme ñāṇaṃ nāmāti? Nirodhasaccavasena. Duvidhāpi
atk-abh02a:1894_2: hesā paññā aparappaccaye atthapaccakkhe ariyasaccadhamme kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca
atk-abh02a:1894_3: pavattattā dhamme ñāṇanti veditabbā. So iminā dhammenāti ettha maggañāṇaṃ dhammagocarattā
atk-abh02a:1894_4: gocaravohārena dhammoti vuttaṃ, upayogatthe vā karaṇavacanaṃ; imaṃ dhammaṃ ñātenāti
atk-abh02a:1894_5: attho; catusaccadhammaṃ jānitvā ṭhitena maggañāṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Diṭṭhenāti dassanena;
atk-abh02a:1894_6: dhammaṃ passitvā ṭhitenāti attho. Pattenāti cattāri ariyasaccāni patvā ṭhitattā dhammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1894_7: pattena. Viditenāti maggañāṇena cattāri ariyasaccāni viditāni pākaṭāni katāni. Tasmā
atk-abh02a:1894_8: taṃ dhammaṃ viditaṃ nāma hoti. Tena viditadhammena. Pariyogāḷhenāti catusaccadhammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1894_9: pariyogāhetvā ṭhitena. Nayaṃ netīti atīte ca anāgate ca nayaṃ neti harati peseti.
atk-abh02a:1894_10: Idaṃ pana na maggañāṇassa kiccaṃ, paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa kiccaṃ. Satthārā pana maggañāṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1894_11: atītānāgate nayaṃ nayanasadisaṃ kataṃ. Kasmā? Maggamūlakattā. Bhāvitamaggassa hi
atk-abh02a:1894_12: paccavekkhaṇā nāma hoti. Tasmā satthā maggañāṇameva nayaṃ nayanasadisaṃ akāsi. Apica
atk-abh02a:1894_13: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo – yadetaṃ iminā catusaccagocaraṃ maggañāṇaṃ adhigataṃ,
atk-abh02a:1894_14: tena ñāṇena kāraṇabhūtena atītānāgate paccavekkhaṇañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ nayaṃ neti.
atk-abh02a:1895_0: Idāni yathā tena nayaṃ neti, taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ ye hi keci atītamaddhānantiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1895_1: Tattha abbhaññaṃsūti jāniṃsu paṭivijjhiṃsu. Imaññevāti yaṃ dukkhaṃ atīte abbhaññaṃsu,
atk-abh02a:1895_2: yañca anāgate abhijānissanti, na taññeva imaṃ; sarikkhaṭṭhena pana evaṃ vuttaṃ. Atītepi
atk-abh02a:1895_3: hi ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmakakkhandheyeva dukkhasaccanti paṭivijjhiṃsu, taṇhaṃyeva
atk-abh02a:1895_4: samudayasaccanti nibbānameva nirodhasaccanti ariyamaggameva maggasaccanti paṭivijjhiṃsu,
atk-abh02a:1895_5: anāgatepi evameva paṭivijjhissanti, etarahipi evameva paṭivijjhantīti sarikkhaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:1895_6: “imaññevā”ti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuccati anvaye ñāṇanti idaṃ anugamanañāṇaṃ nayanañāṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1896_0: Pariye ñāṇanti cittaparicchedañāṇaṃ. Parasattānanti ṭhapetvā attānaṃ sesasattānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1896_1: Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Cetasā ceto paricca pajānātīti attano cittena tesaṃ cittaṃ
atk-abh02a:1896_2: sarāgādivasena paricchinditvā nānappakārato jānāti. Sarāgaṃ vātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1896_3: taṃ heṭṭhā satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge vuttameva. Ayaṃ pana viseso – idha anuttaraṃ vā cittaṃ
atk-abh02a:1896_4: vimuttaṃ vā cittanti ettha lokuttarampi labbhati. Avipassanūpagampi hi paracittañāṇassa visayo hotiyeva.
atk-abh02a:1897: Avasesā paññāti dhamme ñāṇādikā tisso paññā ṭhapetvā sesā sabbāpi paññā ñāṇanti sammatattā sammutiñāṇaṃ nāma hoti. Vacanattho panettha sammutimhi ñāṇanti sammutiñāṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1898_0: 797. Kāmāvacarakusale paññāti ayañhi ekantena vaṭṭasmiṃ cutipaṭisandhiṃ ācinateva,
atk-abh02a:1898_1: tasmā “ācayāya no apacayāyā”ti vuttā. Lokuttaramaggapaññā pana yasmā cutipaṭisandhiṃ
atk-abh02a:1898_2: apacinateva, tasmā “apacayāya no ācayāyā”ti vuttā. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarapaññā cutipaṭisandhimpi
atk-abh02a:1898_3: ācinati, vikkhambhanavasena kilese ceva kilesamūlake ca dhamme apacinati, tasmā “ācayāya
atk-abh02a:1898_4: ceva apacayāya cā”ti vuttā. Sesā neva cutipaṭisandhiṃ ācinati na apacinati, tasmā
atk-abh02a:1899_0: 798. Na ca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhatīti idaṃ paṭhamajjhānapaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sā
atk-abh02a:1899_1: hissa kāmavivekena pattabbattā kilesanibbidāya saṃvattati. Tāya cesa kāmesu vītarāgo
atk-abh02a:1899_2: hoti, abhiññāpādakabhāvaṃ pana appattatāya neva pañca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhati, nimittārammaṇattā
atk-abh02a:1899_3: na saccāni paṭivijjhati. Evamayaṃ paññā nibbidāya hoti no paṭivedhāya. Svevāti paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1899_4: patvā ṭhito. Kāmesu vītarāgo samānoti tathā vikkhambhitānaṃyeva kāmānaṃ vasena vītarāgo.
atk-abh02a:1899_5: Abhiññāyo paṭivijjhatīti pañca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhati. Idaṃ catutthajjhānapaññaṃ
atk-abh02a:1899_6: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Catutthajjhānapaññā hi abhiññāpādakabhāvenāpi pañca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhati,
atk-abh02a:1899_7: abhiññābhāvappattiyāpi paṭivijjhati eva. Tasmā sā paṭivedhāya hoti. Paṭhamajjhānapaññāya
atk-abh02a:1899_8: eva pana kilesesupi nibbindattā no nibbidāya. Yā panāyaṃ dutiyatatiyajjhānapaññā,
atk-abh02a:1899_9: sā katarakoṭṭhāsaṃ bhajatīti? Somanassavasena paṭhamajjhānampi bhajati, avitakkavasena
atk-abh02a:1899_10: catutthajjhānampi. Evamesā paṭhamajjhānasannissitā vā catutthajjhānasannissitā vā
atk-abh02a:1899_11: kātabbā. Nibbidāya ceva paṭivedhāya cāti maggapaññā sabbasmimpi vaṭṭe nibbindanato
atk-abh02a:1899_12: nibbidāya, chaṭṭhaṃ abhiññaṃ paṭivijjhanato paṭivedhāya ca hoti.
atk-abh02a:1900_0: 799. Paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhītiādīsu yvāyaṃ appaguṇassa paṭhamajjhānassa lābhī.
atk-abh02a:1900_1: Taṃ tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti
atk-abh02a:1900_2: tudanti codenti. Tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā
atk-abh02a:1900_3: hāyati parihāyati; tasmā hānabhāginīti vuttā. Tadanudhammatāti tadanurūpasabhāvā.
atk-abh02a:1900_4: Sati santiṭṭhatīti idaṃ micchāsatiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na sammāsatiṃ. Yassa hi paṭhamajjhānānurūpasabhāvā
atk-abh02a:1900_5: paṭhamajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato disvā assādayamānā abhinandamānā nikanti uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1900_6: tassa nikantivasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā neva hāyati, na vaḍḍhati, ṭhitikoṭṭhāsikā
atk-abh02a:1900_7: hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ṭhitibhāginī paññāti. Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1900_8: santato paṇītato manasikaroto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā. Samudācarantīti paguṇato
atk-abh02a:1900_9: paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya tudanti codenti. Tassa upari
atk-abh02a:1900_10: dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā visesabhūtassa
atk-abh02a:1900_11: dutiyajjhānassa uppattiṭṭhānatāya visesabhāginīti vuttā. Nibbidāsahagatāti tameva
atk-abh02a:1900_12: paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ nibbidāsaṅkhātena vipassanāñāṇena sahagatā. Vipassanāñāṇañhi
atk-abh02a:1900_13: jhānaṅgabhede vattante nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati, tasmā nibbidāti vuccati. Samudācarantīti
atk-abh02a:1900_14: nibbānasacchikiriyatthāya tudanti codenti. Virāgūpasañhitāti virāgasaṅkhātena nibbānena
atk-abh02a:1900_15: upasaṃhitā. Vipassanāñāṇamhi sakkā iminā maggena virāgaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikātunti pavattito
atk-abh02a:1900_17: nāma. Tassa tesaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā ariyamaggapaṭivedhassa
atk-abh02a:1900_18: padaṭṭhānatāya nibbedhabhāginīti vuttā. Evaṃ catūsu ṭhānesu paṭhamajjhānapaññāva
atk-abh02a:1900_19: kathitā. Dutiyajjhānapaññādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1901_0: 801. Kicchena kasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassāti lokuttarasamādhiṃ uppādentassa pubbabhāge
atk-abh02a:1901_1: āgamanakāle kicchena kasirena dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamantassa kilese
atk-abh02a:1901_2: vikkhambhetvā āgatassa. Dandhaṃ taṇṭhānaṃ abhijānantassāti vikkhambhitesu kilesesu
atk-abh02a:1901_3: vipassanāparivāse ciraṃ vasitvā taṃ lokuttarasamādhisaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ dandhaṃ saṇikaṃ
atk-abh02a:1901_4: abhijānantassa paṭivijjhantassa, pāpuṇantassāti attho. Ayaṃ vuccatīti yā esā evaṃ
atk-abh02a:1901_6: ca dandhattā maggakāle ekacittakkhaṇe uppannāpi paññā āgamanavasena dukkhapaṭipadā
atk-abh02a:1901_7: dandhābhiññā nāmāti vuccati. Upari tīsu padesupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1902_0: 802. Samādhissa na nikāmalābhissāti yo samādhissa na nikāmalābhī hoti, so tassa na
atk-abh02a:1902_1: nikāmalābhī nāma. Yassa samādhi uparūpari samāpajjanatthāya ussakkituṃ paccayo na
atk-abh02a:1902_2: hoti, tassa appaguṇajjhānalābhissāti attho. Ārammaṇaṃ thokaṃ pharantassāti paritte
atk-abh02a:1902_3: suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā ārammaṇe parikammaṃ katvā tattheva appanaṃ patvā taṃ
atk-abh02a:1902_4: avaḍḍhitaṃ thokameva ārammaṇaṃ pharantassāti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Nanikāmalābhīpaṭipakkhato
atk-abh02a:1902_5: hi paguṇajjhānalābhī ettha nikāmalābhīti vutto. Avaḍḍhitārammaṇapaṭipakkhato ca vaḍḍhitārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1903: Jarāmaraṇepetaṃ ñāṇanti nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā catunnaṃ saccānaṃ ekapaṭivedhavasena etaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1904: Jarāmaraṇaṃ ārabbhātiādīni pana ekekaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha pavattikāle pubbabhāge saccavavatthāpanavasena vuttāni. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh02a:1907_0: 804. Pañcavidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese pītipharaṇatādīsu pītiṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti
atk-abh02a:1907_1: dvīsu jhānesu paññā pītipharaṇatā nāma. Sukhaṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti tīsu jhānesu
atk-abh02a:1907_2: paññā sukhapharaṇatā nāma. Paresaṃ cetopharamānā uppajjatīti cetopariyapaññā cetopharaṇatā
atk-abh02a:1907_3: nāma. Ālokaṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti dibbacakkhupaññā ālokapharaṇatā nāma. Paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1907_4: paccavekkhaṇānimittaṃ nāma. Teneva vuttaṃ “dvīsu jhānesu paññā pītipharaṇatā”tiādi.
atk-abh02a:1907_5: Tattha ca pītipharaṇatā sukhapharaṇatā dve pādā viya, cetopharaṇatā ālokapharaṇatā
atk-abh02a:1907_6: dve hatthā viya, abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ majjhimakāyo viya, paccavekkhaṇānimittaṃ sīsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1907_7: viya. Iti bhagavā pañcaṅgikaṃ sammāsamādhiṃ aṅgapaccaṅgasampannaṃ purisaṃ viya katvā
atk-abh02a:1907_8: dassesi. Ayaṃ pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhīti ayaṃ hatthapādasīsasadisehi pañcahi aṅgehi
atk-abh02a:1908_0: Ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho cevātiādīsu arahattaphalasamādhi adhippeto. So hi appitappitakkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:1908_1: sukhattā paccuppannasukho. Purimo purimo pacchimassa pacchimassa samādhisukhassa
atk-abh02a:1908_2: paccayattā āyatiṃ sukhavipāko. Santaṃ sukhumaṃ phalacittaṃ paṇītaṃ madhurarūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:1908_3: Phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa hi sabbakāyānugataṃ sukhasamphassaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh02a:1908_4: sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati. Imināpi pariyāyena āyatiṃ sukhavipāko. Kilesehi
atk-abh02a:1908_5: ārakattā ariyo. Kāmāmisavaṭṭāmisalokāmisānaṃ abhāvā nirāmiso. Buddhādīhi mahāpurisehi
atk-abh02a:1908_7: ca santo. Atappanīyaṭṭhena paṇīto. Kilesapaṭippassaddhiyā laddhattā kilesapaṭippassaddhibhāvassa
atk-abh02a:1908_8: vā laddhattā paṭippassaddhiladdho. Paṭippassaddhaṃ paṭippassaddhīti hi idaṃ atthato
atk-abh02a:1908_9: ekaṃ. Paṭippassaddhakilesena vā arahatā laddhattāpi paṭippassaddhiladdho. Ekodibhāvena
atk-abh02a:1908_10: adhigatattā ekodibhāvameva vā adhigatattā ekodibhāvādhigato. Appaguṇasāsavasamādhi
atk-abh02a:1908_11: viya sasaṅkhārena sappayogena cittena paccanīkadhamme niggayha kilese vāretvā anadhigatattā
atk-abh02a:1908_12: na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato. Tañca samādhiṃ samāpajjanto tato vā vuṭṭhahanto
atk-abh02a:1908_13: sativepullappattattā satova samāpajjati satova vuṭṭhahati. Yathāparicchinnakālavasena
atk-abh02a:1908_14: vā sato samāpajjati sato vuṭṭhahati. Tasmā yadettha “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho
atk-abh02a:1908_15: ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti evaṃ paccavekkhamānassa paccattaṃyeva aparappaccayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1908_16: ñāṇaṃ uppajjati – taṃ ekamaṅgaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Evamimehi pañcahi paccavekkhaṇañāṇehi
atk-abh02a:1908_17: ayaṃ samādhi pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi nāma vuttoti.
atk-abh02a:1911_0: 805. Chabbidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese iddhividhe ñāṇanti “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”tiādinayappavatte
atk-abh02a:1911_1: iddhividhe ñāṇaṃ. Iminā avitakkāvicārā upekkhāsahagatā rūpāvacarā bahudhābhāvādisādhikā
atk-abh02a:1911_2: ekacittakkhaṇikā appanāpaññāva kathitā. Sotadhātuvisuddhiyā ñāṇanti dūrasantikādibhedasaddārammaṇāya
atk-abh02a:1911_3: dibbasotadhātuyā ñāṇaṃ. Imināpi avitakkāvicārā upekkhāsahagatā rūpāvacarā pakatisotavisayātītasaddārammaṇā
atk-abh02a:1911_4: ekacittakkhaṇikā appanāpaññāva kathitā. Paracitte ñāṇanti parasattānaṃ cittaparicchede
atk-abh02a:1911_5: ñāṇaṃ. Imināpi yathāvuttappakārā paresaṃ sarāgādicittārammaṇā ekacittakkhaṇikā appanāpaññāva
atk-abh02a:1911_6: kathitā. Pubbenivāsānussatiyā ñāṇanti pubbenivāsānussatisampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Imināpi
atk-abh02a:1911_8: appanāpaññāva kathitā. Sattānaṃ cutūpapāte ñāṇanti sattānaṃ cutiyañca upapāte ca
atk-abh02a:1911_9: ñāṇaṃ. Imināpi yathāvuttappakārā cavanakaupapajjanakānaṃ sattānaṃ vaṇṇadhātuārammaṇā
atk-abh02a:1911_10: ekacittakkhaṇikā appanāpaññāva kathitā. Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇanti saccaparicchedajānanañāṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1914_0: 806. Sattavidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇantiādinā nayena pavattinivattivasena
atk-abh02a:1914_1: ekādasasu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu ekekasmiṃ kālattayabhedato paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vatvā
atk-abh02a:1914_2: puna “yampissa taṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti evaṃ tadeva ñāṇaṃ saṅkhepato khayadhammatādīhi
atk-abh02a:1914_3: pakārehi vuttaṃ. Tattha jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ, asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti
atk-abh02a:1914_4: ñāṇadvayaṃ paccuppannaddhānavasena vuttaṃ. Atītampi addhānaṃ, anāgatampi addhānanti
atk-abh02a:1914_5: evaṃ atīte ñāṇadvayaṃ, anāgate ñāṇadvayanti cha. Tāni dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena saddhiṃ
atk-abh02a:1914_6: satta. Tattha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti paccayākārañāṇaṃ. Paccayākāro hi dhammānaṃ pavattiṭṭhitikāraṇattā
atk-abh02a:1914_7: dhammaṭṭhitīti vuccati; tattha ñāṇaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ. Etasseva chabbidhassa ñāṇassetaṃ
atk-abh02a:1914_8: adhivacanaṃ. Evaṃ ekekasmiṃ aṅge imāni satta satta katvā ekādasasu aṅgesu sattasattati
atk-abh02a:1914_9: honti. Tattha khayadhammanti khayagamanasabhāvaṃ. Vayadhammanti vayagamanasabhāvaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1914_10: Virāgadhammanti virajjanasabhāvaṃ. Nirodhadhammanti nirujjhanasabhāvaṃ. Iminā kiṃ
atk-abh02a:1914_11: kathitaṃ? Aparavipassanāya purimavipassanāsammasanaṃ kathitaṃ. Tena kiṃ kathitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1914_12: hoti? Sattakkhattuṃ vipassanāpaṭivipassanā kathitā. Paṭhamañāṇena hi sabbasaṅkhāre
atk-abh02a:1914_13: aniccā dukkhā anattāti disvā taṃ ñāṇaṃ dutiyena daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭati, dutiyaṃ tatiyena,
atk-abh02a:1914_14: tatiyaṃ catutthena, catutthaṃ pañcamena, pañcamaṃ chaṭṭhena, chaṭṭhaṃ sattamena.
atk-abh02a:1916: 807. Aṭṭhavidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese sotāpattimagge paññāti sotāpattimaggamhi paññā. Iminā sampayuttapaññāva kathitā. Sesapadesupi eseva nayoti.
atk-abh02a:1918_1: samāpattīsu. Tāsaṃ anupubbena anupaṭipāṭiyā vihāritabbaṭṭhena anupubbavihāratā, samāpajjitabbaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:1918_2: samāpattitā daṭṭhabbā. Tattha paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā paññātiādayo aṭṭha sampayuttapaññā
atk-abh02a:1918_3: veditabbā. Navamā paccavekkhaṇapaññā. Sā hi nirodhasamāpattiṃ santato paṇītato paccavekkhamānassa
atk-abh02a:1922_0: 809. Dasavidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese aṭṭhānanti hetupaṭikkhepo. Anavakāsoti paccayapaṭikkhepo.
atk-abh02a:1922_1: Ubhayenāpi kāraṇameva paṭikkhipati. Kāraṇañhi tadāyattavuttitāya attano phalassa
atk-abh02a:1922_2: ṭhānanti ca avakāsoti ca vuccati. Yanti yena kāraṇena. Diṭṭhisampannoti maggadiṭṭhiyā
atk-abh02a:1922_3: sampanno sotāpanno ariyasāvako. Kañci saṅkhāranti catubhūmakesu saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu
atk-abh02a:1922_4: kañci ekaṃ saṅkhārampi. Niccato upagaccheyyāti niccoti gaṇheyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti
atk-abh02a:1922_5: etaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi, na upalabbhati. Yaṃ puthujjanoti yena kāraṇena puthujjano. Ṭhānametaṃ
atk-abh02a:1922_6: vijjatīti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthi; sassatadiṭṭhiyā hi so tebhūmakesu saṅkhāresu kañci
atk-abh02a:1922_7: saṅkhāraṃ niccato gaṇheyyāti attho. Catutthabhūmakasaṅkhāro pana tejussadattā divasaṃ
atk-abh02a:1922_8: santatto ayoguḷo viya makkhikānaṃ diṭṭhiyā vā aññesaṃ vā akusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na
atk-abh02a:1922_9: hoti. Iminā nayena kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhatotiādīsupi attho veditabbo. Sukhato upagaccheyyāti
atk-abh02a:1922_10: “ekantasukhī attā hoti arogo parammaraṇā”ti evaṃ attadiṭṭhivasena sukhato gāhaṃ sandhāyetaṃ
atk-abh02a:1922_11: vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhivippayuttacittena pana ariyasāvako pariḷāhābhibhūto pariḷāhavūpasamatthaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1922_12: mattahatthīparitāsito viya, sucikāmo pokkhabrāhmaṇo gūthaṃ kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato
atk-abh02a:1922_13: upagacchati. Attavāde kasiṇādipaṇṇattisaṅgahatthaṃ saṅkhāranti avatvā kañci dhammanti
atk-abh02a:1922_14: vuttaṃ. Idhāpi ariyasāvakassa catubhūmakavasena paricchedo veditabbo, puthujjanassa
atk-abh02a:1922_15: tebhūmakavasena; sabbavāresu vā ariyasāvakassāpi tebhūmakavaseneva paricchedo vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1922_16: Yaṃ yañhi puthujjano gaṇhāti, tato tato ariyasāvako gāhaṃ viniveṭheti. Puthujjano
atk-abh02a:1922_17: hi yaṃ yaṃ niccaṃ sukhaṃ attāti gaṇhāti, taṃ taṃ ariyasāvako aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti
atk-abh02a:1923_0: Mātarantiādīsu janikāva mātā. Manussabhūtova khīṇāsavo arahāti adhippeto. Kiṃ pana
atk-abh02a:1923_1: ariyasāvako aññaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti? Etampi aṭṭhānaṃ. Sacepi bhavantaragataṃ ariyasāvakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1923_2: attano ariyasāvakabhāvaṃ ajānantampi koci evaṃ vadeyya – ‘imaṃ kunthakipillikaṃ jīvitā
atk-abh02a:1923_3: voropetvā sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe cakkavattirajjaṃ paṭipajjāhī’ti, neva so taṃ jīvitā
atk-abh02a:1923_4: voropeyya. Atha vāpi naṃ evaṃ vadeyyuṃ – ‘sace imaṃ na ghātessasi, sīsaṃ te chindissāmā’ti,
atk-abh02a:1923_5: sīsamevassa chindeyyuṃ, neva so taṃ ghāteyya. Puthujjanabhāvassa pana mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1923_6: ariyasāvakassa ca baladīpanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – sāvajjo puthujjanabhāvo,
atk-abh02a:1923_7: yatra hi nāma puthujjano mātughātādīnipi ānantariyāni karissati. Mahābalo ariyasāvako;
atk-abh02a:1924_0: Paduṭṭhena cittenāti dosasampayuttena vadhakacittena. Lohitaṃ uppādeyyāti jīvamānakasarīre
atk-abh02a:1924_1: khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeyya. Saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti samānasaṃvāsakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1924_2: samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitaṃ pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅghaṃ bhindeyya, vuttañhetaṃ – “pañcahupāli,
atk-abh02a:1924_3: ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati – kammena, uddesena, voharanto, anussāvanena, salākaggāhenā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1925_0: Tattha ‘kammenā’ti apalokanādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarena kammena. ‘Uddesenā’ti
atk-abh02a:1925_1: pañcasu pātimokkhuddesesu aññatarena uddesena. ‘Voharanto’ti kathayanto, tāhi tāhi
atk-abh02a:1925_3: ‘nanu tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca! Mādiso nāma
atk-abh02a:1925_4: uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ gāheyyāti cittampi uppādetuṃ tumhākaṃ na yuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1925_5: Kiṃ mayhaṃ avīci nīluppalavanaṃ viya sītalo? Kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī’tiādinā nayena
atk-abh02a:1925_6: kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena. ‘Salākaggāhenā’ti evaṃ anussāvetvā tesaṃ
atk-abh02a:1925_7: cittaṃ upatthambhetvā anivattanadhamme katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
atk-abh02a:1925_8: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ vohārānussāvanasalākaggāhā pana pubbabhāgā.
atk-abh02a:1925_9: Aṭṭhārasavatthudīpanavasena hi voharantena tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya
atk-abh02a:1925_10: gāhitāyapi abhinnova hoti saṅgho. Yadā pana evaṃ cattāro vā atirekā vā salākaṃ gāhetvā
atk-abh02a:1925_11: āveṇikaṃ kammaṃ vā uddesaṃ vā karonti, tadā saṅgho bhinno nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1926_0: Evaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Ettāvatā mātughātādīni
atk-abh02a:1926_1: pañca ānantariyakammāni dassitāni honti, yāni puthujjano karoti, na ariyasāvako.
atk-abh02a:1929_0: Tattha ‘kammato’ tāva – ettha hi manussabhūtasseva manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ
atk-abh02a:1929_1: vā api parivattaliṅgaṃ jīvitā voropentassa kammaṃ ānantariyaṃ hoti. Tassa vipākaṃ
atk-abh02a:1929_2: paṭibāhissāmī’ti sakalacakkavāḷaṃ mahācetiyappamāṇehi kañcanathūpehi pūretvāpi, sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
atk-abh02a:1929_3: pūretvā nisinnabhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvāpi, buddhassa bhagavato saṅghāṭikaṇṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1929_4: amuñcitvāva vicaritvāpi, kāyassa bhedā nirayameva upapajjati. Yo pana sayaṃ manussabhūto
atk-abh02a:1929_5: tiracchānabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā, sayaṃ vā tiracchānabhūto manussabhūtaṃ, tiracchānabhūtoyeva
atk-abh02a:1929_6: vā tiracchānabhūtaṃ jīvitā voropeti, tassa kammaṃ ānantariyaṃ na hoti, kammaṃ pana
atk-abh02a:1929_7: bhāriyaṃ hoti, ānantariyaṃ āhacceva tiṭṭhati. Manussajātikānaṃ pana vasena ayaṃ pañho kathito.
atk-abh02a:1930_0: Ettha eḷakacatukkaṃ, saṅgāmacatukkaṃ, coracatukkañca kathetabbaṃ. ‘Eḷakaṃ māremī’ti
atk-abh02a:1930_1: abhisandhināpi hi eḷakaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ manusso manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā
atk-abh02a:1930_2: mārento ānantariyaṃ phusati. Eḷakābhisandhinā pana mātāpitiabhisandhinā vā eḷakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1930_3: mārento ānantariyaṃ na phusati. Mātāpitiabhisandhinā mātāpitaro mārento phusateva.
atk-abh02a:1930_4: Esa nayo itarasmimpi catukkadvaye. Yathā ca mātāpitūsu, evaṃ arahantepi etāni catukkāni
atk-abh02a:1930_5: veditabbāni. Manussaarahantameva ca māretvā ānantariyaṃ phusati, na yakkhabhūtaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1930_6: kammaṃ pana bhāriyaṃ ānantariyasadisameva. Manussaarahantassa ca puthujjanakāleyeva
atk-abh02a:1930_7: satthappahāre vā vise vā dinnepi yadi so arahattaṃ patvā teneva marati, arahantaghāto
atk-abh02a:1930_8: hotiyeva. Yaṃ pana puthujjanakāle dinnaṃ dānaṃ arahattaṃ patvā paribhuñjati, puthujjanasseva
atk-abh02a:1930_9: taṃ dinnaṃ hoti. Sesaariyapuggale mārentassa ānantariyaṃ natthi, kammaṃ pana bhāriyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1931_0: Lohituppāde tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya parūpakkamena cammacchedaṃ katvā lohitapaggharaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1931_1: nāma natthi. Sarīrassa pana antoyeva ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati. Devadattena
atk-abh02a:1931_2: paṭividdhasilāto bhijjitvā gatā sakalikāpi tathāgatassa pādantaṃ pahari. Pharasunā
atk-abh02a:1931_3: pahaṭo viya pādo antolohitoyeva ahosi. Tathā karontassa ānantariyaṃ hoti. Jīvako
atk-abh02a:1931_4: pana tathāgatassa ruciyā satthakena cammaṃ chinditvā tamhā ṭhānā duṭṭhalohitaṃ nīharitvā
atk-abh02a:1932_0: Atha ye ca parinibbute tathāgate cetiyaṃ bhindanti, bodhiṃ chindanti, dhātumhi upakkamanti,
atk-abh02a:1932_1: tesaṃ kiṃ hotīti? Bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ hoti ānantariyasadisaṃ. Sadhātukaṃ pana thūpaṃ
atk-abh02a:1932_2: vā paṭimaṃ vā bādhayamānaṃ bodhisākhañca chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Sacepi tattha nilīnā
atk-abh02a:1932_3: sakuṇā cetiye vaccaṃ pātenti, chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Paribhogacetiyato hi sarīracetiyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1932_4: mahantataraṃ. Cetiyavatthuṃ bhinditvā gacchantaṃ bodhimūlampi chinditvā harituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1932_5: Yā pana bodhisākhā bodhigharaṃ bādhati, taṃ geharakkhaṇatthaṃ chindituṃ na labbhati.
atk-abh02a:1932_6: Bodhiatthañhi gehaṃ, na gehatthāya bodhi. Āsanagharepi eseva nayo. Yasmiṃ pana āsanaghare
atk-abh02a:1932_7: dhātu nihitā hoti, tassa rakkhaṇatthāya bodhisākhaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Bodhijagganatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1932_8: ojoharaṇasākhaṃ vā pūtiṭṭhānaṃ vā chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva; sarīrapaṭijaggane viya puññampi hoti.
atk-abh02a:1933_0: Saṅghabhede sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghe asannipatite visuṃ parisaṃ gahetvā katavohārānussāvanasalākaggāhassa
atk-abh02a:1933_1: kammaṃ vā karontassa uddesaṃ vā uddisantassa bhedo ca hoti ānantariyakammañca. Samaggasaññāya
atk-abh02a:1933_2: pana vaṭṭati. Samaggasaññāya hi karontassa neva bhedo hoti na ānantariyakammaṃ. Tathā
atk-abh02a:1933_3: navato ūnaparisāyaṃ. Sabbantimena pana paricchedena navannaṃ janānaṃ yo saṅghaṃ bhindati,
atk-abh02a:1933_4: tassa ānantariyakammaṃ hoti. Anuvattakānaṃ adhammavādīnaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ kammaṃ; dhammavādino
atk-abh02a:1933_5: anavajjā. Tattha navannameva saṅghabhede idaṃ suttaṃ – “ekato, upāli, cattāro honti,
atk-abh02a:1933_6: ekato cattāro, navamo anussāveti salākaṃ gāheti – ‘ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo, idaṃ
atk-abh02a:1933_7: satthusāsanaṃ, idaṃ gaṇhatha, idaṃ rocethā’ti. Evaṃ kho, upāli, saṅgharāji ceva hoti
atk-abh02a:1933_8: saṅghabhedo ca. Navannaṃ vā, upāli, atirekanavannaṃ vā saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo cā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1934: Etesu ca pana pañcasu saṅghabhedo vacīkammaṃ, sesāni kāyakammānīti. Evaṃ kammatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:1935_0: ‘Dvārato’ti sabbāneva cetāni kāyadvāratopi vacīdvāratopi samuṭṭhahanti. Purimāni
atk-abh02a:1935_1: panettha cattāri āṇattikavijjāmayapayogavasena vacīdvārato samuṭṭhahitvāpi kāyadvārameva
atk-abh02a:1935_2: pūrenti. Saṅghabhedo hatthamuddāya bhedaṃ karontassa kāyadvārato samuṭṭhahitvāpi
atk-abh02a:1935_3: vacīdvārameva pūretīti. Evamettha dvāratopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:1936_0: ‘Kappaṭṭhitiyato’ti saṅghabhedoyeva cettha kappaṭṭhitiyo. Saṇṭhahante hi kappe kappavemajjhe
atk-abh02a:1936_1: vā saṅghabhedaṃ katvā kappavināseyeva muccati. Sacepi hi ‘sve kappo vinassissatī’ti
atk-abh02a:1936_2: ajja saṅghabhedaṃ karoti, sveyeva muccati, ekadivasameva niraye paccati. Evaṃ karaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1936_3: pana natthi. Sesāni cattāri kammāni ānantariyāneva honti, na kappaṭṭhitiyānīti. Evamettha
atk-abh02a:1937_0: ‘Pākato’ti yena ca pañcapetāni kammāni katāni honti, tassa saṅghabhedoyeva paṭisandhivasena
atk-abh02a:1937_1: vipaccati. Sesāni “ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko”ti evamādīsu saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh02a:1937_2: Saṅghabhedābhāve lohituppādo, tadabhāve arahantaghāto, tadabhāve sace pitā sīlavā
atk-abh02a:1937_3: hoti, mātā dussīlā no vā tathā sīlavatī, pitughāto paṭisandhivasena vipaccati. Sace
atk-abh02a:1937_4: mātā mātughāto. Dvīsupi sīlena vā dussīlena vā samānesu mātughātova paṭisandhivasena
atk-abh02a:1937_5: vipaccati; mātā hi dukkarakāriṇī bahūpakārā ca puttānanti. Evamettha pākatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:1938_0: ‘Sādhāraṇādīhī’ti purimāni cattāri sabbesampi gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ sādhāraṇāni. Saṅghabhedo
atk-abh02a:1938_1: pana “na kho, upāli, bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ bhindati, na sikkhamānā, na sāmaṇero, na sāmaṇerī,
atk-abh02a:1938_2: na upāsako, na upāsikā saṅghaṃ bhindati. Bhikkhu kho, upāli, pakatatto samānasaṃvāsako
atk-abh02a:1938_3: samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhito saṅghaṃ bhindatī”ti vacanato vuttappakārassa bhikkhunova hoti,
atk-abh02a:1938_4: na aññassa; tasmā asādhāraṇo. Ādisaddena sabbepete dukkhavedanāsahagatā dosamohasampayuttā
atk-abh02a:1939_0: Aññaṃ satthāranti ‘ayaṃ me satthā satthukiccaṃ kātuṃ samattho’ti bhavantarepi aññaṃ
atk-abh02a:1939_1: titthakaraṃ ‘ayaṃ me satthā’ti evaṃ gaṇheyya – netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti attho. Aṭṭhamaṃ
atk-abh02a:1939_2: bhavaṃ nibbatteyyāti sabbamandapaññopi sattamaṃ bhavaṃ atikkamitvā aṭṭhamaṃ nibbatteyya
atk-abh02a:1939_3: – netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Uttamakoṭiyā hi sattamaṃ bhavaṃ sandhāyevesa “niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti
atk-abh02a:1939_4: vutto. Kiṃ pana taṃ niyāmeti? Kiṃ pubbahetu niyāmeti udāhu paṭiladdhamaggo udāhu
atk-abh02a:1939_5: upari tayo maggāti? Sammāsambuddhena gahitaṃ nāmamattametaṃ. Puggalo pana niyato
atk-abh02a:1939_6: nāma natthi. “Pubbahetu niyāmetī”ti vutte hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ upanissayo vutto
atk-abh02a:1939_7: hoti, paṭhamamaggassa upanissayābhāvo āpajjati. Iccassa ahetu appaccayā nibbattiṃ
atk-abh02a:1939_8: pāpuṇāti. “Paṭiladdhamaggo niyāmetī”ti vutte upari tayo maggā akiccakā honti, paṭhamamaggova
atk-abh02a:1939_9: sakiccako, paṭhamamaggeneva kilese khepetvā parinibbāyitabbaṃ hoti. “Upari tayo maggā
atk-abh02a:1939_10: niyāmentī”ti vutte paṭhamamaggo akiccako hoti, upari tayo maggāva sakiccakā, paṭhamamaggaṃ
atk-abh02a:1939_11: anibbattetvā upari tayo maggā nibbattetabbā honti, paṭhamamaggena ca anuppajjitvāva
atk-abh02a:1939_12: kilesā khepetabbā honti. Tasmā na añño koci niyāmeti, upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanāva
atk-abh02a:1939_13: niyāmeti. Sace hi tesaṃ vipassanā tikkhā sūrā hutvā vahati, ekaṃyeva bhavaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-abh02a:1939_14: arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāti. Tato mandatarapañño dutiye vā tatiye vā catutthe vā
atk-abh02a:1939_15: pañcame vā chaṭṭhe vā bhave arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāti. Sabbamandapañño sattamaṃ
atk-abh02a:1939_16: bhavaṃ nibbattetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, aṭṭhame bhave paṭisandhi na hoti. Iti sammāsambuddhena
atk-abh02a:1939_17: gahitaṃ nāmamattametaṃ. Satthā hi buddhatulāya tuletvā sabbaññutañāṇena paricchinditvā
atk-abh02a:1939_18: ‘ayaṃ puggalo sabbamahāpañño tikkhavipassako ekameva bhavaṃ nibbattetvā arahattaṃ
atk-abh02a:1939_19: gaṇhissatī’ti ‘ekabījī’ti nāmaṃ akāsi; ‘ayaṃ puggalo dutiyaṃ, tatiyaṃ, catutthaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1939_20: pañcamaṃ, chaṭṭhaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī’ti ‘kolaṃkolo’ti nāmaṃ
atk-abh02a:1939_21: akāsi; ‘ayaṃ puggalo sattamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī’ti ‘sattakkhattuparamo’ti nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-abh02a:1940_0: Koci pana puggalo sattannaṃ bhavānaṃ niyato nāma natthi. Ariyasāvako pana yena kenacipi
atk-abh02a:1940_1: ākārena mandapañño samāno aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ appatvā antarāva parinibbāti. Sakkasadisopi
atk-abh02a:1940_2: vaṭṭābhirato sattamaṃyeva bhavaṃ gacchati. Sattame bhave sabbakārena pamādavihārinopi
atk-abh02a:1940_3: vipassanāñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gacchati. Appamattakepi ārammaṇe nibbinditvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:1940_4: Sacepi hissa sattame bhave niddaṃ vā okkamantassa, parammukhaṃ vā gacchantassa, pacchato
atk-abh02a:1940_5: ṭhatvā tikhiṇena asinā kocideva sīsaṃ pāteyya, udake vā osādetvā māreyya, asani vā
atk-abh02a:1940_6: panassa sīse pateyya, evarūpepi kāle sappaṭisandhikā kālaṃkiriyā nāma na hoti, arahattaṃ
atk-abh02a:1940_7: patvāva parinibbāti. Tena vuttaṃ – “aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbatteyya – netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1941_0: Ekissā lokadhātuyāti dasasahassilokadhātuyā. Tīṇi hi khettāni – jātikhettaṃ, āṇākhettaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1941_1: visayakkhettanti. Tattha ‘jātikkhettaṃ’ nāma dasasahassilokadhātu. Sā hi tathāgatassa
atk-abh02a:1941_3: parinibbāne ca kampati. Koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ pana ‘āṇākhettaṃ’ nāma. Āṭānāṭiyamoraparittadhajaggaparittaratanaparittādīnañhi
atk-abh02a:1941_4: ettha āṇā vattati. ‘Visayakhettassa’ pana parimāṇaṃ natthi. Buddhānañhi “yāvatakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1941_5: ñāṇaṃ tāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ ñeyyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1941_6: ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇa”nti vacanato avisayo nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1942_0: Imesu pana tīsu khettesu, ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ, aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantīti
atk-abh02a:1942_1: suttaṃ natthi, na uppajjantīti pana atthi. Tīṇi piṭakāni – vinayapiṭakaṃ, suttantapiṭakaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1942_2: abhidhammapiṭakanti. Tisso saṅgītiyo – mahākassapattherassa saṅgīti, yasattherassa
atk-abh02a:1942_3: saṅgīti, moggaliputtatissattherassa saṅgītīti. Imā tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake
atk-abh02a:1942_4: buddhavacane imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ muñcitvā aññattha buddhā uppajjantīti suttaṃ natthi,
atk-abh02a:1943_0: Apubbaṃ acarimanti apure apacchā; ekato nuppajjanti, pure vā pacchā vā uppajjantīti
atk-abh02a:1943_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha bodhipallaṅke “bodhiṃ appatvā na uṭṭhahissāmī”ti nisinnakālato
atk-abh02a:1943_2: paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ tāva pubbenti na veditabbaṃ. Bodhisattassa
atk-abh02a:1943_3: hi paṭisandhiggahaṇe dasasahassacakkavāḷakampaneneva jātikkhettapariggaho kato, aññassa
atk-abh02a:1943_4: buddhassa uppatti nivāritā hoti. Parinibbānato paṭṭhāya ca yāva sāsapamattāpi dhātuyo
atk-abh02a:1943_5: tiṭṭhanti tāva pacchāti na veditabbaṃ. Dhātūsu hi ṭhitāsu buddhā ṭhitāva honti. Tasmā
atk-abh02a:1943_6: etthantare aññassa buddhassa uppatti nivāritāva hoti, dhātuparinibbāne pana jāte
atk-abh02a:1944_0: Tīṇi hi antaradhānāni nāma – pariyattiantaradhānaṃ, paṭivedhaantaradhānaṃ, paṭipattiantaradhānanti.
atk-abh02a:1944_2: Tattha paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi. Ekasmiñhi kāle paṭivedhakarā bhikkhū
atk-abh02a:1944_3: bahū honti; ‘esa bhikkhu puthujjano’ti aṅguliṃ pasāretvā dassetabbo hoti. Imasmiṃyeva
atk-abh02a:1944_4: dīpe ekavāraṃ kira puthujjanabhikkhu nāma nāhosi. Paṭipattipūrakāpi kadāci bahū honti,
atk-abh02a:1944_5: kadāci appā. Iti paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi.
atk-abh02a:1945_0: Sāsanaṭṭhitiyā pana pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ. Paṇḍito hi tepiṭakaṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti.
atk-abh02a:1945_1: Yathā amhākaṃ bodhisatto āḷārassa santike pañcābhiññā satta ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā
atk-abh02a:1945_2: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā parikammaṃ pucchi, so ‘na jānāmī’ti āha; tato udakassa
atk-abh02a:1945_3: santikaṃ gantvā adhigatavisesaṃ saṃsandetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1945_4: pucchi; so ācikkhi; tassa vacanasamanantarameva mahāsatto taṃ sampādesi; evameva
atk-abh02a:1945_5: paññavā bhikkhu pariyattiṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti. Tasmā pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1945_6: ṭhitaṃ hoti. Yadā pana sā antaradhāyati tadā paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nassati.
atk-abh02a:1945_7: Tattha paṭṭhānaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ antaradhāyati. Anukkamena pacchā dhammasaṅgaho. Tasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1945_8: antarahite itaresu dvīsu piṭakesu ṭhitesu sāsanaṃ ṭhitameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:1946_0: Tattha suttantapiṭake antaradhāyamāne paṭhamaṃ aṅguttaranikāyo ekādasakato paṭṭhāya
atk-abh02a:1946_1: yāva ekakā antaradhāyati. Tadanantaraṃ saṃyuttanikāyo cakkapeyyālato paṭṭhāya yāva
atk-abh02a:1946_2: oghataraṇā antaradhāyati. Tadanantaraṃ majjhimanikāyo indriyabhāvanato paṭṭhāya yāva
atk-abh02a:1946_3: mūlapariyāyā antaradhāyati. Tadanantaraṃ dīghanikāyo dasuttarato paṭṭhāya yāva brahmajālā
atk-abh02a:1946_4: antaradhāyati. Ekissāpi dvinnampi gāthānaṃ pucchā addhānaṃ gacchati; sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ
atk-abh02a:1946_5: na sakkoti sabhiyapucchā viya āḷavakapucchā viya ca. Etā kira kassapabuddhakālikā
atk-abh02a:1947_0: Dvīsu pana piṭakesu antarahitesupi vinayapiṭake ṭhite sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati. Parivārakhandhakesu
atk-abh02a:1947_1: antarahitesu ubhatovibhaṅge ṭhite ṭhitameva hoti. Ubhatovibhaṅge antarahite mātikāya
atk-abh02a:1947_2: ṭhitāyapi ṭhitameva hoti. Mātikāya antarahitāya pātimokkhapabbajjāupasampadāsu ṭhitāsu
atk-abh02a:1947_3: sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati. Liṅgaṃ addhānaṃ gacchati. Setavatthasamaṇavaṃso pana kassapabuddhakālato
atk-abh02a:1947_4: paṭṭhāya sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ nāsakkhi. Pacchimakassa pana saccapaṭivedhato pacchimakassa
atk-abh02a:1947_5: sīlabhedato ca paṭṭhāya sāsanaṃ osakkitaṃ nāma hoti. Tato paṭṭhāya aññassa buddhassa uppatti na vāritā.
atk-abh02a:1948_0: Tīṇi parinibbānāni nāma – kilesaparinibbānaṃ, khandhaparinibbānaṃ, dhātuparinibbānanti.
atk-abh02a:1948_2: ‘dhātuparinibbānaṃ’ anāgate bhavissati. Sāsanassa kira osakkanakāle imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe
atk-abh02a:1948_3: dhātuyo sannipatitvā mahācetiyaṃ gamissanti, mahācetiyato nāgadīpe rājāyatanacetiyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1948_4: tato mahābodhipallaṅkaṃ gamissanti. Nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi brahmalokatopi dhātuyo
atk-abh02a:1948_5: mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti. Sāsapamattāpi dhātu na antarā nassissati. Sabbā
atk-abh02a:1948_6: dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekaghanā hutvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo
atk-abh02a:1948_7: vissajjessanti. Tā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharissanti. Tato dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā
atk-abh02a:1948_8: sannipatitvā “ajja satthā parinibbāti, ajja sāsanaṃ osakkati, pacchimadassanaṃ dāni
atk-abh02a:1948_9: idaṃ amhāka”nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṃ kāruññaṃ karissanti.
atk-abh02a:1948_10: Ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave avasesā sakabhāvena sandhāretuṃ na sakkhissanti. Dhātūsu
atk-abh02a:1948_11: tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati. Sāsapamattāyapi dhātuyā sati
atk-abh02a:1948_12: ekajālāva bhavissati; dhātūsu pariyādānaṃ gatāsu pacchijjissati. Evaṃ mahantaṃ ānubhāvaṃ
atk-abh02a:1948_13: dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti. Yāva evaṃ na antaradhāyati
atk-abh02a:1948_14: tāva acarimaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ – netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-abh02a:1949_0: Kasmā pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ na uppajjantīti? Anacchariyattā. Buddhā hi acchariyamanussā,
atk-abh02a:1949_1: yathāha – “ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke upajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso. Katamo
atk-abh02a:1949_2: ekapuggalo? Tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti. Yadi ca dve vā cattāro
atk-abh02a:1949_3: vā aṭṭha vā soḷasa vā ekato uppajjeyyuṃ, na acchariyā bhaveyyuṃ. Ekasmiñhi vihāre
atk-abh02a:1949_4: dvinnaṃ cetiyānampi lābhasakkāro uḷāro na hoti, bhikkhūpi bahutāya na acchariyā jātā,
atk-abh02a:1949_5: evaṃ buddhāpi bhaveyyuṃ; tasmā nuppajjanti. Desanāya ca visesābhāvato. Yañhi satipaṭṭhānādibhedaṃ
atk-abh02a:1949_6: dhammaṃ eko deseti, aññena uppajjitvāpi sova desetabbo siyā. Tato anacchariyo siyā.
atk-abh02a:1949_7: Ekasmiṃ pana dhammaṃ desente desanāpi acchariyā hoti. Vivādabhāvato ca. Bahūsu ca
atk-abh02a:1949_8: buddhesu uppannesu bahūnaṃ ācariyānaṃ antevāsikā viya ‘amhākaṃ buddho pāsādiko, amhākaṃ
atk-abh02a:1949_9: buddho madhurassaro lābhī puññavā’ti vivadeyyuṃ; tasmāpi evaṃ nuppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1950: Apicetaṃ kāraṇaṃ milindaraññā puṭṭhena nāgasenattherena vitthāritameva. Vuttañhi tattha –
atk-abh02a:1951_0: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṃ bhagavatā – “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ
atk-abh02a:1951_1: ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ – netaṃ
atk-abh02a:1951_2: ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti. Desentā ca, bhante nāgasena, sabbepi tathāgatā sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme
atk-abh02a:1951_3: desenti, kathayamānā ca cattāri ariyasaccāni kathenti, sikkhāpentā ca tīsu sikkhāsu
atk-abh02a:1951_4: sikkhāpenti, anusāsamānā ca appamādapaṭipattiyaṃ anusāsanti. Yadi, bhante nāgasena,
atk-abh02a:1951_5: sabbesampi tathāgatānaṃ ekā desanā ekā kathā ekā sikkhā ekānusiṭṭhi, kena kāraṇena
atk-abh02a:1951_6: dve tathāgatā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti? Ekenapi tāva buddhuppādena ayaṃ loko obhāsajāto.
atk-abh02a:1951_7: Yadi dutiyo buddho bhaveyya, dvinnaṃ pabhāya ayaṃ loko bhiyyoso mattāya obhāsajāto
atk-abh02a:1951_8: bhaveyya. Ovadantā ca dve tathāgatā sukhaṃ ovadeyyuṃ, anusāsamānā ca sukhaṃ anusāseyyuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1951_9: Tattha me kāraṇaṃ dassehi yathāhaṃ nissaṃsayo bhaveyya”nti.
atk-abh02a:1952_0: “Ayaṃ, mahārāja, dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī, ekasseva tathāgatassa guṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1952_1: dhāreti. Yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, nāyaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya, caleyya
atk-abh02a:1952_2: kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṃseyya, na ṭhānamupagaccheyya.
atk-abh02a:1953_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, nāvā ekapurisasandhāraṇī bhaveyya, ekasmiṃ purise abhirūḷhe sā
atk-abh02a:1953_1: nāvā samupādikā bhaveyya. Atha dutiyo puriso āgaccheyya tādiso āyunā vaṇṇena vayena
atk-abh02a:1953_2: pamāṇena kisathūlena sabbaṅgapaccaṅgena. So taṃ nāvaṃ abhirūheyya. Apinu sā, mahārāja,
atk-abh02a:1953_3: nāvā dvinnampi dhāreyyā”ti? “Na hi, bhante, caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya
atk-abh02a:1953_4: vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṃseyya, na ṭhānamupagaccheyya, osīdeyya udake”ti. “Evameva
atk-abh02a:1953_5: kho, mahārāja, ayaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī ekasseva tathāgatassa
atk-abh02a:1953_6: guṇaṃ dhāreti. Yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, nāyaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya,
atk-abh02a:1954_0: “Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, puriso yāvadatthaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya chādentaṃ yāvakaṇṭhamabhipūrayitvā.
atk-abh02a:1954_1: So tato pīṇito paripuṇṇo nirantaro tandīgato anonamitadaṇḍajāto punadeva tattakaṃ
atk-abh02a:1954_2: bhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya. Apinu kho so, mahārāja, puriso sukhito bhaveyyā”ti? “Na hi, bhante,
atk-abh02a:1954_3: sakiṃ bhuttova mareyyā”ti. Evameva kho, mahārāja, ayaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī…pe…
atk-abh02a:1955_0: “Kiṃ nu kho, bhante nāgasena, atidhammabhārena pathavī calatī”ti? “Idha, mahārāja,
atk-abh02a:1955_1: dve sakaṭā ratanaparipūritā bhaveyyuṃ yāvasmā mukhasamā. Eka sakaṭato ratanaṃ gahetvā
atk-abh02a:1955_2: ekamhi sakaṭe ākireyyuṃ. Apinu taṃ, mahārāja, sakaṭaṃ dvinnampi sakaṭānaṃ ratanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1955_3: dhāreyyā”ti? “Na hi, bhante, nābhipi tassa caleyya, arāpi tassa bhijjeyyuṃ, nemipi
atk-abh02a:1955_4: tassa opateyya, akkhopi tassa bhijjeyyā”ti. “Kinnu kho, mahārāja, atiratanabhārena
atk-abh02a:1955_5: sakaṭaṃ bhijjatī”ti? “Āma, bhante”ti. “Evameva kho, mahārāja, atidhammabhārena pathavī calatīti.
atk-abh02a:1956_0: “Apica, mahārāja, imaṃ kāraṇaṃ buddhabalaparidīpanāya osāritaṃ. Aññampi tattha patirūpaṃ
atk-abh02a:1956_1: kāraṇaṃ suṇohi yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti. Yadi, mahārāja,
atk-abh02a:1956_2: dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṃ, parisāya vivādo uppajjeyya – ‘tumhākaṃ
atk-abh02a:1956_3: buddho, amhākaṃ buddho’ti ubhatopakkhajātā bhaveyyuṃ. Yathā, mahārāja, dvinnaṃ balavāmaccānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1956_4: parisāya vivādo uppajjeyya – ‘tumhākaṃ amacco, amhākaṃ amacco’ti ubhatopakkhajātā
atk-abh02a:1956_5: honti; evameva kho, mahārāja, yadi dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṃ, tesaṃ
atk-abh02a:1956_6: parisāya vivādo uppajjeyya – ‘tumhākaṃ buddho, amhākaṃ buddho’ti ubhatopakkhajātā
atk-abh02a:1956_7: bhaveyyuṃ. Idaṃ tāva mahārāja ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti.
